story:
Take Point Now has created an adapted jet ski (personal watercraft or PWC) that can be piloted by a rider with only one arm. Our first prototype exceeded our wildest expectations! We call it the "Linebacker" after Operation Linebacker, which took place in Vietnam in 1972.

As we continue to develop Linebacker, we're moving forward to launch our second adapted prototype, the "Defender", and we need your help to continue inspiring our fellow wounded veterans along with all disabled persons.


Take Point Now is a team of Iraq War veterans and supporters who have set out to inspire all wounded veterans to regain the team dynamic that characterized their military service and to reclaim their amazing lives. Riding on deep water and under open sky is something everyone should experience with their family, friends and community. We're training to break five world records (including the record for crossing the Atlantic Ocean on a jet ski) to prove that as a team, disabled veterans can do anything.


We consider our patent-pending prototypes to be templates for others to improve upon. So, Take Point Now will be making our designs available to anyone who wants to build their own. Our goals are to use the designs to inspire any rider with a disability or injury, and provide the means for them to get an adaptive jet ski to suit their individual needs.
We'd love for engineering schools and fabricators to expand upon what we've done so we can create easier, simpler and more cost effective adaptations. Contact us to facilitate your development effort.


Defender will be completed by Labor Day when we will be taking it out on tour. We'll launch both prototypes at one of our events with the Wounded Warrior Project and continue presenting it at boat conventions and adaptive sports clinics.
We'll get immediate and direct feedback from disabled riders of all types so we can further develop each different style of adaptation to fit all types of injuries and disabilities.


Our jet skis currently represent five services of the military -- Marine Corps, Navy, Coast Guard, Army and Air Force. The "Defender" is named after the Coast Guard's Defender Class search and rescue vessels.

Six skis are named after battles or operations from Vietnam as a heartfelt thank you to all the Vietnam veterans who have been supporting and inspiring today's veterans in hospitals, VA Centers, and in all aspects of civilian life. We THANK YOU ALL. 

Our two prototype PWC's will be wrapped in colors as soon as they are fully tested and ready to join the Take Point Now team in our World Record Preparations.


The answer is simple. On the water, everyone is equal. Personal watercraft provide freedom and excitement, while the PWC community provides fellowship and new friends. Being on the water is energizing and soul changing. Our team leader, PK Ewing, was left with multiple injuries after his Iraq Deployment and sitting on a jet ski (or falling off!) also causes him no further damage.

To learn more, visit our website at www.TakePointNow.com/aboutTPN


What we need to launch Defender:

  • We'll be getting another Kawasaki PWC and double trailer for $11,000. Each of our adapted PWC's is built to overcome a different injury, and we'll be able to take them to events to show everyone what how they function in person.
  • Initially we'll need three custom designed and constructed saddles, including spare seats, materials and labor for a total of $7,200. Different leg and spine injuries will need different adaptations.
  • $4,800 will go towards testing machines in a variety of sea conditions and costs include fuel and travel expenses. We need to test them extensively in calm and rough waters to confirm they will be safe in all conditions.
For your contribution, you can receive Take Point Now apparel, social media recognition, special communication from team members, and a variety of other unique items and experiences. If we don't reach our entire goal, then we'll begin work with what we have and continue our efforts to get sponsors and break world records!


What could it mean to your disabled loved one to enjoy deep water and open sky on a jet ski? It would mean freedom, exhilaration and fellowship on the water.  Until now, missing a hand or an arm meant you couldn't ride a PWC. Until now, a paralyzed person couldn't enjoy a PWC. Take Point Now is changing that completely with our adaptive jet skis.


Entering the water and using powerful watercraft brings inherent risk, and that risk can increase in adaptive sports. But we minimize the risk with smart design and execution. We also minimize the risk by focusing on adding ability to the disabled rider so he or she can become more independent.  We train our riders based on the Coast Guard's standards of training for PWC operations. Finally, we minimize the risk by adhering to the number one rule:  "No one rides alone."


Sometimes people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help in Launching Defender.  Other ways you can help include:

  • Help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign! Tell your friends and family about our campaign.
  • Use the social media icons below to check us out and view our highlight videos. And join us on Pinterest and Instagram, too. (#LaunchingDefender)

story:
Hello Guys, 

We are introducing the Love spray.
This is a 100% natural erection spray for men. 

Love spray is for men of all ages and works quickly and effectively.


Love Spray Can Be Your Ultimate Partner In Love:

Are you facing difficulty in your love life? If you are then here is a solution that can give you a relief from all those erection problems you had been facing until now. You can use this magical spray even if there is a major problem related to erection. It can even perform miracles on those, which had never felt an erection in years. Love life is always sensitive and pleasure of your love partner is essential to lead a peaceful and happy life. There are so many things surrounding us and love life is one of them. The problem that most of the men face related to love life would be either basic problem of erection while love making. It can be due to medicinal effect or some other problem. Whatever the reason may be, the effects are same and worrisome. Apart from this, there are also chances where your love partner needs more from you even after you ejaculate.

Use of the love spray:

This love spray is magical as mentioned and does its job perfectly well for you. Just a spray can change your feeling and you can have unlimited fun and enjoyment with this product. If you want to satisfy your love partner, you can make use of this amazing product every time you want to get erection immediately even after ejaculation. It is just a matter of spraying it once and neither complications to work on nor any exercise routine to get your desire on fire. Carrying a small bottle of spray will help you get to your world in minutes, in seconds in fact.

Enjoy your youthfulness forever:

If you feel you have turned out to be old and have problems erecting then you do not have to worry about it anymore. This magical spray will give out that comfort level that you wander for. You can have all your desires fulfilled even in a difficult situation where you feel you might not be able to perform. Get back your manliness with the help of this spray. You will not believe your own eyes with the kind of result that this product brings to you. So why not give it a try to see how it works wonders for you and support you in your love life. Purchase love spray for the sizzling sex life you and your partner deserve.



Each bottle of LOVE SPRAY contains a supply with normal use (10-15 uses)


A new product, which makes a strong and huge erection possible with all occasions when you want it only... without delay!



Comments from our testers: 

- I had the largest erection of my life!  After erectile dysfunctions problems,  i was happy to test this new product and i had experienced the largest and most wonderful erection of my life!
This product changed my relationship.

- I make love 4 times a day 

- This is an excellent product. It's more enjoyable for my partner. It does not sting or smell, and it's easy to rinse off. I really enjoy using this product.


SCHEDULE

Our product is finished and has been tested by 25 couples.
Now we are raising funds for the production.

We’re so close, but we need your help. 
Please join us be a part of this project!

Launch Campaign:  September 2015 

Start mass production:  1 November 2015


Begin product shipments:  15 December 2015

Retail distribution:  2016
Retail price will be 9$ for each spray


Thanks for your interest in Love Spray!

Even if you’re not able to donate funds to our campaign today, you can still help us out by sharing our campaign with friends and family. Check out the Indiegogo share tools!


RISKS & CHALLENGES

We will start shipping Love spray to our backers in December 2015. We already have fully working product. We just need the funds to start the production 

We will keep you updated on our progress every week.

story:
Why Feng Shui Naturals

As a cosmetologist I know how important it  is for people to look and feel their best. However I believe our health is more important  than  our  vanity. Why potentially sacrifice your health for your beauty when your don't have too? Your skin is the largest organ of your body. Feed it only what it needs without the added junk that only a scientist would understand. Our products are fresh ,natural ,plant based & handcrafted.Making them safe for you and safe for the environment.


Keeping our integrity and keeping up with demand

We have been granted the opportunity to have our products distributed by the largest natural foods market in the country. The momentum is growing and we need your help to keep up with the demand.We will use the funds raised here to purchase our raw materials and packaging in larger quantities to keep the cost down .As well upgrade to commercial equipment while still maintaining the continuity and quality of our products. 

Your contribution will not only make a difference now but also in the future. We are a company that is committed to sustainability as well as the local economy . Growth for a small business equals growth for the families that it supports .We thank you in advance for your contribution and consideration.


Big Things come in small packages 

Small companies are making big strides everyday because of the help from many . We know that collectively we can make a difference . 

Other Ways You Can Help

We know that word of mouth is the best advertisement . Maybe you can't make a financial contribution but you still want to help. Telling  your family and friends about Feng Shui Naturals is a gift all in itself.

story:
THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT! OUR TELOMERE TESTING KITS ARE NOW AVAILABLE AT TELOMERES.TITANOVO.COM

As seen at:


Shipping of our kits is ready to begin: Be an early adopter of our actionable health data!



Telomere Testing For Everyone!

The length of telomeres correlates strongly with:
  • Overall longevity and health
  • Cancer risk
  • Lifestyle choices
Longer telomeres (the protective caps of chromosomes which shorten over the course of a lifetime) are a sign of overall good health. Because telomere length has been proven to be strongly correlated to measures of overall health, it is now possible to use telomere length as a metric of good health.

We believe that anyone who wants should be able to access data concerning their telomere length.
That is why we have developed the first telomere testing kit which will be saliva based, direct-to-consumer, quick, and affordable. While development of our method is complete, we need you to make our efforts worthwhile.
Our team believes that Big Data in the area of telomere length will say a lot about the health of society, and even give insight as to what lifestyles are healthy on a cellular level and what aren't.
For example, long telomere length is strongly correlated to a Mediterranean diet. But there is still a lot to learn, and researchers need you to help get there.
Each Telomere Testing Kit will be delivered with a brief survey used to compare your telomere length with others who have taken our test. Thus, the more peole that take our test, the more valuable the data will be for researchers and participants.

If we meet our stretch goals, we will be able to purchase additional equipment and reagents in bulk to provide you with three additional pieces of information which are correlated with longevity. Those are variations and copies of APOE APOE: (2/2, 2/3, 3/3, 3/4, 4/2, 4/4), APOC3(A/A, A/C, C/C), ACE (I/I, I/D, D/D)  genes. Those (especially APOE) have been shown to have strong correlation with health, longevity and lifespan in humans. If we are able to compare results of this test with telomere length we will make an important step further into understanding of influence of inherited factors vs environmental(lifestyle) factor on telomere length.

Your donation matters

You give:

  • A monetary donation
  • A sample of your saliva
  • An extended survey, stating your age, geographical location, family info and lifestyle. (Data will be kept anonymously at an encrypted vault at Amazon servers)

You get:


  • Access to cutting edge information regarding your telomere length
  • Secure data regarding your telomere length and how lifestyle choices may be affecting it
  • Knowledge is power: The information you need to make positive choices for your general wellbeing

Titanovo gets:


  • Data used to seek patterns concerning the length of telomeres with environmental, genealogical, and lifestyle factors
  • The monetary support necessary to popularize our product and empower more people

Everyone benefits:

  • The (anonymous) data will be used by researchers to advance medical science and research the prevention of chronic conditions
  • Geographical mapping may be useful in identifying regional toxins which are harming regional communities
  • Help us promote healthy living!

Our technology

It is true, there have been several methods to measure the length of telomeres. But ours is different. For one, it stands apart from most methods by analyzing buccal cells (inner cheek) instead of blood for measuring telomeres.
And yes, there are other saliva-based methods for measuring telomeres, but none have been developed which have been successfully launched on a commercial scale for at-home customers.
This is where our technology differs. Due to our proprietary modification of the traditional buccal cell-based quantitative PCR method and specially-crafted primers used, we require only a small amount of DNA to successfully measure telomeres. This solves a key problem that past attempts to commercialize telomere testing kits have faced: the worry of an insufficient sample. In fact, a typical swab of saliva provides 20 times more DNA than is required for our test!
After extensive R&D, and using our test on volunteers, we are absolutely ready to bring our telomere testing kit to market.

Our Team

Oleksandr Savsunenko (Ph.D.), Founder

Dr. Savsunenko earned two PhDs in Macromolecular Chemistry and Organic Chemistry and MSc in Biochemistry. He has a long history of working between industry and academia, with his primary interest being in projects around developing technologies. For Titanovo, Dr. Savsunenko is dedicated to realizing the potential of big data in the medical sciences.

Corey McCarren, Founder

Corey McCarren specializes in public relations and communications, and has worked on business development for a variety of projects in the high-tech field, including Titanovo. Internally, Corey’s focus is on developing scalable business processes, while earning high-quality media attention and developing business relationships and opportunities.

Alex Koliada, Head Scientist

Alex Koliada is a key researcher at the Gerontology Institute in Kiev and is largely resonsible for the development of the telomere test used by Titanovo. He is the Head Scientist at Titanovo and is responsible for managing the laboratory and improving laboratory processe

Risks

The risks for Titanovo are minimal: The method is tried and tested, now we need you, the citizen scientist, to help bring value to our project.

We have also taken the time to make sure that our test is within compliance with all regulations. With that being said, we plan to stay within compliance of national, state, and local regulatory agencies, which given updated guidelines, may pose a future risk to our project.

The data offered by Titanovo grows in value with the number of people who take our test. There is a risk that not enough individuals will take our test to provide meaningful data; however, we believe that with your help, we will be able to achieve the worlds largest database of information on telomere length!

Support us in social media!

Share this project with friends and family and help spread the word about digital health! 

Additional information

Wikipedia on Telomeres

Disclaimer

By supporting our campaign and using our product, you are agreeing to the terms listed below.

Medical Information

At this time we are in no way, shape, or form providing medical advice. The information we provide with our Telomere Testing Kit is for research, educational, and informational use only.

To the fullest extent permissible by law, Titanovo Inc. holds no liability and assumes no risk for any health-related decisions clients may choose to make in reference to the data provided.

Privacy

We encourage you to share your personal data with us to link telomere length with environmental, genealogical, and lifestyle factors, but it is not required. For your safety, your questionnaire data and your results will be anonymized and kept private.  The reason for this citizen science experiment is to gather data to better learn about telomere length. Titanovo will use this data in a non-identifiable way for research in the future, which may be of a commercial nature. You will always be able to export your data from Titanovo at any time at no cost to you.

may choose to make in reference to the data provided.
Privacy 
We encourage you to share your personal data with us to link
telomere length with environmental, genealogical, and lifestyle factors, but it
is not required. For your safety, your questionnaire data and your results will
be anonymized and kept private.  The
reason for this citizen science experiment is to gather data to better learn
about telomere length. Titanovo will use this data in a non-identifiable way
for research in the future, which may be of a commercial nature. You will
always be able to export your data from Titanovo at any time at no cost to you.

story:
Order your CARRYGYM now. Order options are on the right side of the page, under 'Perks.'

The CARRYGYM allows you to burn hundreds of calories from the comfort of your home. There are many workout devices on the market that monitor fitness, but without the physical effort of making it happen, you won’t get in shape.  Little effort produces little results.  CARRYGYM makes working out convenient with resistance bands at your fingertips in place of all the dumbbells, weight stacks, and machines.  You can work out with CARRYGYM inside, outside, in front of the TV or in the office. Carry it with you wherever you go! In addition to this, CARRYGYM is the perfect machine for personal trainers, fitness instructors and gym owners!

           

The CARRYGYM is even accessible by those in a wheelchair! Exercise shouldn't just be about who can go to the gym. We at CARRYGYM make it our goal to bring a healthy and fit lifestyle to anyone who wants it.

A message from the CARRYGYM creator, Ed Wolan: During and after college, strength training became a part of my life.  It ultimately led me to the man who revolutionalized exercise machines, Arthur Jones, inventor of NAUTILUS equipment, and Dr. Ellington Darden, head of research at NAUTILUS.  These two gurus of the fitness industry changed my life. My friend, Gary Stempien, and I opened the first complete NAUTILUS facility in Michigan in the 1970s where we trained thousands of people, including professional athletes.

All of this experience and knowledge is the prelude to this God-given inspiration to invent CARRYGYM.  Over the last couple of years of research and experiments, I am now ready to market CARRYGYM, a 12 lb. revolutionary fitness machine, to the public.  I can proudly and honesty say that CARRYGYM is truly a unique, great fitness machine.

                         

My goal of $7,500 will allow me to buy in bulk quantity and have CARRYGYM ready to ship to customers. We have plans to promote at trade shows and group classes such as karate clubs, churches, health clubs, organizations, or personal training sessions. 

Achieving these goals with your support is extremely valuable to expedite the invention of CARRYGYM to the public.  Having a sales track record will enable me to accomplish my dream of presenting the CARRYGYM on ABC's well-known show,  Shark Tank, thereby helping me to get an investor.

When you support CARRYGYM, you are supporting fitness, health, and well being.  And through that support, you will help me to use CARRYGYM to motivate others to get fit. 

There are many exercises that you can do right in your home with CARRYGYM that are inspired directly from the gym - including incline chest flies, incline chest press, tricep extensions, forward deltoid raises, bicep curls, lower back extensions, upright rows, torso twists and many more. As the poster below shows you, these exercises can even be performed by those in a wheelchair using the CARRYGYM. 

By simply adjusting the CARRYGYM bands, you can easily change your workout from beginner to advanced. A passion for health, fitness, maximum performance and top-notch results is why the CARRYGYM is the new workout machine for you! The CARRYGYM truly is a big gym in a small package.

TESTIMONIALS

"I think CARRYGYM really works! I get as good a workout as I do when I go to the gym."

"CARRYGYM is a portable, versatile piece of equipment that is as good as, if not better, than a whole room full of equipment."

"I much prefer working out at home using the CARRYGYM with varying bands that I can adjust. It is just perfect for me, and I get a really nice workout. Now that my whole family uses the CARRYGYM for our workouts, not only do we save on gas money but also the gym membership fees that are a lot for a family of four. I highly recommend the CARRYGYM for moms who don't have a lot of spare time. I will spend half an hour every couple of days and get as good a workout as I would get using the Nautilus machines at the fitness centers. It really is fantastic and affordable. I love it!"

               


"I have been looking for and trying to create for years some type of easily transportable strength building exercise for my students. All of my students are disabled and need something more in their physical education programs other than skills and games. I have been teaching adapted physical education in the Jurupa School District in California for 16 years, and the CARRYGYM has been the best exercise for me to help my students. It's easy to carry from school to school and has become an added part to my students physical education program. It was also very helpful for me to see the illustrated exercise routines for persons who are in wheelchairs so my students can see others like themselves working on their arms, chest, and back. Finally, a universal piece or exercise equipment for everyone and without exception EVERYONE."

 

     


All perks for this campaign will be shipped upon the end of the campaign.

The CARRYGYM will be sold at the retail price of $229.99. To get yours today, contact inventor Ed Wolan at edwolan@yahoo.com.

Don't forget to follow us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/carrygym and Twitter at https://twitter.com/carrygym!

This product is proudly MADE IN AMERICA!

story:
Spark for Camp Goodtimes

 

Our fundraiser is called Spark and is an outdoor gala at the top of the Sea to Sky Gondola in Squamish, BC on September 19th, 2015 (www.sparkforcampgoodtimes.com).

Picture all the best of camp as you remember it from your childhood, combined with beautiful views and all the glamorous aspects of your favourite gala. That's Spark - there's no gala anything like it! 

Our objective for the fundraiser is two-fold: to increase awareness to fuel larger ongoing support for Camp Goodtimes and to raise as much as money as possible so we can provide more spots for the many kids in need. Help us send more kids to camp!

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

We need funding in order to run the event with the objective of table sales, sponsorship, and on-site activities contributing to a much larger amount of money for Camp Goodtimes. 100% of the net proceeds will go to Camp Goodtimes. We are also looking to have as many aspects of the event donated to keep costs down to ensure more money goes to the camp.

If we reach at least $10,000 of our goal, each person who has contributed to the campaign a minimum of $100 will be entered in to win a table for 8 at Spark with transportation from Vancouver, a gourmet meal, complimentary drinks and full-day access to the Sea to Sky Gondola.

If we reach our fundraising goal of $25,000, there will be a chance for contributors to win two tables.

For more details and to sponsor or attend the event, visit: www.sparkforcampgoodtimes.com 

 

The Impact

 

Why your contribution makes a difference? You are bringing smiles to children and their families who are living with cancer. A fun time and a supportive environment for forming lasting friendships is so important. Help us support Camp Goodtimes, an unforgettable, empowering summer camp experience.

Please watch this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GHBiG8K-Gkk 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

If you can't contribute, please spread the word about our amazing event, Spark!

Our website is www.sparkforcampgoodtimes.com

 

Thank You!

Love,

The Spark Team!

Vancouver, BC

Canada

story:
Beauty of grace

A few years ago my family suffered a loss of a loved one due to cancer after a long fight. Her name was Grace and she was 61 with her first grandchild being only a year old. As a biochemist, I was in the right place at the right time to discover the truth behind the ingredients in everyday personal care products. One ingredient in particular, named Ceteareth, adds cancer causing contaminates found in 46% of products alone. This is just one ingredient in thousands that we use on your bodies everyday causing harm to our health. 


As a result, I have launched Beauty of Grace. Our first product is a creme designed to target wrinkles, uneven skin tone, sun damage, dry skin, and cellulite. Originally designed to be face creme, we decided a large tube with a more affordable price would encourage head to toe use. We love it that much! We will be donating 10% of the profits to cancer research and affected families. This is a revolution to bring new standards to the market and make big corporations reform what ingredients they sell. 

Funding Needed

The funding needed to produce the first 5,000 units is $15,000. The money will be going towards ingredients, packaging and production supplies. We will be selling a 6oz tube on our website www.beautyofgraceskincare.com and on Amazon. Long term we are aiming to be on shelves of all major stores. Any additional funds will go towards research and development.

Goals

The BG creme is made to impact the market with healthier products that won't break the bank. I have worked in the high end cosmetic industry making amazing products costing over $100 each that very few could afford. It's time to bring amazing products to the masses. Profit margins on cosmetic products have gotten out of control. 

Challenges/ Spread the Word

The challenges that stand in my way is getting the word out. I know good ingredients and how to create great products, but I am a biochemist not a social networker. Please help me spread the word, and spread the cause by using #creme4cause. 

Facebook: Beauty of Grace

Instagram: Beauty of Grace

Twitter: @creme4cause

story:
Short Summary

My name is Willem, I am a trans male, equine enthusiast, and rider.  Over the past few years as I have been undergoing my own transition and therapy it came to my attention that I was always under constant stress.  Stress from home, from work and even from friends and family.  As an adult, coping with this stress and anxiety has been difficult.  

The only solace I have found is with animals, a dog and horses.   The more I have been around horses the more my stress has been relieved.  I then realized that if an adult could be under stress from such things, then the stress and anxiety I have been feeling would be 10 fold for a child.  The goal of this program is to bring transgender and gender nonconforming youth together with horses.  In bringing these children together with horses we hope to create a stress free environment where they can release the emotions they are dealing with inside.  Horses don't judge who takes care of them.  All they know is that they are being tended to.  They return that care with love and acceptance.  


How are you helping?

Through your donations I hope to raise at least 125,000 needed to start up this therapy program.  

  • 30,000 as a down payment for the facility or first 6 months rent of a facility to get us started
  • 5,000 - 8,000 per horse purchasing and transportation fees
  • 34,000 to move and higher a trainer for the first year to tend to and train the horses needed for our program
  • 15,000 for a reliable truck
  • 8,000 for a horse trailer
  • various other start up fees include insurance, horse feed and veterinary care for all the animals

The Impact

We hope to impact the lives of transgender children, young adults, and their families in a meaningful way.  Stress and anxiety can be hard for anyone to manage.  In addition to this transgender youth also have to deal with bullying and teasing that comes from their peers and even adults that do not understand.  A child is not always aware of themselves and when teased for trying to become more comfortable in themselves they start to withdrawal.  This isolates them and takes away a part of their life that they will never get back.

By bringing these children into a stress and judgment free environment we hope to allow them to let go of all that they are hiding and holding onto.  We intend to allow them to bond with and have time with a horse to allow healing and a place of refuge to be themselves.  The horses don't judge or look down on those that take care of them.  All they see is the love of a child who wants to be their friend.  A horse is a silent ear to listen to those that will open up to them.  Allowing their caretaker time to heal and learn

Risks & Challenges

Currently we are only a team of 2, one caretaker and a horse trainer.  It will take time to locate the right animals for the program and to get clients for our program.  We will be fully dependent during the first few months on donations of those around us and here on indiegogo for the first few months.  After that it will be time we will have to find enough clients to sustain the care of our animals and rent or mortgage for the property.  Over time we hope to increase staff and animals.  

Other Ways You Can Help

We will always be in need of things for our animals.  Items that can be accepted to help lower costs:

  • Gently used saddles, bridles and halters
  • Older horses that are experienced trail riders 
  • Fresh hay
  • Fresh Straw
  • Carrots and Hard feed
  • Farrier Services

Thank you all for your continued support.  You are helping make this world a little brighter for those that need it!

story:
Short Summary

 

Our Mission:

“Is to develop a great mobile application that end users will appreciate as being an invaluable asset in creating peace of mind for both Civilians and Law Enforcement alike”.

 

Who Are We?

We are a group of frustrated and highly motivated individuals who've decided to come together and work towards finding a solution to one of the most pressing issues in todays national conversation. The lack of understanding, miscommunication and avoidable conflict between Law Enforcement and our communities. We're not here to place blame on any one group or organization but rather to help foster a better dialogue between each other.

 

Our Founder:

My name is Devon Garrett and I'm a 31 year old African American man with a background in supervision & management. I'm just trying to make the world a little better for my kids to live in. (Get a good laugh in about the mustache but know that this is an old picture when I had no choice but to shave my beard lol)

 

Our Thought Process:

  • We think if people were to channel their anger and frustrations into something positive like our app we'll finally be able start focusing on a solution that might help reduce these traffic related incidents. Have you noticed that we all run to social media and cry and complain (including ourselves) whenever there's a civilian killed by a officer or an officer killed by a civilian? What if there was a way to reduce that problem? Would you help? Would you donate? Would you share? Or are you just so complacent with all the assaults and killings among both Law Enforcement and Civilians that it doesn't matter anymore? Once you've spoken your peace across all the social media platforms will you be fine with going back to your daily routine until the next BREAKING NEWS assault or killing grabs another headline?  

 

 

Our Plan, What we need & What you get:

 

The money we raise will be use to do the following

  • Design and Develop
  • Private testing and debugging
  • Beta Testing in select locations to prove viability
  • Debugging and resolving issues & concerns that arise from Beta Testers
  • Market Direct Connect
  • Launch Direct Connect App to the public
  • Upgrading & Supporting Direct Connect and its users
  • Give us the time and space to focus on achieving these goals

So what happens if we don't raise the capital we need in order to develop our app? Well simply put all of the violence, protest, fights, innocent people being assaulted and or killed will continue. You'll log-in to your Facebook and see yet another incident has happened during a traffic stop where either a innocent civilian or cop has been shot dead. You'll voice your opinion while knowing that nothing will ever change. You'll turn on the TV and immediately see a red banner that reads BREAKING NEWS and then you'll watch a video of the incident as you shake your head and talk about it with your kids as everybody starts to take sides.

 

This will be the routine until maybe one day the person who's involved in the incident on the news is you or a loved one. We aren't saying that Direct Connect will completely and immediately solve the problem but we believe it's a start, that maybe it'll able to help reduce these types of events from occurring. Think of your donation more as an investment in your future safety or peace of mind and help us help you.

 

Perks & Rewards!!!

So we have come up with a fair and generous way to reward those who believe in our idea and have donated in order to see it through to its conception. Reward/Perk list as followed...(PS in order to be eligible  to receive one of the Perks you have to click on the specific perk option you want on the side of this page, otherwise you're just contributing regardless of receiving a reward or perk)

1. $1- A sincere thank you from our team plus updates on our progress.

 

2. $5 to $10 tiers-  Earns you a FREE 6 month subscription once our app launches and a sincere thank you from our team plus updates on our progress. (First 1000 receives this Perk)

 

3. $25- Earns you a FREE 9 month subscription once app launches (First 400 receives this perk), plus if you live in a select area in which we decide to test before the official product launch you'll have the option of being a Beta Tester and provide us feedback directly(Number of Testers TBD by Beta Test needs). Also a sincere thank you and shoutout from us on our Facebook and or Twitter pages plus updates on our progress.

 

4. $50- Earns you a FREE subscription for an entire YEAR plus a personal thank you card from our team to you and a shoutout from us on our Facebook and or Twitter pages. Plus more detailed PRIVATE updates on our progress.(First 150 receives the YEAR subscription and thank you card)

 

5. $100 to $250 tier- Earns you an entire 3 year subscription FREE of charge. A more personal shoutout from our team on our Facebook and or Twitter pages. Detailed PRIVATE updates on our progress and receive a bumper sticker of our logo. (Bumper Stickers & Free subscriptions go to 1st  200 contributors in this tier. Shipped only to those in the USA)

 

6. $500- Earns you 3 LIFETIME subscriptions FREE of charge (To First 75). A more personal shoutout from our team on our Facebook and or Twitter pages. Detailed PRIVATE updates on our progress and receive 3 bumper stickers with our logo.  Also have your name added to a honorary contributor section on our website for the life of the site. Lastly, express your ideas and concerns or just have a chat with our founder Devon Garrett by receiving a personal phone call. Ships only in USA

Besides the fact that you might be making it possible to save lives, I hope that these rewards & perks are incentive enough to get you to donate to our cause.

(Disclaimer- If app ends up not being viable (Please see Risk & Challenges below) all Perks and Rewards will still be given apart from those having to do with receiving subscriptions for obvious reasons.)

 

The Impact:

  • With just a little contribution from you we have the chance to start moving in the right direction and start creating a better dialogue between the people who are sworn to protect and serve us and the community in which they preform those duties. The majority of our citizens wake up, give their children a kiss before dropping them off at school and heading out for the day not expecting to be killed by an officer who jumps the gun during a 'routine traffic stop' which is already a nerve-racking situation. On the other hand the majority of officers wake up and kiss their kid(s) goodbye before heading into a job where they are never guaranteed to see their own family again because they could be preforming a "routine traffic stop" that may cost them their life. Our world is definitely imperfect and that's why we're asking you to help in improving it.

(The choice is in your hands)

You have the opportunity to help create societal impact.

 

Risks & Challenges

1. As with any crowdfunding campaign there's a risk of not obtaining enough funding in order to successfully complete your projects goals due to unforeseen issues and changes. So to help alleviate some of that risk we are also looking for accredited investors who could help bridge the gap between the money that we've personally put into to our project and the money that we've raised from all of you generous people.

 

2. Law Enforcement Agencies will play a very important role in making Direct Connect a reality. They have to want to be associated with our service in order for this to come together properly and become an effective tool in creating that communication and understanding that we all hope to one day see come to fruition. We will strive to do our very best at showing them the benefits (both short term and long term) of having a tool like this become apart of their community outreach departments so we can start to improve the Community to Law Enforcement and vice versa relationship with each other.

     

     

    Other Ways You Can Help :

    If you read this far we hope you've decided to donate and become apart of the solution by helping our app become reality. BUT if you can't contribute monetarily there are other ways you can help us reach our goal. If you can take a minute or 2 of your time and help share our campaign page across your social media platforms it could go along way in producing the results we need.

    Also the worlds oldest and truest form of getting the word out is through 'Word Of Mouth" which is still the best proven way to market your ideas. We'd be forever grateful if you could spread our campaign and make some noise about it! The more eyes and ears the better.

    A word from our founder - Thank you for taking the time to read about our campaign. I hope we've enlightened you on what we see as the problem and how we plan on helping to reduce it. Please don't be negative or put down our ideas, especially if you haven't put any skin in the game to help find a solution. At least we're trying.

    Don't forget to visit our Facebook and Twitter pages where you can Like and follow us to receive updates. Also you can visit us at http://www.directconnectapp.net/ where you can drop us a line while signing up for our email list for exclusive product updates.
story_txt:
Short Summary
 
Our Mission: 
“Is to develop a great mobile application that end users will appreciate as being an invaluable asset in creating peace of mind for both Civilians and Law Enforcement alike”.
 
Who Are We?
We are a group of frustrated and highly motivated individuals who've decided to come together and work towards finding a solution to one of the most pressing issues in todays national conversation. The lack of understanding, miscommunication and avoidable conflict between Law Enforcement and our communities. We're not here to place blame on any one group or organization but rather to help foster a better dialogue between each other.

 
Our Founder: 
My name is Devon Garrett and I'm a 31 year old African American man with a background in supervision & management. I'm just trying to make the world a little better for my kids to live in. (Get a good laugh in about the mustache but know that this is an old picture when I had no choice but to shave my beard lol)

 
Our Thought Process:
We think if people were to channel their anger and frustrations into something positive like our app we'll finally be able start focusing on a solution that might help reduce these traffic related incidents. Have you noticed that we all run to social media and cry and complain (including ourselves) whenever there's a civilian killed by a officer or an officer killed by a civilian? What if there was a way to reduce that problem? Would you help? Would you donate? Would you share? Or are you just so complacent with all the assaults and killings among both Law Enforcement and Civilians that it doesn't matter anymore? Once you've spoken your peace across all the social media platforms will you be fine with going back to your daily routine until the next BREAKING NEWS assault or killing grabs another headline?  

 

 

Our Plan, What we need & What you get:

 
The money we raise will be use to do the following

Design and Develop
Private testing and debugging
Beta Testing in select locations to prove viability
Debugging and resolving issues & concerns that arise from Beta Testers
Market Direct Connect
Launch Direct Connect App to the public
Upgrading & Supporting Direct Connect and its users
Give us the time and space to focus on achieving these goals

So what happens if we don't raise the capital we need in order to develop our app? Well simply put all of the violence, protest, fights, innocent people being assaulted and or killed will continue. You'll log-in to your Facebook and see yet another incident has happened during a traffic stop where either a innocent civilian or cop has been shot dead. You'll voice your opinion while knowing that nothing will ever change. You'll turn on the TV and immediately see a red banner that reads BREAKING NEWS and then you'll watch a video of the incident as you shake your head and talk about it with your kids as everybody starts to take sides.
 
This will be the routine until maybe one day the person who's involved in the incident on the news is you or a loved one. We aren't saying that Direct Connect will completely and immediately solve the problem but we believe it's a start, that maybe it'll able to help reduce these types of events from occurring. Think of your donation more as an investment in your future safety or peace of mind and help us help you.

 
Perks & Rewards!!!

So we have come up with a fair and generous way to reward those who believe in our idea and have donated in order to see it through to its conception. Reward/Perk list as followed...(PS in order to be eligible  to receive one of the Perks you have to click on the specific perk option you want on the side of this page, otherwise you're just contributing regardless of receiving a reward or perk)
1. $1- A sincere thank you from our team plus updates on our progress.
 
2. $5 to $10 tiers-  Earns you a FREE 6 month subscription once our app launches and a sincere thank you from our team plus updates on our progress. (First 1000 receives this Perk)
 
3. $25- Earns you a FREE 9 month subscription once app launches (First 400 receives this perk), plus if you live in a select area in which we decide to test before the official product launch you'll have the option of being a Beta Tester and provide us feedback directly(Number of Testers TBD by Beta Test needs). Also a sincere thank you and shoutout from us on our Facebook and or Twitter pages plus updates on our progress.
 
4. $50- Earns you a FREE subscription for an entire YEAR plus a personal thank you card from our team to you and a shoutout from us on our Facebook and or Twitter pages. Plus more detailed PRIVATE updates on our progress.(First 150 receives the YEAR subscription and thank you card)
 
5. $100 to $250 tier- Earns you an entire 3 year subscription FREE of charge. A more personal shoutout from our team on our Facebook and or Twitter pages. Detailed PRIVATE updates on our progress and receive a bumper sticker of our logo. (Bumper Stickers & Free subscriptions go to 1st  200 contributors in this tier. Shipped only to those in the USA)
 
6. $500- Earns you 3 LIFETIME subscriptions FREE of charge (To First 75). A more personal shoutout from our team on our Facebook and or Twitter pages. Detailed PRIVATE updates on our progress and receive 3 bumper stickers with our logo.  Also have your name added to a honorary contributor section on our website for the life of the site. Lastly, express your ideas and concerns or just have a chat with our founder Devon Garrett by receiving a personal phone call. Ships only in USA
Besides the fact that you might be making it possible to save lives, I hope that these rewards & perks are incentive enough to get you to donate to our cause.
(Disclaimer- If app ends up not being viable (Please see Risk & Challenges below) all Perks and Rewards will still be given apart from those having to do with receiving subscriptions for obvious reasons.)
 


The Impact:

With just a little contribution from you we have the chance to start moving in the right direction and start creating a better dialogue between the people who are sworn to protect and serve us and the community in which they preform those duties. The majority of our citizens wake up, give their children a kiss before dropping them off at school and heading out for the day not expecting to be killed by an officer who jumps the gun during a 'routine traffic stop' which is already a nerve-racking situation. On the other hand the majority of officers wake up and kiss their kid(s) goodbye before heading into a job where they are never guaranteed to see their own family again because they could be preforming a "routine traffic stop" that may cost them their life. Our world is definitely imperfect and that's why we're asking you to help in improving it.
(The choice is in your hands)


You have the opportunity to help create societal impact.
 
Risks & Challenges
1. As with any crowdfunding campaign there's a risk of not obtaining enough funding in order to successfully complete your projects goals due to unforeseen issues and changes. So to help alleviate some of that risk we are also looking for accredited investors who could help bridge the gap between the money that we've personally put into to our project and the money that we've raised from all of you generous people.
 
2. Law Enforcement Agencies will play a very important role in making Direct Connect a reality. They have to want to be associated with our service in order for this to come together properly and become an effective tool in creating that communication and understanding that we all hope to one day see come to fruition. We will strive to do our very best at showing them the benefits (both short term and long term) of having a tool like this become apart of their community outreach departments so we can start to improve the Community to Law Enforcement and vice versa relationship with each other.



 
 

Other Ways You Can Help :

If you read this far we hope you've decided to donate and become apart of the solution by helping our app become reality. BUT if you can't contribute monetarily there are other ways you can help us reach our goal. If you can take a minute or 2 of your time and help share our campaign page across your social media platforms it could go along way in producing the results we need.

Also the worlds oldest and truest form of getting the word out is through 'Word Of Mouth" which is still the best proven way to market your ideas. We'd be forever grateful if you could spread our campaign and make some noise about it! The more eyes and ears the better.

Please don't be negative or put down our ideas, especially if you haven't put any skin in the game to help find a solution. At least we're trying.

story:
The bee2gether vibe is an innovative couples sex toy designed to bring women to orgasm during intercourse. This patent-pending innovation has been designed by renowned Sex Therapist, Kelli Young, to help couples achieve their highest states of arousal and orgasm during sex. With a wireless remote that is controlled by her, and a unique Pleasure Zone Design, the bee2gether vibe ensures intense stimulation exactly where and how she wants it every time. Waterproof, and made from medical grade silicone, the bee2gether vibe comes in a discreet, rechargeable carrying case so you can take it with you anywhere!

The bee2gether vibe is worn comfortably on the penis allowing its unique, patent-pending Pleasure Zone Design to stimulate her in just the right spot during love making. With the powerful vibration and wireless remote, she is in control the entire time – from foreplay to mind-blowing orgasm!



After months of product design, development and testing we have released the first phase of production to a select group of couples to test drive the bee2gether vibe for themselves. We wanted to get real input from real couples to ensure that the bee2gether vibe lived up to their expectation. Here is a sample of the feedback we received from our lucky testers!

Kelli Young is the creator of the revolutionary new and innovative vibrating couples' sexual enhancement device –The bee2gether vibe – and its unique "Pleasure Zone Design".

Kelli Young earned her degree in occupational therapy in 1992 from the University of Western Ontario, and since that time, she has practiced in hospital, community, and private practice settings. She currently runs her own successful private practice, providing sex therapy and couple therapy.

Kelli believes strongly in the pursuit of life-long learning and professional advancement. In 1998, Kelli earned a diploma in group psychotherapy from the Canadian Group Psychotherapy Association (CGPA),. In 2005, she earned a Master's degree (M.Ed.) in Counseling Psychology from the University of Toronto. That same year she received a Graduate Certificate in Couple and Family Therapy Studies from the University of Guelph. Kelli also has extensive training and certifcations in Sex Therapy: She has completed an Intensive Sex Therapy Training Institute (2001); an Advanced Training Program in Treating Female Sexual Dysfunction (2002); the Sexual Attitudes Reassessment (SAR) training program (2006); and a practicum in sexual medicine and counselling. 

Kelli is a Registered Psychotherapist practicing in Toronto, Canada. She is also a Registered Sex Therapist and a clinical member of the Board of Examiners in Sex Therapy and Counselling in Ontario (BESTCO). Additionally, she is a Registered Marriage and Family Therapist and a member of the Registry of Marriage and Family Therapists in Canada (RMFT). She is also a Clinical Fellow of the American Association For Marriage and Family Therapists (AAMFT).

This wealth of education and training, combined with years of experience in helping individuals and couples to improve their intimate relationships, has lead Kelli Young to the development of the bee2gether vibe.

Risks & Challenges

The greatest challenges we have faced to date is debugging the technology for wireless communications, and production delays. 

We are well qualified to avoid these issues as the technology was developed by a team of engineers and current prototypes are working very well.

Production delays are a risk with any new product but we are working with a solid manufacturer that has operations on the ground in North American and China and have done significant due diligence on their expertise and ability to meet delivery schedules.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help us spread the buzz of the bee2gether vibe. This fun and exciting new product will help spice up couples' relationships across the country. We thank you in advance for your interest and support!!

story:
The Better Leagues Better Lives Campaign:  Get Your League Free Brand-Name Teamwear, Premium Access & Expert Help to Raise $50,000 for Your Youth League 

15-year youth sports league officer Anne-Sophie Whitehead started the media community League Network to help her 300,000 fellow volunteers in North America's 41,000 leagues and 21 team sports make better leagues and better lives.  League Network's motto, "Better Leagues Better Lives," comes from Anne-Sophie's discovery that no matter where you live, better youth sports leagues mean higher high school graduation rates and lower youth crime rates.  She learned how to slow embezzlement from youth leagues that has recently landed 1,100 coaches and trustees in jail, caused over 450 leagues to go bust and left nearly 100,000 kids without sports.  She unveiled the secrets of training and recruiting and raising funds and saving her league big bucks by buying smart.  And she built the world's largest database of youth leagues and their officers.  So along with her publisher husband Jay Whitehead and NFL veteran (Miami Dolphins, Dallas Cowboys, Carolina Panthers) and high school athletic director JR Tolver and digital marketer Erik Adamonis, she founded LeagueNetwork.com, League Network Magazine, and League Growth Assisted Fundraising to help league officers do 4 things to make better leagues and better lives: Learn best practices, Connect with other league officers, Save money by buying smarter, and Grow by raising funds.   League Network is a Public Benefit Corporation, which means we are legally required to track and report our social impact, which is defined as the amount of money we help leagues raise to support their kids.  

Youth Sports League Officers Need a League Network Subscription. Here's How to Get It & Great Spiritwear Free!  

  • League Network's media and fundraising platforms have already helped many league managers. Now we want to prove that League Network can generate at least $25,000 in Premium subscriptions with the Better Leagues, Better Lives campaign, which will allow us to expand our Assisted Fundraising capability to generate $millions more and deliver fantastic content and connections and buying tools for worthy leagues like yours.   Every dollar over $25,000 accelerates the process.  And if we hit $100,000, we can even hire more fundraisers who can help League Network help more leagues even faster.  Every week in North America, 3 to 5 youth sports leagues fail due to lack of funding or mismanagement, leaving hundreds or thousands of kids stranded.  Don't let this happen!  
  • The Better Leagues, Better Lives Campaign is simple, easy and inexpensive.  There are 5 levels of participation:  $19, $59, $99, $149 and $199, with ascending reward levels.    
  • For $19, get a $15 cash coupon for your league's logowear at Squadlocker, and a $45 Preferred League Network subscription with full access to League Network content, connections and the buyer's guide. 
  • For $59, get a $45 cash coupon for logowear and a $45 Preferred League Network subscription. 
  • For $99, get a $90 cash coupon for logowear and a $299 Premium League Network subscription that gets your league full content, connection and buyer's guide access, PLUS access to no-upfront-fee assisted fundraising of up to $50,000. 
  • For $149, get a $120 cash coupon for logowear and the Premium sub with $50,000 fundraising.   
  • And for $199, our most popular level, get a $175 cash coupon for logowear, and the $50,000 fundraising feature.  
  • All your funds will go to building League Network's capabilities to help your league's coaches and managers to Learn best practices, Connect with other leagues, Save by buying smart, and to Grow your league.

Other Ways You Can Help--Including Adopt-A-League!

Some of you just can't contribute, but you can still help make Better Leagues Better Lives a success.  Here's are things you can do: 

Adopt-A-League!  You can buy one of the levels and adopt another league to take advantage of the Campaign perks.  We'll take care of the adoption for you.  And you will have done your part to make Better Leagues Better Lives. 

Refer friends to the Better Leagues on social media such as Twitter, Facebook and LinkedIn, or via email.   Use this link in your messages:  https://igg.me/at/leaguenetwork

Even if you don't contribute, if you use the Indiegogo share tools for social media, we can track how many referrals you've made and you can win one of our valuable Referral Rewards to be announced on the 30th day of the Better Leagues Better Lives Campaign. 

The Better Leagues, Better Lives Campaign's Impact

"Better Leagues, Better Lives" is League Network's motto.  It came from Anne-Sophie and Jay Whitehead's experience that regardless of a community's socioeconomic status, its quality of life is higher if it has well-run youth sports leagues.  Anne-Sophie, Jay and NFL veteran JR Tolver are successful media and social entrepreneurs committed to social impact, and with many years' professional experience in media, sports leagues and marketing.  Leading companies such as Corporate Responsibility Magazine, the 100 Best Corporate Citizens List and Tickets-for-Charity, the League Network team has raised tens of $millions for good causes and helped the world's largest companies measure $billions in social and environmental impact, and improve their practices to do even better.  And remember, League Network PBC is a Public Benefit Corporation, which means we are legally required to track and report our social impact, which is defined as the amount of money we raise for youth sport leagues to support their players, officers and coaches.      

Risks & Challenges

We know how hard it is for league officers and coaches to do what they do as volunteers.  We also know how hard it is to launch a new media and fundraising company--between us, we've launched 15 companies, several of which have been quite successful.  We know how to make League Network work, because we've seen the upside and the downside of social entrepreneurship.  

One thing we know for sure--without the support of league managers and coaches like you, League Network cannot fulfill its commitment to better leagues and better lives.  So even if you don't support the Better Leagues Better Lives campaign, we'd love to hear from you.  Email AnneSophie@LeagueNetwork.com and tell us how we can improve.  And we'd love for you to share this campaign with your social networks, using Indiegogo's sharing tools right on the campaign page--share using your social networks--Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Instagram, etc.  

We know how to make this campaign successful.  Over the course of the 60-day Better Leagues Better Lives Campaign, you'll see us add video messages, add rewards for referrals, and add celebrity and league leader endorsements.

story:
The growth of the Dental industry has been higher than that of medical practices as advances in cosmetic dentistry have allowed people to have “quick fixes” to their smiles.

Dental Operatory ready for Dental Implant patient

Continued advances in dental care, orthodontic sciences, and cosmetic dental procedures will continue to drive more patients to dentists for cosmetic and elective dental procedures. One visit service for many procedures, such as crowns is now possible.

Dental Laboratory for large dental group.  Fitting and adjustments made while the patient waits during (1) visit. 

Tooth Doctor LLC Finance company provide onsite financing for elective dental procedures, which substantially increases patients’ ability to afford cosmetic dental work.

Tooth Doctor LLC Easy Pay Finance Program

Several computerized Milling units start work on implants and appliances for patients based on patient x-rays.  Computer-aided design and computer-aided manufacturing programs interpret the x-rays and tell the milling machines what to manufacture for the patient.

Why 100% PRETTAU ZIRCONIA is better than metal/ceramic dental appliances:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ilWDSLapCCw

Tooth Doctor LLC technicians have intense on-going technical training with Zirkonzahn Worldwide.  Yes, there is an art course to ensure correct color match of implants.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kC1j-5cuPYE

Dental Industry Trends

  • New technology will reduce chair time for patients
  • Implant Procedures will be driven by prosthetics
  • Patients prefer Dentists with computer aided technology. The quality of work is superior.
  • Implants are an economic option for patients
  • In-house dental Laboratory enables Dentist to complete a procedure in (1) visit versus (4) visits for exam, extraction, modeling, fitting and adjustments.  
  • Implants will be 30% of a Dentist’s business by 2020

A Senior Group of USA Dentists, trained at prestigious Universities, lead a team of International Doctors that provide State of the Art Restorative Cosmetic Dentistry utilizing Zirkonzahn equipped Dental Laboratories enabling one visit service for many clients.

 

TOOTH DOCTOR LLC  appreciates your support with these gifts:

  • $35 Contribution = Zirconia Adjustable Grind Mill:

The grinding mechanism is made from an advanced Zirconia ceramic close in hardness to diamond. The same Zirconia found in Tooth Doctor crowns & implants. It will never rust thus provides ultra-long- life performance. Excellent when fine results are needed in recipes that call for ground spices or seeds.

 

  • $50 Contribution = Ziconia Roller Tip Pen: 

Zirconia Pen has an advanced ceramic ball tip. Features a ribbed rubber finger grip for comfort.  The ultimate writing experience. The extremely smooth ceramic ball glides effortlessly as it lays down water-based ink for an elegant touch to your personal signature !  The same tough Zirconia compound is used to manufacture Tooth Doctor implants.

 

  • $150 Contribution = Zirconia Ceramic Coffee Grinding Mill:

This Zirconia ceramic coffee mill features a grinding mechanism that will never alter the flavor of the grinds, resulting in fresh, flavorful coffee. The grinding mechanism: made from Zirconia close in hardness to diamond that will never rust providing ultra long-life performance: same material in Tooth Doctor crowns. * A must for Turkish coffee.

 

  • $200 Contribution = Zirconia Ceramic Kitchen Scissors:

Zirconia ceramic kitchen scissors are rust-proof and chemically inert. The advanced ceramic blades deliver long-lasting sharpness and are precisely aligned, achieving clean, straight cuts. Close in material hardness to diamond, the durability of these non-corrosive blades is extremely suitable for moisture-prone environments.

story:
Watercolor Paintings turned into Yoga Mats!

•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••
 

 


~ Made with Eco-Friendly Materials ~
My mats are made using an eco-friendly sustainable natural tree rubber and a suede-like microfiber cloth. No glue. No PVC. This also means no unpleasant odor when you remove it from the packaging.

~ Non-Slip . Super Absorbent . Washable ~
These mats feature an ultra-soft, bacteria-resistant microfiber surface that serves as a yoga towel and mat combination. It lends just the right amount of grip, absorbency and support. From Hatha to Bikram, these towel-combo mats will allow you to move, breathe, and sweat without worry of slippage. When it needs a wash, spot clean with a castile or mild soap & water mix and then air dry.

~ Unique + Artfully Designed ~
My mats are the only hand-designed watercolor yoga mat on the market! Each yoga mat I make comes from one of my original watercolor paintings, of which you will receive a small postcard size print with your purchase. Even though these mats are pieces of a greater whole, each is specifically designed to stand alone as its own beautiful work of art.

~ Lightweight  ~
Measures 183cm x 61cm, 4mm thickness

 

 

 

 

 

•  PICK YOUR DESIGN  •

 

Please refer to the labeled yoga mats in the images below before purchasing your perk. Please be sure you are selecting the mat of your choice.

 

****For Los Angeles locals, I am offering a LOCALS ONLY perk that will save on shipping.

•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

 

Perks of Funding!

These are limited time early-bird prices!

Don't see a perk that suits your needs? Please email me at info@lucenthueyoga.com and we can discuss an order specialized for you.

 

 

  • $15 – Receive a 4 pack of blank hand-painted watercolor Thank You cards for your personal use.
  • $25 – You will receive an 8”x11” print of a special LHY watercolor painting. This painting will only be offered as a print during this campaign.
  • $65 + SHIPPING – You will receive one Iriah watercolor yoga mat. 
  • $65 (Los Angeles Locals ONLY) - You will receive the Iriah Mat. Pick up in Los Angeles.
  • $65 + SHIPPING – You will receive one Coral watercolor yoga mat
  •  $65 - (Los Angeles Locals ONLY) - You will receive the Coral Mat. Pick up in Los Angeles.
  • $65 + SHIPPING – You will receive one Chimera watercolor yoga mat.
  • $65 (Los Angeles Locals ONLY) - You will receive the Chimera Mat. Pick up in Los Angeles.
  • $65 + SHIPPING – You will receive one Esme watercolor yoga mat.
  • $65 (Los Angeles Locals ONLY) - You will receive the Esme Mat. Pick up in Los Angeles.
  • $240 – Receive 4 LHY watercolor yoga mats (one of each design).

 

 

 

 

 

How else can you get involved?

 

 

 

If you are not in a position to back this project financially, you can still get involved by helping me reach a larger audience.

SHARE SHARE SHARE!

Spread the love!

Follow Lucent Hue Yoga on Instagram and Facebook to stay linked!

•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

 

Why am I using Indiegogo?

My designs are complete and I have a manufacturer that I have been working with who is fantastic. However, in order to go into full scale production, and make this venture sustainable for you, I need to secure the funding through obtaining pre-orders!

Your contribution will go directly to production. No if's, and's, or but's about it. You want one of these beautiful yoga mats, I want to give it to you! So now is the time to grab one! Once this pre-order window ends, I cannot guarantee the availability of these designs in my online store. <3

•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

About The Artist:

 

I'm Stephanie, practicing yogi and painter, among other things! My hope, as a yogi who started out on her yoga journey from a place of injury and pain, is that the art that I've created for these yoga mats inspires the new yogi to roll out their mat more often - especially on days that push back at you. I hope you are reminded to make more time for yourself, for the injured parts of yourself you've been neglecting, or to simply explore your magnificently colorful depths. I believe that art and yoga both teach us to make space for inspired breakthroughs, as well as quiet our minds so that we can hear the voice within us that may have gotten lost over time. Above all else, I hope to always honor the Light that guides us further in line with our most expansive, Highest Self.

<3

My background:

 

Since the time I learned how to hold a crayon, expressing myself creatively was a monumental part of how I defined myself. I spent much of my time as a performer, training classically in all the facets of dance and theater. Back at home in my childhood bedroom, I loved to sit for hours drawing and exploring the world of shapes and color. Over time, my drawing hobby became a valuable tool for emotional healing, meditation, empowerment and deeper soul expression. Shortly after college while working a job far outside the artistic sector, I sustained a dance injury, and with the intention of healing my body, I bought my first yoga mat. 

For months, I rolled out my mat in my living room every day, and very quickly found myself in love with how incredible my mind and body felt even after only 15 minutes on my mat. As my body began to heal, my heart began to heal and flourish despite the old pain patterns, blockages, and negativity I'd internalized over the years. During this time, I started picking up my paintbrushes again every day, learning new techniques and letting go of any expectations. Power. Serenity. Love. Presence. All of these self-sustained, grown beneath my feet. I realized how far I had come from that creator I had once been as a child. Looking back on it now I know that I embarked on what is most likely the Renaissance of my life. I've come home to myself - through art, through yoga. One a particularly poignant day on my  mat in the summer of 2015, I made a promise to the child inside me, to share my experience and my art with others in a way that felt meaningful and true. 

I love the idea that yoga can be experienced on a piece of art. Besides, there are far too many plain yoga mats out there! Come practice on a watercolor painting! How fun is that!?

 

 

 

 

 

You are a beautiful color in a big sky of a painting, my friend. 

Thank you for being here, in this act of creation, with me.

Namaste.

 

Gratitude + Love 

I am so grateful to have an amazing community, family and friends alike. With their support I am one step closer to actualizing my dream.

•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••
Professional Video/Photography by

Daniel Sliwa Photography
•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••
Music by

Ron Bunney & Stephanie Crothers

•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

 

 

Thank you for contributing to this creative dream

from the bottom of my heart,

Stephanie

 

 

 
"To make living itself a work of art, that is the goal."

(Henry Miller, author/painter)

story:
CoRNerstone was founded after we recognized a huge need for healthcare support in the community. The increase seen across the board this year for corporate insurance plans was devastating. We saw that by combining our knowledge to create a corporate well-being program, we could help the most people in our community and create a win-win for the employees as well as the employers. We have to start working together as a community if we want to gain some control back over these skyrocketing healthcare costs. 

 Our mission is to become the "cornerstone healthcare" meaning that all roads will lead back to one entity that can track and coordinate a family or company's healthcare; we want to be the one constant that is always there to answer questions or assist with healthcare decisions and ties all of the many arms of your healthcare plan together. We want to create a family atmosphere and healthcare setting for our members that provide transparent pricing, an easy to use patient portal, and I know its crazy... but real live, experienced registered nurses driving the program. We believe that PREVENTION IS KEY... its importance comes right after employee engagement. If no ones utilizing the program, it really makes no difference how great the program or prevention strategies are. 


Short Summary
