story:
LiKiDA Story

The Idea started from need, We had always been users of reusable Water bottles but always felt frustrated when cleaning the bottle, it would take so long and you would need a special brush and you could never tell if the bottle was clean or not. And then you had to let it dry or stick a ton of paper inside to dry it; there had to be a better way; and that's when the idea for the bottle appeared. After many months of brainstorming the concept was born. Then, as we started to dig deeper into the impact that using a reusable water bottle could have in the environment we knew we had something special.

WHAT MAKES OUR BOTTLE UNIQUE
First its the World's first bottle to open in the middle. WHY? First it makes cleaning a breeze (check our video). Not just we were able to design and engineer a bottle that opens in the middle but the amazing part was that we were able to do that without making the bottle look bulky, the threads on the bottle are flushed with the body, so most people don't even notice that the bottle opens in the middle, also that makes LiKiDA bottles able to fit on standard bike bottle cages and cup holders. Plus LiKiDA bottles are super strong, believe us we have tested them endlessly, drops, run overs, bike rides, camping trips you name it we have done it. So be confident that we did our testing.



What We Need & What You Get

So LiKiDA was started solely by both of us (Nuno and Monica), novices in this field, and never had started a business before. This was beyond anything we had ventured, and it was scary and challenging, but we had an Idea and a Dream so we knew we had to go for it!

Business expenses started piling in, first we designed and got the Provisional patent and then the Non-provisional and then other business costs, started to burn through a lot of money. We never took a penny from the business to pay ourselves. Then we decided to order the first batch of bottles, maybe not the smartest move, and that’s when we ran into trouble, money ran out and we were stuck with merchandise but no money to continue operating the business. We were in deep debt, which meant that both of us had to go back to our full-time jobs again, but we never gave up, and kept working on LiKiDA.

So we are here now, to ask you for your support to get the business back up again. We have the bottles in stock, so be confident that you are not supporting a wanna be product, we have the bottles ready to ship to your home and ready to be used. We learned a lot, and made some novices  mistakes, but we are ready now with your support to Kick start our Dream and to take it into the next gear!


By supporting our campaign you will allow our dream: of building a meaningful company; to stay alive by providing us with the resources to continue to run the business and for us to continue to develop products that have positive impact in the environment and in the world.

Specs

.18oz 500ml
.100% 304 Food Grade STAINLESS STEEL BOTTLE
.BPA FREE CAP
.100% RECYCLABLE
.UNIQUE DESIGN AND FEATURE



The Impact

By buying LIKIDA bottles you will be helping remove millions of bottles from landfills and the oceans and bring awareness to the destructive impact that single use water bottles have in our ecosystem. Billions of bottles end up in landfills or worst floating in our oceans where they are not decomposed but reduced to tiny fragments that are ingested by the fish getting them sick and us when we eat them, plus destroying their fragile ecosystem. We have realized from years of using reusable water bottles that it doesn't change your way of life. I'm a believer that it makes it better; I'm a huge supporter that using a reusable water bottle is way more practical to use, besides the obvious health benefits, it's so easy to refill the bottles these days, airports, refilling stations, and every restaurant will allow you to refill your bottle and their water is filtered what else could you ask for. Help us reduce the impact that single use water bottles have in our environment.




Risks & Challenges

We all know that building a successful  business is no easy task and we have made our share of mistakes, but also we have learned a lot. We know there's still challenges ahead, and that's what drives us to continue and its what kept us from never giving up and keep on fighting for something we believe in. We are passionate individuals who believe that alone we are weak but together we can make a difference in the world.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone can help with money and that's ok, your voice is very important, so if you can help us share our story and help us bring awareness to our Bottle then that is all we could ever ask from you.



FAQS

What colors are available?
At the moment will only have 3 colors to choose from, Silver, Black and Green. Please Email us with your color preferences after your purchase at likidamail@gmail.com

Do bottles leak?
No, they don't. We spent a lot of time making sure that there were no leaks, we have personally used the bottles for over a year with no problems.

What material are they made?
The bottles are made of 304 food grade stainless steel, the cap is made of BPA free plastic, and the seals are made of food grade silicone.

          

        

Monica Cabral and Nuno Branco

          Founders of LiKiDA
story_txt:
LiKiDA Story
The Idea started from need, We had always been users of reusable Water bottles but always felt frustrated when cleaning the bottle, it would take so long and you would need a special brush and you could never tell if the bottle was clean or not. And then you had to let it dry or stick a ton of paper inside to dry it; there had to be a better way; and that's when the idea for the bottle appeared. After many months of brainstorming the concept was born. Then, as we started to dig deeper into the impact that using a reusable water bottle could have in the environment we knew we had something special.WHAT MAKES OUR BOTTLE UNIQUEFirst its the World's first bottle to open in the middle. WHY? First it makes cleaning a breeze (check our video). Not just we were able to design and engineer a bottle that opens in the middle but the amazing part was that we were able to do that without making the bottle look bulky, the threads on the bottle are flushed with the body, so most people don't even notice that the bottle opens in the middle, also that makes LiKiDA bottles able to fit on standard bike bottle cages and cup holders. Plus LiKiDA bottles are super strong, believe us we have tested them endlessly, drops, run overs, bike rides, camping trips you name it we have done it. So be confident that we did our testing.

story:
FORGET THE GUESSWORK

MEASURE ANY MUSCLE AND IMPROVE

Mpower is a smart training solution that helps you build your strength whatever your goals may be. 



MPOWER TECH

HOW DOES MPOWER MEASURE MUSCLES?


EMG

When muscles are activated, they produce electrical signal called EMG. Mpower uses a technology called surface EMG (sEMG) to measure and analyze muscle behavior during training.

POD

The Mpower pod is attached to the skin surface over any muscle to measure EMG-signal as the muscle responds to the training exercises. The Mpower pod transmits the measurement data to the Mpower app for further analysis.

APP

Based on the data, the Mpower app calculates multiple parameters that help users get the most out of their training. 


HOW IT WORKS

1  

Measure any muscle with a small pod, which you can easily attach to any single muscle

2

Get instant feedback and learn to fine-tune your technique

3  

Find out if you are using the right muscles and as efficiently as you could

4

Evaluate your technique and strength over time to adjust your training plan 




BENEFITS OF MPOWER

GET STRONGER

Everyone can benefit from strength training. Mpower helps you build your strength whatever your goals may be.

GET EMPOWERED 

Measure any muscle with the small pod and get instant feedback. Train smarter and achieve better results.

FOLLOW YOUR PROGRESS

Get information about your performance and see how your strength is improving.

BUILD YOUR MAXIMUM SPEED AND STRENGTH 

For the first time ever, you can get real-time feedback about your fast muscle fibers, which are needed to produce fast and explosive movements.

ENSURE EFFECTIVE MUSCLE MASS BUILDING 

Find out how your muscles are activated during training to make sure you are training at the right level to build muscle mass.

INCREASE YOUR ENDURANCE STRENGTH 

Continue your endurance strength training till you reach the level you need for progress.

FINE-TUNE AND OPTIMIZE YOUR TRAINING FOR FASTER RESULTS 

Learn about your muscles and what type of training techniques are the most efficient. Get information about your muscle balance, fine-tune your technique and get maximum benefits out of your training. 

AVOID OVER-TRAINING AND INJURY 

Recognize the signs of fatigue and avoid over-training. Mpower spots when your fast muscle fibers are getting tired.




FOR PERSONAL TRAINERS AND COACHES 


If you’re a personal trainer or a coach, Mpower is the perfect tool for ensuring better results for you and your clients.


FORGET THE GUESSWORK 

Have you ever wondered if your training plan and workouts are the most efficient for your client? Now you can create tailored strength training programs for each client individually. With Mpower, you can measure the effect of different techniques, see how muscles are developing and make changes to the training plan as needed, based on data, not on guesswork.

•  Increase confidence among your clients with data proven measurement

•  Ensure that your client is training the right muscles and adjust the instructions if needed

•  Show your clients  how different techniques, tools, volume and tempo in training work

•  Avoid over-training and injuries by following your client’s muscle fatigue levels


MOTIVATE YOUR CLIENT 

The old saying “What you measure is what you get” applies also to strength training. When you can show proof about the impact and progress of the training plan on your client, you get a valuable motivation tool.

•  Demonstrate the targeted impact of the exercise by measuring activation power

•  Show your client how their exercise technique gets better by measuring activation power – the progress of training is visible as increased muscle activation volume and max activation

•  Show your client the impact of training on endurance strength efficiency and speed strength


STAND OUT FROM YOUR COMPETITORS 

With Mpower, besides getting a great tool for your work, you will also see what a positive impact it has on your professional image and gain additional profits.

•  Improve the quality of your services as a personal trainer

•  Stand out from your competitors with specialized offering and high quality service

•  Develop your service packages and get a premium price by giving your clients measured proof of progress and that their efforts are worthwhile





REVIEWS


”Every true professional personal trainer should use Mpower, because they can really see the benefits of strength training and help their customers to improve”

Riku Aalto, CEO / Trainer4You, the premier health, fitness and wellness continuing education provider


”The Mpower muscle trainer is really valuable for a team coach, since  the coach gets to see the muscle  performance of individual player in the team. ”

Samppa Jaakola, Strength Coach, Oulun Kärpät /Finnish National ice hockey champion 2015 Kärpät


”Mpower muscle trainer is excellent, first time ever objective tool to monitor the training of the power sports. Mpower shows efficiently the training quality and quantity of the individual player, the balance of rest and training.”

Sami Kivimäki, Game Leader /Vimpelin Veto, National Finnish baseball silver medalist 2015 




MEASURES INDIVIDUAL MUSCLE


Mpower measures 34 muscles on your body. Select which muscle you want to measure and see if you are really using it and as efficiently as you could. Select exercises by muscle or muscle group. 

Track your progress by muscle, optimize your training to achieve results sooner, and track imbalances and muscle performance in compound and multi-joint exercises like squats and cycling.

story:
sensmi is the world's most accurate smart wristband that tracks and analyzes your daily stress levels and sleep patterns. It helps you pursue life with less stress and more mindfulness.

With sensmi, you can easily find out when, where, who, and what triggers the most stress in life and work, and practice stress-relieving exercises to calm down and increase focus, based on sensmi's suggestions.

sensmi also accurately tracks and records lab quality sleep data (light to deep) to evaluate changes in your sleep patterns.



The Sensmi is the latest smart wristband to shift away from simply counting steps, and attempt to have more impact and meaning on our lives.  --  DIGITAL TRENDS

Figuring out what contributes to rising stress levels shouldn’t be that hard. Not when you can use a smart wearable such as Sensmi for the job.  --  gadgetify


By wearing his sensmi band, John can easily identify which aspects of his work day are giving him the most stress and promptly address them by practising breathing exercises. With the help of sensmi, John can even confirm instantly whether his stress relieving exercise was able to calm him down and increase his focus.

By analyzing her "Sleep Zenpoints" on her sensmi, Amanda will be able to track her sleeping patterns accurately and identify which of her daily activities help her maximize her sleep. Using sensmi, Amanda is given the insights she needs to change her daily habits and improve her well being.

By switching to the meditation mode on her sensmi, Abby is able to focus, find her peace of mind, and figure out if her meditation sessions have been useful in helping her find her zen. With sensmi, Abby is now able to track her progress on her path to mindfulness.






sensmi can identify and assess your destructive stress moments. Unlike the healthy activation, the destructive stress moment would follow by long period of high stress, in hours and even in days. Syncing with your calendar on smartphone, sensmi can pinpoint the event leading to destructive stress so that you can avoid such event in the future or exercise precaution in advance.

During deep sleep, people are in a total stress-free state. sensmi can detect this stress-free state and calculate the sleep cycle of deep and light sleep. sensmi can therefore evaluate the sleep quality based on the number of sleep cycle and the length of deep sleep you experienced.

sensmi is built with the proprietary GSR-Pro sensor to evaluate your stress level. It uses military standard encryption technology to protect your personal data. With large memory capacity and long battery life, you can wear it for a whole week without syncing or charging it.


*Galvanic Skin Response: Scientific research has shown that when we get excited, nervous or stressed, a burst of signals from the brain fire nerves on our skin that lead to a spontaneous fluctuation of skin conductance. GSR has more than 100 years history and has been widely used in biofeedback therapy in hospitals.

    



*A clinical trial was done to validate our GSR Pro technology with regards to stress identification and stress quantification using brain wave analysis as benchmark. Results show that our GSR Pro technology reached 100% accuracy in stress identification and 88.9% accuracy in stress quantification.

For more information, please click here.



What smartphone operating systems will sensmi work with?

We developed iOS app and Android mobile app, so you can access our mobile app wherever and whenever.

Do I need to wear sensmi all the time?

For the most accurate readings, it is recommended that you wear the bracelet all the time. The more you wear sensmi, the better it understands you and the more accurate your readings will be. Depending on what you want to find out more about yourself, you can wear it in the morning to track your activities, or wear it during night to track your sleep.

Can I shower or swim with sensmi?

No. sensmi is designed to be water-resistant. You can wear it when you're washing your hands or in contact with water, but not when you're showering or swimming.

Do I need to wear my sensmi tight, or is it fine to wear it loose?

As long as the sensors can touch your wrist skin, the sensors are able to get accurate readings.

Will I be able to choose the color that I want for my sensmi?

Most definitely. We'd want you to be able to pick your sensmi in your favorite color. At the end of the campaign, we will list all available colors for you to choose.

When will I get my sensmi?

Estimated shipping dates are December 2016. You can expect to receive your sensmi to be delivered by this Christmas.

How do I get in touch with your team?  
You can message us here or email us at info@sensmiband.com.

For more FAQ, please refer to http://sensmiband.com/faq.html.

Estimated shipping dates are December 2016. You can expect to receive your sensmi to be delivered by this Christmas.



How do I get in touch with your team?  You can message us here or email us at info@sensmiband.com.
For more FAQ, please refer to http://sensmiband.com/faq.html.

story:
Fundathlon aims to develop a next-generation fundraising platform for athletes, teams, and sport organizations.

While striving for innovation in the areas of sport, digital marketing, sponsorship, and crowdfunding, Fundathlon will create winning strategies and synergies between athletes, teams, businesses, sports fans and consumers.

A message from the founder of Fundathlon

Ancient Olympia, 21/04/2016

Dear friends,

The idea behind Fundathlon is the result of my experiences as a high-performance athlete (swimming and water polo), sports administrator, coach (volunteer), sports media professional, and digital marketer.

Having spent the first half of my life in Greece and the second half in Canada, personal challenges brought me back to my homeland - at a time of unprecedented socio-economic crisis not only in Greece but also in Europe and around the world. 

Although there are no in-depth reports (national or global) as far as the impact of these socio-economic conditions on sport at all levels, there is no doubt that more than ever before, athletes (and their families), teams (amateur and professional) as well as sport organisations are faced with overwhelming financial challenges.

While I was going through some major changes in my personal life I couldn't help but absorb what was going on in the world and around me. Therefore, I decided to start a new business venture in the areas about which I'm most passionate: sport and the Internet. After much research, I found a gap in the area of sport fundraising via the Internet and that's how Fundathlon was founded.

Sport is a way of life, and "athlon" (ἆθλον) does not only mean "prize" (after a victory) but also struggle and hard work (victorious or not). Fundathlon's mission is to help athletes, teams, and organisations achieve their goals in sport and beyond.

Today, in Ancient Olympia - the cradle of sport and Olympism - as the sun's rays help ignite the torch, Fundathlon's crowdfunding campaign will be launched in order to finance this project.

I welcome you all to support us and be part of the Fundathlon journey!

Sincerely,

Makis Papadopoulos

We need your support in order to:
  • develop and release the Fundathlon platform
  • create a Fundathlon fund which will be accessible for athletes and teams once the platform is launched
  • build awareness about Fundathlon during an International Tour starting from Greece (see map). During the Tour, we will meet with athletes, teams, businesses, media, and other potential Fundathlon stakeholders
  • offer a scholarship to the Imagine Peace Youth Camp organised by the International Olympic Truce Centre
  • open an office in Athens (Greece) and hire local talent (i.e. developers)
  • expand internationally and open offices in North America and Asia

Below we list the perks that you get for supporting Fundathlon's crowdfunding campaign. Please note that during the campaign we will be announcing new perks which all supporters will be entitled to get (including early supporters).

Grassroots: €2 Contribution

  • Your name will be placed on a virtual map connecting all Fundathlon supporters from around the world and posted on Fundathlon.com and social media

Individual: €10 Contribution

  • Fundathlon "Proud Supporter" medal made of wood (see photo below)
  • 10€ discount coupon at Yoleni's (minimum purchase required)
  • Your name will be placed on a virtual map connecting all Fundathlon supporters from around the world and posted on Fundathlon.com and social media

Doubles: €16 Contribution

  • Fundathlon "Proud Supporter" medal made of wood (see photo above) for each of the two (2) contributors
  • 10€ discount coupon at Yoleni's for each of the two (2) contributors (minimum purchase required)
  • Your name will be placed on a virtual map connecting all Fundathlon supporters from around the world and posted on Fundathlon.com and social media

Team: €50 Contribution

  • Fundathlon "Proud Supporter" medal made of wood (see photo above) for each of the Team members (up to 10)
  • 10€ discount coupon at Yoleni's for each of the Team members (minimum purchase required)
  • Your name will be placed on a virtual map connecting all Fundathlon supporters from around the world and posted on Fundathlon.com and social media

Corporate Team: €100 Contribution

  • Fundathlon "Proud Supporter" medal made of wood (see photo above) for each of the Corporate Team members (up to 10)
  • The names of each Corporate Team member will be placed on a virtual map connecting all Fundathlon supporters from around the world and posted on Fundathlon.com and social media

PRIZE 1: Commemorative coin of the Panathinaic Stadium

Share the Fundathlon crowdfunding campaign via e-mail, Facebook Twitter, LinkedIn, etc. and win a commemorative coin of the Panathenaic Stadium.

Simply refer ten (10) supporters at the "Individual" level and above (i.e. Doubles, Team, Corporate), and you automatically win a commemorative coin of the Panathenaic Stadium.

Note: You can win the Panathinaic Stadium commemorative coin even if you don't contribute financially to the crowdfunding campaign yourself (although we have contribution levels starting at only 2 Euros).

PRIZE 2: Skype credit

Share the Fundathlon crowdfunding campaign via e-mail, Facebook Twitter, etc. and win 10% of the amount raised from your referrals in Skype credit.

For example if you refer 10 friends and their total contributions to the Fundathlon campaign is 100 Euros, you win a 10-Euro Skype credit. That simple!

Note: You can win the Skype credit even if you don't contribute financially to the crowdfunding campaign yourself (although we have contribution levels starting at only 2 Euros).

How to share

Copy your unique URL link to post around the Internet and save it for later by clicking the link icon circled below or begin sharing on social media by simply clicking the Facebook or Twitter buttons below with your URL pre-loaded.

When you click on any share tool on the campaign page, then you’ll automatically get a Facebook post or tweet that’s ready-to-go with your referral URL.

How to track your referral results

  • Log into your Indiegogo account
  • Click on your user name beside the search box at the top right of the page.
  • Select the “My Profile” option
  • Click on the tab that says “Referrals” for the latest totals of referrals and contributions
  • Count the number of funders

Fundathlon is very proud and honored to be associated with the Olympic Truce movement and the International Olympic Truce Centre (IOTC).

Proceeds from Fundathlon's crowdfunding campaign will cover a full scholarship for IOTCs Imagine Peace Summer Camp which will take place this summer (July 24-31, 2016) at the premises of the International Olympic Academy in Ancient Olympia.


About the International Olympic Truce Center

The International Olympic Truce Foundation and the International Olympic Truce Centre were established in July 2000 as a joint initiative of Greece and the International Olympic Committee (IOC), turning the commitment of the Olympic Movement to promote its peaceful principles into concrete action.

The initiative first took form in 1998, with a proposal from the Greek Government to the members of the IOC for the institutional revival of Olympic Truce in the new millennium. In a historic December 1999 decision, the International Olympic Committee announced the establishment of the International Olympic Truce Foundation and the International Olympic Truce, in cooperation with Greece.

Olympic Truce: Videos (YouTube channel)


International Partners

Yoleni's

National Partners: Greece

Viva.gr

VivaWallet

Solebike

Stay tuned as more Fundathlon partners and perks will be announced during the crowdfunding campaign.

Can I contribute anonymously?

Yes. You can contribute anonymously if you prefer to contribute without sharing your name on the campaign, or contribute on behalf of a friend or family member.

I don't want to contribute online. Can I contribute offline?
Yes. You can also contribute by bank wire, cheque or cash. Please send us an e-mail at info@fundathlon.com and let us know how you'd like to contribute and whether you'd like it to reflect on the online crowdfunding campaign.

Can I participate in the Share & Win contest without making a contribution?
Yes. However, you have to log-in to your Indiegogo account (if you don't have an account, you'd need to create one) and use the "Share" links.

When do I get my perk(s)?
You will receive your perk(s) within 30-60 days after the conclusion of this campaign.
story_txt:
Fundathlon aims to develop a next-generation fundraising platform for athletes, teams, and sport organizations.
While striving for innovation in the areas of sport, digital marketing, sponsorship, and crowdfunding, Fundathlon will create winning strategies and synergies between athletes, teams, businesses, sports fans and consumers.


A message from the founder of Fundathlon
Ancient Olympia, 21/04/2016
Dear friends,
The idea behind Fundathlon is the result of my experiences as a high-performance athlete (swimming and water polo), sports administrator, coach (volunteer), sports media professional, and digital marketer.
Having spent the first half of my life in Greece and the second half in Canada, personal challenges brought me back to my homeland - at a time of unprecedented socio-economic crisis not only in Greece but also in Europe and around the world. 
Although there are no in-depth reports (national or global) as far as the impact of these socio-economic conditions on sport at all levels, there is no doubt that more than ever before, athletes (and their families), teams (amateur and professional) as well as sport organisations are faced with overwhelming financial challenges.
While I was going through some major changes in my personal life I couldn't help but absorb what was going on in the world and around me. Therefore, I decided to start a new business venture in the areas about which I'm most passionate: sport and the Internet. After much research, I found a gap in the area of sport fundraising via the Internet and that's how Fundathlon was founded.
Sport is a way of life, and "athlon" (ἆθλον) does not only mean "prize" (after a victory) but also struggle and hard work (victorious or not). Fundathlon's mission is to help athletes, teams, and organisations achieve their goals in sport and beyond.
Today, in Ancient Olympia - the cradle of sport and Olympism - as the sun's rays help ignite the torch, Fundathlon's crowdfunding campaign will be launched in order to finance this project.
I welcome you all to support us and be part of the Fundathlon journey!
Sincerely,
Makis Papadopoulos



We need your support in order to:


develop and release the Fundathlon platform

create a Fundathlon fund which will be accessible for athletes and teams once the platform is launched

build awareness about Fundathlon during an International Tour starting from Greece (see map). During the Tour, we will meet with athletes, teams, businesses, media, and other potential Fundathlon stakeholders

offer a scholarship to the Imagine Peace Youth Camp organised by the International Olympic Truce Centre

open an office in Athens (Greece) and hire local talent (i.e. developers)

expand internationally and open offices in North America and Asia

story:
(Weiter unten findest du die Beschreibung auf deutsch/scroll down for the German version)



This is why we never have breakfast...

Where has the time gone?

Every morning I am facing the same problem. I am short of time and also too lazy to prepare a healthy breakfast. Even having cereal takes too long. So I had to grab some junk food on my way to university or work.


We created a 100% organic mixture which replaces your breakfast in a delicious, healthy and quick way.

Striving for a wholesome breakfast, we created a 100% organic mixture containing filling carbs, proteins, healthy fats and plenty of fiber. Furthermore we mix it with 125ml (4 fl oz) of a customary smoothie which adds secondary plant substances, vitamins and replenish the glycogen store. We top it off with cow's milk in order to stabilize blood sugar and provide essential minerals like calcium.


Special about our approach:

  • You will be satisfied for at least 4 hours.
  • Our shake contains only 300kcal/calories.
  • Our shake is prepared within 60 seconds.


Easy to handle!



It is delicious - WE PROMISE!




But what if you do not like coconut flakes or are allergic to nuts?


No problem at all. We are building a web shop that..

  • allows for customization

  • provides more than 50 different ingredients

  • enables you to create your own flavor


With the help of your money we will set up the web shop even faster. If you share our vision please support our campaign.  




This is what you have to know about our mixture:

  • 100% organic ingredients: it consists of several finely and freshly ground nuts, porridge oats, coconut flakes, wheat bran, flaxseed and other super foods
  • Perfect recipe: the proportion is ideal for mixing a shake as well as baking muffins (just add baking powder & one egg)                                                                   => comes with even more ideas on new recipes





Perks




  Like                          Follow






Frequently Asked Questions - FAQ

If you have any further questions please do not hesitate contacting us via info@breakfastbird.com


Is this approach not way too expensive? 

A healthy breakfastbird shake is charged with only roughly 2.5$ per shake - all together (smoothie, organic mixture and milk). In comparison to an average sandwich on the way which costs 3$ each, our offer is really attractive for you.
Keep in mind that the advantage of a healthy and 100% organic breakfast with its' positive long-term impact is not even considered in the previous calculation.


What is the money for?

The money helps us achieving the following two objectives:
    • Set up a web shop: we want to build a web shop that allows you to create your individual mixture - you decide on the ingredients                               
    • Spread the word: our vision ist to feed all early birds across the globe


    Is it really healthy? Evidence!

    Yes, of course! We analyzed over 100 healthy breakfast foods and read over 50 papers. That allows for deducing the most important ingredients and finally come up with breakfastbird.

    You want to know more about it? Click here.


    How many calories does it contain?

    A really beneficial and light breakfast. Once you have tried, you know what we mean by light breakfast. There are three reasons why you should use breakfastbird:

    • 300kcal is the maximum (35g organic mixture|125ml customary smoothie| cow's milk containing 3.5% fat )
    • No cravings: if you start your day with a breakfastbird shake, you won't be hungry for the next few hours
    • Cut the calories to 200kcal: by diluting with water or using less of our organic mixture

    Just enjoy!





    Jeder dritte Deutsche geht ohne Frühstück, aber mit knurrendem Magen, aus dem Haus. Um sich anschließend beim Bäcker um die Ecke mit einem belegten Brötchen einzudecken.



    Wir haben eine Super Mischung (100% BIO) entwickelt, die dein Frühstück auf eine gesunde, schnelle und leckere Weise ersetzt.

    Breakfast bird strebt danach ein vollwertiges Frühstück zu liefern. Deshalb kreierten wir eine Mischung, welche...

    • langsam verdauliche, langkettige Kohlenhydrate 
    • sättigende Proteine
    • gesunde, ungesättigte Fette
    • & viele Ballaststoffe
    enthält.

    Das Ganze mixen wir mit 125ml Smoothie (die Hälfte eines handelsüblichen Smoothie)  und vervollständigen das Frühstück dadurch mit wichtigen sekundären Pflanzenstoffen, Vitaminen und schnellen Kohlenhydrate, die den über die Nacht entleerten Glykogen-Speicher wieder füllen.
     
    Abegrundent durch die gleiche Menge an Kuhmlich (alternativ: Sojamilch) stabilisieren wir den Blutzuckerspiegel und beugen dadurch Heißhungerattacken vor. Zudem versorgen wir den Körper mit essentiellen Mineralstoffen wie z.B. Kalzium, welches den Fettaufbau hemmt, die Speicherung verhindert und die Fettverbrennung anregt.


    Das besondere daran ist:

    • Du bist die nächsten 4 Stunden gesättigt.
    • Ein Shake hat gerade einmal 300 kcal.
    • Das Ganze ist in 60 Sekunden präpariert.

    Das solltest du über die Super Mischung wissen:

    100% biologische Zutaten: Die Mischung besteht aus fein gemahlenen Nüssen, Haferflocken, Kokosraspeln, Weizenkleie, Leinsamen und anderen Super Foods.




    Was ist wenn du Kokos nicht magst oder allergisch auf Walnuss reagierst?



    Überhaupt kein Problem. Wir bauen gerade einen Webshop, der es dir ermöglicht...

    • deine Mischung zu individualisieren

    • mit einer Auswahl aus über 50 unterschiedliche Zutaten

    • um schlussendlich deinen eigenen Geschmack zu kreieren



    Wie kann ich breakfast bird unterstützen?

    Suche weiter oben im Text nach Perks (das sind Vergünstigungen, welche du nur hier auf Indiegogo erhälst):

    1. Wähle eine Option (eine Perk).
    2. Du erhälst eine E-mail, in der wir dich nach Unvertäglichkeiten fragen.
    3. Teste die Mischung zu Hause aus.

                                Wir versprechen dir: Es ist super lecker & gesund!


    Falls du Fragen hast oder Feedback geben möchtest - gerne!
    Schreibe uns eine E-mail: info@breakfastbird.com
    oder melde dich über Whatsapp bei 0159 058 366 85.



                                    Like                               Follow

story:
We are innovative and passionate in everything we set out to achieve, to constantly exceed expectations through the most efficient and high value-added solution.

Combining sensors, micro controllers, communications technology and smart materials we created new devices that enhance personal self-care and give new approach to self healing.


SMART + INTERACTIVE + SENSORY


Their main functions are: stress reduction, purification, ionization, oxidation, energetic balancing, acupressure, and positive programming.

It purifies, energizes, ionize and balance your bio-physical condition !


Technologies to automatically recognize stress are extremely important to prevent chronic psychological stress and pathophysiological risks associated with it. There is  great variability in how people experience stress and how they express it physiologically.

Putting your feet on the floor of crystal panel, energy contact will be set up between person and chamber becoming "alive" and begins to clean the body and mind.


Chamber uses Electrodermal Activity (EDA) as a physiological indicator of stress and strong emotion. Device in Crystal chamber detects skin conductance responses, which are spikes in the signal indicating a "fight or flight" response.


 Crystal Chamber collects EDA dates, analyzing them to obtain reliable estimates of stress and emotion . Users can visualize these results and download files containing features calculated on the data to be used in their own analysis. 

After level of stress and type of excitment is detected,Chamber launches fully automated system that intelligently responds to a person's affective state in real time.


Smart device choose the right colors combination of different shades for any specific state. It launches circular polarization of light through crystals and the movement of cleansing the energy blocks, comprehensive emotional states leading to imbalances and a deep form of natural healing to cleanse these imbalances.

Light is responsible for turning on the brain and the body. Light enters the body through the eyes and skin. When even a single photon of light enters the eye, it lights up the entire brain. This light triggers the hypothalamus, which regulates all life-sustaining bodily functions, the autonomic nervous system, endocrine system, and the pituitary (the body's master gland).



During a session time Smart device tests the reactions of the entire organism in the real-time monitoring how we see colors and how they can have impact on our human health.

This technique can assess frustration, stress, and mood on the individual and direct way reacting on emotionally intelligent, especially responding to a person's frustration in a way that reduces negative feelings.


All the results can be seen and downloaded in Crystal Chamber application made for smart phone. Application will also be available on the web site and the Cloud.


By learning to identify what is stressful, as well as what works to reduce stress, individuals can take the steps necessary to help them live healthier, longer lives.


During the 25min session you are exposed to the active influence of crystal chamber that purifies, energizes, ionize and balance your bio-physical condition.You can see the changes of your transformation during the session. You can see your before and after results on your smart phone.


WHAT IS CRYSTAL CHAMBER - CHAMBER THAT CHANGES THE WORLD OF SELF-HEALING!

Crystal chamber is a 4-side opened box, dimension 47.25“ x 47.25“ x 66.93“ height

(120 cm x 120 cm x170 cm).It can be placed in any corner of the house ,office,sport center or spa and wellness centers and club houses. 

Chamber is interactive and react with person`s stress level while sitting inside changing colors in the chamber`s panel.


Chamber has more functions. Every side of chamber has its own function. It neutralizes a high concentration of CO2 and generates bio-active, life-enhancing energy fields that can simply and easily produce significant health benefits, physically, mentally and emotionally.

Stressful electromagnetic field is completely neutralized by the Crystal chamber in the time you are sitting and creating an effect what scientists call a ‘zero-point field’. 



Chamber monitors climatic CO2, humidity and temperature. 


Highlights

Crystal chamber generates bio-active, life-enhancing energy fields that can simply and easily produce significant health benefits, physically, mentally and emotionally. Exposure to these fields has been found to:

  • Detoxify the air and the room;
  • Detoxify the body and the mind
  • Recharge cells 
  • Enhance the functioning of the immune system
  • Boost cell regeneration
  • Elevate mood
  • Assist in balancing the brain
  • Increase energy levels an oxygen level
  • It’s taking the contaminating energy from the surroundings and changing it into beneficial energy patterns.

We  placed a chair inside of the chamber so  person can sit exposed to positive energy effects generated by physical and biophysical influences that produce a lot of health  benefits.


 Our work in progress…..


Part of the chamber system monitoring is climatic control of the air in the room.

 With the high CO2 concentration and non- proper ventilation, people will feel headaches, dull, drowsiness, lose of concentration and correspond to the high levels of dust, chemicals and bacteria in the air.

Monitor detects air condition in the room.

 

Children are the most vulnerable group.



 Chamber changes color depending on the stress level.

 


WHO ARE THE USERS ?

-  children who use a computer equipment and smart phones every day

-  hyperactive and anxious children and people

-  employees in offices who spend more than couple of hours a day on computer

-  all who have bad memory

-  and who have poor immunity

-  all with difficult to breathe

-  all of who have various autoimmune diseases

-  all others who want to improve the own health and energy boost


WHO ARE THE CUSTOMERS ?

-  parents for their children

-  bosses and entrepreneurs for their employees in their offices

-  spa centers in order to introduce new services to its customers

-  wellness centers for the introduction of new services for its customers; clinics, dentists, gynecologists

-  shopping centers ; sports centers, club houses

-  It is excellent for guests of a small and large hotels as new amazing service.



 TIMELINE

  Pre-orders begin shipping in January 2017

January 2017

WHO WE ARE ?

Our team is consisted of 10 people working in researching,developing,marketing,selling and manufacturing process.

As team we have developed more then 30 particular authorized products for ecological  technology and well-being. We  enjoy developing cool new products using,researching and exploring a new positive technologies. Crystal Chamber is our novel  passion.


What We Need & What You Get

The Crystal Chamber is in its earliest stage of production. Technology that is included in chambers is in stage of patent pending. We estimate that we need

 $150 000 for buying machinery for production. If we do not reach the funding goal we will still use raised money for the investment in our production and make sure all the backers receive their perks.  Perks that we chose for you are mostly parts included in Crystal Chamber, so you can experience the positive influence on your health in privacy of your home. The most exciting perks are T shirts, and hats embedded with crystal bead that is actually inside of the main product - Crystal Chamber. In that way you will have a direct positive influence of active crystals on your body. Also, another exciting perk are specially made active crystal boards that can be installed in your bedroom, living room or anywhere else you wish in your house or office and in that way neutralize bad energy in the room giving  healthier air and emotion. 


Risks & Challenges

This product and our project really does not have any risks or obstacles. Technology is there, we have all the knowledge needed  for this project to be successful. We will use all our experience to make and at the end to sell this product to the mass. In last couple of years we already had two successful  and new projects that were our innovation. For example, Dalma Cab that produces Mediterranean climatic effects was a huge success in Croatia. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We accept all kinds of help. So please, spread the word about this great product so we can make this world better together!
story_txt:
We are innovative and passionate in everything we set out to achieve, to constantly exceed expectations through the most efficient and high value-added solution.

Combining sensors, micro controllers, communications technology and smart materials we created new devices that enhance personal self-care and give new approach to self healing.

SMART +
INTERACTIVE + SENSORY




Their main functions are: stress reduction, purification, ionization, oxidation, energetic balancing, acupressure, and positive programming.
It purifies, energizes, ionize and balance your bio-physical condition !




Technologies to automatically recognize stress are extremely
important to prevent chronic psychological stress and pathophysiological risks
associated with it. There is  great
variability in how people experience stress and how they express it
physiologically.



Putting your feet on the floor of crystal panel, energy contact will be set up between person and chamber becoming "alive" and begins to clean the body and mind.





Chamber uses Electrodermal Activity (EDA) as a
physiological indicator of stress and strong emotion. Device in Crystal chamber
detects skin conductance responses, which are spikes in the signal indicating a
"fight or flight" response.




 Crystal Chamber collects EDA dates,
analyzing them to obtain reliable estimates of stress and emotion . Users can
visualize these results and download files containing features calculated on
the data to be used in their own analysis. 


After level of stress and type of excitment is
detected,Chamber launches fully
automated system that intelligently responds to a person's affective state in
real time.



Smart
device choose the right colors combination of different
shades for any specific state. It launches circular polarization of light through crystals
and the movement of cleansing the energy blocks, comprehensive emotional states
leading to imbalances and a deep form of natural healing to cleanse these imbalances.

Light is
responsible for turning on the brain and the body. Light enters the body
through the eyes and skin. When even a single photon of light enters the eye,
it lights up the entire brain. This light triggers the hypothalamus, which
regulates all life-sustaining bodily functions, the autonomic nervous system,
endocrine system, and the pituitary (the body's master gland).





During a session time Smart device tests the reactions of the entire
organism in the real-time monitoring how we see colors and how they can have
impact on our human health.
This technique can assess frustration, stress,
and mood on the individual and direct way reacting on emotionally intelligent,
especially responding to a person's frustration in a way that reduces negative
feelings.




All the results can be seen and downloaded in
Crystal Chamber application made for smart phone. Application will also be
available on the web site and the Cloud.




By learning to identify what is stressful, as well as what works to
reduce stress, individuals can take the steps necessary to help them live
healthier, longer lives.


During the 25min session you are exposed to the active influence of crystal chamber that purifies, energizes, ionize and balance your bio-physical condition.You can see the changes of your transformation during the session. You can see your before and after results on your smart phone.




WHAT IS CRYSTAL CHAMBER - CHAMBER THAT CHANGES THE WORLD OF SELF-HEALING!

Crystal chamber is a 4-side
opened box, dimension 47.25“ x 47.25“ x 66.93“ height
(120 cm x 120 cm x170
cm).It can be placed in any corner of the house ,office,sport center or spa and
wellness centers and club houses. 




Chamber is interactive and react with person`s stress level while sitting inside changing colors in the chamber`s panel.






Chamber has more functions. Every side of chamber has its own function. It neutralizes a high concentration of CO2 and generates bio-active, life-enhancing energy fields that can simply and easily produce significant health benefits, physically, mentally and emotionally.

Stressful electromagnetic field is completely
neutralized by the Crystal chamber in the time you are sitting and creating an
effect what scientists call a ‘zero-point field’. 

Chamber monitors climatic CO2, humidity and temperature. 

Highlights
Crystal chamber generates bio-active, life-enhancing energy fields that can
simply and easily produce significant health benefits, physically, mentally and
emotionally. Exposure to these fields has been found to:

Detoxify the air and the room; 
Detoxify the body and the mind
Recharge cells 
     
Enhance the functioning of the immune system
Boost cell regeneration
Elevate mood
Assist in balancing the brain
Increase energy levels an oxygen level


It’s taking the contaminating
     energy from the surroundings and changing it into beneficial energy
     patterns.






We  placed a
chair inside of the chamber so  person can
sit exposed to positive energy effects generated by physical and biophysical
influences that produce a lot of health 
benefits. 

 Our work in progress…..

Part of the chamber system monitoring is
climatic control of the air in the room.
 With the high CO2 concentration and non- proper ventilation, people will feel headaches, dull, drowsiness, lose of concentration and correspond to the high levels of dust, chemicals and bacteria in the air.
Monitor
detects air condition in the room.


 
Children are the most vulnerable group.







 Chamber changes color depending on the stress
level.


 




WHO ARE THE USERS ?
- 
children who use a computer equipment and smart phones every day
- 
hyperactive and anxious children and people
- 
employees in offices who spend more than couple of hours a day on
computer
- 
all who have bad memory
- 
and who have poor immunity
- 
all with difficult to breathe
- 
all of who have various
autoimmune diseases
- 
all others who want to improve the own health and energy boost







WHO ARE
THE CUSTOMERS ?
- 
parents for their children
- 
bosses and entrepreneurs for their employees in their offices
- 
spa centers in order to introduce new services to its customers
- 
wellness centers for the introduction of new services for its customers;
clinics,
dentists, gynecologists
- 
shopping centers ; sports centers, club houses
- 
It is excellent for guests of a small and large hotels as new amazing service.

story:
Short Summary

Can you believe, in today's world of "Modern Medicine", that Medical Professionals still use a Wooden Tongue Depressor and separate Magnification Light (from the outside of the Oral Cavity) to do an Oral Exam? A "piece of wood" is still considered a Medical Instrument?! Imagine the Millions of Trees that have been used to make these Wooden Tongue Depressors.

     

                    With Your Help, we can Evolve past the Scenes Above.

                     Contribute Today, for a World of Better Tomorrows!      

I have Patented a New Medical Device that is going to help Save these Trees; by replacing the Wooden Tongue Depressor with a Safer, more Efficient, and more Effective Device - the "LEDula" (Patent Pending).



The LEDula will take a common 2-handed (and at times – awkward) procedure down to a single handed procedure; freeing up the second hand, and more importantly time, for the medical professionals of the world. 
When a Wooden Tongue Depressor is used (with one hand), and a light is illuminated (with a magnification light - in the other hand) from "outside" the Patient's mouth, the Medical Professional has to battle the shadows; cast from the Lips, Teeth, and Tongue.

                                   

 
The LEDula has an Ergonomic/Automatic Pressure Switch, that is designed to turn on and Illuminate the Entire Oral Cavity, Throat, and Tonsils - from Inside the Patient's mouth - when the user presses down to reposition the Patient's tongue. 

However, these things are not even the most important aspects of the LEDula… it’s SAFER! In recent years there was a Contaminated Wooden Tongue Depressor batch that was linked to being Contaminated with Rhizopus Microsporus – causing Gastric Mucormycosis! The LEDula's Disposable Probe Covers ensure that there will never be any type of contamination. We go to the Doctor to get better... not worse!

With your Donation - you will not only be helping Revolutionize a very Antiquated Device and Procedure, and making Oral Exams much Safer for Everyone... you will also be doing your part to help Save Millions of Trees!

                             


                                 Let's all do our part to keep this from happening!!

                          *This used to be a BEAUTIFUL Forest... now, it is gone*

                          Please continue reading and make your Donation, Today!

                    What We Need & What You Get

 *Version 2.0 of the LEDula will have a RF Temperature Sensor (Located on the Bottom - See Design) & LCD Screen (i.e. Schematic Above), to take and give the Temperature of the Patient. When the LEDula presses down on the Tongue, and the Light is Automatically Activated, the Patient's Temperature will also be Taken and Displayed on the LCD Screen.**However, this Version will be after the LEDula 1.0 has been through a Full Cycle and World Wide Release**

*The LEDula Version 1.0, the Version that will be Launched 1st, does not include the Temperature Probe, nor the LCD Screen. Version 1.0 will only have the Ergonomic/Automatic Pressure Switch and LED Lens Set... which will Illuminate the Entire Oral Cavity*

A Lot of thought, time, effort, and money has already been invested into the Engineering of the LEDula. That's why we are ready to enter the Prototype Phase! However, this will not be the typical "Trial and Error" effort, which is typical of the Prototype Phase. We have already virtually tested many designs, sizes, and practical applications of the LEDula and have perfected the Engineering, Manufacturing, and Logistics. This leads us into a very structured Prototype and Product Testing Model.

With all of that being said - in the last year, we have developed fantastic relationships and pricing. We will be able to Manufacture the LEDula Prototype, Product Test (and any additional R&D, if needed), and do a 1st Run (i.e. of 100 Units and 18k Probe Covers) for far less than most spend on their Prototype, alone.

Hasn't it already been too long (getting rid of the Wooden Tongue Depressor)? Here's what we need to make it happen:

Total Goal = $60,000.00

*The 1st Phase is $15,000.00. Here's what that $$$ will go towards:

- Prototype Manufacture

- Product Testing (Includes any needed R&D, Engineering, Design Changes, and Re-run of Prototype)

- Logistics for Prototype - Travel, Lodging, Food, Expense. We will need to attend the Manufacturing of the Prototype; for obvious reasons.

*The additional $45,000.00 will cover the following:

- P/T and Corporate Attorney

- Incorporation for LEDula

- Insurance - GL, Product Liability, E&O, Etc...

- 1st "Limited" Run of 100 Units - LEDula's

- 1st "Limited Run of 18,000 Probe Covers

- Marketing and Branding

- 4 Medical Seminars and Conferences; Fees, Travel, Food, Lodging, Etc...*

*We will need to attend Medical Seminars and Conferences to get Endorsements! We give a Medical Professional a Free LEDula, and enough Probe Covers to get them through 1 week of use, and they give us a Written Endorsement, LOI (i.e. to use the LEDula, in the future), and needed Feedback.

We already have half a dozen Medical Professionals that are Extremely Excited to use the LEDula. These Endorsements and LOI's will go a long way, when it comes time to line-up the LEDula for a Limited, 3 State, Initial Run and Release.

The Crowd Funding Goal for the LEDula was carefully computed and is truly "bare bones". With that being said - there was not a lot of room for "Incentives". So, a lot of thought went into how we could truly reward you, the Contributor.

Yes, when you give $$$ to help get the LEDula up and running (so to speak) - you are helping to make a Medical Procedure "SAFER" and are doing your part to Help The Environment. However, we really did not want the LEDula Campaign to be "Charity" Based. So, I asked myself a question that "Walt Disney" would commonly ask, "how do we Plus it?"

We now have Rewards from $10 to $1,000.00 - and most of them are Environment Based. When you give your Support to the LEDula Campaign (i.e. $50 and up) - you are not only helping save the Millions of Trees that would be Cut-down and Processed, to make the (no longer needed) Wooden Tongue Depressor... you are adding Trees to this Magnificent World we live on; and the Trees are planted in your Honoree's Name!

So, from a Single Tree to a Large Grove of Trees, and Honorable Mentions to an actual LEDula from our 1st Run, we have come up with an Incredible Rewards Program.

Even if we could just get $1.00 from everyone - that $1.00 is going to help Change The World! 

                                                           The Impact


The LEDula will take a common 2-handed (and at times – awkward) procedure down to a single handed procedure; freeing up the second hand, and more importantly time, for the medical professionals of the world. However, these things are not even the most important aspects of the LEDula… it’s SAFER!

For years, or since the “shift” into what is considered “modern medicine”, there is one medical instrument that has stayed the same – the Wooden Tongue Depressor. Why? Sure, it is perceived to be inexpensive and easy to produce. I ask - what about the high cost to the White Birch Tree? Also, is the Wooden Tongue Depressor the Safest, Most Efficient, and Best Instrument for the job? I am about to show you why it is not.

Imagine yourself at a Doctor’s appointment. You have been suffering from a severe sore throat, headache, and chills. After your nurse has taken your vitals and recorded your symptoms – you spend your time reading the literature on the walls, playing “crossy roads”, and checking out all the stuff in the exam room. One thing you always see – a jar full of Wooden Tongue Depressors.

Your Doctor (or PA) walks in, asks you how you have been, advances the conversation with some small talk, and dives into your symptoms (so to speak). When you mention that you have been suffering with a sore throat (that feels like it is as dry as the “Sahara Desert”), the Doctor/PA stops what he or she is doing and heads over to where the Wooden Tongue Depressor Jar is taking up precious countertop space. After grabbing a Tongue Depressor, he or she then walks over and grabs the Magnification Light off of the wall… tells you to open up and say, “Ahhhhh” (i.e. with one hand holding the Wooden Tongue Depressor and the other holding the Magnification Light)… and awkwardly tries to get your mouth open and tongue into a position – where they can properly illuminate the oral cavity, throat, and tonsils (even though it is hard to light the oral cavity, properly, from outside of the patient’s mouth).

Now, rewind…

In this scenario – everything starts the exact same. However, this time (after telling the Doc/Pa about your “Sahara Desert” throat) the Doctor/PA reaches in his or her pocket, pulls out a LEDula (which is the exact same length and width of a standard Wooden Tongue Depressor), presses the LEDula down into a box of Probe Covers (e.g. like they use on the Digital Thermometers), and tells you to open your mouth and say, “Ahhhh”. This time the procedure is done with one hand. As soon as they use the LEDula to put pressure on the tongue (i.e. pressing the tongue down and out of the way) – the LED system lights up… illuminating the entire oral cavity, throat, and tonsils. This time – the oral cavity is completely illuminated from inside the patient’s (i.e. your) mouth… no shadows from lips, teeth, or tongue; which has a habit of getting in the way and casting a shadow into the bottom/back of the throat.

Once your Doctor has finished the oral part of the exam – they aim the LEDula at the opening of the bio-hazard disposal bin, press on the back of the LEDula’s Disposable Probe Cover, shooting it into the bio-hazard disposal bin, and clips the LEDula back in their lab coat pocket. No muss… no fuss.

Now – Imagine being a part of putting a LEDula in the hand of each and every medical professional in the world! No more jars of Wooden Tongue Depressors. Isn’t it about time to withdraw this antiquated device (if you want to call a piece of wood a “device”) from “Modern Medicine”? Envision the MILLIONS of trees that will be saved when the archaic Wooden Tongue Depressors are replaced with the contemporary and efficient LEDula.

Yes, we may want to keep a few boxes of wooden depressors available for “Arts and Crafts” projects, for school children; but they no longer belong in the modern medical realm.

                      


Helping to save one of our most important natural resources, taking a Two-handed proceduredown to a One-handed procedure and increasing the effectiveness of a medical procedure are not the only things that the LEDula will do and/or save. TIME, is another one of the essentials that the LEDula will help save.

10-12 seconds per exam does not really sound like a lot. However, it adds up. 10 minutes per day could equal an extra exam; while 100hrs a year would allow Medical Professionals to help a lot of additional patients. We all know how over worked our Medical Professionals are… 100hrs would sure make for a nice vacation… giving these Medical Professionals a much needed rest.

Imagine how much more efficient it would be – having a LEDula in the hand of each and every Medical Professional and Volunteer in the USA; or, how about the Sudan (below)… and eventually, the Entire World!

                     

I have talked (a lot, I know) about the different ways that the LEDula can and will, ultimately, help humanity… now, let us talk about Safety. Wooden Tongue Depressors are made from, well, a Porous, Organic Material – i.e. Wood. That means that Wooden Tongue Depressors are susceptible to Contamination.

                                                 

                                        *Magnified Photo of Rhizopus Microsporus*

In recent years there was a Contaminated Wooden Tongue Depressor batch that was even linked to being Contaminated with Rhizopus Microsporus – causing Gastric Mucormycosis! This was the first time that anyone even thought about a link between Wooden Tongue Depressor Contamination and Sickness (or Disease). Imagine – how many times in History this has happened… and no one even had a clue? I do not know about you, but I would rather Contain and Stop any chance of a Medical Tool and/or Device, used to help diagnose us (when we are sick), from even the slightest possibility of making us Sicker. We go to the Doctor to get better… not to get worse! Replacing every Wooden Tongue Depressor with a LEDula just makes sense and NEEDS to be done.

                                    

Of course, there is the “Corporate” aspect, which we have not yet talked about. The LEDula will help save time, while making a procedure more efficient… this equals $$$ saved! Plus, think of all the JOBS that can be created – right here in the USA. It is going to take a lot of people to help create enough LEDula’s to put one in the hand of each Medical Professional across the World. Additionally, let’s not forget about the Disposable Probe Covers – which creates a very nice accompanying/Repeat Revue Source. 

With all of that being said – we would like to ask you to help us… to join us… in getting the LEDula to market. Be a part of Revolutionizing a Medical Device and Procedure – replacing an antiquated Medical Device (i.e. a piece of wood)… saving Medical Professionals Hundreds of Thousands of Hours per year. Imagine what could be done with that time.

Through your generosity… you will be doing your part to help save MILLIONS of Trees, improving the Quality of Lives, and Modernizing a long overdue Medical Device and Procedure! What can I say – the LEDula is a Win/Win.

This is the Crowd Funding Campaign that you have been looking for… a way to help better the Global Environment (i.e. The World) and Humanity.

Please tell everyone you know about the "LEDula" IndieGoGo Crowd Funding Campaign and Please give as much, or as little, as you can… for, without you, the LEDula will (unfortunately) be many years away. Hasn’t it already been too long?

Thank you for your support.

Now, let’s make History!
