"Charity" Based. So, I asked myself a question that "Walt
Disney" would commonly ask, "how do we Plus it?"
We now have Rewards
from $10 to $1,000.00 - and most of them are Environment Based. When you give your
Support to the LEDula Campaign (i.e. $50 and up) - you are not only helping
save the Millions of Trees that would be Cut-down and Processed, to make the
(no longer needed) Wooden Tongue Depressor... you are adding Trees to this
Magnificent World we live on; and the Trees are planted in your Honoree's Name!
So, from a Single Tree
to a Large Grove of Trees, and Honorable Mentions to an actual LEDula from our
1st Run, we have come up with an Incredible Rewards Program.
Even if we could just
get $1.00 from everyone - that $1.00 is going to help Change The World!                                                            The Impact



The LEDula will take a common 2-handed (and at times –
awkward) procedure down to a single handed procedure; freeing up the second
hand, and more importantly time, for
the medical professionals of the world. However, these things are not even the
most important aspects of the LEDula… it’s SAFER!
For years, or since the
“shift” into what is considered “modern medicine”, there is one medical
instrument that has stayed the same – the Wooden Tongue Depressor. Why? Sure,
it is perceived to be inexpensive and easy to produce. I ask - what about the
high cost to the White Birch Tree? Also, is the Wooden Tongue Depressor the Safest,
Most Efficient, and Best Instrument for the job? I am about to show you why it
is not. 
Imagine yourself at a Doctor’s appointment. You have
been suffering from a severe sore throat, headache, and chills. After your
nurse has taken your vitals and recorded your symptoms – you spend your time
reading the literature on the walls, playing “crossy roads”, and checking out
all the stuff in the exam room. One thing you always see – a jar full of Wooden
Tongue Depressors.
Your Doctor (or PA) walks in, asks you how you have
been, advances the conversation with some small talk, and dives into your
symptoms (so to speak). When you mention that you have been suffering with a
sore throat (that feels like it is as dry as the “Sahara Desert”), the Doctor/PA
stops what he or she is doing and heads over to where the Wooden Tongue
Depressor Jar is taking up precious countertop space. After grabbing a Tongue
Depressor, he or she then walks over and grabs the Magnification Light off of
the wall… tells you to open up and say, “Ahhhhh” (i.e. with one hand holding
the Wooden Tongue Depressor and the other holding the Magnification Light)… and
awkwardly tries to get your mouth
open and tongue into a position – where they can properly illuminate the oral
cavity, throat, and tonsils (even though it is hard to light the oral cavity,
properly, from outside of the patient’s mouth).
Now,
rewind…
In this scenario – everything starts the exact same.
However, this time (after telling the Doc/Pa about your “Sahara Desert” throat)
the Doctor/PA reaches in his or her pocket, pulls out a LEDula (which is the
exact same length and width of a standard Wooden Tongue Depressor), presses the
LEDula down into a box of Probe Covers (e.g. like they use on the Digital
Thermometers), and tells you to open your mouth and say, “Ahhhh”. This time the
procedure is done with one hand. As soon as they use the LEDula to put pressure
on the tongue (i.e. pressing the tongue down and out of the way) – the LED
system lights up… illuminating the entire oral cavity, throat, and tonsils.
This time – the oral cavity is completely illuminated from inside the patient’s
(i.e. your) mouth… no shadows from lips, teeth, or tongue; which has a habit of
getting in the way and casting a shadow into the bottom/back of the throat.
Once your Doctor has finished the oral part of the exam
– they aim the LEDula at the opening of the bio-hazard disposal bin, press on
the back of the LEDula’s Disposable Probe Cover, shooting it into the bio-hazard
disposal bin, and clips the LEDula back in their lab coat pocket. No muss… no
fuss.
Now – Imagine being a part of putting a LEDula in the
hand of each and every medical professional in the world! No more jars of
Wooden Tongue Depressors. Isn’t it about time to withdraw this antiquated
device (if you want to call a piece of wood a “device”) from “Modern Medicine”?
Envision the MILLIONS of trees that will be saved when the archaic Wooden
Tongue Depressors are replaced with the contemporary and efficient LEDula. 
Yes, we may want to keep a
few boxes of wooden depressors available for “Arts and Crafts” projects, for
school children; but they no longer belong in the modern medical realm.


                      

Helping to save one of our
most important natural resources, taking a Two-handed proceduredown to a One-handed procedure and
increasing the effectiveness of a medical procedure are not the only things
that the LEDula will do and/or save. TIME, is another one of the essentials
that the LEDula will help save.
10-12 seconds per exam does not really sound like a
lot. However, it adds up. 10 minutes per day could equal an extra exam; while
100hrs a year would allow Medical Professionals to help a lot of additional
patients. We all know how over worked our Medical Professionals are… 100hrs
would sure make for a nice vacation… giving these Medical Professionals a much
needed rest.
Imagine how much more efficient it would be – having a LEDula
in the hand of each and every Medical Professional and Volunteer in the USA; or,
how about the Sudan (below)… and eventually, the Entire World!

                     
I have talked (a lot, I know) about the different ways
that the LEDula can and will, ultimately, help humanity… now, let us talk about
Safety. Wooden Tongue Depressors are made from, well, a Porous, Organic Material
– i.e. Wood. That means that Wooden Tongue Depressors are susceptible to
Contamination. 

                                                                                         *Magnified Photo of Rhizopus Microsporus*


In recent years there was a Contaminated Wooden Tongue
Depressor batch that was even linked to being Contaminated with Rhizopus
Microsporus – causing Gastric Mucormycosis! This was the first time that anyone
even thought about a link between Wooden Tongue Depressor Contamination and
Sickness (or Disease). Imagine – how many times in History this has happened…
and no one even had a clue? I do not know about you, but I would rather Contain
and Stop any chance of a Medical Tool and/or Device, used to help diagnose us
(when we are sick), from even the slightest possibility of making us Sicker. We
go to the Doctor to get better… not to get worse! Replacing every Wooden Tongue
Depressor with a LEDula just makes sense and NEEDS to be done.

                                    
Of course, there is the “Corporate” aspect, which we
have not yet talked about. The LEDula will help save time, while making a
procedure more efficient… this equals $$$ saved! Plus, think of all the JOBS
that can be created – right here in the USA. It is going to take a lot of
people to help create enough LEDula’s to put one in the hand of each Medical
Professional across the World. Additionally, let’s not forget about the
Disposable Probe Covers – which creates a very nice accompanying/Repeat Revue Source. 
With all of that being said – we would like to ask you
to help us… to join us… in getting the LEDula to market. Be a part of Revolutionizing
a Medical Device and Procedure – replacing an antiquated Medical Device (i.e. a
piece of wood)… saving Medical Professionals Hundreds of Thousands of Hours per
year. Imagine what could be done with that time. 
Through your generosity… you will be doing your part to
help save MILLIONS of Trees, improving the Quality of Lives, and Modernizing a
long overdue Medical Device and Procedure! What can I say – the LEDula is a
Win/Win.
This is the Crowd Funding Campaign that you have been
looking for… a way to help better the Global Environment (i.e. The World) and
Humanity.
Please tell everyone you know about the "LEDula" IndieGoGo Crowd Funding Campaign and Please give as much, or as little, as you can… for,
without you, the LEDula will (unfortunately) be many years away. Hasn’t it
already been too long?
Thank you for your support. 
Now, let’s make History!

story:
SUPSKIN elementary waterwear

Stand Up Paddling needs its specialized clothes. An innovative ultra light customized drysuit offering high breathability & comfort, boardshorts that don´t get wet and useful accessories such as drysocks and drypants. A new dimension of technical clothes for cold water activities. To be safe on the water all year round!

To follow these needs SUPSKIN created an unmatched product line and customer service that no other brand is able to offer.


What makes SUPSKIN unique?

Stand Up Paddling is our passion. SUPSKIN offers suits and accessories with uncompromising functionality created from stand up paddlers for stand up paddlers!

Colourful, light, breathable, stylish & safe on cold water


Based in the heart of Austria we spend every spare moment in our often cold lakes & rivers. Not only during summer.


SUP all year round without getting wet or cold. Over the years we have created the idea of making great gear that works perfectly for stand up paddling even in colder conditions.



Our collection is built with purpose and well engineered using the best parts & technology. Multi-functional, individual, beautifully designed, made in Austria.



SUPSKIN products

SUPSKIN suits are wind- and waterproof, made out of highly breathable stretch fabrics with bionic climate membrane and feelgood technology and they offer an extraordinary level of comfort. Bluesign approved.


See all SUPSKIN products on supskin.com



SUPSKIN stands for quality

After only three years of testing, learning and some more testing we have established a true brand with quite a big fan base around the world.



The feedback of our customers is very important for us as we try to develop our products continuously and implement good ideas and needs as fast as possible.





We focus on highest quality and environmental friendly recyclable products designed in Austria and made in Europe.

  • water and wind proof stretch fabric - triple layer weave with comfortable lining with breathable climate membrane
  • naturally self-cleaning effect
  • active>silver reduces odors and ensures freshness and hygiene
  • bluesign standard

SUPSKIN uses a three layer construction for drysuits with water and wind proof, elastic and moisture vapour permeable membrane that provides protection from wind and rain while simultaneously allowing water vapour to escape to the outside.


  1. water and wind proof stretch fabric
  2. breathable climate membrane
  3. comfortable lining with triple layer weave

The membrane - inspired by nature - reacts to different prevailing conditions. In doing so, not only temperature but also air and body moisture are balanced out.


SUPSKIN suits are water and wind repellent on the outside and water absorbent on the inside. It keeps the body dry, minimizes perspiration marks and stimulates a cooling effect.



We from SUPSKIN are proud of the fact that all our products are designed in Austria and produced in Europe.

We go for highest quality standards and sustainable fair production. It´s our philosophy to preserve the ecological system that provides the opportunity to practise our sports. And all our customers support this philosophy.


Products carrying the bluesign approved fabric label contain semifinished goods that were manufactured according to the bluesign standard.

  • skin-friendly and low-contaminated textiles
  • innovative, conserving & environmental friendly production
  • uncompromising functionality
  • quality with "feel good guarantee"



SUPSKIN Upycycling - Side products


In our atelier fabric remnants from our production are transformed into valuable raw materials for a new creative design process. In school projects the creative team designs and produces ecologically sustainable design items and customer goods for both individual and corporate customers. It contributes to lengthening product lifecycles and avoiding waste.



Where does SUPSKIN stand?

We want to influence the world of SUP with the most innovative clothes and be as influential as Jack O´Neill was with his neoprene wet suits back in the 1950-60.




As a family operated business we have reached a limit of what is possible.

We need YOU to help growing this story of success into an established leader brand that makes sure people around the world can be safe out there on water and doing what they love to do. Spending their time with family, exploring new exciting places or racing to the limit and not worry about hypothermia, being wet and cold all day long and stop the action for changing clothes.


We save lives and put a smile on people´s faces. This is a goal that is worth doing the job and going all the way. Half of the human population is connected to water based activities and jobs so there is a lot of work and development for us to do.


Our goal - SUPSKIN world

To grow an international global brand with thousands of individual customers we need to relocate and organize our company.

€ 50.000,- working capital support for a better and more efficient online shop that keeps the retail costs low and an online suit design tool für customers

€ 100.000,- for preseason fabric storage with different coloured fabrics and parts that speeds up the production

€ 200.000,- for systematic team enlargement that guarantees more jobs and cuts the waiting time for a custom suit in half

€ 500.000,- for expansion of product portfolio and internationalisation: market entry into USA & Canada

More money gives us more time to develop even better products and offer a new machine set up for a free & fast repair service.


We would greatly appreciate if you could:

  1. Fund our campaign - Thank You!
  2. Spread the word with your friends, families and communities


Perks!

Other ways to help us

If you´re not in a place to financially contribute to our campaign, simply share our IndieGoGo page with your friends on Facebook. Thank you!

Help us SHARE on Facebook! 


SUPSKIN Website

SUPSKIN on INSTAGRAM


Wolfgang Leeb founder of SUPSKIN

My Story

I am an Austrian based Stand Up Paddler and started with this watersport in summer 2011. With a focus on racing, exploring and SUP center business but limited due to long cold winter time and freezing cold water. Looking for proper sup clothes became an issue to protect me from the elements to keep me warm, safe and comfortable.



Every sport has its specialized equipment and clothes but all I could find was wetsuits or heavy bulky 4 layer thick drysuits for kayaking which didn´t work well for standing on a board. So either I was sweating and still freezing in my wetsuit or limited by movement and soaked in an expensive baggy drysuit. 

Also my sup rentals and clinics went down to 0 after the last warm sunny days in fall and only would pick up again in late spring. 6 months of low business would be tough on any sup based business around the world.

So I figured that if SUP would keep growing strong as it does, the need for a best solution custom tailor made technical drysuit would be enormous. Since stand up paddling is called the fastest growing sport in the world it´s worth to give it a go.


We started from scratch and a first hand sewn and glued proto suit. We didn't want to follow a given path and redesigned the concept of a drysuit combined with a not watersport based membrane fabric which has never been used for drysuits before. It led us into a new dimension of technical clothes. It´s a bit like how Apple did change the game for mobile phones  whilst others did miss the evolution. 

After only 3 years of testing, learning and some more testing we have established a true brand with a quite big fan base around the world. Supskin became an institution in the cold watersports activities and not only in stand up paddling but due to its high end quality and outstanding function also in other sports like sailing, jetskiing, ocean canoeing and even ice climbing and cross country skiing.

The main focus lies on tailor made suits, boardshorts that don´t get wet and useful accessories as drysocks and drypants. Everybody is different in bodysize, activities and style. To follow these needs we created an unmatched product line and customer service that no other brand is able to offer.

As a family operated business with a focus on an environmental friendly recyclable product made in Europe we have reached a limit of what is possible.

To grow an international global brand with thousands of individual customers we need to relocate and organize our company. € 50.000.- for a better and more efficient online shop keeps the retail costs low,  € 100.000.- for preseason fabric storage with different coloured fabrics and parts speeds up the production and € 200.000 for labour costs for a bigger team that guarantees more jobs and cuts the waiting time for a custom suit in half. More money gives us more time to develop even better products and offer a new machine set up for a free repair service.


Be part of this story and become a true SUPSKINER!

Thank you!

story:
The HOVERSPIN™ is the perfect gift for the person that has everything.

                    

The HOVERSPIN™ is a fully metal high-tech spinning top. It featurs an advanced design including; adjustable top and base for easy leveling.

Spin the top - and make it hover!  

It spins while surfing on magnetic waves! You can even hold your hand underneath the top and it will continue to spin and float in mid air!  The HOVERSPIN™ is supported only by magnetic force, produced by magnets in the top and base (no batteries required).

"It's not magic! It's physics. The speed of the turn is what keeps you upright. It's like a spinning top." Deborah Bull


The HOVERSPIN™ is a beautiful top which will last for generations to come. It's made for those with a playful mind who have a nack for engineering, physics or science. It sports a minimalist timless design for those who love elegance and simplycity. A great gift for a friend, co-worker or yourself.

HOVERSPIN™ is the first metal spinning top that levitates

 The HOVERSPIN™ is designed and manufactured in Switzerland. Crafted from aluminum, each piece is precision machined on state of the art CNC lathes producing perfectly balanced components. Once machined, each piece is meticulously instpected for dimensions and weight. They are then and only then hand finished in our workshop in Switzerland. 

 "Once you have tasted flight you will walk the earth with your eyes turned skywards, for there you have been and there you will long to return." Leonardo da Vinci

The Challenge


The HOVERSPIN™ is not just a simple toy, it requiers some skill. Beginners will need some practice to spin the top. As your skills increase so will your flight time. 

The HOVERSPIN™ was created by a division of Additive Dynamics to demonstrate the fascinating display of magnetic force.

A scientific theorem was formed over a century ago that states it's impossible - yet this amazing top levitates right before your eyes!


If you would like to make the HOVERSPIN™ availabale for everyone, please support us and select one of the perks below.  We are offering reduced pricing for our first backers.

                           Timeline



                     Choose your Perk


FAQ


What holds the top up?

The combination of centripetal force and magnetic waves

Why does it need to spin?

To jumpstart the magnetic forces

Why does the top slip sideways?

Because the magnetic base is not adjusted so that it is completly level.

Why is the weight critical?

Barometric pressue and temperatur can influence the power of the magnets. This is why the top is adjustable.


How does the HOVERSPIN™ work?

We receive numerous queries from HOVERSPIN™ owners asking for an explanation of how it works.  Many express surprise that it works at all, often citing a theorem by Earnshaw (1,2) as proof that it should not work.  Interest in the HOVERSPIN™ has always run high among scientists.  Recently, analogies of the HOVERSPIN™ to traps for microscopic particles (e.g., electrons, neutrons) have been recognized by scientists working in a fascinating area of research where matter is manipulated and examined, one such microscopic particle at a time.  The first to recognize the analogy was Dr. Michael V. Berry of the University of Bristol.

story:
easy.

delivers 100% organic cotton feminine hygiene products to women throughout Canada on a quarterly basis. A portion of each years profits goes toward health education and sanitary pads for Kenyan girls via Zana Africa Foundation.

  • I am seeking $5,000 worth of funding for marketing and advertising to ensure this service reaches as many women as possible.

    why?
  • Conventional feminine hygiene products contain harmful chemicals and chemicals that shed, safe options are only available at health food stores.

  • Your donation gives women access to a safe option for the products they interact with most intimately.

  • 80% of girls in East Africa lack access to sanitary pads - your purchase supports these girls by providing them with pads and health education via Zana Africa Foundation.

    can't donate?
Spread the word, your time is so valued - thank you!
story_txt:
easy.

delivers 100% organic cotton feminine hygiene products to women throughout Canada on a quarterly basis. A portion of each years profits goes toward health education and sanitary pads for Kenyan girls via Zana Africa Foundation.  I am seeking $5,000 worth of funding for marketing and advertising to ensure this service reaches as many women as possible.why?


  Conventional feminine hygiene products contain harmful chemicals and chemicals that shed, safe options are only available at health food stores.

Your donation gives women access to a safe option for the products they interact with most intimately.

80% of girls in East Africa lack access to sanitary pads - your purchase supports these girls by providing them with pads and health education via Zana Africa Foundation.can't donate?


Spread the word, your time is so valued - thank you!

story:
Nutshell:
  1. 2redwinery makes 2 great red wines.
  2. Your tax-deductible support gets you the wine.
  3. All proceeds support prostate cancer research.
  4. That's it: great wine for a worthy cause.

2 Red Wines Supporting Prostate Cancer Research

Why We Are Here:
Pursuing a long-time love of wine, I (Winemaker Bob) started small volume wine making in 2007.  The goal was to produce the explosive style of Zinfandel and Syrah-based Rhone-style blend I find most exciting.  The award-winning Zinpiphany© Zinfandel and Rhone-styled #2red were the result.  Passion later changed to purpose following a diagnosis of incurable prostate cancer. Determined to make the best of the situation, I created the Robert and Susan Hollander Foundation, an IRS approved 501c3 non-profit supporting prostate cancer research.  Since then, all proceeds from my wine making efforts at 2redWinery are committed to supporting prostate cancer research through the Foundation.  Your tax-deductible support will allow me to continue to produce great wines for you while supporting prostate cancer research.

The Campaign:

By helping me make my next two barrels of wine with your tax-deductible support, you can secure wines from the 2016 vintage or from my award-winning wine library while supporting prostate cancer research.

The campaign has three parts:

  1. Your tax-deductible support.
  2. Red wine rewards for you.
  3. All proceeds pass to the Foundation and prostate cancer research.

About 3 million men are living in America right now with prostate cancer and about 28000 will die this year.   Prostate cancer will affect about 1 in 7 men over their lifetime.  This campaign will allow me to continue the pursuit of something I love while helping someone you may know.

What I Need, What You Get & What I Do

All proceeds above my anticipated wine makings costs of $16,200 for the two barrels are committed to the Foundation and prostate cancer research.  The Foundation currently operates with an expense rate of 0.0% (I pay the costs.)  You get the wine (see Perks).  I get the satisfaction of making wine and doing something useful.  In the three fiscal years the Foundation has been operational, we have made annual gifts with recipients including clinical investigators at MD Anderson and the Cleveland Clinic.  Both wines have been consistent award winners:

I am proud and pleased with all of my wines, including those not yet entered in competition.  The 2012 Zinpiphany and #2red are the current go-tos on our dinner table.  

The Perks

Like wine futures,  you can secure wine from the upcoming 2016 vintage.  I will be offering single bottles, mixed two-packs, wine 6-packs and full cases of Zinpiphany and #2red.   For those of you with immediate gratification needs, you can select from my existing wine library, including some of the wines listed above.

Timeline:

Summer, 2016 - grapes grow and ripen
Fall, 2016 - harvest and crush of the 2016 grapes
Fall, 2016 - shipping of library wine perks once the weather cools
Late Fall/Early Winter, 2016 - fermentation
January, 2016 through February, 2018 - aging in oak
March, 2018, or so - blending of the 2016 Zinpiphany and #2red
Fall, 2018 - shipping of the 2016s with the cooler weather

Risks:

The California wine industry has been unusually reliable year after year, largely due to favorable weather, adequate rain and, when the rain is spotty, irrigation which still remains reliable.  Natural disasters remain a rare risk and wine-making disasters like a failed fermentation are possible, but events like these are unlikely.  If my funding falls short and I scale back to one barrel, I will still work to do right by you by substituting a wine of similar value and known excellence.

Wine shipments are not possible to: DE, KY, MS, OK, RI, SD, UT.
I can ship to PA, and AL but they must be shipped to a state store for your pick up. 

You Can Help!

Want to help but can't contribute? Share, tweet and post on social media!

story:
Hi, my name is Quétreahna Da Costa but most people just call me Quéti. I'm a 20 year old who loves cooking,writing,and creating beauty products! What better way to join all of my loves  together than by writing a cookbook?! Inside & Out is such an important project to me because not only does this cookbook cover what goes directly into your mouth but also onto your skin. When I learned that our skin has "tiny little mouths", it made me realize just how important the products we use on our body are. So in order to help myself and other people take control of what they put on and in their bodies I decided to include people's two favorite things in one book, food and healthy products! That's where you all come in, in order to get this book started and out there I'll need your help. As we all know most things in life don't come free, but your health is definitely worth the cost.

The estimated cost for this project is around $2000. This money will go to the three P's: 

1: Photography,

2:Printing

3: Publishing 

This cookbook like I said earlier will have recipes for inside your body outside of your body. It will also have some fun kids recipes as well, so the whole family can enjoy this new adventure together!

In every new project we take on in life, there will almost always be a setback but here we are having faith that everything will go smoothly. If not, hey that's another life lesson we just learned. We'll get through it eventually.


Now if you can't help monetarily don't worry! You can always share this project with your friends,family,colleagues,anybody!

story:
Hey there!

 Glad to have you reviewing our campaign. My name is Cody, President of Aftermath Supplements Inc., my passion for fitness developed at a young age, I remember I was in grade seven, over for dinner at my friends place. His dad had a men's fitness magazine, I opened it and started to read. (Well, started looking at pictures of fit girls. That counts as reading, right. lol) I remember seeing this massive dude on one of the pages and it clicked, I said to myself, "some day, I'm going to be big like that." In grade seven, I got my first weight bench, by grade eight I was working out with 165 lb on flat bench at four sets of eight reps. It was love at first rep... I enjoyed the exhausted feeling after an intense two hour lift session and still do. I enjoy growing as a person, and fitness is so easily relatable to life. We don't grow unless we experience pain, it takes heart break to know what "love" actually is, and it takes the pain of that last rep to tear your muscle apart. But, in the aftermath, we become stronger, and better. 

The only thing I didn't enjoy, was the slow recovery time, and getting fatigued earlier then I wanted. SO, I started experimenting with different supplements, researching, looking into the science behind the claims, if there were any and used myself as a guinea pig. As the years go by, you waste a lot of money learning what works and what doesn't. BUT! Wasting money or not, the experience and knowledge you gain are invaluable. A lot of products out there have the bare minimum of what's needed to get the job done properly, and I'm tired of it. 

When it comes to spending my hard earned money on products, I want the best, not some hocus pocus, magic powder. I want results, and I want it backed by science. 

With the knowledge I've gained over the years and a lot of extra research I stepped up to design my own product line. Enter, Aftermath Supplements Inc., this supplement line has been intentionally designed with maximum dose for maximum benefit to the user. I sourced one of the best contract manufacture's in America with the best flavouring capability. They source and test the highest quality ingredients for use in our products, with a four week turn around from product order to fulfilment. That's pretty damn good. 

It's our mission at Aftermath Supplements, to bring you high quality products, designed for results at the lowest possible price. We're here to help you conquer. Our second mission is to stay true to fitness and clear of sex sells marketing. We don't agree with objectifying people as merely sexual objects put here for our pleasure and fun. You're a human-being. You're invaluable. 

We have six products to start with, over the next two years we will be introducing a natural testosterone booster that actually works. It's our goal to triple the high end of normal testosterone levels and it will be backed by science. We will also be introducing a plant based enzymatically alive nutritional drink. 

I've always been entrepreneurial at heart, partly because I have other big dreams besides fitness to impact this world in a positive way. There's a lot of non-sense going on in our own countries that seriously has no need. We have enough resources, technology, talent and skill to solve most of our hunger and homeless related issues; if we put our hearts, minds and pockets together. Aftermath, will be initiating possible solutions to these issues and investing in them over the years to come. 

ALL of your contributions matter, from the smallest to the biggest, everything adds up and I want you to know that every penny invested in our start-up, is greatly appreciated. 

Let's make this dream come to life! Will you do this with us?

Thank you!

You can check out our product design and look at, www.aftermathsupplements.com

What We Need & What You Get

We need $175 000 to start this properly. $122 610 to start manufacturing our product line and $52 390 for marketing through social media, internet, and fitness magazines. 
Besides our current discounts, every investor will receive a %30 discount on all purchases for 12 months!! Investing with us will be a great choice, as I have already explained we're passionate about fitness, real results and playing an active significant role in researching and developing solutions to help eliminate hunger and lift up poverty stricken families in our city and our country. Life is short gift and we only live it once; we may as well do all we can to make a positive difference in the world around us. 

Your Impact

As we grow, we will be utilizing a blog section on our webpage to ask our customers what issues they would like to see us contribute to, so we can donate to a different cause every other month. 
YOU, YES YOU. ALL of your contributions will make this dream and much more come to life! Money isn't meant to be hoarded, or squandered. Together we can make a difference!! 
Wait, there's more, if we reach our minimum goal, $5 from every purchase will be donated to help support the families of the Fort McMurray wild fire.
 

Risks & Challenges

- If we do not reach our financial goal, some people will be shipped a different product then they may have ordered, but, you will get an equivalent amount of product as you paid for. 

Worst case scenario example: If we only land enough funds to start one product line, we will start the line that has the most orders. So, everyone who ordered something different will end up with the most popular product. 

Thank you for taking this journey with us!

What are you waiting for!? Doo it. ;)

story:
When it comes to Brazil, it's no question that it's home to the most beautiful women in the world. It seems that Brazil has some highly regarded secrets that keep women looking flawless and beautiful year around. While we continuously search for the fountain of youth that Brazilian women regularly tap into,  we have found a secret regimen to maintaining healthy and shiny hair and we want to share it with you! Our Bio Tanix Restoring hair care kit is like nothing else available in the US. It has been a front runner in Brazil since its market release in 2015.  It continues to receive praise even from the toughest critics. It contains some of the ingredients that Brazilian women hold in secrecy. It was even featured in 

as an upcomming must have hair care line! 



Let's take a closer look at some of the key ingredients..........


Argan Oil is a natural compound rich in vitamin A, E, omega 6 and 9 essential fatty acids. It naturally moisturizes hair, diminishing frizz making it a great asset to restore and restructure the fibers.  In essence, it nourishes, strengthens, and adds shine and softness.
Ojon Oil is also rich in omega 9 fatty acids, which is essential in treating damaged hair. It helps restore shine and softness, making it silky, while contributing to maintaining healthy hair fibers.  It aids in reconstructing hair damaged due to heat and protects hair from extreme heat used while blow drying or flat ironing. It also protects hair after any salon service that uses professional chemicals.
Olive Oil is the oil extracted from the fruit of the olive tree, a tree native to the Mediterranean region.  Our Olive oil is obtained by pressing only at low temperatures using mechanical filtration to secure the rich antioxidants this amazing fruit offers. It aids in restoring damaged hair, giving it shine and softness. 
When combined, all three active ingredients are a powerhouse in giving you healthy and shiny hair just like the beautiful Brazilian women flaunt on the beaches of Rio de Janeiro as featured in  magazine. 


Here's a break down of what products are in our Bio Tanix Restoring line...



But don't take our work for it......
Check out what others are saying about Bio Tanix Restoring!




HERE'S OUR ROADMAP TO SUCCESS! WITH YOUR HELP, WE WILL BE ABLE TO GIVE BACK AND CREATE JOBS. 



We hope you're as excited as we are to bring our Bio Tanix Restoring Line to the US.  However, as a special introductory offer at a deep discount, we want you to be the first to try some of our other nutrient rich home care products that are also not yet available in the US market. 

THERMAL HOME CARE


Our Thermal Home Care line was developed to aid  in taming extremely rebellious hair. You may want to keep your natural shape but maybe need a little help keeping it hydrated and healthy looking.  This line is rich in essential oils for the most rebellious ethnic hair.  It will leave your hair restored, silky, with a longer intense shine. Its use is very important to maintain healthy hair.


BIO TANIX ORIGINAL


Our Bio Tanix Original Home Care line has been created for the more sensitive hair type, especially our blond bombshells! Our line consists of a complete daily maintenance regimen of  a purifying shampoo, deep conditioning mask, regular conditioner, and a leave-in conditioner. When used together, the results are nothing short of spectacular! And we highly recommend using our leave-in contioner to protect your hair in the summer months.

MAXIMUS HOME CARE



Our Maximus Home Care line is packed with antioxidants and rich nutrients.  It's made with Açaí, Bamboo, and Structure XL which are an excellent trio in combating frizzy and unruly hair. We recommend this after care line for the person with curly hair looking to keep their natural god-given spirals while disciplining the frizz and curls giving you maximum control.



HYDRA HOME CARE



Our Hydra Home Care line is packed with rich moisturizers for the extremely dry and damaged hair type. It can be used year around and great for beach goers to protect their hair from salts. It is a must for those who live in arid climates and  the cold dry winter months. 


FOR YOUR HELP, HERE ARE THE AWESOME PERKS WE'RE EXICTED TO EXTEND TO YOU!

$64.99 (23% off) $50.00USD + Shipping

With the minimum pledge, we are offering you our new Bio Tanix Restoring Kit before it hits the US Markets! We want you to be first to experience our top quality products.    

$129.98 (27% off) $95.00USD + Shipping

So you decided to stock up and get two of our awesome kits? We know you made the right choice. You'll be stocked for a good 90 days. We will give you two Bio Tanix Restoring kits to try before it hits the US Markets. 

$160.87 (27% off) $117.00USD + Shipping

Here's a 2 kit mix combo that will put up a fight against even the most rebellious hair! We recommend this for extremely curly and ethinc hair types. 

$129.98 (27% off) $95.00 + Shipping

This 2 kit mix combo is perfect for all types of blonds.  Whether you're a natural blond or it's been highlighted, no one will be able to tell with this powerful duo.  You'll lock in the blond color longer and protect it against daily polluntants.

                                      $129.98 (27% off) $95.00USD + Shipping

With this double power kit combo, you'll be able to tame your natural spirals and shape.  They will help you keep your natural shape while disciplining the stubborn fly away hair and frizz. 


$160.87 (27% off) $117.00USD + Shipping

If you have extremely dry hair, live in dry climates, or live extreme seasonal changes with dry winters, then this is the 2 kit combo pack we recommend. Your hair will stay moisturized and reviltalized. 


$321.74 (35% off) $210.00 + Shipping (Free for US and Canada)

Wow! You're really going to have amazing hair! You're hair is going to love you and so do we! We are as excited as you are to experiment with all 4 our our after care lines.  We know you'll probably end up having a favorite and we hope you do! You'll end up with our Bio Tanix Restoring, Thermal Complex, Hydra Complex, and Maximus Control Kit.


386.72 (41% off) $230.00 + Shipping (Free for US and Canada)

Wow! You're really going to have amazing hair! You're hair is going to love you and so do we! We are as excited as you are to experiment with our complete after care lines.  We know you'll probably end up having a favorite and we hope you do! You'll end up with our Bio Tanix Restoring, Bio Tanix Original, Thermal Complex, Hydra Complex, and Maximus Control Kits.  Did we say that we appreciate your help? Well, we do and cannot express our gratitude enough! Also, with this perk, you'll receive a personal thank you letter from us with awesome updates as we move through this journey!  



COME JOIN AND GROW WITH US!



Access our Website:

www.biotanixrestoring.com

story:
Short Summary

Hello, our names are Matheau and Regina Casner.  We are the founders of ONE+ONE YOGA. Matheau's background is in advertising, marketing, web design and broadcasting. Regina has a background in fitness, holding past certifications through the American Council on Exercise and Stott Pilates. She is a certified as a 200 Hour Yoga Instructor through YogaWorks.

From personal experience, I remember being interested in yoga and all its benefits, but not wanting to add anything to my life that would hinder my faith in Jesus Christ. 

After much prayer, research and practice, I noticed that rather then hindering my faith journey, my yoga practice actually helped me become more honest with myself and how I really was responding to conflict and everyday stress. My time on my mat was helping me see how I responding off my mat.

There is a quote that says, “Jesus can expound nothing until we can get through all the noisy questions of the head, and are alone with Him."

Those words encompass what begun to happen in my life. 

Yoga is learning to live in the moment by connecting each breath to each movement. The practice of yoga is not some sort of spiritual magic.  When we learn to be more aware of our God-given bodies - emotionally, spiritually, physically—yoga serves as a tool that can also help us become more aware of our habits, thought patterns and how we respond when conflict comes. 

So, our family has embarked on the journey of creating ONE+ONE Yoga. We offer more then just online yoga classes, we have a continually growing library of articles and blog posts to help you understand yoga terminology, and even how parts of the yogi philosophy may or may not line up with our with the Christian faith. We will be adding new video content every month and quarterly challenges to help you live with intention - on and off your yoga mats. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • Raising $5,000 will allow our start-up company to upgrade our video camera, pay for the purchase of a new microphone, help cover the cost of set construction, marketing and update our lighting. These updates will allow us to produce and offer high quality yoga classes, from an online format. Yoga any time and any where.
  • This funding will allow us to make the best use of our time. We have other plans to offer seasonal goals, and resources to help members of ONE+ONE YOGA, this will help speed up the process.
  • If we do not meet our total funding goals, the funds we do raise will go toward the necessary upgrades, and those who have invested will still receive their perks.
  • The Perks for supporting our start up company! If you support $5 Team Members will receive their name on the Team Member's page of our website. For $25 you will receive 1 free month subscription of unlimited access to our online video library. For $50 you will receive 1 month of unlimited access, plus a custom ONE+ONE T-shirt.. Support of $100 will receive a full 2 month subscription to ONE+ONE YOGA's online video library, a custom t-shirt, and water bottle.  $250 supporters will receive 2 months subscription to the website,  plus custom t-shirt, water bottle, and one Gauntlet Bracelet (Unisex) made by ApseAdorn. $500 supporters will receive 12 month subscription to ONE+ONE library, a custom t-shirt, water bottle, custom hand towel and a one Gauntlet Bracelet (Unisex) made by ApseAdorn.

The Impact

How will YOUR contribution make an impact?

  • Your support helps provide people the knowledge and tools to help them develop a personal yoga practice—intelligently and safely—from a Christian worldview. We will offer the resources to understand how a yoga practice can improve someone's whole health—mind, body and spirit.
  • Investing in an online, worldwide community that will allow many people to learn and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

We are a new company and we are daring to reach into this new area, but we're passionate and confident about helping other find better physical and spiritual health.

  • ONE+ONE YOGA is a brand new start up company. Our company is comprised of ourselves, along with our four children--who have given up extra Dad and Mom time to help make ONE+ONE YOGA a reality. Our oldest daughter has also given up some sleep to style her Mom's hair. We have been investing early mornings, late evenings and weekends to get ready for the launch of our website and release of our first set of videos. We are at the place of being close to ready, but in need of a financial infusion to help us take the next step.
  • A challenge we hope to have is adding additional  teachers and increase the size of our video crew.
  • We are planning to "open our doors" within the next two weeks with the launching of ONE+ONE YOGA.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Thank you for taking the time to learn more about ONE + ONE YOGA! Even if you are unable to invest financially, please consider sharing our campaign on your Facebook, Instagram or Twitter account. The Indiegogo share tools make it simple and quick!

Thank You!!

story:
We are Pyramid Creative Inc. and our team has decades of direct experience in life coaching and helping others as well as degrees and doctorate degrees from distinguished US universities.

We are crowdfunding to help us reach more people, spreading the word on what they really need to know about succeeding at healthy commitments. We also are raising funds to do more programs and develop programs in different languages.

Most people if they fail at a diet, fail to keep exercising regularly, fail to quit smoking, or fail at staying off addictive drugs after a rehab program, blame themselves. The truth of the science is, that there is a very real need for continuous support. Adding a support system has been shown to increase success from dismal to a whopping 95% and more.

Quit Smoking Support is the key to success increasing success to 95% from 5%.

Exercise support is the key to success and increasing success to 95% from 5%.

Diet support is the key to success and increasing success to 95% from 5%.

This has been supported by the National Institutes of Health and CDC for decades.

The science is clear, but getting that needed willpower boost has been the consistent problem. Not anymore! Now wherever, whenever it is needed, a boost to willpower is delivered to you through your mobile phone or tablet or computer. Short audio messages give you a power shot of willpower you need to increase your success rate to 95%.

Your coach on the go!

Willpower boost,

what you need,

right when you need it,

and your odds of reaching your goal rise from 5% to 95% and higher!

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need funding of $11,600 to :
  • spread the word
  • create more programs and programs in different languages.

Our Dedication:

  • extremely dedicated!
  • extremely excited!
  • 7 day work week!

The Impact

Increase success rates to 95% from 5%

  • Imagine a world when every time someone makes a healthy commitment to diet, exercise, quit smoking or end serious drug addictions succeed 95% of the time or more! That is what this program can and will achieve with funding from people like you. It is possible because the science supports it and now we have a way to deliver it to everyone the right and powerful way that works.

Apply this to your own experiences:

  • Think about your own experiences with diet, exercise or quitting smoking or even serious addiction, what if the last time you gave in, you had instant access to the right message that worked ,so you would not have given up? Now everyone has the right coach!
  • How do we know our support method and program works? Because it has already been tested and our feedback from users was 100% positive.

Risks & Challenges

Challenges: Communicate the needed information broadly and widely to allow for increased success rates, regular use of support through public awareness of the factor of success related to support.

Risks: The information is not communicated broadly and widely enough to obtain the needed traction for sustainable sales and further development of programs.

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word!

story:
Stretch-N-Grow is a fun-filled fitness program that has many elements to help children create a mindset to be physically and mentally healthy. This is accomplish through sports, cheer, dance, and adventurous classes. All coaches will be certified for youth fitness and nutrition specialists.

Classes are 30 minutes of ACTION PACKED excitement! This weekly early childhood physical education, nutrition and wellness program improves the level of fitness in our Stars and teaches them the importance of a healthy lifestyle and the perils of inactivity.  We assist parents and childcare providers in developing good health and fitness habits! 

Schools will designate a time and day of the week to come instruct the classes. Each month and week, we will E-mail our parents detailing our classes and a link to our curriculum handout!  We encourage our Parents to print use this information as a learning tool for their child and family!  

Example of a Monthly Handout

Example of a Weekly handout

Your contribution and support will help me be able to provide a successful kids fitness program to encourage living a healthy lifestyle.

This campaign will help me provide weekly early childhood physical education, nutrition and wellness programs for children between the ages of 18 months to 5 years. Not only will it improve the level of fitness in our children, but it also teaches them the importance of a healthy lifestyle and the perils of inactivity.  Your contribution can help me assist parents and childcare providers in developing good health and fitness habits! 

Thank you so much!

Risks and challenges

I am committed to making this happen! Your contribution will help me secure territory within the Stretch-n-Grow franchise in Spring, Texas. I will relocate to Spring, TX to run the business and will personally teach all classes. Upon expansion, I'll hire and train instructors to help kids stretch-n-grow!

The percentage of children with obesity in the United States has more than tripled since the 1970s. Today, about one in five school-aged children (ages 6–19) has obesity. This is a strong passion of mine to teach good health and fitness habits to our children. I'm going to start off small, tiny in fact! But I'm confident in our mission to serve children. While I'm aware of the risks, I'm incredibly fired up by the possibilities.

        

"Teach children how they should live, and they will remember it all their life." - Proverbs 22:6

story:
Overview

The Food and Drug Administration (FDA) is currently overhauling rules for sunscreen manufacturers in the U.S. Common sunscreen chemicals such as oxybenzone and octinoxate are readily absorbed into the bloodstream. These chemicals cause hormone disruption, reduce sperm count in men, and incite reproductive health issues in women. These chemicals are also destroying the coral reefs.

Right now, only two sunscreen ingredients are generally recognized as safe and effective (GRASE). These are titanium dioxide and zinc oxide. Zinc oxide is a mineral-based UVA and UVB reflectant that forms a barrier between your skin and the sun's radiation. Zinc oxide is the active ingredient in our original Live Pure Sun Care Creme formula. We are leading the way for sunscreen manufacturers in terms of safety and effectiveness, however...

The FDA's rules require that we put our product through costly broad spectrum clinical SPF testing to ensure that the sunscreen works as intended. We need your help in getting our sunscreen the appropriate clinical testing. Additionally, we must move our production to an FDA-approved, organic certified facility and work with chemists to calibrate our formula for mass production. The good news is: there is a manufacturing facility in the Sunshine State that meets our standards for purity.

Introduction

Hi there, we are Lance and Kender Johnson, founders of Live Pure Body Care. For seven years, we have manufactured our very own skin care products and served tens of thousands of these products to the world. These products are unique because they were a vital part of how we recovered our health and how we continue to protect our cells from endocrine disrupting chemicals. These products are NOT made from synthetics whatsoever - no parabens, heavy metals, coal-tar, or hormone-disrupting chemicals. These products are strictly plant-based formulas, with properties that promote skin health.

Partner with us and change the world for the better

Live Pure Body Care has three main objectives going into 2020 and beyond, and we are asking for your partnership to make these objectives a reality:

1.  We want to ramp up production for our original Sun Care Creme formula in an interested FDA-compliant, organic certified facility in Miami, Florida. Our Sun Care Creme not only protects against excessive UVA and UVB rays that may lead to skin cancer, but also protects you from the hormone-disrupting, cancer causing chemicals that are currently used in top sunscreen brands in the U.S! To do this, we must work with chemists to calibrate our formula for large batch runs.

2.  By scaling up the production and marketing of our Sunscreen, we will be on the forefront of protecting oceanic habitats and the health of coral reefs. Our formula does not contain the chemicals that destroy beautiful oceanic creatures and their natural habitats. Studies now show that the mass production of sunscreen chemicals is killing the coral reefs. The hormone-disrupting chemicals found in most body care products are even affecting the reproductive abilities of orca whales. For these reasons many sunscreen chemicals, such as oxybenzone and octinoxate, are being banned in places like Hawaii, and the FDA is starting to promote formulas that contain zinc oxide, one of the top ingredients in our formula!

3.  We must achieve clinical broad spectrum SPF testing so we can market our Sun Care Creme as "sunscreen" and be competitive in the marketplace. By increasing our sales, we will be able to donate more of our profit so we can work with humanitarian missions. One of our long term goals is to provide clean water to communities that do not have access to this precious resource. People who do not have access to clean water are truly suffering, and we want to do our part in making the world a better place.

Because of these priorities, Live Pure Body Care must move our base of operations out of Illinois so we can mass produce our sunscreen in an FDA-approved, organic certified facility in Florida. To do this, we ask for your help in raising $15,000.

This is an incredible time to grow, to impact the sunscreen market in a positive way. We look to continue shipping our products to the contiguous 48 United States and hope to expand our products worldwide as the opportunity arises.

For now we are asking for your help in achieving our base goals of successful broad spectrum SPF testing, and calibration of our formula at an FDA-compliant, organic-certified facility.

Live Pure Sun Care Creme in production at our home-based facility.

Our tamper proof seal ensures quality and freshness

Sun Care getting properly labeled

What you can get in return

We have set aside some incredible perks for your kind partnership. Shipping our products directly to you is the best way to thank you as we move forward. This is the final manufacturing run for these products in 2019 and may not be available in 2020 as we prepare for changes. All perks will be shipped free of charge in November/December 2019. Here are the products you can claim upon your donation:

Sun Care Creme (Choose between Frankincense, Lavender, or Fennel) Get your hands on one of our signature Sun Care cremes, which contain the natural ZincScreen and a high Skin Repair Factor - fueled by antioxidant-rich golden jojoba and red raspberry seed oils! These have a 3 year shelf life, so stock up now!

Moisturizing Skin Care Salve: Make your skin soft and supple with this antioxidant-rich, anti-inflammatory blend of natural oils. This salve is great for dry skin, swelling, cuts, and abrasions.

Holistic Deodorant 3-Pack (Lavender, Sweet Orange, and Frankincense): Combat body odor at the source with our smooth hemp seed oil and sodium bicarbonate blend, made with 100% therapeutic grade essential oils.

Holistic Deodorant 3-Pack (Spearmint & Clove, Tea Tree, and Rosemary & Pine) This deodorant pack includes three types that have a more manly scent.

Clay Mask: This 4oz blend of clay has a drawing, detoxifying effect on the skin.

Peppermint Essential Oil: This 1 ounce vial of peppermint essential oil is great  diluted in water and used on achy joints, upset stomach and on the temples for headache.

8 Bar Soap Super Pack (Sweet Orange, Tea Tree, or Lavender) Our honey and hemp seed oil soap base provides a smooth, moisturizing lather. We will make a special batch of soap just for you when you partner with us.

Where the money goes

If we reach our goal of $15,000, we will go forward with broad spectrum clinical testing ($6,500). Then, an FDA-approved, organic certified facility from Florida will calibrate our formula to specifications ($1,500) and help us begin our first mass production run ($6,000), which will include label rework to promote the clinical SPF ($1,000). If we raise more than our goal, we will use the funds to begin a strategic marketing campaign to educate the public on the importance of switching to Live Pure's Sun Care Creme.
 

Why we believe in this product

In 2013, I came down with the worst sun burn of my life. That day on Lake Michigan, I had only applied coconut oil to my skin and stayed out in the sun for four hours straight. The next day I suffered from a severe redness and internal itching that could not be relieved. I called it "Hell's itch." From that day forward, I was determined to create a sunscreen that prevented this nightmare. In 2016, I had developed a product worthy of testing out on my own skin. The product delivered great results for my entire family, including my one-and-half year old. We all tanned well over our week trip in the Florida sun. Every trip to the beach since then, I have been confident in our own sun care creme. Not only are the ingredients well researched and formulated at just the right concentration, but I have never experienced "Hell's itch" ever again! Since then, thousands of people have enjoyed this product.
 
Lots of fun time in the sun, but no ruthless sun burn, since using our own Sun Care Creme
 
Live Pure Sun Care Creme includes the non-nano ZincScreen. Zinc oxide is registered at the FDA as a broad spectrum UVA and UVB reflectant. Ours is non-nano, which means it won't enter your pores and disrupt your natural chemistry.
 
Live Pure Sun Care Creme also contains smooth, moisturizing ingredients such as shea butter and coconut oil, nourishing the skin like a lotion.
 
Live Pure Sun Care Creme possesses a high Skin Repair Factor, which refers to the high amount of antioxidants in the formula. The antioxidants come from golden jojoba oil and red raspberry seed oil, which help provide for the skin's quick recovery. This is the great thing about our product that separates it from others on the market: if you forget to apply it to an area on your skin, and you get burned, you can apply it afterward to moisturize and help speed up the skin's recovery, preventing nasty itch and skin damage.
 

Other ways you can help

 
There have been and there will continue to be challenges along this road of expansion. We have met several marketing and product development challenges head on over the past seven years, and we believe that this is a true opportunity to grow our mission and improve the lives of so many people.
 
We will be working hard to follow all the rules for sunscreen manufacture set forth by the FDA, and we have a set amount of time to achieve these goals. We do not receive a salary from our company and we do not water down our formula to boost our bottom line.
 
If you're unable to make a financial contribution, that's okay. We still appreciate your energetic support and hope that you can share The Future of Sun Care campaign with others who can help us move forward. Thank you!
story_txt:
Overview
The Food and Drug Administration (FDA) is currently overhauling rules for sunscreen manufacturers in the U.S. Common sunscreen chemicals such as oxybenzone and octinoxate are readily absorbed into the bloodstream. These chemicals cause hormone disruption, reduce sperm count in men, and incite reproductive health issues in women. These chemicals are also destroying the coral reefs.
Right now, only two sunscreen ingredients are generally recognized as safe and effective (GRASE). These are titanium dioxide and zinc oxide. Zinc oxide is a mineral-based UVA and UVB reflectant that forms a barrier between your skin and the sun's radiation. Zinc oxide is the active ingredient in our original Live Pure Sun Care Creme formula. We are leading the way for sunscreen manufacturers in terms of safety and effectiveness, however...
The FDA's rules require that we put our product through costly broad spectrum clinical SPF testing to ensure that the sunscreen works as intended. We need your help in getting our sunscreen the appropriate clinical testing. Additionally, we must move our production to an FDA-approved, organic certified facility and work with chemists to calibrate our formula for mass production. The good news is: there is a manufacturing facility in the Sunshine State that meets our standards for purity.
Introduction
Hi there, we are Lance and Kender Johnson, founders of Live Pure Body Care. For seven years, we have manufactured our very own skin care products and served tens of thousands of these products to the world. These products are unique because they were a vital part of how we recovered our health and how we continue to protect our cells from endocrine disrupting chemicals. These products are NOT made from synthetics whatsoever - no parabens, heavy metals, coal-tar, or hormone-disrupting chemicals. These products are strictly plant-based formulas, with properties that promote skin health.
Partner with us and change the world for the better
Live Pure Body Care has three main objectives going into 2020 and beyond, and we are asking for your partnership to make these objectives a reality:
1.  We want to ramp up production for our original Sun Care Creme formula in an interested FDA-compliant, organic certified facility in Miami, Florida. Our Sun Care Creme not only protects against excessive UVA and UVB rays that may lead to skin cancer, but also protects you from the hormone-disrupting, cancer causing chemicals that are currently used in top sunscreen brands in the U.S! To do this, we must work with chemists to calibrate our formula for large batch runs.
2.  By scaling up the production and marketing of our Sunscreen, we will be on the forefront of protecting oceanic habitats and the health of coral reefs. Our formula does not contain the chemicals that destroy beautiful oceanic creatures and their natural habitats. Studies now show that the mass production of sunscreen chemicals is killing the coral reefs. The hormone-disrupting chemicals found in most body care products are even affecting the reproductive abilities of orca whales. For these reasons many sunscreen chemicals, such as oxybenzone and octinoxate, are being banned in places like Hawaii, and the FDA is starting to promote formulas that contain zinc oxide, one of the top ingredients in our formula!
3.  We must achieve clinical broad spectrum SPF testing so we can market our Sun Care Creme as "sunscreen" and be competitive in the marketplace. By increasing our sales, we will be able to donate more of our profit so we can work with humanitarian missions. One of our long term goals is to provide clean water to communities that do not have access to this precious resource. People who do not have access to clean water are truly suffering, and we want to do our part in making the world a better place.
Because of these priorities, Live Pure Body Care must move our base of operations out of Illinois so we can mass produce our sunscreen in an FDA-approved, organic certified facility in Florida. To do this, we ask for your help in raising $15,000.
This is an incredible time to grow, to impact the sunscreen market in a positive way. We look to continue shipping our products to the contiguous 48 United States and hope to expand our products worldwide as the opportunity arises.
For now we are asking for your help in achieving our base goals of successful broad spectrum SPF testing, and calibration of our formula at an FDA-compliant, organic-certified facility.

Live Pure Sun Care Creme in production at our home-based facility.

Our tamper proof seal ensures quality and freshness

Sun Care getting properly labeled
What you can get in return
We have set aside some incredible perks for your kind partnership. Shipping our products directly to you is the best way to thank you as we move forward. This is the final manufacturing run for these products in 2019 and may not be available in 2020 as we prepare for changes. All perks will be shipped free of charge in November/December 2019. Here are the products you can claim upon your donation:
Sun Care Creme (Choose between Frankincense, Lavender, or Fennel) Get your hands on one of our signature Sun Care cremes, which contain the natural ZincScreen and a high Skin Repair Factor - fueled by antioxidant-rich golden jojoba and red raspberry seed oils! These have a 3 year shelf life, so stock up now!
Moisturizing Skin Care Salve: Make your skin soft and supple with this antioxidant-rich, anti-inflammatory blend of natural oils. This salve is great for dry skin, swelling, cuts, and abrasions.
Holistic Deodorant 3-Pack (Lavender, Sweet Orange, and Frankincense): Combat body odor at the source with our smooth hemp seed oil and sodium bicarbonate blend, made with 100% therapeutic grade essential oils.
Holistic Deodorant 3-Pack (Spearmint & Clove, Tea Tree, and Rosemary & Pine) This deodorant pack includes three types that have a more manly scent.
Clay Mask: This 4oz blend of clay has a drawing, detoxifying effect on the skin.
Peppermint Essential Oil: This 1 ounce vial of peppermint essential oil is great  diluted in water and used on achy joints, upset stomach and on the temples for headache.
8 Bar Soap Super Pack (Sweet Orange, Tea Tree, or Lavender) Our honey and hemp seed oil soap base provides a smooth, moisturizing lather. We will make a special batch of soap just for you when you partner with us.
Where the money goesIf we reach our goal of $15,000, we will go forward with broad spectrum clinical testing ($6,500). Then, an FDA-approved, organic certified facility from Florida will calibrate our formula to specifications ($1,500) and help us begin our first mass production run ($6,000), which will include label rework to promote the clinical SPF ($1,000). If we raise more than our goal, we will use the funds to begin a strategic marketing campaign to educate the public on the importance of switching to Live Pure's Sun Care Creme. Why we believe in this productIn 2013, I came down with the worst sun burn of my life. That day on Lake Michigan, I had only applied coconut oil to my skin and stayed out in the sun for four hours straight. The next day I suffered from a severe redness and internal itching that could not be relieved. I called it "Hell's itch." From that day forward, I was determined to create a sunscreen that prevented this nightmare. In 2016, I had developed a product worthy of testing out on my own skin. The product delivered great results for my entire family, including my one-and-half year old. We all tanned well over our week trip in the Florida sun. Every trip to the beach since then, I have been confident in our own sun care creme. Not only are the ingredients well researched and formulated at just the right concentration, but I have never experienced "Hell's itch" ever again! Since then, thousands of people have enjoyed this product. Lots of fun time in the sun, but no ruthless sun burn, since using our own Sun Care Creme 
Live Pure Sun Care Creme includes the non-nano ZincScreen. Zinc oxide is registered at the FDA as a broad spectrum UVA and UVB reflectant. Ours is non-nano, which means it won't enter your pores and disrupt your natural chemistry. 
Live Pure Sun Care Creme also contains smooth, moisturizing ingredients such as shea butter and coconut oil, nourishing the skin like a lotion. 
Live Pure Sun Care Creme possesses a high Skin Repair Factor, which refers to the high amount of antioxidants in the formula. The antioxidants come from golden jojoba oil and red raspberry seed oil, which help provide for the skin's quick recovery. This is the great thing about our product that separates it from others on the market: if you forget to apply it to an area on your skin, and you get burned, you can apply it afterward to moisturize and help speed up the skin's recovery, preventing nasty itch and skin damage. Other ways you can help There have been and there will continue to be challenges along this road of expansion. We have met several marketing and product development challenges head on over the past seven years, and we believe that this is a true opportunity to grow our mission and improve the lives of so many people. We will be working hard to follow all the rules for sunscreen manufacture set forth by the FDA, and we have a set amount of time to achieve these goals. We do not receive a salary from our company and we do not water down our formula to boost our bottom line. If you're unable to make a financial contribution, that's okay. We still appreciate your energetic support and hope that you can share The Future of Sun Care campaign with others who can help us move forward. Thank you!

story:
What is Prompt?

Prompt is an initiative to start a conversation about mental health in the tech community, and today we are excited to be part of the Travis Foundation, a not-for-profit organization dedicated to improving Open Source for everyone.

Mental Health in Tech is an issue most people would prefer not to recognize.  People in tech, which includes developers, designers, sys admins - everyone under the tech umbrella - are one of the highest career group to be effected by Mental Health issues.  These issues can include depression, anxiety, eating disorders, ADD/ADHD, bipolar, or a myriad of other issues.  Yet, for some reason, we often stigmatize having issues with our brains.  People in tech don't want to admit there are issues being ignored.  Instead of going away, ignoring the issues had meant the loss of people who could have been helped.

Mental Health is a delicate subject.  People involved in the tech sector generally try to solve their own problems instead of seeking much needed help.  We want to open the door and say it's okay to have issues and it's okay to reach out for help.  Many people are suffering in silence and they don't need to.

The goal is simple: take speakers who talk about mental health from various perspectives and give them money so they can do just that. On top of that, offering support and coaching for speakers, as well as helping organizations get in touch with speakers on the topics surrounding Mental Health as it applies to workers in the Technology field.

What We Need & What You Get

While Prompt was created under the tutelage of Eamon Leonard and the Community Team at Engine Yard, it has grown much larger than one company.

We need funding to get our speakers to conferences.

Helping out helps out all of the tech community.

Funds are focused on travel costs and accommodations for our speakers to go where they are needed.  

The Impact

To get an understanding of Prompt and how it works, take a look at this panel from Distill 2014 featuring the first four Prompt speakers discussing their issues.

Who is Prompt?

Founder: Eamon Leonard

Coordinators: PJ Hagerty, Davey Shafik, Naomi Slater

Speakers: Jen Akullian, Justine Arreche, Greg Baugues, Jason Charnes, John Dalton, Ed Finkler, Paddy Carver, Amy Newell, Julia Nguyen, Christopher Murphy, Karolina Szczur, Mary Thengvall, and Caleb Thompson.

Other Ways You Can Help

Get involved!!  If you can't contribute, invite a speaker to your event, or ask us for help to learn how to speak about an issue you have had that you are overcoming.
