story:
I am Craig J Hubbard, an Australian Exercise Rehabilitation Industrial Designer and "I need your help to protect millions of young athletes from preventable harm”. 

As a former professional Basketball player, I had my share of painful and debilitating ankle sprains. I had used both tape and semi-rigid braces but because of their difficulty to apply, cost of taping, or being restrictive of my normal athletic ability, I, like most athletes, often avoided using anything....and again, sprained my ankles.

After seeing another professional player sprain his ankle in a club game I wondered...

"Why is it that we can put man on the moon and not prevent the 'common ankle sprain'?"

Well, the answer, after two years of research and surveys of current methods, was "Tape and current brace companies simply do not understand how the ankle works, or they see 'profit' in the injury itself".

KiSS understands the athlete's needs as well as the science of ankle function !

 

 

 

 

KiSS Ankle Co. ARE FOCUSED ON PREVENTION NOT INJURY MANAGEMENT.

Social media provides the pathway to change sports and medicine forever. Our mission is to educate parents and athletes directly as to the benefits of PREVENTION.  We already have the support of some of the world's top Ankle Surgeons. See Dr Richie's letter below.

Currently, according to a recent British Journal of Sports Medicine paper, the short and long term costs of the 'common ankle sprain' in short and long term pain and disability, is the highest single cost for any single injury.

Together, WE can help save millions of young athletes and others prevent or medically rehabilitate the common ankle sprain.

"Prevention is better than (non) cure", wrote one of the authors of the BJSM paper when introduced to the KiSS for the first time.

You may not need a KiSS, but you probably know someone who does?

You may simply want to support the cause of protecting millions of people from pain and suffering, and there are ways to support that cause a variety of  'pledges'. 

KiSS is the Ankle system to change sport and medicine forever...

You and the people you share with, have the power to make that happen !

 

Sizes- Currently Medium and Large with Small to come Crowd willing in September 2017

  • Small - U.S. shoe 6 - 9 and weight  40 -60* Kg
  • Medium U.S. shoe 9 - 11 and weight 50 - 90* kg
  • Large U.S. shoe 11-13 and weight 70 - 110* kg

* Weights will overlap. With increased height, the larger of the options for weight is recommended

Custom and larger sizes service offered to first Backers over $100 post crowdfund.

 

The 'power' of the Kinetic Impulse Suppression System to prevent the 'common ankle sprain'

 

Research BEFORE design.

Statements like Delarcerda et al that “… the purpose of ankle taping is to reduce joint range of movement….”  have reinforced the traditional belief that to protect the ankle from injury it is necessary to restrict the ankle from inverting by limiting the ankle range of motion (ROM) in this direction. 
Garrick and Requa  have proposed a theoretical aim of ankle taping “…to support externally a ligamentous structure without limiting normal range of motion or function. This support of ligaments need be present only when the physiologic or normal ranges of motion have been exceeded.” . They also contend, “….the achievement of this goal, however, is virtually impossible.” 


The 'common ankle sprain motion'.

  • THERE IS A 'SAFE' ZONE where the energy can be absorbed and transferred away from the ankle during the sprain motion, or returned to the athlete as energy stored during normal activity.  
  • Your ankle ligaments like the Anterior Talofibular or ATFL are supporting a completely different joint, the up and down motion (dorsi and plantar flexion) that is only injured when the ankle roll reaches its limit.  
  • Restricting the ankle roll is not only unnecessary, but if done on an injured ankle, can and does lead to long term laxity and disability like arthritis.
 

Why does a KiSS work for prevention and rehabilitation? US Surgeon Dr.Richie Jnr explains.

Important points

  • Restricting the Ankle Complex alters the entire biomechanical chain of the lower limb and 'breaks' it.
  • The ankle complex is a 'safety valve' for the lower limb to prevent injury by increasing the time of loading to enable a muscle response and begin the external rotation of the lower limb to 'de-weight' the limb.  
  • None of that can happen when you use restrictive braces or taping!

And finally there are the detrimental effects on performance due to restrictive methods.

  • Robinson, Frederick and Cooper  “Directional changes require a large horizontal component of force. Positioning the leg while manoeuvring is accomplished by the normal ROM at the ankle and subtalar joints. If ankle motion is restricted, then the ability to position the leg to apply a large horizontal force component is reduced, decreasing manoeuvrability.” 
  • In order to maintain the ankle joint surface contact during activity and avoid cartilage damage, the KiSS provides positive tension directed upward through the joint.  This is a goal of taping but Glick et al  demonstrated radiographically the inability of rigid tape to hold the talus within the ankle mortis for any time longer than 20 minutes and was in fact probably effective for less.

By storing and returning the energy of normal motion without restricting anything but the extremes of ROM, the KiSS allows time for normal joint motion to de-weight the ankle and for muscle responses.

By restoring joint integrity and providing a 'safety net' against the ankle sprain, the KiSS restores confidence and eliminates joint pain on walking. This in rehabilitation stimulates repair of ligaments, cartilage and bone through normal activity

Please see the website for the full abstract version of this research completed BEFORE designing the 'cure' for the common ankle sprain.

How does a KiSS work?

There are at least 2 Patented scientific advances based on nature, sound physics and engineering that make the KiSS work.

  • A KiSS is designed to suppress or store a high shock force (the ankle sprain). By spreading the force over time throughout the ankle roll motion, it reduces the 'sudden' force transfer up the leg as happens with tape and rigid and semi-rigid braces. But how does it do that?
  • The yellow strap or 'tongue' has a high density elastic behind it.  The tongue only comes it action at the limits of the ankle roll or inversion, preventing any further ankle roll.  Before it gets to the end range, or the 'DANGER or INJURY zone', the elastic has stored most of the force.  If the motion continues, the yellow tongue comes in and 'catches' you.
  • The KiSS is a 'shock absorber' for the ankle.
  • The second part of the patented system, and probably the most significant engineering is the 'anchor pad'. These anchors are capable of a resisting a high shock force, being designed to mimic the starfish being 'smashed' by waves in the tidal zone.  The anchor is made of the same firm but soft material used in surfboard grip; It loves getting wet ! 

The KiSS both grips onto the skin, and your skin conforms to the 'star' hole design of the anchor, and you grip onto the brace.

 

  • An effectively 'set' anchor is capable of enough shock force holding to prevent the common ankle sprain.  Achieving the proper 'set' or 'anchor' needs two things; firm binding of the anchors and up to 10 minutes to 'grip' or 'mould to the skin. 

 

So where does the force go?  

The force stored in the elastic is returned to the athlete when the ankle returns to normal.  As such, running, jumping and changing directions is enhanced not restricted.

 

Products tested and used by professional athletes, Doctors and Ankle Surgeons

Professional teams and associations

Australian Wallabies Rugby Union and Queensland Reds - Super Rugby

Brisbane Broncos and St George Rugby League - National Rugby League Australia

Ex Brisbane Bullets and Sydney Supersonics players - National League Basketball - Australia

Sydney Swans - Australian Football League

Brisbane Lions - Australian Football League

Regional Sports Academy - Netball and Touch Football Australia

Brisbane Roar - National Soccer (Football) League Australia

Australian Football League AFL- General Manager - Football operations - "The brace is obviously of real value to sports people, and as such,should be encouraged"

Orthopaedic Ankle Surgeons, Doctors and Sports Therapists

Dr Doug Richie Jnr - US Ankle Surgeon - Board member and Past President of the American Academy of Podiatric Sports Medicine for 7 years and also serving as Section Editor (Sports Medicine) for the Journal of Foot and Ankle Surgery for 10 years. Seal Beach Podiatry Group, CA.. 

Dr Kim Slater - Orthopaedic Ankle Surgeon to the Sydney Swans AFL and specialist ankle and knee surgeon

Dr Michael Kinchington - Doctor to the Sydney Swans AFL

Dr Martin Raftery - Team Doctor to St George Rugby league, Australian Wallabies Rugby Union and current Chief Medical Officer of World Rugby

Dr John Sage - Orthopaedic Sports surgeon - "Although it can be used for lesser injuries, I feel that one of its main benefits will be with severe instability of the lateral ligament complex of the ankle in sportsmen"

Marjorie Curl - Physiotherapist - Launceston Tasmania. "I use this for people with chronic RA (Rheumatoid Arthritis) who have instability and need a soft support. They also need an adjustable one because of swelling during the day. This brace fills that need."

Ross B Smith - Australian Olympic Team Physiotherapist - "I believe this brace certainly to be an excellent alternative to strapping.."

Mark Kenna - Sports Physiotherapist - "It is quicker and easier to apply than tape.."

Yan Smits - Head of R&D Otto Bock/Rehband "I was very impressed when I observed your samples...! I realise your designs are unique concerning function, shape, colour and appearance." 

Steve J Oordt - Smith & Nephew DonJoy Inc (Elastoplast) "(we are) favourably impressed by your work and in the hands of a company able to maximise the potential for this product, it could be quite successful."

Professional athletes and others

Hon John Howard - Former Prime Minister of Australia "my ankle healed quite quickly." "Thank you for sending me the prototype ankle brace"

Michael Voss - AFL - Brownlow medalist

'The Australian' Newspaper, back page

'Brisbane's Champion Midfielder, Michael Voss, will consider wearing a special protective cast on his injured ankle in a bid to play in Saturday's preliminary final against North Melbourne at the MCG. 

The cast is similar to the one successfully used by Brisbane Broncos forward Andrew Gee for his broken thumb in last weekend's rugby league semi-final. Voss, who rates himself a better than 50-50 chance of playing, looked comfortable when he tried the cast on at training last night.'

Ian Healy - Australian Cricket team wicketkeeper "many thanks for your assistance once again, it really is and was appreciated"

See the website for more media and photos during many years of testing and development

What We Need & What You Get

KiSS needs $30,000 US to

  • Increase our current production capacity in our facility in Australia. Ie employ more people, buy materials and a hydraulic 'click' press to bring the full manufacturing process in house.
  • Buy tooling to introduce the small size KiSS.
  • Produce packaging, logos and associated product delivery systems
  • Kick start the project and 'seed' parts of the world with the KiSS
  • Produce better videos and explanations to 'empower' people to make change
  • Professionally develop social media and other 'word of mouth systems'.

I am a single Father, and my sons are helping me produce the current content.  I believe you can see where engaging professionals for this task would be an advantage.

I am an inventor and educator. I AM NOT A SALESPERSON and I don't do 'business structures' well. So..

  • Your funding will employ our new CEO in as much capacity as you facilitate to ensure the commercial success of the KiSS Ankle Co. Linda Cooper and others are helping without payment at the moment but are professionals in the field of communication and education delivery.
  • You get to be the first in the world to experience the support and confidence of the KiSS Ankle System as a reward for various pledge options

You also get to know you helped 'kick start' a revolution and saved millions from pain and suffering. All initial pledges will be permanently acknowledged on our social media platforms because of your contribution to changing sport and medicine forever !!!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help 'KiSS' others:

  • Please help to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign through social media. Sharing is really caring and preventing harm.
  • Everyone knows someone who needs a KiSS
  • There are many ways to support KiSS by using the sharing tools on the page

The world, and I, will thank you for the enormous good we will do, TOGETHER !

How does a KiSS work?
There are at least 2 Patented scientific advances based on nature, sound physics and engineering that make the KiSS work.

A KiSS is designed to suppress or store a high shock force (the ankle sprain). By spreading the force over time throughout the ankle roll motion, it reduces the 'sudden' force transfer up the leg as happens with tape and rigid and semi-rigid braces. But how does it do that?
The yellow strap or 'tongue' has a high density elastic behind it.  The tongue only comes it action at the limits of the ankle roll or inversion, preventing any further ankle roll.  Before it gets to the end range, or the 'DANGER or INJURY zone', the elastic has stored most of the force.  If the motion continues, the yellow tongue comes in and 'catches' you.

The KiSS is a 'shock absorber' for the ankle.
The second part of the patented system, and probably the most significant engineering is the 'anchor pad'. These anchors are capable of a resisting a high shock force, being designed to mimic the starfish being 'smashed' by waves in the tidal zone.  The anchor is made of the same firm but soft material used in surfboard grip; It loves getting wet ! 


The KiSS both grips onto the skin, and your skin conforms to the 'star' hole design of the anchor, and you grip onto the brace.
 

An effectively 'set' anchor is capable of enough shock force holding to prevent the common ankle sprain.  Achieving the proper 'set' or 'anchor' needs two things; firm binding of the anchors and up to 10 minutes to 'grip' or 'mould to the skin. 


 

So where does the force go?  
The force stored in the elastic is returned to the athlete when the ankle returns to normal.  As such, running, jumping and changing directions is enhanced not restricted.
 
Products tested and used by professional athletes, Doctors and Ankle Surgeons
Professional teams and associations
Australian Wallabies Rugby Union and Queensland Reds - Super Rugby
Brisbane Broncos and St George Rugby League - National Rugby League Australia

Ex Brisbane Bullets and Sydney Supersonics players - National League Basketball - Australia

Sydney Swans - Australian Football League
Brisbane Lions - Australian Football League
Regional Sports Academy - Netball and Touch Football Australia
Brisbane Roar - National Soccer (Football) League Australia
Australian Football League AFL- General Manager - Football operations - "The brace is obviously of real value to sports people, and as such,should be encouraged"
Orthopaedic Ankle Surgeons, Doctors and Sports Therapists
Dr Doug Richie Jnr - US Ankle Surgeon - Board member and Past President of the American Academy of Podiatric Sports Medicine for 7 years and also serving as Section Editor (Sports Medicine) for the Journal of Foot and Ankle Surgery for 10 years. Seal Beach Podiatry Group, CA.. 
Dr Kim Slater - Orthopaedic Ankle Surgeon to the Sydney Swans AFL and specialist ankle and knee surgeon
Dr Michael Kinchington - Doctor to the Sydney Swans AFL

Dr Martin Raftery - Team Doctor to St George Rugby league, Australian Wallabies Rugby Union and current Chief Medical Officer of World Rugby
Dr John Sage - Orthopaedic Sports surgeon - "Although it can be used for lesser injuries, I feel that one of its main benefits will be with severe instability of the lateral ligament complex of the ankle in sportsmen"
Marjorie Curl - Physiotherapist - Launceston Tasmania. "I use this for people with chronic RA (Rheumatoid Arthritis) who have instability and need a soft support. They also need an adjustable one because of swelling during the day. This brace fills that need."
Ross B Smith - Australian Olympic Team Physiotherapist - "I believe this brace certainly to be an excellent alternative to strapping.."
Mark Kenna - Sports Physiotherapist - "It is quicker and easier to apply than tape.."
Yan Smits - Head of R&D Otto Bock/Rehband "I was very impressed when I observed your samples...! I realise your designs are unique concerning function, shape, colour and appearance." 
Steve J Oordt - Smith & Nephew DonJoy Inc (Elastoplast) "(we are) favourably impressed by your work and in the hands of a company able to maximise the potential for this product, it could be quite successful."
Professional athletes and others
Hon John Howard - Former Prime Minister of Australia "my ankle healed quite quickly." "Thank you for sending me the prototype ankle brace"
Michael Voss - AFL - Brownlow medalist
'The Australian' Newspaper, back page 
'Brisbane's Champion Midfielder, Michael Voss, will consider wearing a special protective cast on his injured ankle in a bid to play in Saturday's preliminary final against North Melbourne at the MCG. 
The cast is similar to the one successfully used by Brisbane Broncos forward Andrew Gee for his broken thumb in last weekend's rugby league semi-final. Voss, who rates himself a better than 50-50 chance of playing, looked comfortable when he tried the cast on at training last night.'

Ian Healy - Australian Cricket team wicketkeeper "many thanks for your assistance once again, it really is and was appreciated"
See the website for more media and photos during many years of testing and development

What We Need & What You Get
KiSS needs $30,000 US to

Increase our current production capacity in our facility in Australia. Ie employ more people, buy materials and a hydraulic 'click' press to bring the full manufacturing process in house.
Buy tooling to introduce the small size KiSS.
Produce packaging, logos and associated product delivery systems
Kick start the project and 'seed' parts of the world with the KiSS
Produce better videos and explanations to 'empower' people to make change
Professionally develop social media and other 'word of mouth systems'.

I am a single Father, and my sons are helping me produce the current content.  I believe you can see where engaging professionals for this task would be an advantage.
I am an inventor and educator. I AM NOT A SALESPERSON and I don't do 'business structures' well. So..

Your funding will employ our new CEO in as much capacity as you facilitate to ensure the commercial success of the KiSS Ankle Co. Linda Cooper and others are helping without payment at the moment but are professionals in the field of communication and education delivery.
You get to be the first in the world to experience the support and confidence of the KiSS Ankle System as a reward for various pledge options

You also get to know you helped 'kick start' a revolution and saved millions from pain and suffering. All initial pledges will be permanently acknowledged on our social media platforms because of your contribution to changing sport and medicine forever !!!
Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help 'KiSS' others:

Please help to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign through social media. Sharing is really caring and preventing harm.
Everyone knows someone who needs a KiSS
There are many ways to support KiSS by using the sharing tools on the page

The world, and I, will thank you for the enormous good we will do, TOGETHER !

story:
At iMorph Smart Technologies, LLC. ("iMorph"), we converge and automate existing smart technology with self-help psychology to stop or reduce undesirable personal behaviors that exist within millions of us, our friends and families we care for. Our signature product is CigFree Smart Band (“CigFree”), designed to help people quit smoking cigarettes. 

CigFree Product Demo https://youtu.be/YLL_OllKmSo

 

iMorph's Mission

“To improve the lives of people who, because of their oppressive cigarette smoking habits, have placed health, financial and social burdens upon themselves and their family lives" by integrating smart technology and proven self-help psychology. 

 

"Quitting smoking is mental"

In the Beginning

Success begins with a personal anecdote. Adrian, one of our Founders, became a heavy smoker after high school. Adrian understood after having smoked for 14 years that smoking is self-destructive and created a separation between people close to him and himself. He wanted to quit. After trying patches, gum and cold-turkey all of which failed, he realized he was trapped.

His profession is smart automation technology. His personal interest is self-help psychology. At that time, there were no smart fitness bands. He created a self-help message using affirmation psychology and a smart phone. He committed himself to listen to a personally tailored message each time he smoked a cigarette. Four days and 44 cigarettes later, he stopped and has never returned. He experienced the message he created for himself.

He sought 20 friends and friend of friends and created a program for them using random Robo calls. It was a limited system, however. The results were miraculous. Eight quit within two weeks. Eight significantly reduced smoking, and four never answered their calls.

That his solution worked, gave him inspiration to change lives for the better. However, doing so on a mass scale had to wait until smart wearable technology caught up to the times. Now it’s here, and so is CigFree.

When you support CigFree Smartband, you become a critical factor in taking our product from a prototype phase, through its clinical trial phase, and to a full commercial launch that will begin to improve the lives of real people who want to break their nicotine habit once and for all, and quit smoking.

 

The Risks and Costs of Cigarette Smoking

The heavy tolls on families associated with cigarette smoking and the large number of people who continue to smoke and wish to stop is known.  These include financial costs. Cigarettes, on average, cost approximately $2,600 annually at average of $7 per pack per day. Some pay much more. There are also severe health costs associated with smoking as it is one of the leading causes of preventable deaths worldwide. Smokers develop high blood pressure and heart rates increase and clogs blood with carbon monoxide preventing oxygen to flow through the circulatory system. Smoking can cause heart damage and lung cancer raising the risk of death and correspondingly treatment costs. Smoking also causes social problems. Smokers also pay higher health and life insurance premiums.

See what happens as soon smokers Quit Smoking?

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o3I0mJ2RfU0

Begin counting how many cigarettes you smoke each day.

 

                                                                                                                                                           

iMORPH WANTS TO HELP PEOPLE STOP SMOKING CIGARETTES AND FREE THEMSELVES

 

The iMorph Solution

 For an affordable onetime fee, smokers receive a decorative smart band to wear that monitors, in real time, smoking related functions. CigFree’s technology monitors bodily functions that are associated with smoking. When CigFree detects the act of smoking, it automatically signals an integrated smartphone to call with an awaiting prerecorded personalized self-help message in that person’s own voice.

All smokers need to quit, is wear CigFree, answer their phone and listen to their messages. CigFree eliminates the distractions that interfere with people’s lives when trying to quit smoking.

Remember, CigFree Never Forgets to Call You

Maybe you smoke and want to quit or care for someone who does.  With CigFree's automated delivery system, together, we create a New Hope to stop smoking with a healthy, natural, affordable, non-nicotine, non-invasive solution to quitting cigarettes. 

When smokers answer their CigFree recording and listen to their 3-4 self-help affirmations that they have selected and recorded in their own voice, they undergo the following process. Over time, each self-help affirmation message passes a concise believable command to a user’s subconscious mind about the positives of being smoke free. The effects of the self-help affirmations are immediate, directly correlate to the undesirable act of smoking, repetitive with each smoking experience and embed, in their minds, the positives of successfully overcoming smoking until they achieve the desired result.

Smoking Cessation Solutions Today

The solutions, other than cold turkey and professional therapy, that exist today for quitting smoking are:

Prescription Drugs: Led by Chantix that reports a 40% success rate over a 12 week program, and a host of potential side effects that include suicidal thoughts. Including doctor visits, it is an expensive solution that blocks the release of dopamine by attaching to nicotine receptors in the brain to wean smokers from smoking. Continued use is recommended if the habit returns;

Nicotine Replacement Therapies: NRT includes products, like nicotine gum, Lozenges, and patches. NRT products can ease a body off nicotine by releasing controlled amounts of nicotine slowly when used as directed can allow people to focus on staying smoke-free. They continue to introduce nicotine into one’s system and there are ongoing costs until the craving for nicotine and smoking stop and therefore can be expensive. Costs vary from $15-$50 per box subject to size; 

Vapor Smoking Alternatives: Electronic nicotine delivery systems (ENDS) -- also known as vaporizers, digital, electronic or e-cigarettes--do not produce a combustible “smoke” like traditionally burned cigarettes, nor do they contain tar, a by-product of burning tobacco. Instead, they contain a small battery that converts a liquid from small cartridges into a water-based mist, which is expelled as vapor or aerosol.  The liquid cartridges or tanks may contain various amounts of tobacco-based nicotine, synthetic nicotine, or no nicotine at all, and flavorings and propellants. Research studies on the personal and public health effects of the vapor produced by these products have been inconclusive. It is reported that while smokers quit cigarettes, most continue smoking E-cigarettes and continue  nicotine. Product costs are lower than cigarettes but average around $50-$100 per month.

The Growing Smoking cessation market in the US in Dollars

 In 2016, According to Grand View Research, the market for smoking cessation in the US was approximately $3 billion in 2016 and forecast to grow more than double $7 billion by 2024.

 

Development of the Smart Band Market

Wearable smart technologies have increasingly been in the public eye since 2012. These include fitness devices and smartwatches. Fitbit and Apple are the key category leaders in these markets, with competitors providing alternative ecosystems around similar functionality. This has attracted the attention of the fitness conscious who track activity such as steps taken, heart monitoring, blood pressure monitoring, etc. There have been no connective functionalities that allow influence over behavior.

iMorph is not marketing smart devices that only track functionalities. CigFree is not another invasive nicotine replacement therapy or prescription drug. It is a one of-a-kind healthy solution to an everyday major costly and troubling worldwide problem that over 1 billion people face.

Our Current State

 iMorph has developed the CigFree prototype. We have identified all our manufacturing needs and capabilities and retained a team as a partner to procure materials, mass scale production, implement all quality control and assurance as well shipping and fulfillment. We have identified our clinical trial co-investigators and set our IRB design study. We have developed our go-to-market plans and pricing models that make us the low-cost solution.

 

We are asking for your supporting contributions to:

  • Complete the integration between the CigFree and smart phone messaging
  • Complete the commerical designs for CigFree, our packaging and websites
  • Build molds for mass production
  • Finalize our preliminary patents and IP protection
  • Most importantly, while we are confident that CigFree will produce a meaningful rate of success stories, we have retained three PhD/MD investigators who will conduct a clinical protocol reviewed by an Independent Review Board that gives CigFree quantified credentialed credibility and documentation to publish results
  • We are confident with your support, we can officially launch by April 30, 2018

Other Ways to Help Us

 Some are not able to contribute. We understand, but don’t think that you cannot still be an important part of this campaign. Please get the word out about what we are doing, make noise. Link our campaign to all your social networks: Facebook; Twitter; Instagram; Snap Chat; and others. Tell your friends and family, most importantly share it with people you know who smoke.

Use the Indiegogo share tools below:

http://www.facebook.com/sharer.php?u=https://en...

 

Our Target

Help us achieve our target of 500,000 smokers in the first year and you too can help people say "Yes, iMorphed!, and now I’m nicotine free and healthy"

Which life option would  most smokers choose, A or B?

A: Pay approximately $240-$360  per month or more for a lifetime of bad health...

OR

B:  A onetime price of $209 for a lifetime of freedom?

 

Meet The Team

 

                                                    

iMorph extends its sincere thanks and gratitude to Indiegogo and everyone supporting our project in anyway to help us make a positive difference in people’s health and lives.

story:
Hi everybody,

 

My name is Rocco Repetto Taylor and I’m 14 years old. I started playing golf in Spain at a very young age and then moved into competitive golf at the age of 9. My club is the Miguel Ángel Jimenez Golf Academy and Miguel Angel’s brother Juan is my trainer. I’m not a pro but I’m ranked 5th out of my age group in my region and play off 4 handicap.

 

The reason I’ve created this Crowdfunding is to help me achieve my goal in life which is to become a professional golfer. It is my passion and I am dedicated to that end.

 

Golf as you all know is not the most financially-fair sport and that is why I’m reaching out to you guy’s. All the money that I get from this crowdfunding campaign will help massively towards my golf tournament costs like hotels, fuel/flights & entry fees and most importantly my new golf clubs. I have grown so tall that my current ones are hindering my game and I need harder and longer clubs to reach my potential. All donations are highly appreciated.

 

This project will of course benefit me but I am hoping it will also benefit you! If you are a business, one of the pledge options gives you the chance to sponsor my tournament clothing. This is a superb opportunity for businesses and individuals and I will always remember the help I get at this stage when I am playing in the Ryder cup in a few years.

 

Thank you everyone for reading this and helping my dream come true. 

 

Rocco Repetto Taylor

 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

Hola a todos,

 

Me llamo Rocco Repetto Taylor, tengo 14 años. Comencé a jugar al golf en España a la edad de 9 años. Practico en mi club local, Escuela Miguel Ángel Jiménez, no soy un profesional pero estoy clasificado 5to de los Cadetes en Andalucía con un handicap de 4.


La razón por haber creado este Crowdfunding es para ayudar a lograr mi objetivo en la vida que es llegar a un cierto nivel en mi juego que pueda jugar a nivel profesional.

Golf como todos saben no es el deporte más financieramente justo y es por eso que estoy contando con vosotros. Todo el dinero que se pone en este crowdfunding es enormemente apreciado y ayudará masivamente a mis gastos de los torneos de golf ej. Hotel, combustible / vuelos y precio de inscripciones y mis nuevos palos de Golf. He crecido tan alto que mis palos actuales están obstaculizando mi juego y necesito palos más duros y más largos para alcanzar mi potencial. Todas las donaciones son muy apreciadas.

 

Este proyecto me beneficiará, por supuesto, pero espero que también pueda beneficiaros a vosotros. Si usted es una empresa, una de las opciones de compromiso le da la oportunidad de patrocinar mi ropa de torneo. Esta es una excelente oportunidad para las empresas. Siempre recordaré la ayuda que obtengo en esta etapa cuando esté jugando en la Ryder Cup en unos pocos años.

 

Gracias a todos por leer esto y ayudar a mi sueño hecho realidad.

 

Rocco Repetto Taylor

story:
Resumen

 

Alejandra Ospina lleva siete años en Karate, un deporte que la apasiona y le ha creado una disciplina. Actualmente es selección Colombia y ha participado en varios campeonatos, tanto nacionales como internacionales, sin ninguna ayuda del gobierno o la federación de deportes. Estuvo en un fondo para deportistas pero el mismo año que se creó, dejó de existir. Con un gran esfuerzo de sus padres, ha logrado ir a competir en el exterior en países como El Salvador, Bolivia, Venezuela, Argentina y a algunas ciudades del territorio colombiano. En la mayoría de campeonatos a logrado ganar y quedar en los primeros puestos siendo bronce en el Centro Americano en Venezuela del presente año. Alejandra está clasificada al mundial de karate en Tenerife, España, el cual se llevara acabo en octubre de 2017. Aún no se ha podido reunir los fondos para su viaje, hospedaje y alimentación. Es importante su participación en esta competencia porque le abrirá las puertas a los Juegos Olímpicos de la juventud en 2018, y a su vez, a los Juegos Olímpicos en 2020. Ese es su gran sueño, de esos que apasionan. Por eso, pedimos su ayuda para que Alejandra pueda cumplirlo.

Con su apoyo económico podremos pagar los tiquetes de avión, estadía en Tenerife, la alimentación y gastos que puedan surgir en el viaje.

Se necesitan recolectar USD 1800  y por cada USD 500 su familia, está dispuesta a ayudar en obras benéficas. Los niños en situación de abandono serán los protagonistas con un cálido acompañamiento en un día recreativo en épocas navideñas. A su vez, si no se logra recolectar la cantidad suficiente de dinero o  si llegamos a superar el tope, el dinero ira a estas fundaciones para contribuir a una mejor calidad de vida para los niños.

story:
1. Magic Puck, NO Bluetooth, MOBILE                                   $3

2. Miracle, NO Bluetooth, countertop                                    $24

3. Magic Puck Pro, Bluetooth enabled MOBILE                 $49

4. Miracle Pro, Wi-Fi/Bluetooth enabled,  countertop     $49

5. Miracle (4pack) NO Bluetooth                                             $124

6. Miracle (4pack) Bluetooth enabled                                   $315

7. PolyPharmacy Manager                                                         $549



Complications arising from improper medicine usage can be disruptive and exhausting, often resulting in stress, additional health deterioration, and even death in many cases.

Individuals who are taking multiple medications, children, elderly, or busy professionals may have trouble keeping track of their medication schedules and dosing. As a result many people in our communities may live in a state of fear and helplessness.

These issues are further complicated when healthcare professionals do not have accurate data regarding their patients' medication usage and history. Research has found that more than half of patients tell their doctor they are taking medications as directed when they are not.

There are many reasons why a person may not take their prescribed medicine. We attempt to address complacency, forgetfulness and complexity with simple reminder and tracking tools. Our innovations are not to compel but to encourage. We are hopeful that with information and understanding harmful habits and attitudes will improve.

Here are some important benefits of Nurse Timers:

The Miracle allows you to manage your medication without removing the medication from its original container. When it is time to take a dose, Miracle will alert you with lights and sound. Setup is simple because there is nothing to program and no timer to set!

 

The Magic Puck attaches to the bottom, top, or side of most medication containers. Like the Miracle, each puck uses lights and sounds to notify you when to take medication. Wherever you go, Magic Puck goes with you!

The Nurse Timer Pro models take medication management to the next level. These devices are Bluetooth enabled and automatically log medication usage in realtime whenever a container is picked up or an alert is silenced. The smart capabilities open up limitless features including progress tracking, usage visualization, and alerting family or healthcare professionals about medicine access and dosing irregularities.

And don't worry if you are not tech-savvy! There is no need to interact with smart devices when taking medication. Everything is handled automatically.

OwnUM is your personal medicine management and health record account. Designed to record and track medicine usage automatically. As this software develops, it will also track your weight, blood pressure and other vital information. Know your Numbers! With access and control of your own electronic medical records, you will be better equipped to keep yourself and your loved ones healthy. OwnUM is expected to work with other personal medical records platform, like Blue Button and Athena Health. Simple and portable, an OwnUM account puts you in charge and keeps all your healthcare information in one place.

*Prototypes. Final design in progress.

Polypharmacy Manager consists of multiple Miracle-like devices arranged in a mobile case. The case offers automatic locking features and an intrusion alarm. Locking secures the user’s medication and privacy, and prevents unauthorized access from children and individuals seeking to steal or abuse medication.

Health deterioration is generally slow and may go unnoticed until an episodic event that could be fatal. With the Polypharmacy, seniors can stay safe and caregivers may quickly intervene when irregularies occur. These units are a must have for every senior with multiple health conditions.

The Nurse Timer Miracle Pack is a convenient holder for up to four Miracles.

The Nurse Timer Tray is designed to manage several medications on the same schedule with the use of a single miracle timer. The Tray attaches to the Miracle Pack so that users can manage multiple medicines on up to four different schedules.

To avoid errors if a distraction occurs when responding to an alert, it is recommended that you  take all the medicines out of the tray before stopping the alert. Replace each container as the dose is taken. Additional trays may be in use for medicines on different dosing cycles.

 

Will we see the day when our bathrooms are transformed to our primary health clinic? It will not require much effort since the necessary technologies are already available. From smart scales and sensors in our toilet seats to sensors attached to our bodies may all alert us to changes that require attention. These sensors will report to hubs that automatically gather details and may make recommendations to help us plan our daily lives and even a doctor’s visit.

Theoretically. these concepts could monitor everything you ingest, know that you may be sick before you realize, notify your caregiver, make suggestions to adjust your medicine or diet, and even drop off medication by drone delivery while you age-in-place.

Wellness and preventative care must have new tools to educate the consumer and new methods to make participating a fun and productive exercise.

Our primary products are designed for ease of use by consumers even those with physical and mental deficiencies. Future products with locking and metering capabilities will improve safety and reduce stress. Responsible medicine use and data generation from each consumer is the foundation for a new frontier of healthcare possibilities.

We will see improvements in nursing care as the error prone scrolling and constant scanning of patients' wrist bands and medication containers are replaced by a safer and more efficient system.

Nurses have to only pick up a container that is in a state of alert, positively identify the patient with instructions that flashes on the display and give the recommended dosage. This silent alerting system will easily guide a nurse from patient to patient in her charge and make adjustments for the usual interruptions.

The Ten Rights of Medicine Administration (a.k.a. the Ten R's) will be reduced to just one which is verification of the right response by the patient to the medicine. Can you imagine the benefits and possibilities?

Clinical studies will be expedited as clinicians gain access to realtime data from their patients' use of Nurse Timer Pro devices and other patient generated health data. Medical science becomes more predictive and interventions more efficient when required. A doctor can remotely stop a Nurse Timer from alerting or make other adjustments. Precision medicine has new friends.

Other key stakeholders including pharmacies, doctor’s offices, insurers, Medicaid, Medicare, VA, regulatory institutions and manufacturers will all see opportunities to become more efficient.

*Medicine Wall Unit and Medicine Carrier are not available at this time.

  1. How do I set or program the device?

    For the Miracle and Magic Puck, you must decide on a time that you want to start the first dosing of the day referred to as your Initial Start Time (IST). This can be done by reference to a separate timepiece. NurseTimers have factory set timing intervals (once a day, 2 times per day, 3 times per day). The user simply applies power (flashing red light) and start the timer by inserting a medication container at the IST (steady green light).  If the medication bottle is in the device when power is turned on, you will still get a flashing red light. The bottle must be removed and replaced to start the timer.

    With the Pro timers (Miracle Pro, Magic Puck Pro, and Polypharmacy Manager), you will be able to set the schedule using any smart device and make a change at any point in time.
     
  2. What if I have multiple medications?

    Medications that have the same schedule can use one device to indicate the dosing time for all the medication on that schedule.  For example, if you take all your "once a day" medicines at the same time in the morning then one "once a day" timer is all you need. Just remember that your Initial Start Time becomes the time that the Nurse Timer will give you an alert each and every day.
     
  3. Do I have to buy a Nurse Timer for each of my medications?

    Medicines that are to be taken at the same time or are on the same schedule may use one Nurse Timer for notification. Take all the meds then pick up and replace the container that is in the Timer to turn the alert back to steady green. Individuals with various medicine schedules, or declining memory and other mental challenges should consider having a Miracle for each medicine or a Polypharmacy Manager.
     
  4. What will stop a person from picking up a container but not taking the medicine?  

    People need help in managing their medicine and errors are generally not intentional. Nurse Timers are meant for individuals who want to take their medication, and does not prioritize preventing deception.
    As development continues, we hope to include a miniature scale inside the Miracle Pro and Polypharmacy Manger. This will allow the Timer to know how much medication is taken every time the bottle is moved.
     
  5. What’s to stop a person from taking more than a recommended amount of medicine from the container?  

    With models connected to a smart device, the quantity to be consumed will be displayed when a container is picked up. Future Nurse Timer devices will explore options to lock away the  medicine containers and only have a single dose of each medicine be dispensed at dosing time.
     
  6. What happens during power failures?

    During power failures, the unit can be connected to an external power pack much like a cell phone mobile power charger. This will allow the unit to function normally during residential power failures. Without a mobile or battery backup, the unit will hold some power reserves to keep the clock running for up to 30 minutes after power failure, however the alert function will be disabled until power is restored. If power loss exceeds 30 minutes, the device will be factory reset.
     
  7. How is this different from pill boxes?

    Pill boxes require taking medication out of their labeled original dispensed containers and putting them into pill compartments labelled with a time of day schedule and also a day of week schedule. Loading up the pill box can be a cumbersome event especially when there are many medicines to be taken and it is easy to make medicine identification errors. No alerts are generally on the specific medicine at dosing time. The system is not suitable for liquids or other medicine formats. Pill boxes will not present a platform for medication access and tracking in realtime. Nurse Timers provide these and many other benefits.
     
  8. How is this different/better than Pill-Packs?

    Pill Packs helps the user by having multiple medication that are on the same schedule to be combined together in a convenient pack. It reduces the need to open several different containers at dosing time. However, pill packs do not provide alerts at dosing times nor can they be used for liquid medications. It may be useful to use a container of pill packs as a container of medicine and use the Nurse Timers for dosing alerts and management.
     
  9. How are Nurse Timers different from other smart pill bottles?

    Nurse Timers can manage dozens of medicines of any format simultaneously for a single user without confusion and at a reasonable cost. There are no monthly service charges associated with Nurse Timers in order to generate dosing notification signals. Nurse Timers works without the need for special caps or special medication containers.

story:
My name is Amy Lems and I live in the beautiful state of Vermont with my 9 year old daughter Mya. I have 28 years experience as a cosmetologist and small business owner. The company I founded 8 years ago, Vermont Organic Solutions, makes safe, effective, and affordable personal care products using natural, organic, and Ecocert ingredients. We are a Female Founded, Benefit Company and we love what we do, making our customers the products they want to use.

We have reached maximum capacity and are looking to grow. To do that we need more raw materials and packaging as well as larger equipment. Growth will enable us to make our products more available by getting into new retail locations as well as being able to introduce new products and product lines. Our customers have been instrumental in influencing what we make and how we make it and we're counting on their support with this endeavor.

We are looking to raise $10,000. The money will be spent on larger quantities of ingredients and packaging, as well as bigger equipment. This will allow us to make larger batches of individual products. In turn it will reduce both our cost per unit of raw materials and our cost of production. It will make it possible to be able to supply products to new retail locations, expanding our availability to our customers. It will also allow us to put new products into production.

We are offering some Amazing Perks for each donation. We've custom designed Beauty Boxes exclusive to this fundraising campaign. The value of each perk is equal to or better than the donation! It comes gift boxed and shipped to the recipient in time for Christmas. Think of it as pre-ordering for those loved ones on your Holiday shopping list. You will be sending your friends and loved ones something Wicked Good from Vermont!

The growth of our company has always been because of our customers input. We believe our sustainable business model, the quality of our products, and our commitment to providing our customers products they want is the backbone of our success so far. This is why we wanted to include our clients in our plan to grow. We're in this together!

The best part about our campaign is that it will help us grow no matter how much money we raise. For us, and for our customers, there is no risk of not raising enough. Any amount that we raise will go toward our continued growth.

Can't donate? No problem, you can still help us get to our goal by sharing our Indiegogo link with your friends and family. You can use the Indiegogo share tools as well as sharing via email or Facebook. Your recommendation and sharing us with  your friends is a huge support.

Thank You!

story:
For too long, non-toxic cosmetics have equated to outdated colors, sub-par formulation and thoughtless product design. 

“Clean” shouldn’t mean basic and boring!

 

If you...

• Want a healthy alternative to traditional toxic cosmetics

• Don’t want to compromise on gorgeous colors and luxurious formulations

• Expect your beauty products to multitask as much as you do

...then Habit was made for you!

 

In short, Habit is high-performance makeup as clean as it gets.

 

 

“I reworked my favorite multi-tasking beauty staples and created the most gorgeous, luscious and high-performance organic multi-use colors, highlighters, and lip balm out there!”

- Aja Frierson, Founder, Habit Cosmetics

 

 

Our multi-use colors, highlighters, and lip balm are:

• Certified organic and vegan and packed with protective antioxidants and skincare-grade ingredients

• Masterfully blended with a majorly moisturizing proprietary 7-emollient blend for luxurious feel and easy application

 

 

 

• Formulated to multi-task and save you time and $$$

• Colors created by a former fashion industry colorist for always on-trend but easily wearable tones

• Housed in recyclable aluminum and glass jars and FSC-certified paperboard boxes, Habit makeup comes to you in seriously beautiful packaging designed with sustainability in mind

 

 

 

 

A Closer Look!

 

• Habit's multi-use colors feature a high concentration of Moringa oil, which has amazing antioxidant, moisturizing and anti-aging properties due to it's omega 3 and 6 fatty acids, vitamin A, B and C content, as well as extraordinary amounts of a plant hormone called Zeatin.

 

• Our highlighters are infused with Sea Buckthorn oil, a naturally brightening and nourishing oil with antioxidant properties due to it's high concentration of vitamin C, quercetin and omega 7 fatty acid.

 

• Our lip balm is enriched with Açai extract, an antioxidant powerhouse supercharged with plant-based stem cells for additional antioxidant and anti-aging benefits, and is blended with a subtle iridescent lavender shimmer.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Risks and Challenges

 

If you've been burned by other crowdfunders and have concerns about us being able to deliver your products, never fear!

 

We've been in business since 2013 and have successfully delivered thousands of orders. And we're already in production on our multi-use colors, highlighters and lip balm.

 

We are scheduled to receive our production run of the multi-use colors and highlighters sometime in March, and our production run of the lip balm is scheduled to be completed in early April. In the event that we experience any delays, we will keep you notified and communicate with you as soon as we are made aware of them!
story_txt:
For too long, non-toxic cosmetics have equated to outdated colors, sub-par formulation and thoughtless product design. 
“Clean” shouldn’t mean basic and boring!
 
If you...
• Want a healthy alternative to traditional toxic cosmetics
• Don’t want to compromise on gorgeous colors and luxurious formulations
• Expect your beauty products to multitask as much as you do
...then Habit was made for you!
 
In short, Habit is high-performance makeup as clean as it gets.
 

 
“I reworked my favorite multi-tasking beauty staples and created the most gorgeous, luscious and high-performance organic multi-use colors, highlighters, and lip balm out there!” 
- Aja Frierson, Founder, Habit Cosmetics
 


 
Our multi-use colors, highlighters, and lip balm are:
• Certified organic and vegan and packed with protective antioxidants and skincare-grade ingredients
• Masterfully blended with a majorly moisturizing proprietary 7-emollient blend for luxurious feel and easy application
 

 


 
• Formulated to multi-task and save you time and $$$
• Colors created by a former fashion industry colorist for always on-trend but easily wearable tones
• Housed in recyclable aluminum and glass jars and FSC-certified paperboard boxes, Habit makeup comes to you in seriously beautiful packaging designed with sustainability in mind
 

 

 

 
A Closer Look!
 
• Habit's multi-use colors feature a high concentration of Moringa oil, which has amazing antioxidant, moisturizing and anti-aging properties due to it's omega 3 and 6 fatty acids, vitamin A, B and C content, as well as extraordinary amounts of a plant hormone called Zeatin.
 
• Our highlighters are infused with Sea Buckthorn oil, a naturally brightening and nourishing oil with antioxidant properties due to it's high concentration of vitamin C, quercetin and omega 7 fatty acid.
 
• Our lip balm is enriched with Açai extract, an antioxidant powerhouse supercharged with plant-based stem cells for additional antioxidant and anti-aging benefits, and is blended with a subtle iridescent lavender shimmer.
 



 

 



 

 

 

 


 
 
Risks and Challenges
 
If you've been burned by other crowdfunders and have concerns about us being able to deliver your products, never fear!
 
We've been in business since 2013 and have successfully delivered thousands of orders. And we're already in production on our multi-use colors, highlighters and lip balm.
 
We are scheduled to receive our production run of the multi-use colors and highlighters sometime in March, and our production run of the lip balm is scheduled to be completed in early April. In the event that we experience any delays, we will keep you notified and communicate with you as soon as we are made aware of them!

story:
Your work out should be the best part of the day. But do you find yourself demotivated by lame, old-school gear? Do you think that having an exciting piece in your workout equipment could break up the routine? Then, we’re on the SAME PAGE. The good news is that there’s a solution. We present you with Funky Dumbbells – a new and fierce piece of gear that you can pump your iron with. Funny, but it’s shaped like a doughnut, so you remember why you’re doing those reps again and again.

 

Whether you want to get in shape, perfect those slim body lines of yours or go full-on Hollywood super-hero body – Funky Dumbbells is the choice for you. Not only you have an unlimited potential for different types of exercises, but on top, you get limitless fun and buzz. Due to interchangeable heads, you can personalize Funky Dumbbells to suit your needs. Use it for a slow warm-up, classic pyramid-sets, muscle tearing drop-sets – you name it. What’s most crucial, is that groovy shape, which will always keep you psyched.

Do you find yourself in a frenzy, rushing through countless stores in a mall, or endlessly scrolling online, looking for a perfect gift? You can’t take that anymore? Yeah, we feel you, and we got your back. Due to the funky versatility of our product, you can give it as a gift to your aunt or uncle, who just quit smoking and wants to get healthy, or to that gorgeous special one so they can stay in shape, or even to that all-crushing CrossFit maniac. Trust us when we say you’ll surprise them, especially because we will deliver them just before Christmas.

People usually try to hide all their gym equipment as much as they could do. Probably  8 of ten people would say that they hide dumbbells under their bed. 
From now on you don't have to hide dumbbells anymore, Funky Dumbbells are the best decorations at your home. You can place it anywhere and as many as you like - it still looks dang good!

 

   

Funky Dumbbells are using simple spinning technology, which doesn't require you to take multiple pieces and assemble it. You just spin one head off, and put another one on it. Interchangeable heads eases the process and allows you to change the heads on the same bar whether it is 2 kg or 15 kg, it doesn't matter. This also means that in future editions of different type of dumbbells, your bar will fit to all of them.       

                           

Funky Dumbbells will have interchangeable heads, which you are able to choose between 2, 3, 5, 7, 10 and 15 kg heads per one dumbbell. One set contains two dumbbells, which would be equal to 4, 6, 10, 14, 20 and 30 kg Funky Dumbbell boxes. Also you will have an option to order Super Pack, containing all the mentioned type of dumbbells before, with total 84 kg of pure power! 

 

We’re grounded in the idea that customer comes first. So every individual who contributes is considered what we call an MVC – Most Valuable Contributor. You make our dream come true, in return, we bring joy to your workouts. *Not only will we put your name on our website but you will be able to choose from the alternatives above. Numerous options allow us to inject fun into your daily exercise.

HOW ELSE YOU CAN HELP US IF YOU SUPPORT OUR FUNKY IDEA? 

Spread the word. We’d appreciate if you’d share our idea with other people and let the world know about Funky Dumbbells. Spread the joy by clicking 'share' button on the Indiegogo website.

 

As you may see not a lot of things have left for us. Probably the biggest question is what time we are planning our delivery and how we are going to make it. 
Manufacturing - we have already done our prototypes, and our partners are already waiting for our call.
Delivery - According to our timeline, delivery to our customers is estimated for late November – early December, so that you get your Funky Dumbbells before the festive season. Agreements are inked with shipment companies, so your package will be at your door on time. All of our goods will be shipped with tracking numbers so you can know when to expect the funkiness.

At Dropi we make things happen. Our relentless effort and crystal focus on common objectives enabled Funky Dumbbells to come to life. A variety of talents utilized and subjected to hard, yet fun work gave an extremely creative output. Youthful energy and innovative design snowballed into something extraordinary and will have a tsunami-like impact on the market.

Funky Dumbbells are not only dumbbells, but a sports tool with a vision - to turn the gym equipment history upside down. Main core is to start a gym line, where unhealthy products like doughnuts, hamburgers and others would be adjusted to daily healthy life,  converting them to sports tools, allowing to perform exercises with them.  
Funky Dumbbells first prototype – doughnut shaped head is only the beginning. We are looking forward to the bigger line. That is the reason, why all our dumbbells bars are created to the size and easy spin-off technology to adjust different types, sizes and styles of the dumbbells.

 

Small talks about who we are, why we do this and what is all about here 


RISKS AND CHALLENGES:


On top of the page you will see, that our flexible funding goal is 50.000 USD. So naturally you come up with the question – what happens if you don‘t collect all the money? We just manufacture less dumbbells and still deliver the ones you ordered. No stress.                   

Another related topic would be delivery – will we deliver on time? Yes, we will. You want to know why? Because we have professionals in our team, who had been working in the logistics for the last 10 years. We know how to do it and we already have agreements with parcel delivery companies.


OUR PARTNERS:

story:
About

Oral health innovation carefully engineered, designed, crafted for all ages by a passionate dentist.

Quotes from the American Dental Association:

"Interdental cleaning helps remove debris and interproximal dental plaque, the plaque that collects between two teeth; dental floss and other interdental cleaners help clean these hard-to-reach tooth surfaces and reduce the likelihood of gum disease and tooth decay."

https://www.ada.org/en/member-center/oral-healt...

"Use of an interdental cleaner (like floss) is an essential part of taking care of your teeth and gums; the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services reaffirmed flossing as 'an important oral hygiene practice' in an August 2016 communication to the ADA."

https://www.ada.org/en/member-center/oral-healt...

"More than 500 bacterial species can be found in plaque; some are good and some are bad for your mouth. Together with food debris, water and other components, the plaque buildup around the teeth and on the gum line will contribute to disease in teeth and gums."

https://www.ada.org/en/press-room/news-releases...

Introduction

Ofloss International launches the first of its kind floss dispenser.  Innovative dental solutions provider, Ofloss, announces the launch of its floss dispenser designed to make flossing easy and accessible for all. Ofloss is an innovative dental solutions provider offering a wide range of dental products and solutions for both adults and children.  As part of its goal of ensuring easy accessibility to quality dental solutions, Ofloss is proud to announce Ofloss Series 1, which is designed to allow for the easy accessibility and usage of dental floss.

The mouth is one of the most important parts of the body, and the teeth are a major component of the mouth. Besides performing two important functions, chewing and aiding the digestive system, the teeth also enhance the appearance of an individual and affect the voice. Therefore, taking good care of the mouth, particularly the teeth has become imperative. Care for the teeth starts from ensuring that the teeth are properly and regularly cleaned, as this is the foundation for dental health. The introduction of dental floss has made cleaning the teeth a lot easier. However, having easy access to dental floss is not particularly easy, especially for children as they often struggle to cut the floss string needed to clean their teeth. 

This is where Ofloss' floss dispenser is particularly helpful. Designed for all ages, the Ofloss dispenser is best placed on or around the bathroom mirror, allowing users as young as 7 years of age* to easily get the proper length of floss that is most suitable for their flossing needs. The device can also be attached on the wall of the shower room, making it even more versatile and helpful for users.

*Parental supervision of young children is highly recommended

Usage

The primary goal of the device and Ofloss is to allow users cut their desired length of the string just using one hand. Dedicated to making floss usage easy and accessible regardless of the age of the users. Ofloss with the launch of the dispenser is striving to keep teeth and gums healthy for years.

 

The Elephant is a symbol of good health, strength, and longevity in many Eastern cultures. 

Dentist Opinion 

"I have been using the Ofloss dispenser for approximately one month now, and I think it's great. The dispenser has clever design features that allow it to be placed on smooth surfaces where it can be readily accessible. The case has multiple floss cutters allowing floss to be cut with the greatest of ease, whether you are left or right handed. I place my Ofloss dispenser on my bathroom mirror where it serves as a constant reminder for me to floss daily. Ofloss is a wonderful and creative floss dispenser. I highly recommend to all." -D. P. Suanico DDS Private Practice in Northern California

Team

Founded by Dr. Brett, a dental practitioner with more than 18 years of experience and a diplomate of American Board of General Dentistry (ABGD); the company is a strong advocate of oral health and is committed to creating great dental products that lead to healthy beautiful smiles. Other members of the Ofloss International team include Sam Groenheim and Peter Wardell, as Business Advisors and Chief Marketing Strategists.
