story:
Do you suffer from sinus congestion or even sinus infections for weeks or months a year? If you're like I used to be, then you do. And it drives you absolutely nuts.

 

The good news is, we've created quite possibly the most revolutionary and successful sinus congestion and sinus infection treatment in decades - and now we bring it to you!

It is all natural, containing nothing but herbs and plants that have been consumed for thousands of years, plus gentle Himalayan salt. It is prepared and used through a Neti Pot, and it goes straight to the root cause of nasal congestion and sinus infections! SinusFreedom may well be the first product that uses latest scientific research to ensure that the actual causes of persistent nasal congestion are addressed and eradicated, and that the root causes of sinus infections are actually treated. So much so that we are applying for a patent on our incredible mixture.

 

 

It's based on published, academic journal research conducted by the world's top universities.  Yet these ingredients have never before been used in sinus treatments or employed for their wonderful abilities to clear both common nasal congestion and those pesky sinus infections! Our proprietary, all natural formula uses ingenious advances in science related to sinus congestion and sinus infections to bring relief.

 

SinusFreedom is a Neti Pot solution, using a specific set of herbs and plant extract that recent university research has proven have very unique properties that attack the underlying causes of sinus congestion and sinus infections! The all natural solution contains only herbs and plant extract that have been consumed for thousands of years, as well as Himalayan salt. The solution is infused into water, a bit like tea, and used with a Neti Pot to rinse your sinuses. The ingredients attack the true causes of sinus congestion and sinus infection, removing irritation, reducing inflammation, and killing off the microbes that cause sinus infections. Then preventing them from coming back to continue the infection!

-----

 

I once spent over two months in college with  a sinus infection that would not go away. No matter what I did. I drove everyone around me nuts, constantly trying my best to cough as little as possible. I couldn't sleep. I couldn't breathe properly. It was an absolutely terrible experience.

And every year after that, I then had to cope with multiple sinus infections per year. If I got sick and didn't get a sinus infection, my sinuses still were congested so badly that I couldn't breathe or speak properly for two weeks just about every time.

 

Any of this sound familiar?

 

This led us down the path to creating SinusFreedom - the only high quality solution I have ever seen to ACTUALLY help you handle prolonged sinus congestion and even sinus infections. And we mentioned it's all natural, right?? Could you imagine not having another sinus infection force you to visit the doctor, pay a boat load of money, and then get stuck on antibiotics? That would be a dream for anyone even somewhat like me.

 

---

 

We're ready to start shipping now! This is a brand new product, launching here for the first time. But the first 25 orders at least will be fulfilled in roughly 2 weeks!  We should be able to continue fulfillment in 2-3 weeks for all orders after that!

 

The Story of How we Created SinusFreedom-

---

With a Masters in Science from Stanford University, and having worked with novel technologies - including biotech devices - my entire adult life, we had one thing on our side... We knew how to do research.

 

Over the next ten years, we poured through scientific journal research and learned everything we could about sinus congestion and sinus infections. We tried EVERYTHING.

 

Eventually we learned that most of what we think about sinus congestion is wrong! Your sinuses are only partially blocked by obstructions. A lot of the congestion comes from inflammation which causes the sinus passage to close. The inflammation is caused by immune response and irritation in your sinuses. Your sinuses are largely swollen, not blocked! And it's your own immune system and irritants in your sinuses that are causing this.

Let's let the Mayo Clinic back us up here:

 

The issue with a sinus infection is twofold: 1)  The bacteria are not technically 'inside' your body, so they aren't exposed to the immune cells in your blood stream. Your sinuses are a passage 'through' your body, but are not considered internal in the same way your muscles would be. There's a barrier 'membrane' between the interior of the body and the sinus passage, to keep things in the air out. 2) The microbes causing the sinus infection cover themselves in 'biofilm' (mucus) which is not very soluble in water, protecting themselves further from your immune system!

This is why sinus infections can last weeks or months, and sometimes aren't fixed by antibiotics (if the antibiotics are primarily in your bloodstream, and the microbes are hiding from your bloodstream using biofilm and being positioned in your sinuses away from your bloodstream...). From there, what to do about sinus congestion and sinus infections wasn't so clear. How do you fix these problems?

We didn't make any headway for years... Until we heard a simple truth on a scientific documentary about bacteria that live in extreme conditions- 'They dry, they die', in other words if bacteria dry out, they die. Period. Some bacteria have means to keep themselves from drying out, but those generally live in the desert. If any bacteria dries out, it dies. Perhaps there was something there...

Eventually I found that if you can dry out your sinuses back to their natural state, you can get rid of the vast majority of sinus infections. If you think about it, when you're healthy your sinuses are fairly dry. When you're sick is the only time there is significant moisture in them...

So drying the sinuses back to their natural state is the solution! It's just extremely hard to do. I won't go into exactly how we first started doing it, as it wasn't easy, but we started curing our own sinus infections. Furthermore, by drying out the sinuses, we found that you removed most of the inflammation congestion as well! Now we just needed a more practical way to do it, so that ANYONE could benefit.

I know what you're thinking, "Everyone says drink more water, use tons of nasal spray - 'nasal irrigation' - and that will work." Okay... So why do your sinus infections not go away in a day or two when you do that? And why are sinus infections estimated to cost $6 billion/year to the medical establishment in the U.S. alone?? Everyone follows that advice...

The fact is, by constantly rinsing the sinuses, you momentarily relieve the issues. But you ALSO generally encourage more mucus production. The microbes that cause sinus infections live off of the nutrients and moisture in that mucus. They irritate your sinuses, causing them to swell, which causes congestion. If you don't have a sinus infection, the runny nose itself causes its own irritation and keeps the sinuses swelled nearly shut.

That irritation also encourages further production of mucus. Unfortunately, the commonly recommended practices give temporary relief and then perpetuate the problem. Cold weather and other factors do so as well.

 

The only problem was, we had no practical way to counteract this. Years of research passed, we tried hundreds of possible solutions. Nothing worked in a way that was user friendly...

Until we found a piece of research on the extremely unique and very beneficial properties of a Northern African herb... This herb had a rare ability to cut through biofilms. That meant it could actually dissolve and clear mucus... Something that saline solutions do very, very poorly. Not only that, but this herb kills bacteria - in part by destroying the membranes of those microbes. An all natural herb that people have consumed for thousands of years was capable of both properly clearing out the sinuses, a task that just about nothing could do, AND it could the microbes causing the infection... Plus it was perfectly safe for consumption. This could be it!

And guess what? UC Berkeley also thinks dissolving biofilms is the key to sinus infections!:

 

We had figured out how to remove the source of the congestion itself! By cutting through and flushing out the mucus, you could remove irritants that otherwise were going nowhere. That would stop the production of mucus, remove the inflammation, and get rid of the congestion! From its root cause. It would also lead to the sinuses drying out, back to their normal state, which would kill the microbes causing any sinus infections as well. And the herb kicks in and helps kill the microbes, as well as preventing them from growing back!

We only needed one more thing. A way to treat the inflammation in the short term to open up your sinuses and provide relief.

There are thousands of anti-inflammatories. But most of them are not natural. And almost all of them create burning sensations - NOT something you want to put in your sinuses (take it from me... Testing was nasty).

After quite a lot of additional research we identified a number of candidates. Fast forward through a long and not-particularly-fun period of testing all the candidates, and we finally found that one - just one - worked as a natural anti-inflammatory and also didn't cause any significant burning sensation. This mysterious plant from the rainforests of Asia was considered sacred by some in its traditional growth range. And now it was to us, as well!

The end product was beautiful! Prepared a bit like tea, mixed with cold water, and containing nothing but specific herbs that have been consumed by man for thousands of years, as well as a mixture of Himalayan salt... Using this solution once or twice a day for just a few days in Neti Pots proved effective at clearing our own sinus congestion and stopping our own sinus infections! And the effects of each ingredient is backed by deep scientific research.

We had done it again! First we managed to bring one of the most successful and revolutionary migraine products in decades to the market - our BreatheEasy Migraine Device, which ran a very successful IndieGoGo project and delivered to all clients within a month. Since then we've had our clients for the migraine device sending glowing reports ever since- including a woman who managed to return to her nursing career thanks to the device.

Now we had created one of the most revolutionary treatments for sinus congestion and sinus infections released in recent history! We haven't had a sinus infection since. We haven't dealt with chronic congestion either!

The best part? We can easily and cheaply provide you with the same benefits!

And we're ready to ship the first orders! Order now and get it in 1-2 weeks!

------------

Allergy Info: If you have significant allergies to any herbs, or nut allergies, you may want to exercise caution or not use SinusFreedom. The processing plants for our herbs may expose the mixture to trace amounts of other herbs and potentially nuts. The only ingredients are natural herbs and Himalayan salt.

(Disclaimer: Of course a Neti Pot formula is not required to be certified by the FDA, and there's not enough money in a product like this to send it through hundreds of millions of dollars in FDA trials... But there IS substantial scientific research behind the effects of the ingredients - peer reviewed, conducted by universities, and published in journals. SinusFreedom is very effective at addressing the underlying causes of sinus congestion and sinus infections, and may treat both of these - but the FDA trials process is prohibitively expensive to have them certify the effects)
story_txt: Do you suffer from sinus congestion or even sinus infections for weeks or months a year? If you're like I used to be, then you do. And it drives you absolutely nuts. The good news is, we've created quite possibly the most revolutionary and successful sinus congestion and sinus infection treatment in decades - and now we bring it to you!It is all natural, containing nothing but herbs and plants that have been consumed for thousands of years, plus gentle Himalayan salt. It is prepared and used through a Neti Pot, and it goes straight to the root cause of nasal congestion and sinus infections! SinusFreedom may well be the first product that uses latest scientific research to ensure that the actual causes of persistent nasal congestion are addressed and eradicated, and that the root causes of sinus infections are actually treated. So much so that we are applying for a patent on our incredible mixture.  It's based on published, academic journal research conducted by the world's top universities.  Yet these ingredients have never before been used in sinus treatments or employed for their wonderful abilities to clear both common nasal congestion and those pesky sinus infections! Our proprietary, all natural formula uses ingenious advances in science related to sinus congestion and sinus infections to bring relief. SinusFreedom is a Neti Pot solution, using a specific set of herbs and plant extract that recent university research has proven have very unique properties that attack the underlying causes of sinus congestion and sinus infections! The all natural solution contains only herbs and plant extract that have been consumed for thousands of years, as well as Himalayan salt. The solution is infused into water, a bit like tea, and used with a Neti Pot to rinse your sinuses. The ingredients attack the true causes of sinus congestion and sinus infection, removing irritation, reducing inflammation, and killing off the microbes that cause sinus infections. Then preventing them from coming back to continue the infection!----- I once spent over two months in college with  a sinus infection that would not go away. No matter what I did. I drove everyone around me nuts, constantly trying my best to cough as little as possible. I couldn't sleep. I couldn't breathe properly. It was an absolutely terrible experience.And every year after that, I then had to cope with multiple sinus infections per year. If I got sick and didn't get a sinus infection, my sinuses still were congested so badly that I couldn't breathe or speak properly for two weeks just about every time. Any of this sound familiar? This led us down the path to creating SinusFreedom - the only high quality solution I have ever seen to ACTUALLY help you handle prolonged sinus congestion and even sinus infections. And we mentioned it's all natural, right?? Could you imagine not having another sinus infection force you to visit the doctor, pay a boat load of money, and then get stuck on antibiotics? That would be a dream for anyone even somewhat like me. --- We're ready to start shipping now! This is a brand new product, launching here for the first time. But the first 25 orders at least will be fulfilled in roughly 2 weeks!  We should be able to continue fulfillment in 2-3 weeks for all orders after that! The Story of How we Created SinusFreedom----With a Masters in Science from Stanford University, and having worked with novel technologies - including biotech devices - my entire adult life, we had one thing on our side... We knew how to do research. Over the next ten years, we poured through scientific journal research and learned everything we could about sinus congestion and sinus infections. We tried EVERYTHING. Eventually we learned that most of what we think about sinus congestion is wrong! Your sinuses are only partially blocked by obstructions. A lot of the congestion comes from inflammation which causes the sinus passage to close. The inflammation is caused by immune response and irritation in your sinuses. Your sinuses are largely swollen, not blocked! And it's your own immune system and irritants in your sinuses that are causing this.Let's let the Mayo Clinic back us up here: The issue with a sinus infection is twofold: 1)  The bacteria are not technically 'inside' your body, so they aren't exposed to the immune cells in your blood stream. Your sinuses are a passage 'through' your body, but are not considered internal in the same way your muscles would be. There's a barrier 'membrane' between the interior of the body and the sinus passage, to keep things in the air out. 2) The microbes causing the sinus infection cover themselves in 'biofilm' (mucus) which is not very soluble in water, protecting themselves further from your immune system!This is why sinus infections can last weeks or months, and sometimes aren't fixed by antibiotics (if the antibiotics are primarily in your bloodstream, and the microbes are hiding from your bloodstream using biofilm and being positioned in your sinuses away from your bloodstream...). From there, what to do about sinus congestion and sinus infections wasn't so clear. How do you fix these problems?We didn't make any headway for years... Until we heard a simple truth on a scientific documentary about bacteria that live in extreme conditions- 'They dry, they die', in other words if bacteria dry out, they die. Period. Some bacteria have means to keep themselves from drying out, but those generally live in the desert. If any bacteria dries out, it dies. Perhaps there was something there...Eventually I found that if you can dry out your sinuses back to their natural state, you can get rid of the vast majority of sinus infections. If you think about it, when you're healthy your sinuses are fairly dry. When you're sick is the only time there is significant moisture in them...So drying the sinuses back to their natural state is the solution! It's just extremely hard to do. I won't go into exactly how we first started doing it, as it wasn't easy, but we started curing our own sinus infections. Furthermore, by drying out the sinuses, we found that you removed most of the inflammation congestion as well! Now we just needed a more practical way to do it, so that ANYONE could benefit.I know what you're thinking, "Everyone says drink more water, use tons of nasal spray - 'nasal irrigation' - and that will work." Okay... So why do your sinus infections not go away in a day or two when you do that? And why are sinus infections estimated to cost $6 billion/year to the medical establishment in the U.S. alone?? Everyone follows that advice...The fact is, by constantly rinsing the sinuses, you momentarily relieve the issues. But you ALSO generally encourage more mucus production. The microbes that cause sinus infections live off of the nutrients and moisture in that mucus. They irritate your sinuses, causing them to swell, which causes congestion. If you don't have a sinus infection, the runny nose itself causes its own irritation and keeps the sinuses swelled nearly shut.That irritation also encourages further production of mucus. Unfortunately, the commonly recommended practices give temporary relief and then perpetuate the problem. Cold weather and other factors do so as well. The only problem was, we had no practical way to counteract this. Years of research passed, we tried hundreds of possible solutions. Nothing worked in a way that was user friendly...Until we found a piece of research on the extremely unique and very beneficial properties of a Northern African herb... This herb had a rare ability to cut through biofilms. That meant it could actually dissolve and clear mucus... Something that saline solutions do very, very poorly. Not only that, but this herb kills bacteria - in part by destroying the membranes of those microbes. An all natural herb that people have consumed for thousands of years was capable of both properly clearing out the sinuses, a task that just about nothing could do, AND it could the microbes causing the infection... Plus it was perfectly safe for consumption. This could be it!And guess what? UC Berkeley also thinks dissolving biofilms is the key to sinus infections!: We had figured out how to remove the source of the congestion itself! By cutting through and flushing out the mucus, you could remove irritants that otherwise were going nowhere. That would stop the production of mucus, remove the inflammation, and get rid of the congestion! From its root cause. It would also lead to the sinuses drying out, back to their normal state, which would kill the microbes causing any sinus infections as well. And the herb kicks in and helps kill the microbes, as well as preventing them from growing back!We only needed one more thing. A way to treat the inflammation in the short term to open up your sinuses and provide relief.There are thousands of anti-inflammatories. But most of them are not natural. And almost all of them create burning sensations - NOT something you want to put in your sinuses (take it from me... Testing was nasty).After quite a lot of additional research we identified a number of candidates. Fast forward through a long and not-particularly-fun period of testing all the candidates, and we finally found that one - just one - worked as a natural anti-inflammatory and also didn't cause any significant burning sensation. This mysterious plant from the rainforests of Asia was considered sacred by some in its traditional growth range. And now it was to us, as well!The end product was beautiful! Prepared a bit like tea, mixed with cold water, and containing nothing but specific herbs that have been consumed by man for thousands of years, as well as a mixture of Himalayan salt... Using this solution once or twice a day for just a few days in Neti Pots proved effective at clearing our own sinus congestion and stopping our own sinus infections! And the effects of each ingredient is backed by deep scientific research.We had done it again! First we managed to bring one of the most successful and revolutionary migraine products in decades to the market - our BreatheEasy Migraine Device, which ran a very successful IndieGoGo project and delivered to all clients within a month. Since then we've had our clients for the migraine device sending glowing reports ever since- including a woman who managed to return to her nursing career thanks to the device.Now we had created one of the most revolutionary treatments for sinus congestion and sinus infections released in recent history! We haven't had a sinus infection since. We haven't dealt with chronic congestion either!The best part? We can easily and cheaply provide you with the same benefits!And we're ready to ship the first orders! Order now and get it in 1-2 weeks!------------Allergy Info: If you have significant allergies to any herbs, or nut allergies, you may want to exercise caution or not use SinusFreedom. The processing plants for our herbs may expose the mixture to trace amounts of other herbs and potentially nuts. The only ingredients are natural herbs and Himalayan salt.(Disclaimer: Of course a Neti Pot formula is not required to be certified by the FDA, and there's not enough money in a product like this to send it through hundreds of millions of dollars in FDA trials... But there IS substantial scientific research behind the effects of the ingredients - peer reviewed, conducted by universities, and published in journals. SinusFreedom is very effective at addressing the underlying causes of sinus congestion and sinus infections, and may treat both of these - but the FDA trials process is prohibitively expensive to have them certify the effects)

story:
The highly anticipated launch is finally here. We’re extremely excited to share all of our hard work and dedication with the release of our flagship product, the EdgeCross-X system - now available to order. Are you ready to take your workout over the EDGE?

  • Want to get in shape quickly?
  • Get a 6 pack?
  • Lose weight?
  • Workout Anywhere?
  • Not enough time to get to the gym?
  • Taking too long to get a full body workout from the gym?
  • Are you at a plateau in your workout?
  • Are you an athlete looking to increase your performance and core strength?
  • Are you looking to take your workout to the next level?

​

  • Get in shape fast!
  • Lose excess body fat quickly!
  • Get the perfect abs!
  • Easy to take anywhere!
  • Takes less than 10 MINUTES a day!
  • Extremely effective and efficient!
  • Never miss a workout again!
  • Builds incredible core strength for athletes!
  • Easy beginner routines too!
  • Never outgrow the product

Featured In



Whether you are a professional athlete, or just starting out, the EdgeCross-X will rapidly build an incredible core and overall strength to get you into the best shape of your life.

A complete full body fitness system, the EdgeCross-X comes packed with versatility, with a range of functions for every kind of move you can imagine.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

By putting your center of balance outside of your body’s natural framework, your body has to work that  much harder to stay upright, amplifying the difficulty of every move you do, while working all of your muscles simultaneously.

The EdgeCross-X works by putting the focal point of your balance outside of your body’s natural framework - taking advantage of what we call off balance leverage leverage training.

When you are off balance, your body automatically engages every muscle to maintain stability, providing the most intense and efficient workout possible, quickly providing incredible results.

The further out your focal point is, leverage creates resistance, and the harder your muscles have to work to lift yourself and stay balanced - resulting in the most difficult and efficient workout possible.

By targeting every muscle in the body at the same time, the EdgeCross-X dramatically increases the efficiency of your workout and reduces time spent exercising by up to 90%!


Searching for a better way, we discovered off-balance leverage training as a solution to our issues. If you were somehow able to put your body off-balance while you trained, muscle groups across your entire body would have to work harder to keep you staying upright.

We worked tirelessly to develop a full fitness system that applied  these laws of physics. By incorporating resistance bands, balancing wheels, and multiple interchangeable design elements, the system is fully customizable from beginner, intermediate, to advanced and beyond.Together, we created what we’re finally ready to unveil as the full EdgeCross-X system. And we couldn’t be prouder!

It’s got it all - all the intensity, all the challenge, and all the style you crave for in the perfect workout product. Built to push your body to the limits in the shortest amount of time possible, the patent pending EdgeCross-X is the next evolution in personal fitness. It’s your secret weapon to get into the best shape of your life... It’s finally ready - are you?

 

The Full EdgeCross-X Training System includes:

  • 1 EdgeCross-X Telescoping Bar
  • 1 EdgeCross-X Balance Wheel
  • 1 pair of Adjustable Handles
  • 2 pairs of Interchangeable End Pieces.
  • 1 pair of Stabilizer Blocks
  • 1 pair of Parallette Attachments
  • 1 pair of Wrist Straps with Rings
  • 1 pair of Foot Straps with Rings
  • 1 Waist Belt with Rings
  • 3 pairs of Fabric Covered Resistance Bands (20lb, 25lb and 30lb)
  • 3 Rubber Resistance Bands (light, med. and heavy)
  • 1 pair of Wrist Wraps
  • 1 EdgeCross-X Carrying Bag
  • 1 EdgeCross-X Branded Workout Mat

The first iteration of the EdgeCross-X system has six main components:

Add resistance bands and the balance wheel for added intensity! You can go from ground movements, right into balancing on the wheel, then straight into a parallette routine (featured above).

You can easily customize the difficulty of the EdgeCross-X by changing the length of the bar, or adjust the position of the handles to go from beginner to advanced. Switch out the ends for added difficulty ranges.

Inherently built for intense, short interval training, the EdgeCross-X is great as a standalone workout, or easily incorporates into your current HIIT, Cross Training, Plyometric, Yoga, Pilates, or Calisthenic routine. 

Use the EdgeCross-X as a pull-up bar. Add the EdgeCross-X to your yoga routine. Use the bar alone a sledgehammer, or take it apart for double hammer moves. Or try all of the above! 


Leverage equates to weightless weight. The more leverage you have, the less resistance there is.

Take a pencil. Place your index finger on the tip of the pencil and lift. You will feel light resistance. Now, try moving your finger an inch away from the end and press down to try to lift it. It becomes much more difficult because you’ve created more resistance because you have less leverage.

Through changing the end pieces or changing handle-positions, you are simulating adding weight to a weight bar by adding additional resistance to your workout through leverage.

Imagine having an entire gym you can take with you everywhere - so you never have to miss another workout again! 

The entire EdgeCross-X training system fits into one small bag so you can take it with you everywhere: home, gym, office, traveling, or wherever you go!

No More Excuses!  

Everyone can find 10 minutes to get in a great workout.  Boost your mood, confidence, and performance and get in the best shape of your life!


There’s a reason the world’s top athletes focus on core strength over any other fitness area: Core fitness is full body fitness. By focusing on core strength, athletes of all disciplines have seen documented improved performance.

Nothing else on the market can strengthen your core, increase balance, and build lean sculpted muscles faster and more effectively than the EdgeCross-X - giving you the competitive EDGE.  

We developed off balance leverage training to rapidly build incredible core strength, a key component to improved injury prevention, improved balance, improved performance, and improved overall fitness.

Because your body works overtime to stay balanced, every move you do using the EdgeCross-X works your core. Additionally, by working your front and back muscles at the same time, exercises on the EdgeCross-X provide an equal, well rounded result for your entire body.

Through this early access product launch, we’re offering the EdgeCross-X system at a discounted rate, with three package options available:

Approximate Retail Price: $399  - Currently 50% off at $199.99!

Basic Package includes: Telescoping Bar, Handles, Intermediate Ends, Beginner Resistance Bands Package, Wheel, Mat and Carrying Bag.

Approximate Retail Price: $520  - Currently 50% off at $259.99!

Intermediate Package includes: Telescoping Bar, Handles, Intermediate Ends, Wheel, Beginner Resistance Bands Package, Advanced Resistance Bands Package, Mat, and Carrying bag.

Approximate Retail Price: $640  - Currently 50% off at $319.99!

Master Package Includes: Telescoping Bar, Handles, Beginner Ends, Intermediate Ends, Advanced Ends, Wheel, Beginner Resistance Bands Package, Advanced Resistance Bands Package, Parallette attachments, Pair of Sandbag Weights, Bar Pad, Wrist Wraps, Mat, and Carrying Bag.

 

By backing now, you will also get exclusive access to our EdgeCross-X digital trainers center, set to be released after the close of our campaign, where we plan to offer exclusive videos detailing new EdgeCross moves, training routines, and exciting developments to future systems!

The EdgeCross-X is the next evolution of personal fitness.

IT TAKES A FULL FITNESS SYSTEM FOR A FULL BODY FIT

By targeting every major muscle group in the body at one time, there’s no longer a need for any other piece of gym equipment. The EdgeCross-X full body system is an all in one package.

This is just the beginning. This product is evolving daily, as we’re constantly discovering and designing new elements to continually advance the EdgeCross-X experience.

 

Currently in the seed and development phase, we need YOUR HELP to bring our first prototype version, the patent pending EdgeCross-X, to life.

The development process of the EdgeCross-X so far has been a long one. From idea to conception, creating the perfect full body fitness system has been no easy task. We’ve learned from our mistakes, with each iteration improving upon the last, and have created many working prototypes that have been providing amazing results.

Now we’re at the point where we’re ready to make the EdgeCross-X available to you, and begin manufacturing a limited run to launch our flagship system - but we won’t stop there. This initial system is just the beginning. We have so much more in store for the EdgeCross-X experience!

 

Steve Berman is the founder of EdgeCross-X LLC. fitness products, and the co-creator of the EdgeCross-X portable fitness system alongside his youngest son Kyle. A successful business person, investor, designer and father to three sons, all of which are into fitness (a direct result of Steve's life as a fitness enthusiast), Steve's mission is to fundamentally change the way the world works out, and aims to bring forth a new evolution in personal fitness with the EdgeCross-X. Steve began his career by building custom homes in the mid-1980s and has gone on to create some of the most exclusive properties throughout Calabasas and Malibu in California, as well as the top awarded boutique hotel in the country (among many others). At 21 years old, Steve was awarded his first patent, of many, for products he has developed throughout the years. A jack of all trades and master of a few, Steve's other interests and hobbies include snowboarding, skiing, surfing, martial arts, and working out, and is a talented artist and guitarist. He truly is a renaissance man. 

Kyle Berman is the co-founder of EdgeCross-X LLC. Fitness products, and co-creator of the EdgeCross-X Portable Fitness system with his dad, Steve. He is a National Academy of Sports Medicine Certified Personal Trainer and is currently studying business administration. His hobbies include rock climbing, surfing, snowboarding, hockey, working out, and if you couldn't tell, EdgeCrossing! 

An insightful marketer fascinated by the human psyche, Pedro is EdgeCross-X's head of advertising as well as co-founder and co-owner of Gravity Pull Media with Grant Harvey. Using his passion for helping companies strategically position themselves and his master growth-hacking, Pedro has copious experience and insight from working on numerous rewards and equity-based campaigns, and is focused on using his insight and empirical knowledge to create solid advertising strategies that have been similarly deployed successfully across a slew of campaigns.

A thriving creative writer with a passion for marketing, Grant is the head of marketing and creative at EdgeCross-X and the co-founder and co-owner of Gravity Pull Media with Pedro Flores. Utilizing his experience and insight from working on numerous rewards-based and equity-based crowdfunding, Grant is a mastermind of marketing and a wizard with words. Grant is aiming to use his talent and experience to guide the EdgeCross team to success.

We’re done prototyping, our patents are pending, and are currently sourcing and optimizing parts and delivery logistics. To begin our production, we have set our initial goal for this first batch of EdgeCross-X systems.

By backing this campaign early, you will receive a minimum of 50% off the approximate retail value of the full system once it goes to market. Get in now - you really do benefit!

In launching our crowdfunding campaign, our goal is to fundamentally change the course of fitness as we know it, creating the next evolution of fitness. In doing so, we’re trying to amass a community of fitness fanatics who, like us, believe there’s a better and more efficient way to exercise than wasting away spending hours of our lives at the gym. No one should ever have to abandon their goals because they don’t have time to workout.

We want to invite you, our backers, to be a part of our mission. We want to listen to your feedback and improve our full system based on your real-time input. We want you to join us in our journey as you pursue your own personal fitness goals.

As your progress grows, our system will grow, and we’ll grow together as a community.

In this way, we want each and every EdgeCross-X system to be made by you. Like any natural ecosystem, we want the EdgeCross-X community ecosystem to result in the best workout system available. Through helping us, you help yourself, and enable us to help you and so many more!

We’ve done all the research, our patents are pending, we have the functioning prototypes, and now we need your help to push this to the next level: get it into manufacturing and distribution to get the EdgeCross-X into your hands.

By backing our campaign, you’re bringing forth a new evolution in personal fitness. Not just for you, but for everyone who will gain access to our system thanks to your early contribution. By focusing on core strength, and full body fitness through off balance leverage training, we can bring forth a new way to think about fitness. No more single-muscle group exercises. It’s full body training or nothing!

But we can’t do this without you. We need your help by backing this campaign, sharing it with your friends, and making as much noise as possible to let the word out and the world know about the EdgeCross-X!

Use the built-in share tools to share via Indiegogo, and feel free to ask as many questions as you want in the comment section below.  

With your help, we can get the EdgeCross-X into the home of every fitness enthusiast across the globe! 

Looking forward to getting you in the best shape of your life!

This product is evolving daily, as we’re constantly discovering and designing new elements to continually advance the EdgeCross-X experience. Currently in the seed and development phase, we need YOUR HELP to bring our first prototype version, the patent pending EdgeCross-X, to life.The development process of the EdgeCross-X so far has been a long one. From idea to conception, creating the perfect full body fitness system has been no easy task. We’ve learned from our mistakes, with each iteration improving upon the last, and have created many working prototypes that have been providing amazing results.Now we’re at the point where we’re ready to make the EdgeCross-X available to you, and begin manufacturing a limited run to launch our flagship system - but we won’t stop there. This initial system is just the beginning. We have so much more in store for the EdgeCross-X experience! Steve Berman is the founder of EdgeCross-X LLC. fitness products, and the co-creator of the EdgeCross-X portable fitness system alongside his youngest son Kyle. A successful business person, investor, designer and father to three sons, all of which are into fitness (a direct result of Steve's life as a fitness enthusiast), Steve's mission is to fundamentally change the way the world works out, and aims to bring forth a new evolution in personal fitness with the EdgeCross-X. Steve began his career by building custom homes in the mid-1980s and has gone on to create some of the most exclusive properties throughout Calabasas and Malibu in California, as well as the top awarded boutique hotel in the country (among many others). At 21 years old, Steve was awarded his first patent, of many, for products he has developed throughout the years. A jack of all trades and master of a few, Steve's other interests and hobbies include snowboarding, skiing, surfing, martial arts, and working out, and is a talented artist and guitarist. He truly is a renaissance man. Kyle Berman is the co-founder of EdgeCross-X LLC. Fitness products, and co-creator of the EdgeCross-X Portable Fitness system with his dad, Steve. He is a National Academy of Sports Medicine Certified Personal Trainer and is currently studying business administration. His hobbies include rock climbing, surfing, snowboarding, hockey, working out, and if you couldn't tell, EdgeCrossing! An insightful marketer fascinated by the human psyche, Pedro is EdgeCross-X's head of advertising as well as co-founder and co-owner of Gravity Pull Media with Grant Harvey. Using his passion for helping companies strategically position themselves and his master growth-hacking, Pedro has copious experience and insight from working on numerous rewards and equity-based campaigns, and is focused on using his insight and empirical knowledge to create solid advertising strategies that have been similarly deployed successfully across a slew of campaigns.A thriving creative writer with a passion for marketing, Grant is the head of marketing and creative at EdgeCross-X and the co-founder and co-owner of Gravity Pull Media with Pedro Flores. Utilizing his experience and insight from working on numerous rewards-based and equity-based crowdfunding, Grant is a mastermind of marketing and a wizard with words. Grant is aiming to use his talent and experience to guide the EdgeCross team to success.We’re done prototyping, our patents are pending, and are currently sourcing and optimizing parts and delivery logistics. To begin our production, we have set our initial goal for this first batch of EdgeCross-X systems.By backing this campaign early, you will receive a minimum of 50% off the approximate retail value of the full system once it goes to market. Get in now - you really do benefit!In launching our crowdfunding campaign, our goal is to fundamentally change the course of fitness as we know it, creating the next evolution of fitness. In doing so, we’re trying to amass a community of fitness fanatics who, like us, believe there’s a better and more efficient way to exercise than wasting away spending hours of our lives at the gym. No one should ever have to abandon their goals because they don’t have time to workout.We want to invite you, our backers, to be a part of our mission. We want to listen to your feedback and improve our full system based on your real-time input. We want you to join us in our journey as you pursue your own personal fitness goals.As your progress grows, our system will grow, and we’ll grow together as a community.In this way, we want each and every EdgeCross-X system to be made by you. Like any natural ecosystem, we want the EdgeCross-X community ecosystem to result in the best workout system available. Through helping us, you help yourself, and enable us to help you and so many more!We’ve done all the research, our patents are pending, we have the functioning prototypes, and now we need your help to push this to the next level: get it into manufacturing and distribution to get the EdgeCross-X into your hands.By backing our campaign, you’re bringing forth a new evolution in personal fitness. Not just for you, but for everyone who will gain access to our system thanks to your early contribution. By focusing on core strength, and full body fitness through off balance leverage training, we can bring forth a new way to think about fitness. No more single-muscle group exercises. It’s full body training or nothing!But we can’t do this without you. We need your help by backing this campaign, sharing it with your friends, and making as much noise as possible to let the word out and the world know about the EdgeCross-X!Use the built-in share tools to share via Indiegogo, and feel free to ask as many questions as you want in the comment section below.  With your help, we can get the EdgeCross-X into the home of every fitness enthusiast across the globe! Looking forward to getting you in the best shape of your life!

story:
What is a Tribe?

The simplest definition is, my Tribe is my people, the people I love and the people that love me. They are the ones we like to hang out with because we enjoy their company.

It’s our husband, wife, children, brother, sister, grandparents, friends, or anyone else who gives us pleasure. Our Tribe.

Yet, there is still a lot of unhappiness and suffering in our world, even in our own little Tribes.

How come?

The answer is, at some level, we are not getting our needs met and we feel unhappy and unsatisfied. 

Did you know we are all wired differently in how we feel love?

Probably not. Most of us have have never thought about it.

I know I didn't. 

But because I have been a healer for over 34 years (Chiropractic Acupuncturist), I began to get the picture that the mind and body really are one. 

I began to get the picture that our illness is mirrored in the quality of our relationships. 

Did you know most conflict and misunderstandings are uncommunicated needs for love? 

TRIBE is based on the principles found in my book called “The Yoga of Relationships and The 12 Ways of Love.” Dr. Denny Thompson

Why the word Yoga?

Because Yoga means the Way of Connection or the Path of Union.

The Yoga of Relationships is about creating a sacred space in relationships that brings people together in peace, health and harmony.

The TRIBE APP helps us implement the Ritual of Loving into our relationships.

Imagine a world, where we know exactly how to love and nurture others in their unique individual ways?

Our innovative LoveQ software found in the TRIBE app can instantly tell you what your partner's  love needs are, without a lengthy questionnaire. 

LoveQ software can tell you what your child's needs are. 

LoveQ software can tell you what your parents and siblings and friends need.

LoveQ software is the brains of the TRIBE relationship app. 

 

Are you missing something in your life?

TRIBE and the 12 Ways of Love could be your secret to ensure that your loved ones feel your love! 

No more miscommunication with your spouse or children or friends!

 Are you in a relationship that isn’t fulfilling?

Are you angry with your spouse or partner?

Do you fight with your kids?

Do you fight with your parents?

Do you want to find a deeper connection with the people you love?

Do you want to make sure that the people in your life feel your love?

Even though we are connected through social media and our phones, it seems that we are all missing a little something.

And that little something becomes a big something over time.

I have used the discovery of LoveQ Technology in my practice for over a decade and have found that it has helped heal relationships and heal the body.

I want the world to have this insight to save marriages, improve relationships and make good ones great!

And I wants to make you healthier as well, because difficult relationships can make you sick.

You need to know that there are 12 Ways of Love.

And that we all have 4 of these 12 Ways of Love that are the more important to us than the rest.

These 4 make up our unique LoveQ.

Knowing your LoveQ  for yourself and others, enables you to really understand yourself and understand others.

What others have said about LoveQ.

“Revolutionary!”,

“A way to deeply connect with others.”

“A short cut to love.”

“A guided way to nurture those you love”

“It’s so simple. It makes people feel good.”

Imagine knowing the secret ways which your children need love, even before they can talk? Nurturing your children in their preferred ways makes for a more happy and resilient child.

Our LoveQ software can tell you just that.

Imagine knowing the secret ways which your husband or wife needs to feel love?

How much easier would your relationships be if you knew how to love your partner?

How much more joy and ease would be in your relationships?

And the TRIBE relationship app  will send notifications to help you love more intelligently. 

Ex: You will get a reminder that will say.......

Have you given Jack a hug today(Physical Touch) ?

Sara loves Listening, remember that the next time you talk.

Plan a date with Julie, she really loves Time Together.

Eli loves to feel Protected, be the first to stand up for him.

Remember, your mom loves Gifts, have you found something special for her? It doesn't matter that it's not her birthday.

Chris wants to Share an experience with you, get that on the calendar.

Honor the planning of Erika, she feels love with Organizing for Perfection. Help her get all              her ducks in a row. 

Why do I need to know my LoveQ?

We all want to love, but it’s not always easy.

Deep meaningful connection is created when both people in a relationship feel loved and nurtured.

Many times relationships are wrought with fighting, unhappiness, depression and illness. Broken homes, unhappy couples and unhappy children are the product of not knowing.              50 percent of all marriages end in divorce because we are not effectively loving and nurturing each other. We can do better. 

The former U.S. Surgeon General Dr. Murthy said that we suffer from a "loneliness epidemic”? He saw loneliness as a prevailing illness more often than diabetes, cancer and even hypertension. Loneliness affects our health dramatically and TRIBE is the answer to this national epidemic.

Knowing and applying loveQ in your life, will dramatically change and improve the quality of your relationships and can help you feel close and part of your TRIBE . 

 TRIBE Core Beliefs

             1.   We need each other. We all need love. We need to love and be loved. We are social                        creatures that have a deep need for love as important as our basic need for water,                             food and air. When we don’t’ feel loved, our relationships suffer as well as our health.

2.   The way I feel love may not be the way you feel love. We are all wired to feel love           in our own individual way through 4 of the 12 Ways of Love.

3.   The purpose of love is to heal. There is no greater force in the Universe than love.           Love has the power to heal our relationships, ourselves, our community, our world.  

4.   The purpose of a relationship is to nurture. I nurture you, you nurture me. Good         relationships are reciprocal. We need to love others in the way they feel loved. We               need to ask others to love us in the way we feel love.

Are you missing something in your life?

TRiBE could help you find it.

TRiBE and the 12 Ways of Love are your secret to ensure that your loved ones feel your love! 

No more miscommunication with your spouse or children or friends!

Are you in a relationship that isn’t fulfilling?

Are you angry with your spouse or partner?

Do you fight with your kids?

Do you fight with your parents?

Do you want to find a deeper connection with the people you love?

Do you want to make sure that the people in your life feel your love?

Why do we need this money?

We’ve created an extraordinary relationship program that people love but we need your help to get it to the world.

Your support will provide a simple way for everyone to access the new science of how to love with the Tribe relationship app.

What are we going to do with your support?

Let me break it down. Here is what we need and what it is going to cost.

  1.  First, we needed a company that could make an app that could do the calculations of the accurate LoveCodes for each individual. After several years of searching, we finally found the right programmer, it just took me a while to find him.  He also gave us the best price by far for the creation of the app. 
  2.  The goal for this part of the campaign is $15,000. Once we have everything up and running smooth and all the bugs worked out we will go back to Indiegogo and do the InDemand campaign to address marketing and media consultants.

We need your help.

Here’s how you can help. 

1. Donate to our crowdfunding campaign to bring the Tribe Relationship App to the market. You can do that here: Go to the Back It button at the top of the page. 

2. Please include your tribe and share this with them.

3. We can’t do this without you and for your support we are eternally grateful! 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Help us spread the word by forwarding this to your tribe.
  • Help us make some noise about the Tribe Relationship App in your life.
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

Gratitude,

Dr. Denny

What's Your LoveQ?

story:
Chronic Pain Does Not Have to Control Your Life! WellPrevail, a leading health-tech start-up, is developing a revolutionary digital platform that will provide comprehensive biopsychosocial pain management services to millions of users worldwide.

And when we say millions, we mean it: chronic pain affects 20% of the world's population. Not only does it disrupt people's personal and professional lives, but it can also lead to anxiety, depression, and even suicide.

Unfortunately, most conventional pain management treatments are piecemeal and, therefore, inadequate.

What we need instead is a holistic approach that addresses all biopsychosocial aspects of living with chronic pain: from physical therapy and mental health to peer support and beyond.

 

Here is where WellPrevail's digital platform comes in. It will feature:

  • A mobile app that packs in a handy clinical concierge, daily log, symptom checker, medication management, and physical therapy plan.

  • A companion eHealth web app where people will be able to access psychological consultations, one-on-one coaching, a patient portal, and various educational resources.

  • A private peer-support community portal, where people with chronic pain will be able to ask questions and share their stories.

Together, these elements will provide truly holistic support that will empower people with chronic pain and help them lead better and more fulfilling lives.

 

Melissa Chua founded WellPrevail. She holds a Bachelor of Science (Immunology, Pharmacology) and an Master of Philosophy (Medicine) from the University of Sydney, and she used to work as a research officer in Singapore. At present, Ms. Chua is pursuing her second graduate degree at Johns Hopkins University.

However, pain management is more than a mere academic and professional interest for Ms. Chua. She knows all too well what it means to live with chronic pain from personal experience. The struggles and challenges she encountered along the way were the inspiration behind WellPrevail and the new digital platform.

 

 

If you pledge now, you will be helping our project take off the ground and relieve the suffering of millions of people worldwide. What's more, you will get exclusive early-bird perks!

story:
INTRODUCTION

My name is Niall I'm originally from Scotland but I moved to Canada 8 years ago. Since moving to  Canada in 2013 I found myself struggling with anxiety, depression and addiction.

Thankfully I am now sober over one year. Consistent exercise and mind work helped give me my life back and I am on a mission to get others who are struggling, to exercise and to do mind work (Yoga, Deep Breathing, Cold Dips, Meditation to name a few)  consistently to improve their overall well being.

I want everyone to be able to get a phenomenal workout whether at home or on the go, for the mental benefits not just physical and the pack we provide at Wolfburgh does exactly this.

ALLOCATION OF FUNDS RAISED

  • The money raised from fundraising will allow us to grow the brand through a strategic online marketing campaign. 
  • During the launch phase of a new brand it is vital we raise brand awareness and get our mission out into the public domain. 
  • It's very important that we continue to grow the 'work out support' aspect of the business. I want to give people the best in support/advice when using the equipment. Additional funds will allow me to get more personal trainers onboard to help provide the guidance people need.
  • We will also use funds to increase inventory and add some new exciting products to the line. 
  • These funds will allow us to continue towards the ultimate goal of becoming a business and community people can trust to help them navigate the difficulties of life.
  • Overtime we want to grow the brand and explore other areas that might help people's  cognitive function,  For example nootropics, getting people to meditate, cold dip etc, vitamins/supplements, encouraging outdoor activity.
  • We cant achieve any of this without your support to get us off the ground.

WOLF VISION

Wolfburgh is not just about selling fitness equipment. We are hear to try and get everyone moving for mental health on a consistent basis so that people 'Gain Momentum, Reach Optimum,  Achieve.' We believe everyone has a duty of care towards others but its impossible to achieve this when your not actually performing at your optimum yourself.

 The fitness equipment pack allows us to establish the brand but in the future we see this as a movement that has everything individuals will need to be performing at their optimum and ultimately achieving. 

5% of all sales go to the Canadian Mental Health Association. 

*****************************************************************************************

WHY WOLFBURGH?

✅Free workouts dropping every week

✅Free support/advice

✅Free shipping

✅No personal trainers fees

✅No monthly gym fees

✅No awkward gym interactions

✅Share the cost between your household

✅Work out from the comfort of your home

✅Or how about exercising outdoors?

FEATURED IN:

***Professional Testimonials***

TrainWithTish - "Canada's Impact Magazine Top Trainer 2018, 2019"  

I have had the BEST experience with wolfburgh! When I found out that the company donates a part of all sales proceeds to The Canadian Mental Health Association, I immediately wanted to reach out. Not only is the customer service top notch, the equipment is awesome. I’ve received all orders so fast I was shocked - especially with most companies needing weeks or even months waiting periods. I love the packaging, the unique equipment they offer, as well as the complete packages they offer! Makes things so easy for a new person just starting out, but also offers the one offs for people who are building onto their home gym. My clients who have also ordered from wolfburgh have also had great customer service care. I’m so glad I found this little small business!!!

Matt Fox Former pro athlete, qualified personal trainer, cancer survivor, and time-stressed dad. Nominated for “Fitness Influencer of the year 2020”   Feb 7, 2021 

This kit really has everything you need and much more to get a great work out at home or on the go. I would highly reccommend to anyone who doesnt want to go to a gym but still wants to look after themselves physically and mentally.

What The Heck Do I Get for $275 cad?

1. 11 pc Ultimate Wolf Resistance Trainer Set

2. Wolf Grade Battle Rope

3. Pull Up or Shut Up Bar

4. Wolf Olympic Training Rings

5. WolfRx Suspension Trainer System

6. Fab Roller

7.You Skipping Rope

8. Xtra Tuff Foam Roller

9. Super Soft Yoga Mat

10. Devine Boxing Reflex Ball

11. Spike Massage Ball

12. Yes Squeeze Hand grip

13. Rotating Push up blocks

14. Firm Fabric Hip/Booty Band

15. Wolfburgh Waterproof  Outdoor Bag

16. Balance ‘is key’  Board

***Customer Testimonials***

Ali 

24.05.2021

  Slight delay with receiving kit but it was the shippers mistake. customer service was good, I am very satisfied with my purchase! Thank you Niall

Abdul

09.05.2021

    Arrived within 3 days. Really good equipment.

Sarah

06.05.2021

Great idea, I can’t believe the variety of workouts I can do with the equipment. I have recommended to my friends. No more gym. Thank you Wolfburgh.

Mark

30.04.2021

I am really impressed with the quality of all the products, received within 5 days. I would highly recommend.

A Final Word From Wolfburgh

​You don't need expensive, time-consuming gym memberships or personal trainers to get fit and improve your overall well being.  

It's been scientifically proven that exercise and movement reduce stress, Improve mood, decrease inflammation and increase energy. Combining this with a solid mental game and with some goals in place, you can take on any challenge.

'Exercise and mindful thinking ideally should be incorporated into your daily routine like drinking water, sleeping, and brushing your teeth.' Niall Roxburgh Owner Wolfburgh

It's time to start looking after yourself, 30 minutes 3-5 days a week and you can and will improve your physical, and mental well being far beyond your expectations.

Change is daunting, getting started is the hardest part, don’t stress we are here to provide you with the support you need.

You got this.

You can find our library of free workouts which is constantly growing on youtube and Instagram. @wolfburgh 

Also check out wolfburgh.com

I

Risks

I don't foresee any risks as the products are already produced and ready for shipping in North America. We don't have to wait months for the pack to be manufactured and shipped.  I have already completed this step.

Ready when you are!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can please donate a small amount to the Canadian Mental Health Association.

5% of all Wolfburgh sales goes to the CMHA.

Tell your friends about Wolfburgh :)
story_txt:
INTRODUCTION
My name is Niall I'm originally from Scotland but I moved to Canada 8 years ago. Since moving to  Canada in 2013 I found myself struggling with anxiety, depression and addiction.
Thankfully I am now sober over one year. Consistent exercise and mind work helped give me my life back and I am on a mission to get others who are struggling, to exercise and to do mind work (Yoga, Deep Breathing, Cold Dips, Meditation to name a few)  consistently to improve their overall well being.
I want everyone to be able to get a phenomenal workout whether at home or on the go, for the mental benefits not just physical and the pack we provide at Wolfburgh does exactly this.
ALLOCATION OF FUNDS RAISED


The money raised from fundraising will allow us to grow the brand through a strategic online marketing campaign. 

During the launch phase of a new brand it is vital we raise brand awareness and get our mission out into the public domain. 
It's very important that we continue to grow the 'work out support' aspect of the business. I want to give people the best in support/advice when using the equipment. Additional funds will allow me to get more personal trainers onboard to help provide the guidance people need.
We will also use funds to increase inventory and add some new exciting products to the line. 
These funds will allow us to continue towards the ultimate goal of becoming a business and community people can trust to help them navigate the difficulties of life.

Overtime we want to grow the brand and explore other areas that might help people's  cognitive function,  For example nootropics, getting people to meditate, cold dip etc, vitamins/supplements, encouraging outdoor activity.

We cant achieve any of this without your support to get us off the ground.


WOLF VISION
Wolfburgh is not just about selling fitness equipment. We are hear to try and get everyone moving for mental health on a consistent basis so that people 'Gain Momentum, Reach Optimum,  Achieve.' We believe everyone has a duty of care towards others but its impossible to achieve this when your not actually performing at your optimum yourself.
 The fitness equipment pack allows us to establish the brand but in the future we see this as a movement that has everything individuals will need to be performing at their optimum and ultimately achieving. 
5% of all sales go to the Canadian Mental Health Association. 
*****************************************************************************************
WHY WOLFBURGH?
✅Free workouts dropping every week
✅Free support/advice
✅Free shipping
✅No personal trainers fees
✅No monthly gym fees
✅No awkward gym interactions
✅Share the cost between your household
✅Work out from the comfort of your home
✅Or how about exercising outdoors?
FEATURED IN:

I love the packaging, the unique equipment they offer, as well as the complete packages they offer! Makes things so easy for a new person just starting out, but also offers the one offs for people who are building onto their home gym. My clients who have also ordered from wolfburgh have also had great customer service care. I’m so glad I found this little small business!!!

Matt Fox Former pro athlete, qualified personal trainer, cancer survivor, and time-stressed dad. Nominated for “Fitness Influencer of the year 2020”   Feb 7, 2021 
This kit really has everything you need and much more to get a great work out at home or on the go. I would highly reccommend to anyone who doesnt want to go to a gym but still wants to look after themselves physically and mentally.

story:
ClearBreath is a mask reuse & storage box with a stylish design that anyone can carry around. Equipped with a Negative-Ion Discharger and an Ozone Generator, ClearBreath can charge static electricity onto your mask while freshening it at the same time. With the help of the ozone generator, the unpleasant odors of a used mask are destroyed in the process as well.

 

Not just for masks, ClearBreath is also equipped with a powerful 6000mAh battery and a wireless charger so you can conveniently put your phone on the lid to charge.

Filtration efficiency(FE) also decreases as your mask loses static electricity during use. This is why you need ClearBreath to make your mask reusable.

 

ClearBreath is easy-to-use and portable, the Negative Ion Discharger and the Ozone Generator restore static electricity to your mask while freshening it in minutes!

Bring ClearBreath on the go with you, keep your mask clean and your body healthy.

 

This box is the perfect place to put your mask. You don’t need to constantly change new masks, as the box can make your mask efficient and fresh again. It has four negative ion discharging holes that add static electricity to your mask to improve its filtration efficiency.

 

With just one click, the Depuration Mode is activated and only takes 5 minutes to complete.

 

The built-in ozone generator can get rid of the unpleasant odors and keep your mask fresh.

 

What is O₃?
    O₃ also known as ozone is a powerful oxidant and has many industrial and consumer applications related to oxidation. The ozone treatment gets rid of the smells on the surfaces and crevices of your mask. With three oxygen atoms, ozone is unstable so its extra oxygen atom can detach and grab onto many other kinds of molecules. If the molecules are stinky ones, they can change to be non-smelly.

Need to charge? The top panel contains a QI wireless charging module, compatible with iOS & Android devices. It is powered by a powerful 6000mAh battery that charges your devices while also providing a long stand-by time.

 

You can store your masks whether shopping, at home, on travel, in the office, or in the car.

 

  • Taking off the mask insider a car.

 

  • Take off the mask during work.

 

Portable and practical, ClearBreath will be your best companion for healthy traveling.

In addition to freshening and charging your masks, you can also put in your jewelry, wallet, necklace, and other accessories for depuration. Enjoy yourself with a cup of coffee while giving your accessories a depuration spa.

The use of ClearBreath is extremely simple. All you need to do is put in your mask, close the upper lid then press a button.

 

1. Put the mask in

2. Close the Lid

3. Long press the Power Button: for 2 seconds for Depuration Mode 6 seconds for Static Electricity Mode.

story:
A (hopefully) Brief Introduction

When we opened our Health Retreat in 2014, we never expected it to grow the way that it has. All we wanted to do was help people understand what healthy living was all about.

We never started it out to become good cooks because that wasn't what we were passionate about. In fact, we even had a chef lined up to join our team and he never arrived. A few days before we were due to open our doors to paying clients, we stopped receiving any contact from the person we had signed up to join our team and naturally, the panic kicked in.

We had people arriving in a few days and something had to be done.

So what do you do when a challenge comes up ?

YOU MAKE A PLAN and you JUST DO IT !!

Neither of us (G&J - the Owners of the Retreat) have ever had any formal training in cooking but through our friendship, we had grown to share a mutual love of eating. After all, it is one of THE most important things that we can do - we all know we need food to stay alive - but it goes far deeper than that.

I (Gareth) am the one who does most of the cooking because, well just because it worked out that way. I have never had the greatest relationship with food and have always found it rather boring and mundane. Eating wasn't something I enjoyed because it just wasn't. I won't go into too much detail here but there were times when I just "forgot" to eat and that lead to a number of health challenges later on in life.

When I met Jeroen in 2008, my Business Partner and Best Friend, I asked him to help me understand food, and healthy living, better. He shared with me his views and how he chose to live his life, and in doing so, a new relationship with food began for me.

I started to appreciate it. I started to value it. I started to see how food was SO MUCH MORE than just fuel and something you  had to do to stay alive. So naturally, when we started our Retreat, we knew that food had to play an important role in what we had to share with the world.

I took this opportunity to find a way of "falling in love" with eating again. 

It was difficult at first. I know how upset I can get if I go somewhere and the food is not that great. So every meal we prepare is a nerve wracking experience. 

And now, 2 and a half years later, and requests every week for a Recipe Book, I finally accept that maybe, just maybe, my cooking is good enough for people to want to continue with at home. 

The Balance Factor isn't just about food.

It's about SO much more.

It's an experience and a journey into a healthier, happier more balanced life style - one that leaves you with more time and more freedom to enjoy the things you really love doing and more importantly than that, it's one that leaves you feeling truly satisfied.

It's an experience that takes you through the seasons, providing you with detailed plans of what to eat throughout the year - Warming Winter stews and soups to Sizzling Summer salads and stir fries, Amazing Autumnal roasts and relishes to Scintillating Spring smoothies and sauces.

But healthy living isn't just about food - it's about much, much more and we know from our experience of working with quite a few people, that planning is the key area of challenge when it comes to living a healthy balanced life and The Balance Factor takes all of that into account.

Meal plans, shopping lists, food diaries and exercise plans for the seasons - we have done our best to combine it and put it all in one place for you to enjoy. 

You never know, The Balance Factor may just be the last series of Recipe Books you ever need to buy to live the healthy life you've always wanted.

What We Need & What You Get

In order to get this book, or should we say, series of books out into the world, we need your help.

It's taken almost 18 months of consistent, solid hard work to get the format of our books clear and we're pleased to say that we're finally there. We have a structure, we have a list and we're ready to rock and roll.

But publishing a book is expensive. Creating and publishing 4 is even more challenging - but if you know us, you'll know that we do like the odd challenge every now and then.

So, over the course of the next year, we'll be releasing our 4 books - that is, if we achieve the targets we need to get this done.

January 2017 - The Winter Edition

April 2017 - The Spring Collection

July 2017 - The Summer Assortment

October 2017 - The Autumn Arrangement

Each edition (or season) will provide you with plans, recipes, information, exercises and so much more that will, at the end of the year, give you a COMPLETE COLLECTION of everything you need to be healthy and happy.

Recipes will be as seasonal (and simple) as possible, providing your body with what it truly needs during the different times of the year. 

Exercises will be tailored and created for you to do in the comfort of your own home, again in line with the times of the year. 

We'll include all of the favourite meals from our Retreat, following our Program and structure that we use each week including Easy Meals, Juices & Smoothies, Soups and Salads, Naya Fiesta Meals, Family Favourites and of course, everyone's favourite, Snacks and Treats. 

Plans will be structured so that they are as simple to follow as possible, giving you a true balance without having to sit down and think too much. 

AND !!

We'll even be running Special Weeks at our Retreat in Spain, dedicated to showing you EXACTLY how we create the meals we do every week. These Gourmet Fitness Weeks will be tied in with the launch of each of the books as they come out so stay posted for more information about those.

We have been in contact with a PR Agency, who we are hoping to sign up and we've had discussions with a Publisher who will help us get everything out into the world, so all contributions will go towards the PR & Publishing Packages we are working on. 

Here's the exact breakdown of what is need to get ALL FOUR BOOKS completed and published over the course of the year: -

Publishing and Production Costs - 10,000.00

PR & Marketing - 6,000.00

Indiegogo Fees - 2,600.00

Paypal Fees - 480.00

Order Fulfillment - 2,625.00

Photography - 2,000.00

The Impact

When we started our business, we had but one simple aim: -

To make the world a healthier and happier place, on person at a time by showing them how simple and fun health can be.

We were fed up with the complexity and confusion of living a healthy, balanced life and just want to be balanced, healthy, happy and free. At the end of the day, our aim is to help people feel good, no matter what is going on around us.

Life is too short to continually be counting calories, doing diets, living in the gym and going without rather than living a balanced, happy and fulfilled life. And it’s for this reason we'd really like to finally get this going.

At D-Toxd Living, we live our lives by a Manifesto. 

  • We’re bound by a common desire to be healthy and free, but most of all, to have fun and be happy.
  • We’re not bound by extremes but live our lives to our own extreme limits.
  • We’re not driven by facts and fear, rather we live by fun and faith.
  • We’re not ruled by research and are driven by personal results. 
  • And most of all, we’re not focused on the outcome because we embrace the simple pleasure and joy of the journey.

And this is our next step towards fulfilling our vision.

We're taking the complex and complicated and doing our best to make it simple and fun again.

We're making it real life, healthy living for one and all.

Risks & Challenges

Right now, the world is awash with some amazing people doing amazing things to help people live healthier lives and we know we have a HUGE task ahead of us. 

We're not juice junkies or yogi's who meditate all day, we're not workout warriors and muscle maniacs who live in the gym, we're not fanatics or freaks who live extreme lives and we're not raw foodies or vegans (or even vegetarians) for that matter.

We're not even trained chefs - and this is probably the reason why it has taken it us so long to finally make this decision towards doing this and creating what so many people have asked for.

We're just 2 regular, every day guys, who get stressed every now and then, who feel like throwing the towel in once in a while, who like having a glass of wine or beer with our families, who want to eat junk at times and who like having fun and helping people. We don't think we're anything special or different at all and may that is our downfall - even writing this is a challenge for us because we just do what we do because it helps people and that is that !

We're making it simple so there will be NO calories and content, macro's and micro's, this's and that's - just plain and simple, healthy, balanced living which is something that might put some people off.

We have NO idea how our voice will be heard, or received, but we're willing to give it a go.

Our biggest risk is doing all of the work, raising all of the funds and then being stuck with a box of books under the table and, if the truth be told, it's another thing that has been putting us off.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you've sat down in our Naya and enjoyed our meals with us, all we ask is that you share and share and share - and then share again.

Tell as many people as you can about this.

Use this hash tag whenever you post anywhere - #thebalancefactor

Come find us on Facebook in our Special Group - "D-Toxd Living - Life Made Good"

Make some noise with us because we would appreciate every single piece of help and support that we can get right now.
