Tell as many people as you can about this.
Use this hash tag whenever you post anywhere - #thebalancefactor
Come find us on Facebook in our Special Group - "D-Toxd Living - Life Made Good"
Make some noise with us because we would appreciate every single piece of help and support that we can get right now.

story:
The Hazelden Betty Ford Clinic in Chicago Invites Pedal4Life's "Pathway to Home" Program

Veterans Share Stories, Inspire Civilians

Stephen P. lives in Johnson City, NY.  Two years after his son was treated with Hydrocodone for a sports injury, he grew addicted and died of an overdose.  Stephen tried getting his son into a treatment facility several times, but could not find an available bed anywhere in NY State. 

Nearly two million Americans suffer from addiction to prescription opioid pain medications. Drug overdoses are now the leading cause of unintentional deaths for Americans ages 25-64.  About 18,000 people die each year from prescription opioid drug overdose. 

  • Drug treatment centers have the capacity to treat only about 20% of those who need help. Making sure those in recovery stay in recovery is imperative to keeping treatment center beds available for new patients like Stephen's son; and, physical activity can play a critical role. 
  • In 2008, National Institute on Drug Abuse chief, Dr. Nora Volkow, suggested that physical activity, specifically bicycling, seems to invigorate neurochemicals in the brain. 
  •  The Hazelden Betty Ford Clinic, in Chicago, has invited our new nonprofit, Pedal4Life, to present a pilot of its "Pathway to Home" program to patients.
  •  Our goal is to bring the program to your community too. 
Please Support Pedal4Life now. Referred by someone? Please click here and write his or her name. That Hero could receive a special gift!

Addicted Veterans Eliminate Opiates After Starting to Ride

The president of the nonprofit Ride2Recovery told me that more than 60% of veterans he works with, who had grown addicted to opiates after being treated for battle wounds, eliminated them from their lifestyles after they started bicycling with his organization.

Bicycling repairs damaged cells and increases the body’s natural endorphins; strengthens health, physical endurance, and emotional stability; and builds friendships that can cleanse a former addict's world of shame and isolation.

If bicycling can help to heal our wounded veterans, it can help to heal civilians too, keeping them in recovery and freeing up beds for others who will need them.


Pedal4Life

Pedal4Life is a new nonprofit, with 501 3(C) status pending, that works with drug treatment centers to build bicycling into their patients’ recovery process.  At Pedal4Life wounded veterans engage civilians recovering from opiate addiction in experiencing the physical, social, and emotional benefits of recreational bicycling.

Our "Pathway to Home" program includes presentations on physical activity and inspiring stories from wounded veterans in recovery; plus, a victory bike ride and new bikes for every patient.


Be Part of Something Special

We need funding to deliver our program to the Chicago Hazelden Betty Ford clinic. 


Please make a gift toward our $20,000 goal. The cost covers:

  • Up to 20 brand new bicycles, helmets, and locks for each patient in recovery. Patients in recovery don't have funds for cars or bikes, making transportation a major hurdle. The bikes and gear are theirs to keep so they can travel to support meetings, jobs and job interviews, and anyplace else they need to go; plus, they'll gain the benefits of physical activity.
  • Travel and stipends for our wounded veteran and physician guest speaker(s)
  • Video documentation for the drug treatment center
  • Street permits and costs for the 5 to 10-mile police-escorted "Pathway to Home" victory bike ride.
  • Attorney fees
  • Liability insurance
  • Materials for the beneficiaries  
Pedal4Life has nonprofit status through its fiscal agency, Active Transportation Alliance, making your gift 100% tax-deductible. 
If we exceed our goal, we can deliver additional "Pathway to Home" events.  The events are free to Hazelden Betty Ford.

About Our Perks

Credibility and earning your trust is vitally important. That's why we carefully chose and placed perks at levels that allow us to yield the highest possible percentage for delivering the pilot program to our beneficiary. 


"Warrior" Perk

$500 Level - Pedal America bicycle jersey by Voler. Worn here by Ira David, Pedal4Life's president and host of the national TV series Pedal America.



Board Members


Andy Clarke, (Chair) is the former president of the League of American Bicyclists and has more than 25 years of experience in bicycling advocacy. His past experience includes stints at Rails to Trails Conservancy, the Association of Pedestrian and Bicycle Professionals, the Bicycle Federation of America (now the National Center for Bicycling and Walking), and a consultant to the Federal Highway Administration.  He now serves as the Director of Strategy for Toole Design, the nation's leading planning, engineering, and landscape architecture firm specializing in multimodal transportation.

Dr. Aletha Maybank, (Vice Chair) MD, MPH, is an Associate Commissioner at the New York City Department of Health and Mental Hygiene and serves as the Director of the Center for Health Equity.  She also serves as Vice President of the Empire State Medical Association, the NYS affiliate of the National Medical Association. Previously she led the Brooklyn District Public Health Office as Assistant Commissioner. Her principal strengths are in the areas of policy, media, partnership/relationship building, community-based participatory research methods, and organizational and community assessments.

Kevin Feldman (Vice Chair) is the Development Director of the South Suburban Humane Society and owner of FundAbilityRules. He works with organizations in the planning, start-up or revitalization of nonprofit advancement programs. His work includes directing donor development and marketing initiatives during crisis and transitional situations. This includes identifying major gift prospects, cultivating prospect relationships, and closing major gifts, building sustainability by creating multiple revenue streams, becoming less dependent on grants, and maximizing the use of multiple marketing communications channels to build positive awareness.

Heather Parris, (Secretary) founded and operates Self Propelled Tours Sedona, Arizona. Shortly after she moved from Vermont to Sedona, in 2007, she joined the Verde Valley Cyclists Coalition and served on the board as Secretary for four years. Self Propelled Tours Sedona, Ariz. is the only company that offers guided road bike tours in Sedona. Heather has appeared on Pedal America as a guest in a special episode that featured women over 40 who road and mountain bike. 

Dorota Dorochowicz, (Treasurer) is the Assistant Manager of the Belden-Stratford, a luxury apartment rental facility in Chicago owned by Prudential and managed by The Laramar Group, a real estate investment company. Dorota brings a strong background in implementing best practices for managing budgets.  She is a passionate outdoor enthusiast and avid cyclist. She has appeared in substantial Pedal America print and online video content and has volunteered at bicycling events that support a number of charitable causes.


Friends and Partners

  • Dr. Donald Teater, medical adviser to the National Safety Council, is one of the country’s leading advocates for curbing over-prescribing and reducing opiate overdose and addiction. 
  • Performance Bicycles, Inc. 
  • Active Transportation Alliance advocates for transportation that encourages and promotes safety, physical activity, health, recreation, social interaction, equity, environmental stewardship and resource conservation. ATA  serves as Ped4Life’s fiscal agency.
  • Ride2Recovery  is a nonprofit that uses bicycling events to support 10,000 of our nation’s wounded veterans. 


Learn more about us at www.pedal4life.org

story:
About the campaign

Hi I’m Manoj. I’m a driver by profession. I come from a lower-middle class family with an average earning of INR 15000 a month. But since past few months I haven’t been able to work at all.  After 6 years of marriage, me and my wife finally gave birth to a pre-mature baby of 7 months . It was the happiest moment of my life. It swept me off my feet as me and my wife have been wanting a baby for the longest time. 

But within one week of my baby’s birth, he developed a dangerous stomach infection called “Necrotising Enterocolits” which was appalling. If the infection spreads, it will be fatal.

I saw my life falling apart knowing the impact of this particular infection on my barely one week old premature baby. It was devastating. After 6 long years, and all my wife and I have been through to have a child, I couldn't possibly let him go. I was determined to get my son out of this and lead a happy life so I started working towards it accordingly. After all the possible resources and help I could gather, I managed to arrange around INR 5 Lacs. But I need twice of that. For further treatments I have to arrange for 5 Lacs more.

How can you help?

The past few months has been tough for me and my family and I’ve barely got any time to work, my household and medical expenses are soaring up and I have just enough to cover basic day to day cost. My wife is a homemaker and my father recently passed away. I’m the only source of income in my family and I'm constantly trying to make the ends meet giving my 100%. All I have is a car, my bread and butter, on loan which has now been vacant for a month. My last resort will be to sell it off which again won’t meet the medical needs for my child completely. I sincerely request you for your support to help my tiny lil chap recover and lead a normal life just like your children. Please contribute and help so I can keep my family together. 

Supporting Documents

story:
Two years ago, our CEO, Jaume Palou, was preparing his holidays. His children suggested going to Thailand and trekking through the jungle to see wild animals, especially elephants. The whole family was really excited about the idea.
 

Jaume suffers from sleep apnea so he asked the travel agent if he might  plug his CPAP machine in during the flight and also while in the jungle. The answer was an emphatic “no.”

At first, Jaume could not resist the idea of not being able to travel. Would he carry his  batteries on him? By calculating the power necessary to keep the CPAP working during six nights in the jungle, he concluded that he would need to carry on his back 55 lbs of car batteries. Something impossible at all.

So, finally, he and his family had to cancel their trip.

However, as an Electronic Engineer, Jaume couldn’t stay inactive. He had to come up with a solution. It was necessary to develop a new CPAP device: portable and autonomous. That’s how Airmony was born.

We have developed the new Airmony CPAP: a hoseless, portable and with Bluetooth connection device. It  can be plugged into a standard USB Power Bank. Now, we are proud to announce that we have the first working prototype.

We now need the funds to carry on with the industrialization of the project together with all the regulatory requirements.

Airmony is a disrupting CPAP experience which will allow Sleep Apnea patients to get a feeling of freedom and control, improving their life quality.

The Indiegogo perks have been designed to allow contributors to receive an extra value and discount on the Airmony retail price, as long as being updated and collaborate in the final design and industrialization.

Our team has evaluated all the technical and regulatory risks and prepared a realistic plan to cover all the emergent eventualities for the product commercialisation.

You really may be interested in our project, and you would love to support us. If no financial contribution is possible, don't worry. You can also support us in other ways:

  • Become a fan of Airmony on Facebook or follow us on Twitter.

  • Spread the word among your friends and colleagues through your social networks.

All help is welcome!
 

 

WHAT IS SLEEP APNEA?

Sleep apnea is a respiratory disorder in which breathing is interrupted for more than 10 seconds during sleep. These pauses in respiration may reoccur between 5-30 times per hour.

Apnea should be treated, as it can affect the daily life, and cause serious health problems (including high blood pressure, heart disease, stroke, diabetes or accidents at work or while driving).

The most common treatment for sleep apnea is to use a CPAP (Continuous Positive Airway Pressure) machine, which keeps the user’s airways open while they sleep.

 

AIRMONY, A REVOLUTIONARY CPAP MACHINE

 

 

 

 

Airmony is a revolutionary CPAP machine that offers superior portability, autonomy and technology. Thanks to its small size, it is perfect for both adults and children who suffer from sleep apnoea.

It is also highly effective at improving rest and recuperation for high-performance athletes.

And for doctors, it is a very useful tool for diagnosing, treating and monitoring patients.

 

WHO CAN BENEFIT FROM THE SUCCESS OF AIRMONY?

 

 

 

TRAVELLERS

  • Who do not want to carry heavy equipment or check in their bags at the airport. Airmony fits easily into hand luggage.

  • Who do not want to worry about having access to electricity? Thanks to its long-lasting battery there is no need to be near a plug socket. Airmony can also be charged via a USB port, a power bank or a car cigarette lighter socket.

 

 

 

CHILDREN WITH SLEEP APNEA

    • Airmony is so easy to use that even young children can follow the treatment in a much more manageable and autonomous way, without depending on their parents as much.

    • They will also feel more comfortable without being connected to a big, bulky machine that may frighten them. This, in turn, will almost certainly improve their self-esteem and make them feel less different to other children.

    • They will be able to fall asleep more easily and have greater freedom of movement. They can even sleep comfortably snuggled up with their favorite teddy!

 

CHILDREN WITH ATTENTION DEFICIT DISORDER (ADHD)

  • Airmony can help improve children’s academic performance because correct respiration increases the oxygen supply to the brain needed to concentrate.

 

 

FAMILY

 

    • Airmony goes wherever the family goes. Its portability and operational autonomy mean that this CPAP machine can be taken anywhere without disrupting the rhythm of the family’s life and without limitations.

    • Thanks to its low acoustic level compared with conventional CPAP machines, it will not keep you or your partner awake at night.

    • And for those caring for someone with sleep apnea, Airmony will release some of the tension that can be generated by providing constant attention as the sufferer can follow the treatment with greater autonomy.

 

PEOPLE WITH ASSOCIATED CONDITIONS

  • Sleep apnea is associated with other conditions, such as Down syndrome, cerebral palsy, multiple sclerosis, Alzheimer’s or stroke. Airmony helps improve the prognosis by maintaining adequate oxygen supply to the brain.

 

DOCTORS

  • Airmony uses EHealth technology: it continuously records physiological sleep parameters, providing data that can be stored on a smartphone or tablet and sent to the doctor via Internet. In this way, doctors can monitor the treatment, adjust the necessary parameters and resend these new instructions directly to the CPAP machine to help the patient breathe even more easily.

  • The machine’s portability, design, convenience, and ease of use all make it less likely that the patient will abandon the treatment. The patient will get better and the doctor will be able to see the results.

 

 

 

HIGH-PERFORMANCE ATHLETES

  • Airmony provides correct oxygenation and helps the body to recover naturally from the physical exertion of training and competition.

WHY ARE WE ASKING FOR YOUR SUPPORT?

 

Sleep apnea is a condition that affects many people, particularly adults, but children too. The most common form of treatment is the use of CPAP machines. However, the way these machines are currently designed has a huge impact on the user's quality of life. Today’s machines are large, heavy and bulky and they restrict the users’ independence and autonomy. As a consequence, many people abandon their treatment and stop using the CPAP machine.

Airmony is an innovative CPAP machine that is small, light, comfortable and silent. It does not use an air-hose, it offers a high level of autonomy with low energy consumption, in addition to eHealth technology, which together aim to overcome the disadvantages of traditional CPAP machines. We are currently improving its design (for example, we have reduced the size of the machine by 30%), but there is still a way to go before it is perfect. For this reason, with your support we will be able to continue developing Airmony, to turn it into the breath of fresh air that many sleep apnoea sufferers all over the world have been dreaming of.

 

 

HOW ELSE CAN YOU HELP US?

 

 

You really may be interested in our project, and you would love to support us. If no financial contribution is possible, don't worry. You can also support us in other ways:

Become a fan of Airmony on Facebook or follow us on Twitter.

Spread the word among your friends and colleagues through your social networks:"Two years ago, their CEO, Jaume Palou, was preparing his holidays....." Now it's possible!!

 

TBIOM CEO Jaume Palou Telling his story:

Spread the word among your friends and colleagues through your social networks.

These pauses in respiration may reoccur between 5-30 times per hour.Apnea should be treated, as it can affect the daily life, and cause serious health problems (including high blood pressure, heart disease, stroke, diabetes or accidents at work or while driving).The most common treatment for sleep apnea is to use a CPAP (Continuous Positive Airway Pressure) machine, which keeps the user’s airways open while they sleep. AIRMONY, A REVOLUTIONARY CPAP MACHINE    Airmony is a revolutionary CPAP machine that offers superior portability, autonomy and technology. Thanks to its small size, it is perfect for both adults and children who suffer from sleep apnoea.It is also highly effective at improving rest and recuperation for high-performance athletes.And for doctors, it is a very useful tool for diagnosing, treating and monitoring patients. WHO CAN BENEFIT FROM THE SUCCESS OF AIRMONY?   TRAVELLERS
Who do not want to carry heavy equipment or check in their bags at the airport. Airmony fits easily into hand luggage.
Who do not want to worry about having access to electricity? Thanks to its long-lasting battery there is no need to be near a plug socket. Airmony can also be charged via a USB port, a power bank or a car cigarette lighter socket.
   CHILDREN WITH SLEEP APNEA
Airmony is so easy to use that even young children can follow the treatment in a much more manageable and autonomous way, without depending on their parents as much.
They will also feel more comfortable without being connected to a big, bulky machine that may frighten them. This, in turn, will almost certainly improve their self-esteem and make them feel less different to other children.
They will be able to fall asleep more easily and have greater freedom of movement. They can even sleep comfortably snuggled up with their favorite teddy!
 CHILDREN WITH ATTENTION DEFICIT DISORDER (ADHD)Airmony can help improve children’s academic performance because correct respiration increases the oxygen supply to the brain needed to concentrate.  FAMILY 
Airmony goes wherever the family goes. Its portability and operational autonomy mean that this CPAP machine can be taken anywhere without disrupting the rhythm of the family’s life and without limitations.
Thanks to its low acoustic level compared with conventional CPAP machines, it will not keep you or your partner awake at night.
And for those caring for someone with sleep apnea, Airmony will release some of the tension that can be generated by providing constant attention as the sufferer can follow the treatment with greater autonomy.
 PEOPLE WITH ASSOCIATED CONDITIONS Sleep apnea is associated with other conditions, such as Down syndrome, cerebral palsy, multiple sclerosis, Alzheimer’s or stroke. Airmony helps improve the prognosis by maintaining adequate oxygen supply to the brain. DOCTORS 
Airmony uses EHealth technology: it continuously records physiological sleep parameters, providing data that can be stored on a smartphone or tablet and sent to the doctor via Internet. In this way, doctors can monitor the treatment, adjust the necessary parameters and resend these new instructions directly to the CPAP machine to help the patient breathe even more easily.
The machine’s portability, design, convenience, and ease of use all make it less likely that the patient will abandon the treatment. The patient will get better and the doctor will be able to see the results.
   HIGH-PERFORMANCE ATHLETESAirmony provides correct oxygenation and helps the body to recover naturally from the physical exertion of training and competition.
WHY ARE WE ASKING FOR YOUR SUPPORT?  Sleep apnea is a condition that affects many people, particularly adults, but children too. The most common form of treatment is the use of CPAP machines. However, the way these machines are currently designed has a huge impact on the user's quality of life. Today’s machines are large, heavy and bulky and they restrict the users’ independence and autonomy. As a consequence, many people abandon their treatment and stop using the CPAP machine.Airmony is an innovative CPAP machine that is small, light, comfortable and silent. It does not use an air-hose, it offers a high level of autonomy with low energy consumption, in addition to eHealth technology, which together aim to overcome the disadvantages of traditional CPAP machines. We are currently improving its design (for example, we have reduced the size of the machine by 30%), but there is still a way to go before it is perfect. For this reason, with your support we will be able to continue developing Airmony, to turn it into the breath of fresh air that many sleep apnoea sufferers all over the world have been dreaming of.  HOW ELSE CAN YOU HELP US?  You really may be interested in our project, and you would love to support us. If no financial contribution is possible, don't worry. You can also support us in other ways:Become a fan of Airmony on Facebook or follow us on Twitter.Spread the word among your friends and colleagues through your social networks:"Two years ago, their CEO, Jaume Palou, was preparing his holidays....." Now it's possible!! TBIOM CEO Jaume Palou Telling his story:

story:
THE BODY LOTION ... and the story behind

This body lotion is exceptionally rich in active agents. Everything in it serves one purpose: making your skin stronger and more resistant to the damaging effects of the sun. Even its base oils are active: calendula in grape seed oil, carrot oil, mango and cocoa butter. They all care for the sun spots and moles on the skin.

I started using calendula oil on my skin when I first felt that I wanted to do something to avoid “the next preventive removal of a mole”. But I always only remembered to use it before my regular check-ups, meaning when I was scared. However, on its own calendula oil is not anything nice to use, it smells, it sticks and does not absorb perfectly. This gave me the idea to combine it with other oils and active agents, and develop a new kind of body lotion for everyday use, so now I remember to treat my sun spotted skin all year around. And so a body lotion was born which smells good, feels good, hydrates your skin and also makes your skin stronger.

This body lotion you will love to use, it will give you precious moments, besides being effective and 100% natural. After long term regular use, chances are your moles and sun spots will reduce or pale slightly - personal experience!

This product is available in 4 scents.

It doesn't have SPF factor. Always have your moles checked regularly, and if you experience anything unusual, contact your dermatologist immediately.

 

SUN CREAM

The best protection for your skin from the harmful effects of the sun. These suncreams include only mineral UV-filter, which is certified by the Food and Drug Administration* (FDA) as effective, broad-spectrum UVA and UVB filter. I used carrot oil, cocoa butter and mango butter, vitamin-E, horse chestnut extract and calendula extract as natural antioxidants to protect delicate skin. These are among the most effective ingredients. These sun creams do not make your skin feel sticky. You can apply them on your face too.

They do not include any chemical UV filter, any nano form component, added scents, added colorant. The UV filter component is not irritative and does not contain allergens. All ingredients are allowed in natural cosmetics. Check the ingredients and make sure you don’t have personal allergy for any of them.

Choose the right factor number that corresponds to your skin type and to the UV index number. Apply to body and face 20 minutes before exposure to the sun, then every 2 hours or after swimming, or even more often if you feel you need it.

How I use it:

As a morning routine, after  applying my daily face cream I put on ♥︎myskin sun cream SPF25+ and finish it with powder, and I just love the final result.

 

AFTER SUN LOTION

It feels and smells fresh, just what you need after sunbathing. It is different from the body lotion because the focus of development was on what the skin needs directly after the sun. This is a lighter formula with water soluble vitamins in higher concentration but not less active agents. Use it to soothe your skin after sun exposure.

 

BODY BUTTER

This product is a combination of butters and oil only:  mango butter, cocoa butter, shea butter, coconut oil and beeswax. You can use it as part of your daily routine body care if you prefer oil or butter instead of lotion or cream. Or on the beach as a natural tan accelerator in the morning and the late afternoon hours. It does not have SPF factor.

How I use it:

When I already have some tan, I like to put it on for the final hours of sunbathing as it nicely mixes with the SPF cream I use for the day. It gives my skin a beautiful glowing color.

 

 

PERKS

Buy single products for a great EARLY BIRD discount in limited number or if you miss this opportunity buy single products for list price, OR choose from the following  packages and reach a discount of up to 20% percent! I created many different packages so I am sure you will find your favorite one.

The Full Range Package is also available for EARLY BIRD discount, delivered in gift box. Ready to be given as a perfect present.

 

MORE...

If you want to know more about me and the milestones of the development, visit:

my facebook page

myskin facebook

myskin instagram

7 years ago...

 

useful information:

EPA-UV index scale

Melanoma prevention guidelines

 

PRODUCT TECHNICAL INFORMATION

All the ingredients are allowed in natural cosmetics, selected carefully, but because they are natural and rich in active agents, you may have personal sensitivity. Please make sure you check out the detailed list below before you apply.

No past or future animal testing of any ♥︎myskin products. Manufacturer and scientific data were used during product development.

 

INGREDIENTS OF THE PRODUCTS

BODY LOTION

water, horse chestnut extract* (aesculus hippocastanum extract, glycerin, alcohol, aqua), grape seed oil, calendula extract, carrot oil (helianthus annuus seed oil, daucus carota sativa root extract), mango butter (mangifera indica seed butter), cocoa butter(theobroma cacao seed butter*), glycerin, polyglyceryl-3 dicitrate/stearate, cetyl alcohol, squalane, ubiquinone, tocopherol/tocopheryl acetate, panthenol, hippophae rhamnoides seed oil*, acacia senegal gum and xanthan gum, benzyl alcohol, glycerin, benzoic acid, sorbic acid, schizandra sphenanthera fruit extract

  • tropical aroma/perfume**(it does not contain any allergen component)
  • lotus flower aroma/perfume**( benzyl benzoate, benzyl salicylate (less than 0,002% contained in the cream), citral, eugenol, benzyl alcohol, farnesol, isoeugenol, geraniol, limonene (less than 0,0009 % contained in the cream)
  • for men aroma/perfume**(citral, coumarin, geraniol (less than 0,0018% contained in the cream), linalool, limonene (less than 0,05 % contained in the cream), benzyl salicylate (less than 0,01% contained in the cream)
  • kids aroma/ perfume**(benzyl benzoate, benzyl cinnamate (less than 0,003% contained in the cream), limonene, linalool (less than 0,0004% contained in the cream)

*100% of ingredients are from organic farming.

**100% natural, without synthetic ingredients, free of preservatives.

WARNING! Schizandra sphenanthera fruit extract is not recommended during pregnancy, so use the  product with scent for kids, as it does not include this component.

 

SUN CREAM

mineral uv-filter component (titanium dioxide (not! in nano form), water, polyglyceryl-2 caprate, sucrose stearate, simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) seed oil, stearic acid, alumina, glyceryl caprylate, squalane), water, horse chestnut extract* (aesculus hippocastanum extract, glycerin, alcohol, aqua), carrot oil (helianthus annuus seed oil, daucus carota sativa root extract), cocoa butter(theobroma cacao seed butter*), mango butter (mangifera indica seed butter), glycerin, cetearyl alcohol, behentrimonium methosulfate, calendula officinalis flower extract, benzyl alcohol, glycerin, benzoic acid, sorbic acid, tocopherol-mixed

*100% of ingredients are from organic farming.

This product contains mineral UV-filter with titan-dioxide in a non-nano form. It creates a thin white-yellow film on the skin but does not absorb, making it perfectly safe and healthy yet providing maximum protection from the UV rays of the sun. Make sure the product is evenly distributed on the skin. 

 

AFTER SUN LOTION

water/aqua, grape seed oil, calendula extract, polyglyceryl-3 dicitrate/stearate, mangifera indica seed butter, glycerin, cetyl alcohol, hydrolyzed wheat protein, sodium benzoate, panthenol, cucumber extract (aqua, glycerin ^, cucumis sativus fruit extract *, sodium benzoate, potassium sorbate, citric acid), acacia senegal gum and xanthan gum, benzyl alcohol, glycerin, benzoic acid, sorbic acid, q10 (squalane, ubiquinone, tocopherol/tocopheryl acetate), punica granatum seed oil*, borago officinalis seed oil*, bisabolol, tocopherol-mixed

  • fresh aroma/perfume**: citral, coumarin, geraniol (less than 0,0018% contained in the cream),  linalool, limonene (less than 0,05 % contained in the cream)

*100% of ingredients are from organic farming.

**100% natural, without synthetic ingredients, free of preservatives.

 

BODY BUTTER

theobroma cacao seed butter*, cocos nucifera oil*, mangifera indica seed butter, butyrospermum parkii butter*, beeswax (cera flava)

*100% of ingredients are from organic farming.

story:
Why SheAPP?

In 2013, Kelsey Meyer, President of Influence and Co., wrote in Forbes that not only are women who create apps in the minority, but there is also a dearth of apps for women, by women. She states  specifically  "more women should be involved in the process of conceptualizing, building, marketing, and monetizing mobile apps".  Kelly’s research shows that the number one on the list women want list is...

"A fitness app that specifically caters to women, or as my co-worker described it, “doesn’t look like it was based on a men’s locker room design”

Enter SheAPP! 

Tam Williams, Founder of She’s It came to a similar conclusion from her extensive research – while there are apps for women by women in many areas of health, there are none that takes a wholistic 360° view that both combines and integrates fitness,  health and well-being that focuses on adding value to women’s lives. There are none that make the data, mostly similar with the wearables and other fitness apps, meaningful enough to keep users engaged and working on their fitness and overall well-being for the long term. As a result, Tam set out on a mission to  bring 360° Well-Being to the  market.

_______________

SheAPP  - Designed with Women in Mind

SheAPP is the  total Go-To place for 360° Well-Being for a HEALTHy WELLthy Journey.  Voice and touch opens pathways for women to design their life around increased health and well-being.  Imagine, start every day with an audio motivational to give you inspiration for whatever the day may bring.  Swipe again to read a related motivational quote and swipe once more for a tip or two for getting through the day.  You can start every day with SheAPP.

_______________

Leading SheAPP’s creation from day one, Tam Williams, Founder and President of She’s It, LLC uses her successful entrepreneurial, global-level communications, business technology, women-centered vision and laser-like focus for excellence in functionality to ensure that SheAPP is for women, by women, giving an experience unlike any other.

Everything from design, functionality and user experience was carefully researched and is threaded through the question – "what is the experience we want to provide to women that they don't currently get?"

1) Engagement with meaningful data about themselves

2) Learning what the data means and how to apply it for betterment of themselves

3) Motivation to act, share and be social about their  HEALTHy WELLthy Journey 

This allows for a collaborative yet empowering experience! Women shaping the conversation for a HEALTHy WELLthy Journey by using SheAPP.

_______________

How Does SheAPP Work?

Imagine having 3 to 8 different apps in front of you. An app for fitness. An app for health concerns. An app for food and exercise. An app for music. An app to connect with others for meetups and online socializing. An app for reminders and an app for other things you want to do. You get the picture. Alone, each app has attributes worthy of having on a journey to increase health and fitness. The caveat is that each app is different and has to be downloaded as a separate app. Now imagine, once you access those apps, they don't even talk to one another. This can be a frustrating experience!

As virtually all the women contacted in the early stages of research reported, their time and focus is very valuable!  We heard loud and clear that women want one app that includes several functions to give the most value for their time.  

SheAPP’s Got That!

_______________

 

SheAPP is The ONE APP that tracks meaningful data points for good health and overall fitness: 

Starting with Leona, you'll begin your journey collecting and curating body composition data into My Personal Body Blueprint (MPBB),  allowing you to move beyond the scale and visualize a healthier you. Through MPBB, you get more accurate data, allowing for motivation and inspiration by seeing those critical data points that apply only to your body.  The MPBB feature can also transform data into a 3D image so that you can see where your body composition lives, from top to bottom and side to side.  You can even turn your image 360°!   This optional function is for women who know they need to be healthier, and as their health changes, so does their body. *Note: 3D image is available using our Partnering resources. 

_______________

SheAPP is The ONE APP that provides one page access for you to track the foods you eat, the times that you eat and the movements you make in My Food/My Moves: 

You don't live to eat, you eat to live and you move to stay active. It's not about the label of breakfast, lunch or dinner. It's about what did you eat, at what time and the caloric intake versus when you moved, how much you moved and how much did you burn over your intake of food. Did you get enough of the suggested and recommended food groups by the USDA? Over the weeks and months, you will see how your foods, your times and your movements (aka exercise), connect in ways that are meaningful for your best fitness and health. It's all about meaningful data!

Have wearables?  No problem!!  My Food/My Moves also captures relevant data from yor wearable syncs to give you another look into your HEALTHy WELLthy Journey. 

_______________

SheAPP is The ONE APP that connects you full circle with others in 15+ areas that matter to you on your HEALTHy WELLthy Journey: 

My Communities wants you to get social by connecting you locally and around the world!  Just imagine -   SheAPP Meetups on topics and concerns that matter to you and others across the globe! SheAPP Fitness,  Health and Inspiration challenges!  SheAPP Kindness and Compassion Challenges!  SheAPP Support Groups!  The possibilities are endless. 

______________

SheAPP is The ONE APP that connects you to thoughtful and engaging ELM (Engage, Learn, Motivate) Conversations:

Innovative articles in 15 conversation channels that matter most to women for overall Well-Being:  Aging, Eating, Education, Family, Fitness, Happiness, Health, Human Rights, Inspiration, Kindness, Pay-It-Forward, Relationships, Spirituality, Well-Being, and Work. These conversations are driven by the data trends from our members, ensuring that the topics are relevant and relatable to our audience. It's meaningful learning that applies directly or indirectly to you and your HEALTHy WELLthy Journey.

Using our data analysis tools, My ELM Conversations ALSO provides compelling articles based on what is most relevant for you. 

_______________

SheAPP is The ONE APP that connects you to Entertainment that offers an exciting array of music, fitness videos; motivational podcasts and more:

Through SheAPP you get entertainment that both soothes and motivates you to persevere in your HEALTHy WELLthy Journey. Access to over 100 music channels opens the  path to well-being through  a comprehensive selection of music. Exercise videos offer a vast array of possible moves and grooves to up your fitness game for a healthier lifestyle. Motivational podcasts and images support you when the going gets rough. SheAPP Entertainment provides an experience that's meaningful for you on your HEALTHy WELLthy Journey.

_______________

SheAPP is The ONE APP that is a  touchstone  to every feature in the ultimate SheAPP experience. 

My Planner is designed so that you  can both schedule and be reminded by voice, vibration and/or visual of your MPBB tracking; My Food/My Moves; My Communities; My ELMs and My Entertainment. When do you want to hear music…. in the background of your exercise program, or at mealtime? Your voice will schedule and your planner assistant will remind you.

_______________

360° Well-Being for a HEALTHY WELLTHY Journey.

 

SheAPP is NOT 3 apps, NOT4 apps, NOT 5 apps, and NOT 6 apps – it’s One APP. No need to go outside SheAPP to engage, learn and be motivated to begin your HEALTHy, WELLthy Journey!  

SheAPP's Got ALL That!

_______________

SheAPP is a native app that is truly a game changer!  

SheAPP is a game changer because it connects to the lives, stories and aspriations of women and girls on their journeys to living a more healthy and wellthy life. By focusing on three crucial areas of health and well-being, SheAPP is the first app that takes women from their bodies, to their lives, their families and communities and their worlds, back again to their bodies. 

1.  Body Composition:  With the plethora of concerns with body image among women, SheAPP is taking a proactive approach.   Body composition gives information about the overall body’s status of  health respect to percentages of fat vs lean muscle mass.  What will become evident and a learning curve for women and girls is that what counts is what is on the inside… not on the outside.   Our mission is for SheAPP to distill the shame associated with body image and turn the focus to a healthy wellthy mindset starting with an internally healthy body. My Food/Moves is an integral part of  body composition, as is the capacity to document one's eating and move activities through My Planner.

2. Conversations ELM:  We know that one's mindset is so critical to well-being. SheAPP acknowledges this by providing crucial avenues for women to engage, learn and be motivated  in areas that matter to them!  Both My Communities and My ELMs support women in this by connecting them wth women around the world  who are concerned and care about the same areas, from Aging to Work. 

3. Data:  Data is the linchpin that links and supports each feature! Data by itself is just data!  However, data becomes meaningful when it helps to shape conversations women and girls have about their bodies and their lives. The data from each feature of SheAPP builds an overall picture of the member with patterns and trends they can then engage, learn and be motivated to act upon. It’s one thing to know when you’ve hit a certain goal with steps. It’s quite another to be able to act upon a multitude of data that motivates you to move beyond the scale. 

Through voice, touch and vibration, SheAPP integrates and connects each feature of SheAPP thus enabling members to visualize and act on not just their fitness/health levels but rather on the total 360°Well-Being experience. 

_______________

The Need for SheAPP

A. Health and Fitness Concerns: The Importance of Body Composition Data

Th utility patent pending My Personal Body Blueprint is SheAPP’s innovative approach to  individual access to one’s body composition data, data that is now recognized to lowering health-related costs and increasing healthy behaviors.

Part 1:  During the research phase of SheAPP, research in medical and exercise/fitness journals consistently cite how the concept of health has developed from a concern of weight, height and body mass index (BMI) to a comprehensive understanding of the importance of  “body composition”.  Simply stepping on a scale and measuring your weight unfortunately is not an indicator of your quality of health. Body composition is more than weight. Body composition is the analysis that distinguishes between pounds that come from body fat and lean body mass, water or muscle. A body composition within the recommended range of body fat and lean body mass suggests less risk of developing obesity-related diseases such as diabetes, high blood pressure, and even some cancers. Simply put, any serious digital devices designed to support overall health towards improving quality of life needs to include body composition data.

The research phase also uncovered that this type of data about one’s body health is primarily available in doctor’s offices, physical therapy/other rehabilitation-focused offices, or high-end fitness centers.  These analyses can be quite costly and used primarily when an individual is already at significant health risk due to disease, condition or injury.  High-level performance athletes also access this type of health information to monitor their status relative to the performance anticipated in the specific activity/sport.   

Rather, when this kind of data is made available on a mobile device as in our SheAPP,  it allows users to track changes in real time when engaging in healthier behaviors.  Data then changes from a static measurement to a dynamic mirror for choice and decision-making. Data is then owned.

As a woman, Tam knows the history of body image and has struggled with health, fitness, and wellness issues for many years. Carol has also had her issues with her body and knows just how society’s images of what constitutes an “appropriate” body is not only outdated, its degrading and shaming of women.   SheAPP wants to distill the shame associated with body image and turn the focus to a healthy mindset starting with an internally healthy body.

SheAPP is a welcome addition to the health/fitness/well-being app market!

SheAPP’s Got This!

_______________

B. Behavioral Change Attributes

SheAPP is designed to work with the widespread consensus that successful intervention design demands a user-centered and iterative approach to development, using mixed methods to progressively refine the intervention to meet user requirements.  

SheAPP, in this first iteration, is planning a comprehensive beta test from women who are advocates and/or early adaptors to provide both qualitative and quantitative feedback for future design iterations.  This feedback will assist us to move the needle from increasing engagement to increasing “effective” engagement...engagement with the features of SheAPP to achieve intended healthy wellthy outcomes.  That is our ultimate goal.

This being said, SheAPP is based on a conception of 360° of Well-Being.   Well-being in our mind is a continuing process of Engagement, Learning and Motivation for effective engagement in one's life and the world.  SheAPP not only uses regular attributes other apps use to support user engagement, the integration of six apps allows us to significantly expand ways to  more effectively engage women on thir healthy wellthy journey.  Included in SheAPP are planned social supports and opportunities for social comparison, as well as informational and educational premier content designed to help women expand their understanding not only of their bodies but also how other areas such as Kindness and Inspiration contribute to their 360° Well-Being. Members will also be able to suggest additional content as their needs and understandings changes.  All this from our considerable research (including the linked article) in how to create apps that have the most beneficial changes in behaviors !  

No other health/fitness/well-being app on the market offers and integrates  this many ways to significantly engage women in their journey to a healthier lifestyle. And it's only the beginning!

SheAPP’s Got This! 

______________

Tam's and Carol's Story

The SheAPP is a signature product of She’s It, LLC, a company that Tam Williams, President and Founder, began in her home at the same time she was head of global education and corporate communications for an international technology firm. Tam knows the benefits of a healthy lifestyle, having run in several half- marathons. She’s It began from her vision to help women lead a healthy lifestyle because, as she was experiencing negative effects of stress on her body, mind and heart, she also knew too many women in similar circumstances.  The more intense the stress became in her corporate world; the more convinced Tam was that her vision was needed.

Then it happened – let go but as Tam says, fired at 55, and Tam was angry, shocked, and scared. Even though Tam knew She’s It held the answer for her vision, she was never quite ready to give up the status and income of her corporate job. When the hammer dropped, she knew it was time… time to take She’s It to the next level and begin the painstaking process of building the company and creating SheAPP from blueprint designs and beginning formulations to a real product.  

Tam was in the same situation of many of the women she wanted to help; 55 years old, suddenly unemployed, and in compromised health. Being both a black woman and planning to bring a technology product to market based on a vision, Tam had already overcome significant obstacles just to arrive at this place. Tam originally became an entrepreneur after fleeing to the west coast with her young children in tow, to put 3,000 miles between them and an abusive spouse. The obstacles she endured gave her the experience she needed to become not only a successful business woman, but, also a strong advocate for women, minorities and small business.  As a media unknown, Tam overcame insurmountable odds by producing shows on Talk Radio Row at both the 2004 Democratic National Convention and the 2004 Republican National Convention.  It was her intelligence, energy and entrepreneurial success that opened the doors to the corporate world that then decided she didn’t fit because of her advocacy for people and a willingness to speak up.

But this time the move to fulltime business owner was different. While Tam was in the throes of getting back to her vision, she knew she didn’t want to take this journey alone. Tam then met Dr. Carol Pate, a former college professor in teacher education who also in her fifties was found “not fit” after 11 years in her position as Department Chair with  over 6M in grant funding to her department to bring a vision of educational excellence for urban teaching to life.

Carol was no stranger to overcoming obstacles having left home in high school for her own safety. Finishing high school and then funding her own way to college, she moved from the southwest to the midwest and then to Philadelphia while working and continuing her education. It was the 2016 election and the ensuing Women’s March in January of 2017 that led Carol to understand that her 30+ year mission of helping those who were left out  of society not only included women but, in 2017, women needed to be her focus. 

Tam’s successful global-level communications and business technology experiences, women-centered vision and laser-like focus for excellence in functionality shapes the SheAPP!  Everything from design, functionality and user experience is threaded through women’s needs and desires.  Carol’s vision and experience for what is possible to shape conversations leads the development of the content media piece. The SheAPP now has double the energy, determination, focus and drive through Tam and Carol to help further women’s engagement, learning and motivation to 360° well-being.  

_______________

Why Is This Campaign Important?  The Impact​ of Your Support!

The SheAPP campaign is raising awareness and increasing effective engagement by and for women in their Healthy Wellthy Journey towards 360° of well-being. We are on a mission to involve women all over the world in their own individual journey to a healthier lifestyle, one woman and one girl at a time! 

We believe that effective engagement with the SheAPP will shape the conversation women have about their health, fitness and well-being from “no time for this” to “I need all of this” for my Healthy Wellthy Journey. 

Every women needs to know and experience that it is good that “Everybody is different, and every “BODY” is different.  We believe that engagement with the SheAPP  will move the conversation women have about what they look like on the outside to how healthy they are on the inside! 

Every woman needs to have the right to how they see their body, their data and their lives.  We believe that engagement with the SheAPP will shape the conversation so every woman will proudly proclaim My Body, My Data, My Life! It’s time for women to take more charge of how they see, feel, care and say about THEIR bodies!

We need support to continue the development of SheAPP to its first full iteration.  At this juncture, SheAPP has been self-funded to complete the MPBB and My Food/Moves features.

As you can imagine – creating a native app is one of the most complicated and comprehensive processes requiring a laser-like focus on user experience.

We need support to continue this painstaking and thorough development so that women everywhere  will truly benefit from our work.  We want nothing better than to have thousands, if not millions  of women to be a part of our critical development and beta testing. 

We know that feedback and ideas from more women will make it even better – for all women to effectively engage in 360° Well-Being!

 

Help fund this FIRST comprehensive health/fitness/well-being app designed for and by women.  

_______________

 

The magnitude of what YOU contribute to help SheAPP come to life!

SheAPP is a total game changer that is integrative, supportive and designed with women in mind. Women using SheAPP will be so amazed at what is possible for them – ALL IN ONE PLACE! 

Imagine being part of the history this SheAPP is making –  help us bring the first version of the SheAPP product to market in December of 2017!  

The first comprehensive health/fitness/wellness app designed by and for women!

The first app that knows and supports Every body is different; every “BODY” is different!

This app will be the first of its kind, and now more than ever, it needs to exist.

________________

What We Need & What You Get

 

  • Funding in the amount of $40,000 is needed to complete the next iteration of features for  SheAPP  1.0 to be delivered to market in December of 2017.  This includes all user interface and coding for top performance functionality. 

 

  • Our first stretch goal of $60,000 will allow us to continue SheAPP on other platforms including syncing integration.  The sooner we reach our stretch goal, the sooner we can begin. We don’t want to leave any women out of this opportunity because of wearable loyalty!   

 

  • Our second stretch goal of $90,000.00 will ensure that SheAPP is on track for proposed feature implementations for 2018 including SheAPP 1.1.

Please consider backing this and helping us have the possibility.

Here is the timeline for the SheAPP:

_______________

FAQ's

Will SheAPP be available on different mobile devices?

Yes! SheAPP  will be available across on iOS and Android mobile devices. Reaching our challenge goals as early as possible will significantly impact the health of women across the globe. 

What if I have a wearable such as Fitbit?

A wearable isn't needed to use and be a SheAPP member. However, we will be syncing our data with the following wearable devices: FitBit, Apple Health, Garmin, MisFit, Samsung. 

Do I have to have machine-generated body composition data to use SheAPP?

No. While that is the optimal way to use the My Personal Body Blueprint feature, it's not the only way. You can input your information to use the feature manually until you are able to access the machine generated composition data.

I am a Personal Trainer. Can I use SheAPP with my clients?

Yes! As long as you both use SheAPP, you can set up a personal community with individual and group clients. But...since we are HIPAA compliant, only your client can give you access to their MPBB information which is done through our She's It and SheAPP privacy protocol.

How Can I See my 3D image?

If you have participated in a scan, your 3D image will show in the My Personal Body Blueprint feature of SheAPP.

Is SheAPP in the App Store now?

No, SheAPP is currently development going through rigorous testing. We have the agreements and business processes in place so that once SheAPP is ready, you will be able to download directly from the  iTunes, Google Play and Amazon!

Will SheAPP be available around the world ?

Yes. SheAPP will be available around the globe. 

My Company should use this. Is SheAPP available for corporations?

Yes. We have SheAPP Corporate! A full wellness program that provides your employees with an integrated approach to health and wellness. 

Risks and Challenges 

The risks are that the world's women  won't have a chance to recieve this and they will continue to have a fragmented system not contributing to any meaningful 360° well-being! This is your chance to participate in a real-time creation of a fitness/health/wellness SheAPP "for women by women"! 

Our company will be challenged with creating an infrastructrue to fully support the explosion we are anticipating as women begin to see the real-time benefts of SheAPP!  We are continually seeking the best advice and supports for continual adaptation and support of the SheAPP. 

Other Ways Women Can Help!

We know that not every woman who hears of this and reads the campaign can afford to contribute.  Even for those who can contribute at whatever level, we ask ALL OF YOU with deep appreciation to get the word out to all your friends, family members and colleagues to make some noise about our SheAPP campaign! 

 Please use the Indiegogo share tools found on this site so your enthusiasm will have a direct link to  the SheAPP campaign! 

 

Thank you, Thank you, Thank you

Tam and Carol
story_txt:
Why SheAPP?
In 2013, Kelsey Meyer, President of Influence and Co., wrote in Forbes that not only are women who create apps in the minority, but there is also a dearth of apps for women, by women. She states  specifically  "more women should be involved in the process of conceptualizing, building, marketing, and monetizing mobile apps".  Kelly’s research shows that the number one on the list women want list is...
"A fitness app that specifically caters to women, or as my co-worker described it, “doesn’t look like it was based on a men’s locker room design”
Enter SheAPP! 
Tam Williams, Founder of She’s It came to a similar conclusion from her extensive research – while there are apps for women by women in many areas of health, there are none that takes a wholistic 360° view that both combines and integrates fitness,  health and well-being that focuses on adding value to women’s lives. There are none that make the data, mostly similar with the wearables and other fitness apps, meaningful enough to keep users engaged and working on their fitness and overall well-being for the long term. As a result, Tam set out on a mission to  bring 360° Well-Being to the  market.
_______________
SheAPP  - Designed with Women in Mind

SheAPP is the  total Go-To place for 360° Well-Being for a HEALTHy WELLthy Journey.  Voice and touch opens pathways for women to design their life around increased health and well-being.  Imagine, start every day with an audio motivational to give you inspiration for whatever the day may bring.  Swipe again to read a related motivational quote and swipe once more for a tip or two for getting through the day.  You can start every day with SheAPP.
_______________
Leading SheAPP’s creation from day one, Tam Williams, Founder and President of She’s It, LLC uses her successful entrepreneurial, global-level communications, business technology, women-centered vision and laser-like focus for excellence in functionality to ensure that SheAPP is for women, by women, giving an experience unlike any other.

Everything from design, functionality and user experience was carefully researched and is threaded through the question – "what is the experience we want to provide to women that they don't currently get?"
1) Engagement with meaningful data about themselves
2) Learning what the data means and how to apply it for betterment of themselves
3) Motivation to act, share and be social about their  HEALTHy WELLthy Journey 
This allows for a collaborative yet empowering experience! Women shaping the conversation for a HEALTHy WELLthy Journey by using SheAPP.
_______________
How Does SheAPP Work?

Imagine having 3 to 8 different apps in front of you. An app for fitness. An app for health concerns. An app for food and exercise. An app for music. An app to connect with others for meetups and online socializing. An app for reminders and an app for other things you want to do. You get the picture. Alone, each app has attributes worthy of having on a journey to increase health and fitness. The caveat is that each app is different and has to be downloaded as a separate app. Now imagine, once you access those apps, they don't even talk to one another. This can be a frustrating experience!
As virtually all the women contacted in the early stages of research reported, their time and focus is very valuable!  We heard loud and clear that women want one app that includes several functions to give the most value for their time.  
SheAPP’s Got That!

_______________
 
SheAPP is The ONE APP that tracks meaningful data points for good health and overall fitness: 

Starting with Leona, you'll begin your journey collecting and curating body composition data into My Personal Body Blueprint (MPBB),  allowing you to move beyond the scale and visualize a healthier you. Through MPBB, you get more accurate data, allowing for motivation and inspiration by seeing those critical data points that apply only to your body.  The MPBB feature can also transform data into a 3D image so that you can see where your body composition lives, from top to bottom and side to side.  You can even turn your image 360°!   This optional function is for women who know they need to be healthier, and as their health changes, so does their body. *Note: 3D image is available using our Partnering resources. 
_______________
SheAPP is The ONE APP that provides one page access for you to track the foods you eat, the times that you eat and the movements you make in My Food/My Moves: 

You don't live to eat, you eat to live and you move to stay active. It's not about the label of breakfast, lunch or dinner. It's about what did you eat, at what time and the caloric intake versus when you moved, how much you moved and how much did you burn over your intake of food. Did you get enough of the suggested and recommended food groups by the USDA? Over the weeks and months, you will see how your foods, your times and your movements (aka exercise), connect in ways that are meaningful for your best fitness and health. It's all about meaningful data!
Have wearables?  No problem!!  My Food/My Moves also captures relevant data from yor wearable syncs to give you another look into your HEALTHy WELLthy Journey. 
_______________
SheAPP is The ONE APP that connects you full circle with others in 15+ areas that matter to you on your HEALTHy WELLthy Journey: 
My Communities wants you to get social by connecting you locally and around the world!  Just imagine -   SheAPP Meetups on topics and concerns that matter to you and others across the globe! SheAPP Fitness,  Health and Inspiration challenges!  SheAPP Kindness and Compassion Challenges!  SheAPP Support Groups!  The possibilities are endless. 
______________
SheAPP is The ONE APP that connects you to thoughtful and engaging ELM (Engage, Learn, Motivate) Conversations:
Innovative articles in 15 conversation channels that matter most to women for overall Well-Being:  Aging, Eating, Education, Family, Fitness, Happiness, Health, Human Rights, Inspiration, Kindness, Pay-It-Forward, Relationships, Spirituality, Well-Being, and Work. These conversations are driven by the data trends from our members, ensuring that the topics are relevant and relatable to our audience. It's meaningful learning that applies directly or indirectly to you and your HEALTHy WELLthy Journey.
Using our data analysis tools, My ELM Conversations ALSO provides compelling articles based on what is most relevant for you. 
_______________
SheAPP is The ONE APP that connects you to Entertainment that offers an exciting array of music, fitness videos; motivational podcasts and more:
Through SheAPP you get entertainment that both soothes and motivates you to persevere in your HEALTHy WELLthy Journey. Access to over 100 music channels opens the  path to well-being through  a comprehensive selection of music. Exercise videos offer a vast array of possible moves and grooves to up your fitness game for a healthier lifestyle. Motivational podcasts and images support you when the going gets rough. SheAPP Entertainment provides an experience that's meaningful for you on your HEALTHy WELLthy Journey.
_______________
SheAPP is The ONE APP that is a  touchstone  to every feature in the ultimate SheAPP experience.  

My Planner is designed so that you  can both schedule and be reminded by voice, vibration and/or visual of your MPBB tracking; My Food/My Moves; My Communities; My ELMs and My Entertainment. When do you want to hear music…. in the background of your exercise program, or at mealtime? Your voice will schedule and your planner assistant will remind you.
_______________

360° Well-Being for a HEALTHY WELLTHY Journey.
 
SheAPP is NOT 3 apps, NOT4 apps, NOT 5 apps, and NOT 6 apps – it’s One APP. No need to go outside SheAPP to engage, learn and be motivated to begin your HEALTHy, WELLthy Journey!  
SheAPP's Got ALL That!
_______________
SheAPP is a native app that is truly a game changer!  

SheAPP is a game changer because it connects to the lives, stories and aspriations of women and girls on their journeys to living a more healthy and wellthy life. By focusing on three crucial areas of health and well-being, SheAPP is the first app that takes women from their bodies, to their lives, their families and communities and their worlds, back again to their bodies. 
1.  Body Composition:  With the plethora of concerns with body image among women, SheAPP is taking a proactive approach.   Body composition gives information about the overall body’s status of  health respect to percentages of fat vs lean muscle mass.  What will become evident and a learning curve for women and girls is that what counts is what is on the inside… not on the outside.   Our mission is for SheAPP to distill the shame associated with body image and turn the focus to a healthy wellthy mindset starting with an internally healthy body. My Food/Moves is an integral part of  body composition, as is the capacity to document one's eating and move activities through My Planner.
2. Conversations ELM:  We know that one's mindset is so critical to well-being. SheAPP acknowledges this by providing crucial avenues for women to engage, learn and be motivated  in areas that matter to them!  Both My Communities and My ELMs support women in this by connecting them wth women around the world  who are concerned and care about the same areas, from Aging to Work. 
3. Data:  Data is the linchpin that links and supports each feature! Data by itself is just data!  However, data becomes meaningful when it helps to shape conversations women and girls have about their bodies and their lives. The data from each feature of SheAPP builds an overall picture of the member with patterns and trends they can then engage, learn and be motivated to act upon. It’s one thing to know when you’ve hit a certain goal with steps. It’s quite another to be able to act upon a multitude of data that motivates you to move beyond the scale. 
Through voice, touch and vibration, SheAPP integrates and connects each feature of SheAPP thus enabling members to visualize and act on not just their fitness/health levels but rather on the total 360°Well-Being experience.

What We Need & What You Get

 

Funding in the amount of $40,000 is needed to complete the next iteration of features for  SheAPP  1.0 to be delivered to market in December of 2017.  This includes all user interface and coding for top performance functionality. 
 

Our first stretch goal of $60,000 will allow us to continue SheAPP on other platforms including syncing integration.  The sooner we reach our stretch goal, the sooner we can begin. We don’t want to leave any women out of this opportunity because of wearable loyalty!   
 
Our second stretch goal of $90,000.00 will ensure that SheAPP is on track for proposed feature implementations for 2018 including SheAPP 1.1. 
Please consider backing this and helping us have the possibility.
Here is the timeline for the SheAPP:

_______________
FAQ's
Will SheAPP be available on different mobile devices?
Yes! SheAPP  will be available across on iOS and Android mobile devices. Reaching our challenge goals as early as possible will significantly impact the health of women across the globe. 
What if I have a wearable such as Fitbit?
A wearable isn't needed to use and be a SheAPP member. However, we will be syncing our data with the following wearable devices: FitBit, Apple Health, Garmin, MisFit, Samsung. 
Do I have to have machine-generated body composition data to use SheAPP?
No. While that is the optimal way to use the My Personal Body Blueprint feature, it's not the only way. You can input your information to use the feature manually until you are able to access the machine generated composition data.
I am a Personal Trainer. Can I use SheAPP with my clients?
Yes! As long as you both use SheAPP, you can set up a personal community with individual and group clients. But...since we are HIPAA compliant, only your client can give you access to their MPBB information which is done through our She's It and SheAPP privacy protocol.
How Can I See my 3D image?
If you have participated in a scan, your 3D image will show in the My Personal Body Blueprint feature of SheAPP.
Is SheAPP in the App Store now?
No, SheAPP is currently development going through rigorous testing. We have the agreements and business processes in place so that once SheAPP is ready, you will be able to download directly from the  iTunes, Google Play and Amazon!
Will SheAPP be available around the world ?
Yes. SheAPP will be available around the globe. 
My Company should use this. Is SheAPP available for corporations?
Yes. We have SheAPP Corporate! A full wellness program that provides your employees with an integrated approach to health and wellness. 
Risks and Challenges 

The risks are that the world's women  won't have a chance to recieve this and they will continue to have a fragmented system not contributing to any meaningful 360° well-being! This is your chance to participate in a real-time creation of a fitness/health/wellness SheAPP "for women by women"! 
Our company will be challenged with creating an infrastructrue to fully support the explosion we are anticipating as women begin to see the real-time benefts of SheAPP!  We are continually seeking the best advice and supports for continual adaptation and support of the SheAPP. 
Other Ways Women Can Help!

We know that not every woman who hears of this and reads the campaign can afford to contribute.  Even for those who can contribute at whatever level, we ask ALL OF YOU with deep appreciation to get the word out to all your friends, family members and colleagues to make some noise about our SheAPP campaign! 
 Please use the Indiegogo share tools found on this site so your enthusiasm will have a direct link to  the SheAPP campaign! 
 
Thank you, Thank you, Thank you 
Tam and Carol

story:
Congratulations !!!

 

YUNMAI 2 SMART SCALE have won an iF DESIGN AWARD 2017 ( Design Oscar ) !!!

YUNMAI Technology Co ., Ltd was a winner of this year’s iF DESIGN AWARD, a world-renowned design prize. The winning product, YUNMAI 2 , won in the discipline Product, in the 1.19 Medicine/Health/Care category. Each year, Germany’s oldest independent design organization, Hannover-based iF International Forum Design GmbH, organizes the iF DESIGN AWARD.

YUNMAI 2 smart scale won over the 58-member jury, made up of independent experts from all over the world, with its spherical padsaccurately weigh disproportional standing design. The competition was intense: over 5,500 entries were submitted from 59 countries in hopes of receiving the seal of quality.

 

Low frequency ( less than 10kHz) to cell sap

High frequency (50kHz) to cell nucleus

story:
Hi friends,

I invite you to be part of the next biggest App. We all know we need to relax right? But who has the time?
Then if you DO have 5 minutes, what do you do?
I'm creating, with your help, an App to cover all your bases. 
I wish I had this App when my life was crap. I wish I had the daily reminders to take care of my own body before it all crumbled in on itself.
Can I tell you a little story about why I want to create this App?
This is me.
I have had so many stress related stomach operations, the doctors can't operate anymore. I have changed my job, lifestyle and mindset to create a peaceful place in my mind and body, to be relaxed and, mostly, stress-free, thus keeping me out of a hospital and off pain medication. 
I now help people who have been touched by cancer and their families. 
Since I have been doing this, I have recognised that stress plays a huge role in recovery and prevention. I don't want to add financial stress to these families, so I have started creating  passive income streams to support my family, so I can go out and help cancer patients and their families at a low cost.
Do I have a marketing background? No.
Do I have government/corporation support? No.
Do I have an awesome team besides me? No.
Am I working around making meals, school drop off's and pick up's, homework, cleaning, cooking, self-learning? Yes.
So this campaign may not be as professional as some, but it's real. 
It's just me, sitting at my laptop, listening to my kids watching TV, in my loungeroom, asking for your support.
What is this App?
Once you have helped fund this App development, you may never know how many people you have personally helped, in so many ways.
Firstly, the App is for adults and children. It will have simple, easy Yoga stretches that can be done anywhere, even a plane or a desk. Yoga has been scientifically proven to help lower stress levels and is gentle enough that anyone can do it. (I am a qualified Yoga/Mindfulness/Meditation teacher with 10 years experience.)
It will have meditations for children and adults. Meditation regulates the blood pressure, lowers the heart rate and helps with anxiety and depression. (I am a school teacher and a Mum, and I know how anxious our little people get.)
It will have reminders during the day to access whether you can relax and be more mindful. Being mindful though-out your day creates more space in your life to be fully present and enjoy the life you are living. (When I teach mindfulness to cancer patients, they always say they need a reminder during the day.)
It will be continually updated with the latest material available for the next 2 years.
What's different about this App?
Nowhere else can you download Yoga stretches to do on an airplane to prevent Deep Vein Thrombosis, with an alarm set into the App to remind you to stretch during the flight.
Nowhere else can you download Yoga poses created by a Yoga instructor specialising in breast cancer therapy, especially for breast cancer recovery.
Nowhere else can you get Yoga poses, meditations, mindfulness alerts, anxiety relief and Emotional Freedom Technique (EFT) all in one convenient package.
Nowhere else caters for adults AND children in the one App.
Nowhere else will you find content designed by an experienced school teacher, a 500 Hr experienced Yoga/meditation/mindfulness teacher, an experienced Yoga specialist for cancer recovery.
Why should I support this App?
Above is how you will impact through the App, but...
Secondly, you will allow me to be able to help more people touched by cancer through my workshops and retreats, online and off. You may never know who you have impacted, but I can guarantee, they will be continually grateful. 
Your funding will go into the management fees, the development costs, the insurance, any tweaks to make it awesome and user-friendly, and the continual creation of more content. 
Do I get anything for supporting this App?
Have you checked out the perks for your funding yet?
I wonder who is going to get to name it and what it's going to be called?
If the goal isn't reached, I will make an App that is very basic, until I can raise the funds to make it really awesome. 
I have changed all of the payments for my digital products to be transferred to here. So if you would like to take a course and contribute to the fundraising this way feel free to check out:
Beginners Meditation,
Beginners Mindfulness,
Beginners Yoga,
Teach your body to sleep,
Beyond the poses - Yogic philosophy,
Emotional Freedom Technique to release fear,
Anxiety relief for children,
and a few more to come.
These are being released as they are finalised, check them out here: 
Victoria's Place Online
Has it started yet?
The design team are onto it and I have already spent hundreds of hours compiling the content. 
I have used professional editors, recording studios, illustrators, technology designers and App creators to make sure all of the content is really great.
If you are like me, and currently don't have too much cashola to spare, you can still help in a HUGE way. Indiegogo has made it really easy to 'share' this page, and social media is one of the best ways to get the word out there. 
Let's start a 'relaxation movement' together! 
How cool would it be to have as many people as we can cool, calm and collected? 
I know we can do it!
Can I say a huge 'thank you' for listening to my story? I'm already touched that you have read this far.
With love and light,
Victoria xx
Feel free to stalk me to see if I'm genuine on my Facebook page;
https://www.facebook.com/victoriasplaceonline/

story:
Why?

First, we would like to thank you for coming this far. Your interest in Parkour as a discipline and community is enough support for us. 

  • By "We" I mean the PPK Team. We started as just 4 dedicated visionaries and have grown to over 40 trusted die hard Certified Instructors, Administrators, & Interns.
  • We are GROWING to meet the demand of our amazing supporters; expanding into the Philadelphia area with our 4th location.
  • Exactly 6 years ago we taught our first Parkour class in South Jersey as the first facility on the entire EAST COAST dedicated to Parkour. Since then we've expanded into three massive playgrounds of awesomeness (Washington Township NJ, Cherry Hill NJ, and Princeton NJ)...and now we're coming to make history in historical Philadelphia! Oh and by the way, PPK Philly will be our FLAGSHIP gym, doubling the size of our other locations at a massive 11,000 square feet of RIDICULOUSNESS. 

Keep reading for details on what's in it for you! 

What's in it for me? 

Contribution details: 

  • FIRST, without a doubt, the best thing about contributing now is the incredible membership discounts you'll be receiving by signing up during the pre-sale (these prices WILL NOT be available after the closing of this campaign). 
  • We are on a mission to raise $20,000 for the NEW facility. The more money we raise the more awesome stuff we're going to put in the gym! 
  • Not only will you be receiving direct perks (listed below) but you will be helping us create a bigger, safer, and more creative environment for you and your little ones to learn, play, and grow as healthy people.
  • Specifically: we will be getting a GIANT FOAM PIT, BAR SETUP, WARPED WALLS, AND OTHER FUN PARKOUR & NINJA OBSTACLES. 

I have no money but I want to help! 

No money? No problem! Here's what you CAN DO:

  • You can share this link to others that you think might benefit from contributing during the pre-sale. 
  • You can help us transport, and organize stuff as well as build and paint new stuff at the new place. Connect with us at team@ppkacademy.com
  • And you can be helpful by telling others that Pinnacle Parkour is about inspiring people through movement. We want to change lives, help families get healthy, and get kids into a positive and uplifting lifestyle. 

Thank you again, we could not have done it without you.
