story:
Short Summary

    Nancy Pohlman and her husband are horse owners, committed to their horses health and well being. They have owned and cared for horses for over ten years. She started by rescuing five wild Mustangs from the lands of the Navajo Nation in Northern Arizona.  Eventually she went into breeding and training professional reining horses on a small ranch in Camp Verde Arizona.

    Nancy, age 72, who is also experiencing arthritis, has challenges with feeding her artheritic horses the prescribed pills they really need. While there are products for feeding medications for dogs and cats, there are none for horses until now. Nancy Pohlman spent nine months developing a solution to the problem of feeding horses pill medications, what she created is Horse Pill Carriers(TM). This product replaces the need to daily syringe pill and paste medications to horses. 

    The product has proved its worth with World Champion, working cow horse professionals, Kevin and Karen Stallings. Many horses in their care recieve daily oral medications for various conditions. Feeding these medications is time consuming and challenging, as often the horses will spit the expensive medications onto the ground. Horse Pill Carriers(TM) turns medicating your horse into giving them a treat. The pill does not fall out of Horse Pill Carriers(TM) and tastes great to horses. Now Karen and Kevin exclusively use Horse Pill Carriers(TM). 

  There are over Five Million pills perscribed by Veterinarins monthly for horses in the U.S. alone. Nancy has created a company, Ranch 707 LLC which manufactures Horse Pill Carriers(TM) to aid in feeding these oral medications to horses. She has since then realized she needs more funding to increase manufacturing. Your help will allow Ranch 707 LLC to fulfill this need.

   The funding will go directly into improving the companys manufacturing capability and supplying more local jobs. We all love our horses, and taking care of them is our first priority. 

The Impact

Contributing to this campaign will help to support a growing small business here in the U.S. and create more local jobs. This product also revolutionizes the way horses are given oral medications.  

Risks & Challenges

 We have a limited poduction capability at the moment. There is a growing demand for our products that we are having difficulty meeting at our current rate of production. 

 We thank you for your support, and the horses thank you.

story:
As seen in:

       

OUR STORY

JUST OUTSIDE THE DOORS OF THE ENDEAVOR SPORTS PERFORMANCE OFFICES ARE THE SIGHTS, SOUNDS AND SMELLS OF ATHLETES HARD AT WORK TRAINING TO BE BETTER PREPARED TO ACHIEVE THEIR INDIVIDUAL AND TEAM GOALS IN ANY GIVEN SPORT.

WE FELT A RESPONSIBILITY AND NEED TO STEP OUTSIDE THE OFFICES. STUDY THE ATHLETES MOVEMENTS, SWEAT PATTERNS AND PREFERENCES TO FIND INSPIRATION TO BETTER HELP THESE ATHLETES.

THE ANSWER WAS TO DESIGN AND DEVELOP APPAREL THAT HELPED THESE ATHLETES ELIMINATE DISTRACTIONS AND ALLOW THEM TO FOCUS ON THE WORK AT HAND.

THIS INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN WILL ALLOW US TO GO INTO FULL PRODUCTION AND DELIVER THESE INNOVATIVE GARMENTS TO ATHLETES AND CHANGE THE PRACTICE OF WEARING MASS-PRODUCED, CHEAP QUALITY, ILL-FITTING SPORTSWEAR TO WEARING PURPOSEFULLY DESIGNED PRODUCT FOR EFFECTIVE TRAINING, MAXIMIZING HIS OR HER COMPETITIVE ADVANTAGE.

DESIGN OF PERFORMANCE - APPAREL

TO OUTFIT THE ASPIRING ATHLETE WITH PURPOSEFUL PRODUCT FOR EFFECTIVE TRAINING, MAXIMIZING HIS OR HER COMPETITIVE ADVANTAGE.

ENGINEERED

TO FACILITATE MOBILITY; ENHANCE FLEXIBILITY; FUNCTION DICTATES FORM - ANATOMICAL PANELING, SEAMING, AND ARTICULATION TO ASSIST FORM AND BODY MOVEMENT; HIGH QUALITY MATERIALS AND CONSTRUCTION ARE PARAMOUNT.

STABILITY

TO PROVIDE AN OPTIMAL AND PREVENTATIVE ENVIRONMENT FOR PHYSICAL STRESS, EXPLOSIVE MOVEMENTS AND EXTERNAL OR INTERNAL CONDITIONS.

INTERFACE 

INTERCONNECTION, AND PROPER FUNCTION OF GARMENTS AND LAYERS; INTUITION OF DRESS; SYSTEM OF APPAREL.

COMFORT

A TRUE PERFORMANCE FEATURE; EVERY DETAIL CONSIDERED; NO DISTRACTIONS; NO CONSTRICTION YET DURABLE FOR RIGOROUS ACTIVITY.

THERMOREGULATE

TO HELP REGULATE THE MICRO-CLIMATE OF AN ATHLETE’S SKIN SURFACE AND CORE TEMPERATURE THROUGH DESIGN AND FABRICS FOR OPTIMAL PERFORMANCE. ADVANCED MOISTURE MANAGEMENT OF SWEAT AND VAPOR KEEPING THE ATHLETE WARM AND DRY IN THE COLD - OR - COOL IN THE HEAT.

INNOVATIVE 

FIT, FABRICS, FUNCTION AND FORM; TECHNOLOGICAL MATERIALS’ ADVANCEMENTS; VISIBLE AND INTUITIVE FEATURES ENHANCE THE MODERN LOOK OF TRAINING.

OUR FEMALE ATHLETES ARE JUST AS SERIOUS AND DEDICATED AS OUR GUYS. WE DO NOT COMPROMISE ON ANY FEATURE OR BENEFIT IN REGARDS TO FIT, FABRICS, FUNCTION AND FORM. OUR FEMININE STYLING WILL ENHANCE THE MODERN LOOK OF TRAINING.

WOMEN'S EXCEED TECH TOP

This short sleeve top is actually a half sleeve. The sleeves are intentionally longer with gentle compression to provide more muscle support for the upper arm. Along with the princess seams, this top offers contemporary feminine styling.

WOMEN'S EXCEED TANK

To complement the Half Sleeve, the racer back Tank allows for non-constricted movement while doing an array of exercises. The back design provides comfort and won’t interfere with bench pressing and floor work.

WOMENS EXCEL LONG SLEEVE TOP

Following the same formula as Men’s, this too has highly advanced thermoregulation, and there’s nothing better than an engineered system. We’re using our “sweat map” knowledge to engineer a mesh in the back panel to vent your body heat where it’s most needed, keeping you comfortable and dry.

WOMEN'S EXCEED CAPRI PANT

Let’s not confuse this with a standard yoga capri. This is a serious training pant as the capri length applies gentle, yet effective compression to the primary leg muscles, thus creating a more optimal environment for unhindered performance.

WOMEN'S BIKER SHORT

The Biker Short is a go-to short for the girl who wants compression and support, while doing the most intense activities. The shaped panels and soft-hand fabric provide unparalleled comfort. This short is perfect whether you’re hitting the gym, hot yoga, or going for a long run.

WOMEN'S EXCEED RUN SHORT

This short is great for running, but also functions extremely well in the gym. The higher knit waistband helps it sit in all the right places. The vented pockets look great, while keep you cool and dry during the most intense sessions.

WOMEN'S EXCEED TECH HOODY

This form-fitting hoody has a soft, beautiful textured fabric and was designed for an array of outdoor activities. It’s paneled in a way to flatter the female build but still provides superior function whether you’re running on the trails or doing outdoor training club.

story:
We are Morgan and Pen.  We have two stories and one goal. 

Morgan's Story: Morgan finished her yoga teacher training in 2012, qualifying with the Independent Yoga Network.  She left an academic career to share the teachings of yoga.  Yoga was the final and most crucial step in Morgan's journey to hear from anorexia and excessive exercising.  Yoga taught Morgan to bring her mind and body back into synch.  Since training, Morgan has taken her classes into hospitals, workplaces, local gyms and community centres.  Her teaching is inspired by Buddhist principles of compassion and self care.  In her therapeutic work she has successfully helped individuals recover from chronic back pain.  She has become known throughout Scotland for her yin yoga classes.  

Pen's Story: Inspired by Buddhist practice, and three years witnessing Morgan's yoga journey, Pen completed her yoga teacher training with BodhiYoga in 2014.  She firmly believes in living yoga, not just practicing on a mat.   She has incorporated yoga teaching into her work as a clinical psychologist and has been using mindfulness based approaches for the past 7 years.                                             

Our Goal: To raise funds necessary to transform the space below into a therapeutic yoga studio.  We have been working tirelessly for the past three years as mobile yoga teachers, travelling most places by bicycle because we believe in environmental sustainability.  Our self practice is vital to our ability to offer an authentic and compassionate teaching style.  You can often see us cycling across the Tay bridge, connecting the village of Newport-on-Tay to the wider community of Dundee, with yoga mats strapped to our backs, or practicing in the sunshine along the banks of the Tay.  Our goal is to purchase a studio space in Newport-on-Tay where people can practice yoga, lean meditation, heal and just be themselves. We need to establish a base for classes, workshops and outreach work.  We need one space that will be able to deliver yoga to the community.  We need you to support our goal.  By donating to our campaign you will help others experience what it feels like to find peace with themselves or recover from injury or trauma.  You will help build a space of wellbeing, acceptance and connection.    


What We Need & What You Get

We need to purchase a space to help us deliver yoga, pilates and alternative therapies to the community. 

Portion of deposit necessary for mortgage  (£10,000)

Therapy room conversion/renovation (£7,000)

New Boiler (£2,500)

equipment (yoga mats, blocks, bolsters, cushions and blocks) (£960)

Branding and advertising costs (£500)

Eco/environmental lighting (1,040)

Our MAIN goal is to pay for the remainder of the deposit necessary to secure our mortgage! Beyond that, we have been so humbled and grateful to have received offers of services and skills in exchange for yoga classes, so we feel that as long as we are able to raise our deposit we will make our business happen and grow organically.  

Our Perks

  • A yoga retreat to the stunning wee Scottish Island of Eigg!
  • 10 eco yoga mats
  • class passes, 1-1 yoga and more! 

The Impact

Our impact is far reaching.  We will initially have a local impact on the health and wellbeing of our community.  As our space and community of yoga and wellbeing teachers develops, we will be able to take our work into wider contexts.      

Penny has been approached by Sense Scotland to deliver 1-1 yoga sessions for individuals with sensory impairments and she is increasingly being asked to take on more students.  People who are deaf or blind or have sensory integration differences as part of autism spectrum disorders, cannot access traditional methods or spaces of yoga. Our therapeutic approach to yoga, makes it possible for these people to experience the benefits of yoga out with a traditional class setting.  Already deaf/blind students are able to initiate yoga postural movement through simple touch, breathe abdominally, and achieve deep relaxation.   

Morgan and Penny are both teaching yoga to people who experience depression, anxiety and difficult relationships with food.  Morgan is teaching yoga to people with chronic back pain and injury and is completing an advanced teacher training in yoga therapy.  Morgan has successfully established outreach classes for NHS (National Health Service) staff as part of staff self-care and wellbeing initiatives.  

Morgan and Penny work together in an integrated partnership, supporting each other to deliver, practice and consider our contribution to the wellbeing of our students and our community.  We both have academic backgrounds and will endeavour to work in partnership with research institutes to contribute to and the growing evidence base for yoga in relation to health and wellbeing of the individual and the community.   Our particular research interests are autism and eating disorders.  We are in dialogue with international institutions with whom we aim to work in partnership with.   

Our space will offer support people we are currently working with, to transition to a more traditional class setting to help with long term social isolation and integration back into the community.  


Risks & Challenges

We aware aware of several risks as we build our campaign and ultimately our business.  

Our primary risk is our own health and wellbeing, which if jeopardised would make our teaching and our project almost impossible.  We have mitigated this risk by committing to our own daily yoga and meditation practice, supporting each other through the day's challenges and maintaining transparent communication about our feelings and state of mind.  

Other risks as we establish the business include slow business, illness of freelance teachers and things out with our control such as major flood or other environmental disaster.  We have developed a comprehensive business plan in conjunction with an independent business advisor and have considered all possible routes for mitigating such risks.  

Other Ways You Can Help

We hope you can donate to our campaign! If you cannot afford to donate, we would be so grateful if you could spread the word.  We have a Facebook page; please feel free to share widely on Facebook, Twitter or any other media and communication means you may have.   Simply click on the Indegogo share tools!
story_txt:
We are Morgan and Pen.  We have two stories and one goal. 

Morgan's Story: Morgan finished her yoga teacher training in 2012, qualifying with the Independent Yoga Network.  She left an academic career to share the teachings of yoga.  Yoga was the final and most crucial step in Morgan's journey to hear from anorexia and excessive exercising.  Yoga taught Morgan to bring her mind and body back into synch.  Since training, Morgan has taken her classes into hospitals, workplaces, local gyms and community centres.  Her teaching is inspired by Buddhist principles of compassion and self care.  In her therapeutic work she has successfully helped individuals recover from chronic back pain.  She has become known throughout Scotland for her yin yoga classes.  


Pen's Story: Inspired by Buddhist practice, and three years witnessing Morgan's yoga journey, Pen completed her yoga teacher training with BodhiYoga in 2014.  She firmly believes in living yoga, not just practicing on a mat.   She has incorporated yoga teaching into her work as a clinical psychologist and has been using mindfulness based approaches for the past 7 years.                                             Our Goal: To raise funds necessary to transform the space below into a therapeutic yoga studio.  We have been working tirelessly for the past three years as mobile yoga teachers, travelling most places by bicycle because we believe in environmental sustainability.  Our self practice is vital to our ability to offer an authentic and compassionate teaching style.  You can often see us cycling across the Tay bridge, connecting the village of Newport-on-Tay to the wider community of Dundee, with yoga mats strapped to our backs, or practicing in the sunshine along the banks of the Tay.  Our goal is to purchase a studio space in Newport-on-Tay where people can practice yoga, lean meditation, heal and just be themselves. story:
This campaign is raising funds on behalf of Bhutan Cancer Society. Bhutan Cancer society is the only NGO in Bhutan working toward providing care and support to cancer patient and researching on cancers in Bhutan.

How do we help? 

Our Mission

“To improve cancer care and reduce the incidence of cancer through  cancer control activities (education, prevention and research) and  provide psychosocial support to those affected and effected by  cancer”.

Our Objectives

1. Care and Support

To enhance quality of life for terminal cancer patients, provide social, spiritual and psychosocial support to cancer  patients and caregivers.

2. Prevention and Advocacy

To optimize prevention of cancer in

collaboration with national and

international stakeholder.

To advocate and mobilize resources for cancer care and support, prevention, and treatment.

3. Research

To make the most accurate cancer

information available to healthcare

providers and cancer patients.

To maintain the National Cancer  Registry in collaboration with MOH and JDWNRH.

To make available small research grants to healthcare practitioners for cancer  research in the country.

story:
My name is Pamela Joy Pontone, and I am a Licensed massage therapist in the State of New York.

I am pitching this project to receive funds so that I can treat three people in Brooklyn, who are each suffering from chronic Lyme Disease in their own unique ways.

I am hoping to be able to treat each person 1 or even 2 times weekly, and in the process will be conducting my own research on Lyme Disease as I discover changes and patterns in their bodies.  I will continue to write about what I notice and learn on my blog,        www.pamelajoypontone.wordpress.com

I will be working from a very colorful toolbox, using cranio-sacral techniques, aromatherapy, energy work, Thai stretching when necessary, and Chinese fire cupping.  My focus is to be able to work on each person consistently, so that I can work with the changes that their bodies experience, and understand how this disease responds to these alternative therapies.  The money I receive will allow me to buy supplies for these therapies, which will vary for each of the three people I treat, and to pay me for the work I will be doing.  My goal is to do these treatments for 10 consecutive weeks, and though this disease has reached chronic levels in their bodies, I would like to see if a positive and noticeable change will occur in each person.  I feel that not enough attention is paid to the study of this disease, and that many people who are suffering from it are unable to work and earn the money for these alternative therapies.  I would like to receive funding so that I can give this opportunity to heal to people who really need it, and in the process, to learn through practice what is beneficial in fighting against this complex and destructive disease.

story:
What is HeartIn? 

REVOLUTIONARY MINIATURE GO-ANYWHERE ELECTROCARDIOGRAPH.

JUST PLUG IT INTO YOUR SMART PHONE OR PC AND GET AN INSTANT CONSULTATION VIRTUALLY ANYWHERE.



Check your heart from anywhere in the world using our new and revolutionary, miniature, portable Electrocardiograph (ECG) through our network of certified cardiology experts, all from your Smart Phone or PC.


Use for regular monitoring without extensive hassle and time loss from making and keeping appointments, use the HeartIn Portable Electrocardiograph for peace of mind, or for times of distress, all for the ultimate in prompt safety, security, and speedy diagnosis.


We use a network of cardiology consultants we certify to instantly interpret and read results from all the necessary cardio ECG data right after you send it.


WHAT COULD BE SIMPLER? 

From the time you or a loved one start the process of applying the HeartIn ECG’s leads to your body to the time you send data to our examining and consulting cardiologist takes usually no more than 15 minutes for a first time user.  We supply an easy-to-read application chart to attach leads, the leads are coded to eliminate confusion, and electrodes attached to your body are adhesive at their ends for ease of personal application.  The examining cardiologist can verify correct placement or answer any uncertainties during the consultation.

 

ULTIMATE PEACE OF MIND

Interpretation and Cardiologist’s Advice Follows Almost Immediately!!!!

You will get peace of mind in minutes, and even an instant start on necessary treatment if indicated!

All that from the comfort of your home, office, car, the road, hotel, or wherever in the world you and your smartphone or PC can connect to the Internet.  We supply the app on free download.

NO WONDER WE CALL IT A REVOLUTION!

The HeartIn ECG is no larger than a cigarette pack (exclusive of leads) and produces the same data produced by a full-size electrocardiograph that may require a shelf or cart in a doctor’s office, clinic or hospital.

It’s a full 12-lead device with all the data any cardiologist needs to conduct a full evaluation – not a condensed or truncated device -- yet its cost is highly affordable.  At a price of just $240, the average person can buy a HeartIn ECG for less money than the typical smartphone, with no subscription costs!  Use it only when you want or need to, and pay for only those consultations you request.


This amazingly small but full-function ECG will fit in a man’s shirt pocket, and the entire setup with leads will fit in small woman’s bag or package (supplied free).

Whether you need it if you’re in distress, to evaluate worrisome signs or just periodic monitoring for compliance results with your treating doctor’s orders, this is the device for you.

Use it on the road, from home, or anywhere. 

WE PROVIDE ALSO HIGH-LEVEL ANALYSIS OF ECG DATA

Benefits of Additional Cardio Data Analysis Technology:

Universal ECG Score System

- CardioanalysisUniversal ECG Score System is designed to analyse more than 200 ECG parameters and to visualize present result in colour logic with a quantitative assessment. 

- The system is able to provide qualified interpretation of ECG signals remaining non–informative for routine methods of ECG interpretation.

Individualized analysis 

- The concept of individual norms for everyone based on Universal ECG Score System allows enhancing the accuracy of results and to individualize recommendations.

Comprehensive statistic engine and Fuzzy logic 

- We use advanced statistical treatment of ECG signals including fuzzy measure theory and fuzzy integral calculus which allows making the precise conclusion.

- 4-th generation ECG analysis technologies. Thorough and deep analysis being obtained under this technology are impossible to receive through ECG visual analysis; 

- Usage of specific ECG parameters that never been used before (our know-how in T-wave analysis)

- Cardiovascular system condition trends assessment makes possible for a doctor to manage the treatment process.

Cloud computing 

- We enable users, their caretakers, and doctors to receive results promptly anywhere and at any time.

There’s no excuse not to have your own personal HEART-IN ECG.

story:
Hello Indiegogo Community,

We are the team at FITFIT.LIFE and we want to share with you an exciting concept that is going to revolutionize the way we continue our workout regiments away from the gym and how they are utilized on fitness apps! Indiegogo Community we introduce to you FITFIT.LIFE!

We at FITFIT.LIFE are a compassionate group of individuals just like “YOU” who want to stay active, in shape, and live a productive healthy lifestyle. We would like to spend six days a week in the gym under the tutelage of a trainer, but with a hectic life and a full schedule sometimes we just can’t make that happen. With this app, you can achieve the same impactful trainer driven workout after you leave your trainer. We at FITFIT.LIFE are also trainers who want to be able to provide shared- knowledge and expertise that we have gained over a lifetime in the fitness industry. We want to share it with “EVERYONE” and “EVERYWHERE.” Not just a hand few of clients who have the financial means and luxury of time to commit to the gym four to five days a week.

Indiegogo Community, FITFIT.LIFE is an interactive mobile fitness lifestyle app that you can take anywhere and apply your custom workout regimen from a list of a 1,000 certified training exercises from the touch of a button!  If desired, the FITFIT.LIFE app will auto populate a daily workout regimen for you by simply imputing your desired workout length, area of focus (weight loss, tone muscle, gain mass), and level of difficulty based on your training skill-set; it’s as simple as 1-2-3! The FITFIT.LIFE app is also voice and video animated so you at home can take the same experience of working out with a trainer in the gym on your smart device! Who knows, your favorite trainer might actually be one of the selected 1,000 trainers who would have access to load their personal training exercises on our app and provide it to the at home user. How unique is that! Indiegogo Community, with your support we can bring this level of fitness innovation to everyone, everywhere, with minimal out of pocket cost to you! It does little justice to us keeping our elite training exercises to the select few when all can enjoy the experience. Help us share that vision!

Indiegogo Community, we are looking for $50,000 to make this dream of providing the first-ever interactive workout lifestyle app possible. By reaching our funding goal, the money use will go towards the final completion of the app demonstrating all the said applications mentioned above. The funding will also allow us to market to other highly-skilled trainers who want to promote themselves and their training methods to a broader audience base.

Indiegogo Community, we have some awesome perks we are offering for those that contribute to our cause. The cost of participating as a member of the FITFIT.LIFE community in any giving level could be as little as the cost of a Grande cup at Starbucks to a percentage of a monthly gym membership for an entire year of service! Where are you going to find a better deal than that?

$6.00 – Try Me! – Offers you six-month trial of our service.

$10.00 – Try Me For A Year! – Offers you a year worth of service.

$25.00 – You Plus Two! – Offers you plus two guests our service for a year.

$100.00 – Party of Five Live at BIGFIT – Offers you plus four guests our dynamic fitness product for an entire calendar year of service plus two “free” tickets to our live BIGFIT group training session premier party!

Or there is an option to donate what you can for the cause! JUST DONATE :). If you don’t have the means to donate help us get the word out and get others to contribute to our campaign! Please access our FITIFIT.LIFE social-media links to share with others :).

In closing Indiegogo Community, this app will change how fitness is brought to the masses! We are a global society. Trainers want to be able to provide their knowledge and gain exposure without having to be confined to the stringent non-compete rules of a brick and mortar facility.  Let’s break the bondage Indiegogo Community! Help us create the perfect learning and training environment for our clients and utopian conditions for trainer. If we achieve our plight, then the money accumulated will go towards achieving our goal of creating an on-line community for trainers to provide share-knowledge and access more people world-wide! The team at FITFIT.LIFE appreciates you taking the time to read our story and hopefully it inspires you to give generously towards our cause.

story:
An IntroductionHello my name is Spencer and i'm currently raising funds to move out of an abusive house hold. I'm a transgender FtM Preop male and i'm currently on fixed income and most of the money goes to my parents to either pay bills or for them to use on things we don't really need. My mother is very trans phobic toward me and my changes and is very abusive about it.

My parents in general are very manipulative and abusive as well and the stress and anxiety are causing problems with day to day life along with my general health.

Currently they will not allow me to get a bank account, use my social security number, get a drivers license or use my food stamps for my own self. I only get $16 in food stamps according to Arkansas law because I am on fixed income.

I am unable to go to the doctor when I need to because of this.

What I hope to achieve with this campaign is to be able to move out, get my name and gender marker changed on my ID and move into an income based apartment with friends where I will be safe and taken care of. Along with being able to afford doctors visits, Therapist visits and a few other medical expenses.


In an effort to help encourage donations I will be offering perks to those who donate !  I'll be updating this area later to show examples of these perks as well so stay tuned for that. 


Why


Currently including the above information I'm unable to hold a job due to my poor health which is why I am on fixed income. Which means I am unable to afford being able to move out to a safer home. With this campaign I hope to be able to move to be with close friends where I can get the medical help I need along with proper care. I will be taking my pets with me as well. 

Thanks to my parents i'm unable to really do much except for lay in bed all day and get yelled at for being "lazy" even though I have diagnosed chronic depression and anxiety along with Border line personality Disorder, Autism, Manic Depressive and bipolar. 

My physical ailments include Rheumatoid Arthritis, Thyroid Disease, Gerd/Acid Reflux and chest pains. I am on expensive medication to help deal with these issues but currently i'm unable to get to a doctor when I need to or a therapist/psychiatrist to get my medication adjusted properly when it needs to be. On top of that my medication is very expensive and cost over 100 usd a month. I can barely afford this. 

I am also unable to afford going to a gender therapist to start my transition and i'm unable to afford male clothes and chest binders. I also need to be able to legally get my name changed as well. So far this process is near impossible unless I'm able to move away from my family and get funding from outside sources like this fundraiser. Any amount helps ! 

Goals

Through this campaign here is a small list of goals I hope to be able to obtain.

  • Get a legal name change to help my transition
  • Be able to mail my things to my new home
  • Buy a plane Ticket
  • Pay for medical bills/medical costs
  • Pay for vet bills/medical costs for my cat and dog
  • Afford new medical devices like braces for my wrists, elbow and knees along with a back brace. 
  • Pay for my medication 
  • Start going to a gender therapist
  • Afford new chest binders and male clothing
  • Get rest of teeth removed and get Dentures


Rewards Information

After the funding period ends donators will be messaged so they may choose their tier rewards and then within that time period rewards will began to be sent out.  If you've donated previously and would like to donate again and want your reward tier raised please contact us and we can do that for you ! 

Update #1 

Here are some of the perks you can earn.  These show every option you can choose from and will be updated ! Please let me know which one you'd like depending on the tier you've donated to.  The art was made by me and  Nursetiger or one of the members of our webshop WikiTronics ! 


Update #2 

New Tier added, more rewards added to tiers 


Sticker Tier




Art Card Tier

If you choose this tier you will receive a custom art card based on either an existing character or your own personal character ! You will not receive one of the cards pictured below but your own custom one ! 
The below cards pictured are examples of what the art will look like. These are not traditional ACEO sized but more like small sketch pages of full colored art. 


TalkSprite Tier 

These are examples as to what your custom talk sprite looks like ! You will not receive one of these sprites you will be receiving your own custom one tailored to you and your character.

story:
Hello,
My name is Joshua and I am the owner/executive chef of Doughboy's Inc. Pizza-Pasta-Catering.
http://bestpizzaschaumburgil.com/

Doughboy's Inc. Pizza-Pasta-Catering offers you a wholesome, fresh, 100% authentic Italian menu that will make you feel the warmth and hospitality of Sunday dinner at "Nonna's."

Since I was a little boy I've learned the passion and quality for Italian cuisine. I stood at my Nonna's side, helping her roll meatballs, chop up garden fresh herbs and vegetables. We trimmed market fresh meats and always "stirred the sauce!"

Doughboy's Inc. Pizza-Pasta-Catering brings you a home style Italian comfort food menu.
Our dough, sauces, breads, and meats are all made from scratch. Our products are purchased locally and grown by local farmers. Our cheeses, tomatoes, and olive oils are imported directly from Italy.

Doughboy's Inc. Pizza-Pasta-Catering makes the best pizza in Schaumburg IL. As the executive chef, I promise you will love our products. Take one bite and if you don't love it, bring it back and we will do everything in our power to make it right. If you still aren't satisfied, we will pay one of our competitors to replace it. No one else makes that kind of offer, because "Nonna's Food" is alway the best!

I NEED YOUR HELP!!!  I opened this pizzeria in late April 2015. In just 3 short months Doughboy's Inc. Pizza-Pasta-Catering has accomplished the following:

-Winner of "Best Pizza in Elk Grove Village IL"
-Over 2300 likes on Facebook
- (90) "5 star" reviews between Google, Facebook and Yelp
- Joined GOA Regional Business Associates
- Donated Over 100 pizzas to community organizations like Jaycees and The Elk Grove Park District
-Only local pizzeria to reward customers for their loyalty by giving away "FREE PIZZA"

Cooking is my passion!! I treat EVERY customer that comes through the door like FAMILY!! They matter to me. I dont send out product unless its perfect!! NO EXCEPTIONS!! I practice "old school" customer service, like opening the door for a customer as they leave, greating every customer that enters our door with "welcome to Doughboy's!!" , Calling customers to ask how thier food was, responding to EVERY review.

The help I need is "working capital." I had $30,000 set aside to cover operating expenses, however after purchasing the business, the Village of Elk Grove came in and forced me to update electrical, plumbing, gas, sewer and water lines. These were not expenses that I budgeted for!! Especially since the site was formally a pizzeria and the business itself is in a Strip Mall  and the landlord at the time told me he would not pay for the updates because he was selling the building.  I went back to the village and pleaded with them, hoever they said if I didnt make the updates that they wouldnt allow me to open. So I was forced to dump all of my savings into a "building I didn't own," which then set my opening date back 5 weeks. Once i did open I was confident that the marketing plan I developed would balance out the HUGE expenses, however my location is slightly hidden off the main road and sales are only at half of what I projected.

I am trying everything I can think of  to stay alive!!
I have cut expenses, cut staff, have my operating budget down to a bare minimum, I even am sleeping at the pizzeria just so I could cut my living expenses...lol.

I am humbly asking anyone and everyone that can help,
PLEASE<PLEASE!!! Help Doughboy's Inc. Pizza-Pasta-Catering stay alive I  have invested my life savings into this great business. We are LOVED by the community and we LOVE serving it making GREAT food and GREAT memories. Check us outwww.iLoveDBpizza.com
Thank you for your help and support!!

Joshua B.
owner/chef

P.S. check us out on "Go Fund Me" 

gofundme.com/6pd58me6s

story:
Athletic league of leaders is a unique program that engages the youth creatively in a wide variety of opportunites in the world of sports.

What We Need & What You Get

Our program teaches 8 sports, but does not only cater to athletes. We inspire writers, entrepreneurs , trainers, coaches and doctors in our program. We will utilize hands on individual and group projects and mentorship from professionals who are currently working in the actual fields.
Your gracious financial contribution will allow us to reach our goal of obtaining the necessary funds we need to launch our 8 week pilot this summer in Miami.

The Impact

Many youngsters dream of going pro. We will show them how they can do so in many new, exciting ways.

Our goal is to help young leaders become fit, learn life skills, and have the broadest range of understanding of careers within the world of sports.  Our participants will learn and grow from professionals representing every aspect of the sports industry. Through age-appropriate, hands-on experiences and the concepts learned in our program, our participants will gain tangible insights into their future.

Our programs will be inserted into communities that often lack the
necessary materials and resources that allows the youth to thrive. Our participants will learn and grow in ever changing environments where professionals from every aspect of the sports industry will be the consistent visitors in which our Leaders will gain insight and hear personal testimonies. Our vision is to allow the youth a opportunity to see with a enhanced vision all while learning numerous skills

Risks & Challenges

Without a program like ours, these communities are leading the nation in youth arrests. Something like this will not only aide in helping keep our youth off the streets and out of trouble, but it will give them the confidence they need to go on through life as Leaders.

story:
The cell phone – a critical link in your life; you protect it from damage, are you doing the same for yourself?

We know that EMF affects the body. The QUESTION’S are: How much? If detrimental? And, who is susceptible? 

  • World Health Organization (WHO): “While an increased risk of brain tumors is not established, the increasing use of mobile phones and the lack of data for mobile phone use over time periods longer than 15 years warrant further research of mobile phone use and brain cancer risk.”
  • American Academy of Environmental Medicine: “The scientific literature proves that non-thermal adverse effects of RF exposure exist and negatively impact health and physiology. New guidelines based on measurements of non-thermal effects and lowering limits of exposure are needed and critical to protect public health.”
  • Forbes: Study Suggests Wi-Fi Exposure More Dangerous To Kids Than Previously Thought – ‘In reference to the International Agency for Research on Cancer, part of the United Nations WHO, classifies RF/EMF as Class 2B Carcinogens – possibly carcinogenic to humans (same category as lead, DTD and gas fumes).’  “Obviously, these devices and the resulting fields are extremely (and increasingly) common in modern society.  Even if we want to, we can’t eliminate our exposure, or our children’s, to RF/EMF.  But, we may need to limit that exposure, when possible.”
  • Consumer Reports: Does Cell-Phone Radiation Cause Cancer? -

    "Should we stop using cell-phones: No, Consumer Reports does not think that’s necessary. But we do have some concerns. “The evidence so far doesn’t prove that cell phones cause cancer, and we definitely need more and better research,” says Michael Hansen, Ph.D., a senior scientist at Consumer Reports. “But we feel that the research does raise enough questions that taking some common-sense precautions when using your cell phone can make sense.” 

PROTXS is a set of new technologies that remediate both the biological and technological impacts of invisible radiations. The sources of these disruptive energies are not likely to go away, as modern information technologies are so popular, convenient and efficient. Through a series of careful studies and documentation, PROTXS has produced a suite of technologies with very wide applications in remediating the deleterious effects of invisible electromagnetic radiations on both living systems and information technologies. Visit our web-site www.protxs.com for more information. PROTXS can effectively be used on all cell-phones, tablets, lap-tops and other wi-fi devices.

History and Goal of the PROTXS Indiegogo Campaign:

Dr. Michael Halliday, DC, founded PROTXS. Dr. Halliday sought to expand his work on total health. During this research he uncovered the amount of data that was available on electromagnetic radiation and its affects on people. This new concern–electromagnetic radiation–and its effects on health, especially for children, was alarming. This set him on a new journey of understanding and then being a leader in the new field of Energy Medicine. He has sought out and worked with scientific leaders in this field to understand the effects of EMR and to develop products to mitigate the affects. This work has lead to the development of PROTXS.

Current Research:

PROTXS and EMR mitigation: PROTXS compound was studied for its ability to mitigate EMR. Extract from report by ProfessorJames Oschman, PhD - “Protxs is a range of new technologies that remediate both the biological and technological impacts on invisible radiation. The Protxs devices contain a proprietary blend of natural products that efficiently reflect and absorb electromagnetic noise and thereby mitigate the harmful effects.”

PROTXS and Human Response: Using applied technology and   Bio-Dynamic Testing was completed this June.  Extract from  report issued by Dr. Dennis Cousinau of the Wellness Clinical  Research, Michigan - “97/104 subjects showed moderate  positive/very positive reaction to EMF/Wi-Fi radiation when  PROTXS technology was carried by the test subjects. The tests  were conducted by double blind method to assure non-biased  response.

Ms. Kate Snyder (graduate of Calvin College with a Masters in Organizational Psychology from  Goddard College) is a PhD Student at Quantum University of Integrative Medicine and is performing two independent tests, for her dissertation.  They are: 1) Integrity of the Blood Brain Barrier, and 2) Brain Activity; when exposed to cell phone radiation. Ms. Snyder has found that, "PROTXS is unique because it has a restorative effect when used". PROTXS is the only device, out of the six competitive devices she tested, that: A) protects the human bio-field from EMF radiation when talking on a cell phone, and B) restores and improves both Blood Brain Barrier scores and Heart Rate Variability scores when used.

  1. Blood Brain Barrier (BBB):  There is a concern over the integrity of the BBB exposed to EMF (there are numerous articles on this subject, a sample of one study is by Dr. Leif Salford: Electromagnetic Fields and Leakage of the Blood Brain Barrier). PROTXS' BBB integrity tests were performed using a CyberScan device. The CyberScan is an advanced biofeedback device from Germany that is a CE Class II Therapy device approved by the FDA. The tests show a composite of Subjects who were measured at four test points: 1) Base Line; 2) holding an active cell phone at their head for one minute; 3) holding an active cell phone to their head for one minute with a PROTXS shield attached; and 4) holding an active cell phone to their head with a competitive device attached. The Test Scale goes from a +12, which shows Integrity in the BBB, to -12, which shows Susceptibility in the BBB. In every Subject the Base-line AND the use of a PROTXS Shield showed Integrity in the BBB; and, in every Subject they showed a Susceptibility score when using a Cell Phone even if equipped with a competitive device.
  2. Heart Rate Variability: A concern is the affect of EMF on brain activity (again, there are numerous studies on EMF and Brain Activity, a sample is at wifiinschools.org.uk).  A HQHeartQuest device was used to measure Heart Rate Variability and the effects on Brain Electrical Activity and Biological Age using a cell phone and cell phone equipped with a PROTXS Shield. The Electrical Activity is shown as blue/green for maximum or good Activity and orange/red for minimal or poor Activity.                                                                                                          The following diagram was to establish a Base-Line Brain Activity for the Test Subjects (sample - a 25 year old male with a blue-green/green cross-section and a Activity score of 66);

     the following diagram is a second test which was repeated after a three minute Cell Phone use (sample - the same 25 year old male with a red area in the cross-section and a decreased Activity score of 52);

    and, the following diagram was a third test which repeated the three minutes of cell phone use with a PROTXS Shield (sample - the same 25 year old male returned to Base-Line values and an Activity score of 64).

    The cell phone use was detrimental on all subjects lowered the Brain Activity an average of 19% while increasing the biological age 7%. The use of PROTXS restored the Subjects to Base-Line values.

Our goal in this campaign is to raise the money to launch the products into the market and to further our research. We have reached out to crowd-funding with Indiegogo because the cell-phone manufactures and the government do not want to take the steps to increase awareness of the potential health issues; the consumers must take the steps to protect themselves from the potential affects of EMF. This campaign and product launch will help to assure that you and your loved ones are provided the protection for Living healthy in a wireless environment. 

We need further resources to complete our awareness campaign, packaging, handling and support structure. We also wish to launch a PROTXS-Pet Shield, because they too are also affected by EMF radiation.

PROTXS' research and reviews by scientist have shown the effectiveness of our production products, but we wish to further substantiate the benefits. We are in contact with medical and other professional personnel to perform the research to study the detailed effects of EMR on the body. Two of the further studies to be performed are:

  1. To research and study the specific effects of EMF radiation at the cellular and molecular level on brain cell tissue. Example of Neurite Proceses effected by toxins; the affect on brain tissue by EMF will follow the same process. Research through: Naweed Sayed, PhD; Department of Anatomy and Physiology, University of Calgary. http://people.ucalgary.ca/~neuro/syed/welcome.html

  2. To research and study the effect of EMR on the human body and specifically the effects on blood. Example of a study on blood by others; to be replicated to show the affect of EMR on blood and beneifits of Protxs. Research through: Beverly Rubik, PhD; Energy Medicine University. http://energymedicineuniversity.org/faculty/rubik.html 

PRODUCT OFFERING:

The PROTXS Shield will sell at $59 each. The Indiegogo Program will offer introductory pricing as PERKS to help those who contribute to our campaign to Live healthy in a wireless environment. 
Thank You!
Thanks you for taking the time to review this important information on your health. Please take the steps necessary to protect yourself. Either to limit exposure such as minimizing cell phone use or using the speaker phone, and/or contributing to the PROTXS campaign and our Products and Research. Take the steps to Protect yourself - you are valuable! 
Not associated with PROTXS, but Additional videos on EMF Concers:
1) International Scientist Appeal on Electromagnetic Fields, Martin Blank, PhD From ElectromagneticHealth Org: Martin Blank, PhD of Columbia University representing 190 international scientists in an Appeal to the UN, UN Member States and the WHO on the risks of electromagnetic fields emitted by telecommunications and utility technologies. Cautioning strongly, Dr. Blank says, “The time to deal with the harmful biological and health effects is long overdue. To protect our children, ourselves and our ecosystem, we must reduce exposure by establishing more protective guidelines.” Video produced by ElectromagneticHealth.org on behalf of international scientists and the Appeal Committee.
2) Kunze Productions LLC and available from TDC Entertainment - trailer for the MOBOLIZE DOCUMENTARY http://www.mobilizemovie.com

lead to the development of PROTXS.Current Research:
PROTXS
and EMR mitigation: PROTXS compound was studied for its
ability to mitigate EMR. Extract
from report by ProfessorJames Oschman, PhD - “Protxs is a range of new technologies that remediate both the
biological and technological impacts on invisible radiation. The Protxs devices
contain a proprietary blend of natural products that efficiently reflect and
absorb electromagnetic noise and thereby mitigate the harmful effects.”
PROTXS
and Human Response:
Using applied technology and   Bio-Dynamic
Testing was completed this June.  Extract from  report issued by Dr. Dennis Cousinau of the
Wellness Clinical  Research, Michigan
- “97/104 subjects showed moderate  positive/very positive reaction
to EMF/Wi-Fi radiation when  PROTXS technology
was carried by the test subjects. The tests  were conducted
by double blind method to assure non-biased  response.
Ms. Kate Snyder (graduate of Calvin College with a Masters in 
Organizational Psychology from  Goddard College) is a PhD Student at Quantum University of Integrative Medicine and is performing two independent
tests, for her dissertation.  They are: 1) Integrity of the Blood Brain Barrier, and 2) Brain Activity; when exposed to cell phone radiation. Ms. Snyder has found that, "PROTXS is unique because it has a restorative effect when used". PROTXS is the only device, out of the six competitive devices she tested, that: A) protects the human bio-field from EMF radiation when talking on a cell phone, and B) restores and improves both Blood Brain Barrier scores and Heart Rate Variability scores when used.

Blood Brain Barrier (BBB):  There is a concern over the integrity of the BBB exposed to EMF (there are numerous articles on this subject, a sample of one study is by Dr. Leif Salford: Electromagnetic Fields and Leakage of the Blood Brain Barrier). PROTXS' BBB integrity tests were performed using a CyberScan device.
The CyberScan is an advanced biofeedback device from Germany that is a CE Class
II Therapy device approved by the FDA. The tests show a composite of Subjects
who were measured at four test points: 1) Base Line; 2) holding an active cell
phone at their head for one minute; 3) holding an active cell phone to their
head for one minute with a PROTXS shield attached; and 4) holding an active
cell phone to their head with a competitive device attached. The Test Scale
goes from a +12, which shows Integrity in the BBB, to -12, which shows Susceptibility
in the BBB. In every Subject the Base-line AND the use of a PROTXS Shield
showed Integrity in the BBB; and, in every Subject they showed a Susceptibility
score when using a Cell Phone even if equipped with a competitive device.


Heart Rate Variability: A concern is the affect of EMF on brain activity (again, there are numerous studies on EMF and Brain Activity, a sample is at wifiinschools.org.uk).  A HQHeartQuest device was used to
measure Heart Rate 
Variability and the effects on Brain Electrical Activity and
Biological Age using a cell phone and cell phone equipped with a PROTXS Shield.
The Electrical Activity is shown as blue/green for maximum or good Activity and
orange/red for minimal or poor Activity.          
                     
                     
                     
                     
       The following diagram was to establish
a Base-Line Brain Activity for the Test Subjects (sample - a 25 year old
male with a blue-green/green cross-section and a Activity score of 66);
the following diagram is a second test which was repeated after a three
minute Cell Phone use (sample - the same 25 year old male with a red area in
the cross-section and a decreased Activity score of 52);
and, the following diagram was a third test which repeated the three
minutes of cell phone use with a PROTXS Shield (sample - the same 25 year old
male returned to Base-Line values and an Activity score of 64). The cell
phone use was detrimental on all subjects lowered the Brain Activity an average of 19%
while increasing the biological age 7%. The use of PROTXS restored the Subjects to Base-Line values.

Our goal in this campaign 
is to raise the money to launch the products into the market and to
further our research. We have reached out to crowd-funding with Indiegogo
because the cell-phone manufactures and the government do not want to take the
steps to increase awareness
of the potential health issues; the consumers must take the steps to protect themselves from the potential affects of EMF. This campaign and product launch will help to assure that
you and your loved ones are provided the protection for Living healthy
in a wireless environment. We need further
resources to complete our awareness campaign, packaging, handling and support
structure. We also wish to launch a PROTXS-Pet Shield, because they too are also affected by EMF radiation.PROTXS' research and reviews by scientist have shown the effectiveness of
our production products, but we wish to further substantiate the benefits. We are in contact with medical and other professional
personnel to perform the research to study the detailed effects of EMR on the
body. Two of the further studies to be performed are:


To research and study the specific effects of EMF radiation at the cellular and molecular level on brain cell tissue. Example of Neurite Proceses effected by toxins; the affect on brain tissue by EMF will follow the same process. Research through: Naweed Sayed, PhD; 
Department of Anatomy and Physiology, University of Calgary. http://people.ucalgary.ca/~neuro/syed/welcome.html


To research and study the effect of EMR on the human body and specifically the effects on blood. Example of a study on blood by others; to be replicated to show the affect of EMR on blood and beneifits of Protxs. Research through: Beverly Rubik, PhD; Energy Medicine University. http://energymedicineuniversity.org/faculty/rubik.html 

PRODUCT OFFERING:The PROTXS Shield will sell at $59 each. The Indiegogo Program will offer 
introductory pricing as PERKS to help those who contribute to our campaign to Live healthy in a wireless environment. 
Thank You!Thanks you for taking the time to review this important information on your health. Please take the steps 
necessary to protect yourself. Either to limit exposure such as minimizing cell phone use or using the speaker phone, and/or contributing to the PROTXS campaign and our Products and Research. Take the steps to Protect yourself - you are valuable! Not associated with PROTXS, but Additional videos on EMF Concers:
1) International Scientist Appeal on Electromagnetic Fields, Martin Blank, PhD From ElectromagneticHealth Org: Martin Blank, PhD of Columbia University representing 190 international scientists in an Appeal to the UN, UN Member States and the WHO on the risks of electromagnetic fields emitted by telecommunications and utility technologies. Cautioning strongly, Dr. Blank says, “The time to deal with the harmful biological and health effects is long overdue. To protect our children, ourselves and our ecosystem, we must reduce exposure by establishing more protective guidelines.” Video produced by ElectromagneticHealth.org on behalf of international scientists and the Appeal Committee.2) Kunze Productions LLC and available from TDC Entertainment - trailer for the MOBOLIZE DOCUMENTARY http://www.mobilizemovie.com

story_txt: Hallo

story:
This is how the app works on both mobile and tablet platforms. IOS & Android.

Be a part of something amazing.

Breast Cancer Previsualization is an app plus a service which gives those going through reconstruction for Breast Cancer a powerful tool to improve the conversation with their doctors.
  • In 2013, I went through treatment for Breast Cancer. I understand that world and I've witnessed first hand how the process of going through treatment could be greatly improved. I have complete empathy for those who have to go through it, those who have gone through it and those contemplating prophylactic measures.
  • The challenge for me during treatment was to improve the conversation around the reconstruction of my body. I was going to lose my breasts, which was something that was never on my radar. When women have mastectomies, they lose their nipples as well. Talking about the surgical direction with hand gestures, photo examples showing the results on other women's bodies, or 3-D graphic illustrations of an average female form was fine at the time while I was trying to comprehend having cancer, but in the back of my mind, I still felt that I was in the dark about what I was going to actually look like in the end. I knew that I would have scars but I wasn't sure how many or how big they would be. I wanted to see visual references of future results on my own body and wondered why something like this wasn't already in place in the age of technology and digital photography.
  • In the world of advertising, before a creative agency can sell a commercial, they must show the client with frame by frame references what their commercial is going to look like so that they know what the creative agency will be producing. From camera angle, to the style of lighting, to what the actors are wearing, how their product will be featured, even the style of the actors hair and so on. There are many subtleties in the aesthetic choices that go into the creation of a commercial and as a creative professional, you have to represent everything that you plan to create visually to your client because they may have something completely different in their mind. You have to be on the same page with your client because they are the ones paying for the commercial. This is called Previsualization, and in the advertising and film business it's called a Pre-viz. 
  • Previsualizing a commercial staves off any future disappointment and puts you on the same page with your client. Happy client. Happy business, right? If I were ever to explain a commercial to a client with hand gestures or pictures of another commercial that's similar, I know for a fact that I would not get the job.
  • That's how I treated the reconstruction of my body. I imported the idea of previsualization into the world of Breast Cancer reconstruction. I wanted to know what I was going to look like during and after several months of surgeries. Even though I had a very talented plastic surgeon, I still needed visual references for myself that represented my own body. This helped me to keep my expectations in check and cross reference with my doctor about the surgical goals.
  • My campaign is two pronged. First, women don't know that they can ask for this type of service because it has never been offered before, and to be honest, ridding oneself of cancer is always the primary haunting concern. Most of us think: if I make it out of here alive, I will be grateful. New boobs and a tummy tuck can be viewed as perk, but being free from cancer is the goal.
  • I will generate an Awareness Campaign in tandem to the launch of the beta test for my Breast Cancer Previsualization App. I want women to know that they need to ask for this type of service and to raise the question, Why isn't something like this in place already? 
  • My Breast Cancer Previsualization App is a tool that will allow women to view the surgical plan on their own body while sharing the same perspective as their surgeon. And this too puts them both on the same page.
  • Every Breast Cancer diagnosis and every surgical procedure is different. Just as every woman’s body type is different and how they'll heal is different. There are many variations of results.
  • Raising awareness is paramount to the launch of this app because currently, the norm is that women go into surgery with very little information. They go into surgery in the dark, holding onto the belief in their doctor's skill set, that they will come out like one of their best case scenarios.
  • I was quite fortunate to have excellent results as I have seen far too many horrific results in private Breast Cancer community chat forums that were just completely heartbreaking. I consider myself very fortunate to have gone through treatment for Breast Cancer in the age of technology and facebook. Eight years ago, how could women measure their results or even know about the different options available for reconstruction? Or who the quality surgeons were? I want to change that. I want to empower those going through treatment for Breast Cancer by giving them incredible tools so that will know that they are on the same page with their surgeon, in effort to stave off disappointing surprises. I want to give them peace of mind, a sense of control when there is very little control. I want to educate them so that they can improve the conversation with their surgeons around their own reconstruction. They will know what they will look like on the other side of surgery.
  • Second, Research and Development of The Breast Cancer Previsualization App. I will create a beta test of this app which will allow me to work with 25 Breast Cancer patients anywhere in the United States. This app will be highly secure which will comply with medical clearances and an incredibly powerful tool with a user friendly interface.
  • My vision which takes on improving the world of Breast Cancer is a massive undertaking. No one likes talking or hearing about cancer, as no one likes being reminded of their mortality. Having to skirt the medical iron curtain in effort to give the medical community an innovate tool seems counter productive. One would think that they should want to take the lead of being innovators in medicine, but perhaps it's a far too complicated notion to take on. So now the patients will show the medical community the importance of this tool. Power To The Patient. I believe that they will prove the demand that a tool like this must exist in the world of surgical reconstruction. If we all work together, everybody wins. 
  • Also, I imagine this type of innovative tool going beyond the disease of Breast Cancer and into realms of helping others with disfigurements caused by other diseases or accidents. Wow, right?

What I need and what I can give back.

  • I'm going to raise $100,000 to start.
  • Research and Development. The Breast Cancer Previsualization App will cost anywhere between $50K-70K to design, develop and research. And it could take up to 3 months to finalize.

  • I'm going to consult with 25 Breast Cancer Patients from anywhere in the US.  This will allow me to test the beta site which drives the app. This app will take information that will help me project an individuals surgical results through *gestural renderings on photographs that the participants will provide through our medically cleared secure app. I will then send a choreographed presentation (like in the video above) back to them through our secure app so that they can show their doctor on their smart phone or tablet platform. (IOS and Android.) I will educate and train the 25 patients how to use this tool. I will also consult with them via skype or facetime. There will be no costs involved for the patients participating in my beta test. The cost to run this service per patient is $1,500, which nets out at $37,500. And in the future phases, I see these costs subsidized through philanthropic endeavors for those who cannot afford this service.
  • *gestural renderings will be realistic and follow the directive of the surgical recommendation and will not enter into the realm of hyper-real retouching.

  • Awareness campaign. Most people don't even know that this type of service exists. There are plastic surgery simulator apps for those who want to see what they're going to look like with breast augmentation, a nose job or even thicker lips. Those apps are far too general for the breast reconstruction world. Getting the word out to women who are going through treatment for Breast Cancer and driving them to this incredible tool, The  Breast Cancer Previsualization App is the bigger task at hand, but not impossible. Anything can happen when you're passionate about it.
  • I'm going to draw boobs in the sky hoping to reach critical mass. I'm going to create a movement on the largest canvas known to man. It will make people vigilant about improving the world of Breast Cancer. Vigilant about being innovative with healthcare. Vigilant about being leaders. My sky boobs will attract the social media world as well as local news and national media. I call it Boobs 2 The Sky. Each sky written letter costs $1800. Which means I will only be able to skywrite "WOW"  two times during this phase of the campaign to raise awareness. Location will focus on Los Angeles first but eventually I would like to skywrite boobs over every major city in the United States. 
  • I will use the remaining $12,500 to put forward to our Awareness Campaign. I imagine skyboobs blowing up on instagram and contributing greatly to this innovative Movement.
  • I will also hire researchers to cull data which will prove the efficacy of this program and they will write papers to medical journals proving that Breast Cancer Previsualization will improve how women go through Breast Cancer which will allow me to lobby so that it gets implemented into surgical protocol and that insurance companies will create an imaging code so that medical practices can offer this for free to their patients. 
  • It's hard to be transparent about something so incredibly private. But I believe with all of my heart and soul that this is a necessary change that needs to be set into action and let the people decide if progress is the right path. I'm launching the conversation and I'm also aware that I will be launching a huge debate, which is good because that will automatically fuel my Awareness Campaign.  
  • Give the power to the patient first, as they'll create the demand and then the medical world will see the value of this powerful tool. 

  • What you get for participating in this awesome campaign is a signed copy of a book that I wrote while developing this campaign, What To Expect When You’re Expecting Nipples. Also a hardcover 12"x12" photography book titled Movement, a collection of images from the most talented iphonographers in the world, who have graciously submitted their work to support this game changing initiative. We live in an era of digital photography where images speak louder than words. And this is the world that Breast Cancer Previsualization evolved from. Photography is a powerful tool.
  • On the very slim chance that I do not reach my entire goal, the funds will go towards the development of the app, the Awareness Campaign and the crowdfunding will continue. I will always rally for this initiative.

Art and Medicine working together

  • My experience is in the world of Advertising, Architecture and now Breast Cancer. I am confident in launching large gestures and campaigns to raise awareness on a global level. This self-induced initiative is the perfect storm where all of my skills, talent and experiences have come together to create a cancer game changing event in the world of Breast Cancer. I know first hand what it's like to be a patient going through treatment for Breast Cancer and confident that my creative expertise will affect the world of caring for those going through treatment for Breast Cancer for the better. 
  • Women who have already gone through treatment have expressed that they wished that this amazing tool was available when they were going through treatment. Here are a couple of quotes from various Breast Cancer support groups from all around the world:  

  • "So wish I had this app when I did it. I'm way too big. Went from a barely B to a full D! I was told I would be a large B to small C!"
  • "Where was this when I needed it! I need a revision..."
  • "My revision surgery is on June 6th. Reduction and lift as well as mesh placement in abs because of botched messes from past surgeons."

Risks & Challenges

Like I said, it's challenging to be transparent about something incredibly private, but if no one comes forth, nothing will progress. Patients can be educators. I found a way to share this experience that's not about cultivating sorrow but about empowering those who have to go through this, and even those who support them.

Risks. One risk is that it will shed light on a necessary change that should have happened already in medical protocol. There will be some medical professionals who might not endorse my campaign. Another risk is that it's such a huge vision that I would need to create quality partnerships with those who will trust in my vision, that I will bring this initiative into immaculate realization.  

The challenge is reaching critical mass and finding women who are going through treatment for Breast Cancer who want to be part of something ground breaking in the world of Breast Cancer. It can be a very somber and private realm, so I have to figure out how to reach and educate those who want to empower themselves. I'm aware that things take time to develop, especially when trying to affect change in the world of healthcare, but it's challenging for me to stand on the sidelines while there are those going through treatment for breast cancer everyday knowing so little about what is possible.

  • My qualifications as a creative veteran and experience in the world of advertising will allow me tack through the challenges brought on by this heavy hitting initiative. Also, I went through treatment for Breast Cancer. I am well versed in that world and extremely empathetic for those who have to go through it. With my experience and vision, I will improve it.

Here's how you can help

  • I understand that if you cannot contribute financially, there are other ways to help by raising awareness about this campaign. You can join my team of fundraisers who work daily getting the word out through facebook, twitter or word of mouth. Or you can casually share a link on your facebook page. This is how the word will spread and one day we will live in a world where breast centers and surgeons will offer this to their patients. #Boobs2TheSky
