You can join my team of fundraisers who work daily getting the word out through facebook, twitter or word of mouth. Or you can casually share a link on your facebook page. This is how the word will spread and one day we will live in a world where breast centers and surgeons will offer this to their patients. #Boobs2TheSky

story:
Campaigner note:

For those that know me you may have heard that this past spring I spent 2 and a half months in an Indigenous community in the Amazon Rainforest where no roads lead to. They have asked me to help them raise money to pay for a youth soccer tournament their children participated in after I left.

This soccer school is important because it gives the children of Sarayaku a way to connect with each other, share, and build an attachment to their community and culture in the face of the increasing allure and pull of a global colonization effort by governments, companies and the dominant culture of our time.

The People of Sarayaku have been and continue to be an incredible example of Indigenous resistance and have created a precedent for all Indigenous peoples by taking the government of Ecuador to an international court and winning. The Indigenous people of Ecuador are some of the leading guardians of nature as through their efforts Ecuador became the first country to write into law, in their constitution, the Right of Nature to life and liberty.

Even though some great strides have been made the fight is not over. Even while I was in Sarayaku oil contractors hired by the Ecuadorian government had illegally reentered the territory in an effort to open it back up for drilling, an action which if ultimately completed would destroy the ecosystem there and the culture and people of Sarayaku which rely upon it. An action which would affect us all.

Whatever you can do to help, even if it is just sending love and prayers to this campaign, would be gratefully appreciated. (Of course, liking, commenting, sharing and contributing are excellent too!)

So much love for your time and commitment. Blessings

-Aša


Soccer from the Rainforest

Futbol desde la Selva

(In English y en Espanol)


Who are we?
¿Quiénes somos?

The Original Kichwa People of Sarayaku are located in the south-central Ecuadorian Amazon Rainforest and are a benchmark in the fight for the Rights of Nature, the rights of the Original Peoples and universal Human Rights.

El Pueblo Originario Kichwa de Sarayaku ubicado en el centro sur de la Amazonia Ecuatoriana, es un referente por su lucha a favor de los Derechos de la Naturaleza, los Derechos de los Pueblos Originarios y los Derechos Humanos universales.

Their fight in defense of their territory has had meaning as an achievement for all of the indigenous peoples of the Americas. They successfully planted a precedent  against a large oil company that supported the Ecuadorian government that wanted to violate and destroy our territory. Our people will continue being the guardians of the Living Rainforest.

Su lucha por la defensa del territorio ha significado un logro para todos los pueblos indígenas de América. Sembró un precedente exitoso contra una gran empresa petrolera que apoyada por el gobierno ecuatoriano quiso violentar y destruir su territorio. Nuestro pueblo fue y seguirá siendo el guardián de la Selva Viviente.

Each achievement reached by the Original Peoples has been thanks to our unity, constancy and creativity within the limited spaces granted by modern urban society.

Cada logro alcanzado por los Pueblos Originarios ha sido gracias a su unidad, constancia y creatividad dentro de los limitados espacios que les concede la sociedad moderna urbana. 


Our fight has been strengthened through different fronts: education, health, self-government, communication and now we want it to be through soccer.

Nuestra lucha se ha fortalecido a través de distintos frentes: educación, salud, autogobierno, comunicación y ahora queremos hacerlo desde el fútbol.



SARAYAKU SPORTS SOCCER SCHOOL

ESCUELA DE FUTBOL DEPORTIVO SARAYAKU

The future 'soccer ambassadors' started training one year ago, their determination and development has been admirable for their parents and the People in general. Their training space has been the historic Sarayaku central plaza which has witnessed since time immemorial countless events of great importance to the People.

Los futuros embajadores del futbol empezaron su entrenamiento hace un años atrás, su empeño y desenvolvimiento ha sido admiración por parte de sus padres y el Pueblo en general, su espacios de entrenamiento ha sido la historica plaza central de Sarayaku testigo desde tiempos inmemoriales de innumerables acontecimientos de gran importancia para el pueblo.

In the summer of this past year we were participating in a Provincial tournament between training schools in a city very close called Puyo which meant traveling by waterway for four hours and then taking a bus for one and a half hours.

En el verano de este año nosotros estábamos participando en un torneo Provincial entre escuelas Formativas  de futbol en la ciudad mas cercana que es el Puyo, esto implica desplazarse vía fluvial por cuatro horas, para luego tomar una bus por una hora y media.

The river by which we navigate is the majestic Bononaza where our parents and grandparents traveled to defend and make known our rights.

El río por donde navegan es el majestuoso Bobonaza, por donde nuestros padres y abuelos viajaron para defender y hacer conocer sus derechos.

In the Amazon the weather is unpredictable, there can be four seasons in the same day, sun in the morning, rain in the afternoon and a strong wind where trees and flowers lose their leaves. The little travelers face all of the seasons in one day.

En la Amazonia el tiempo es impredecible, son las cuatro estaciones en un mismo día, sol en la mañana, lluvia en la tarde, flores, arboles sin hojas, un viento fuerte. Los pequeños viajeros enfrentan todas estas estaciones en un día.

The championship lasted for the whole vacation season and the young athletes dreamt and fought to bring the trophy to the community and display it.

El campeonato durará toda esta temporada vacacional y los pequeños deportistas sueñan y luchan llevar el trofeo y exhibirlo en la comunidad.




 

 TO SERVE WE NEED TO COLLECT MONEY

PARA QUE SERVIRA MI COLECTA

* So that the child athletes can participate in the soccer championship that is developing in the very close city called Puyo.

* Para que los niños deportistas puedan participar en el campeonato de fútbol que se esta desarrollando en la ciudad mas cercana que es el  Puyo.

* Nutrition for 50 child ahtletes in the city of Puyo for ten days.

* Alimentación para 50 niños deportistas en la ciudad del Puyo por diez días.

* Lodging for 50 children in Puyo for ten nights.

* Hospedaje para 50 niños en la ciudad del Puyo por diez Noches.

* A provision of uniforms and sports implements for the 50 children of the soccer school. Also for when they travel by river, ponchos, (for the days when it rains) and protective caps for sunny days.

* Dotación de uniformes e implementos deportivos a los 50  niños de la escuela de fútbol. Para cuando viajen por río (PARA LOS DIAS DE LLUVIA PONCHOS DE AGUA, PARA LOS DIAS DE SOL UNAS GORRAS PROTECTORAS)

* Transportation for the soccer school by waterway from Sarayaku to Port Latazas and then by bus until Puyo and vice versa.

* Movilización de la escuela de fútbol vía Fluvial, desde Sarayaku hasta el Puerto Latazas para luego tomar un bus hasta el Puyo y viceversa.



Because it is necessary to have a soccer school in Sarayaku

Porque es necesaria una escuela de futbol en Sarayaku

The youth of Sarayaku are very knowledgeable about the wisdom of their people and territory. However, the violence of a relentless colonization effort has intensified with globalization, already it has made many youth want to leave Sarayaku and value the outside culture more. Through this soccer school and through sports we want to encourage a space for socialization between them, to strengthen their ties and attachment to their community and to strengthen their self-esteem, values and appreciation for their culture.

Los y las jóvenes de Sarayaku son grandes conocedores de la sabiduría de su pueblo y territorio. Sin embargo, la violencia de un incesante proyecto colonizador intensificado con la globalización, ha hecho que muchos jóvenes quieran salir de Sarayaku y valoren más la cultura de afuera. Mediante esta escuela de fútbol, queremos incentivar a través del deporte, un espacio de socialización entre ellos, que fortalezca sus lazos y arraigo a su comunidad, queremos fortalecer su autoestima, sus valores y el aprecio por su cultura.



 The Results

 Resultados

More than thirty children have had a soccer experience and put all their efforts into being ambassadors for the message of life that Sarayaku proposes for a very near future.

Mas de treinta niños tienen una experiencia de futbol y ponen todo su empeño para ser los embajadores del mensaje de vida que propone Sarayaku en un futuro muy cercano.


OUR CONTRIBUTION

NUESTRO APORTE

Each day we sacrifice valuable time to defend the Right of Nature and our rights as an Original People. Meanwhile the rich plan strategies in order to make millions of dollars for wars and to destroy people and nature.

Cada día sacrificamos el valioso tiempo para defender el Derecho de la Naturaleza y derechos como Pueblo Originario. Mientras tanto los grandes planifican estrategias con el fin de sacar millones de dólares para las guerras y destruir pueblos y la naturaleza.


Courage, courage, penny by penny a dollar is made to defend Kawsak Sacha - the Living Rainforest (Angun Gualinga, Ex-President of Sarayaku)

Coraje, Coraje, de centavito a centavito se hace un dólarcito para defender el Kawsak Sacha-Selva Viviente (Angun Gualinga, Ex-Presidente de Sarayaku)



Sources:
Fuentes:

http://sarayaku.org/
http://rainforests.mongabay.com/1007.htm

http://rainforests.mongabay.com/1007.htm
http://amazonwatch.org/work/climate-change-and-the-amazon-rainforest
http://atlanticrising.org/classroom/rainforests.asp
http://www.dailymail.co.uk/sciencetech/article-2198809/Cutting-rainforests-dramatically-impact-rainfall-researchers-find.html
http://www.pachamama.org/blog/biodiversity-of-the-amazon-rainforest-a-photo-essay
http://www.canada.com/vancouversun/news/editorial/story.html?id=9bf1076b-a128-410b-a799-a245e3a95501

story:
Introducing PlusOne's PreShave and PostShave


Testimonials: What Others Are Saying


Hello, 

My name is Dominick Hall. I began creating PlusOne over a decade ago as an answer to the lack of targeted, modern formulations available to men of color. And even today, it continues to puzzle me why comprehensive offerings still do not exist.

After much time and investment, I am incredibly proud to introduce the PlusOne grooming line of products to the world. PlusOne not only features unprecedentedly targeted formulations, but also feature an innovative bottling system focused on function, impeccable design and aesthetics. 

There is simply nothing else like PlusOne in the grooming industry to date. 

I thank you for your attention, support and help in ushering in the Next Generation in Men's Grooming.. Finally.


What You Get


As a backer of my campaign, it will be my honor and pleasure to offer the PlusOne's PreShave/PostShave paired system as a pre-order Perk. These initial offerings of the PlusOne Grooming System exemplify the core philosophy of PlusOne: Balance and harmony, equal but opposite, Um Yang.

Where almost all other shaving products available today focus simply on lubrication, fragrance and cooling after the shave, PlusOne's Pre/PostShave is far more comprehensive.


When applying the PreShave formulation, you'll experience significant cooling on the face, even during a hot shower or a hot towel treatment. This allows beard whiskers to become softened by the heat and humidity, while the skin stays tight and level - much like a cold compress.

Next is a slight numbing sensation on the skin. This is extremely vital as skin will not signal the reaction of swelling if it cannot detect the scraping and abrasion of the shaving process. This allows the hair to be cut with any shaving tool while keeping freshly shaved hair and at the skin level. In turn, hair will not become trapped below swollen skin and create an ingrown hair.


And when balanced with the PostShave formulation, the optimal level of lubricants, antiseptics and soothing agents ensure freshly shaved skin stays clean, tight and smooth. Growing hair comfortably slides parallel along the skins surface, significantly reducing follicle re-entry, razor bumps, redness, irritation and itching.
 

What We Need


Ten years is a long time. I was able to invest thousands of my own money for formulation, sampling, engineering and within the last three years, completing the trademark, incorporation and patenting processes. 

I've been able to invest in the web/ecommerce technologies which are now in place and ready for business. Now with the advent of crowdfunding, I am hopeful the need to go it alone is a thing of the past.

The costs to bring this to market include plastic injection tooling/manufacturing, and bulk formulation laboratory costs. These costs total $85,000.


Successful Campaign Perk Schedule


The Impact

PlusOne is necessary. The Multi-Cultural Men's grooming demographic has been absurdly underserved. And while PlusOne finally delivers a true modernization in grooming for this demographic of men, PlusOne doesn't limit itself. 

My barbering clientele is as diverse as you will ever find. This compelled me to examine the plentiful offerings that currently exists for the demographic most served.

I found that these products suffer from their own set of unique issues. Gimmicks ranging from marketing botanical infusions at ineffective percentages, one size fits all 5-in-1 formulations and so on.

After the successful launch of the initial PlusOne offering where the need is greatest, I will be introducing truly effective formulations for all men, utilizing the PlusOne containment and methods. 

And working with my young daughter, I will be introducing a women's line in addition to unique and innovative grooming tools currently in development.

A bit about me: I have a great deal of experience in successfully creating systems and methods that are innovative and modernize my industry. In 2006 I created a suite of software and later, created native apps for my barbering clientele. 

The software empowered my clients to manage their appointments, network and be introduced and incentivized for connecting with local small businesses in our community. 

I love and embrace the entrepreneurial life , which has has led me to this moment. To learn of all of my business ventures please visit www.domsfoi.com/

Risks & Challenges

The greatest challenge in the process of bringing PlusOne to this point was obtaining the proper legal protections, engineering a containment solution to my meticulous standards and amazing formulations that would truly advance and modernize my industry. These hurdles have been successfully cleared. 

I've secured a partnership with a highly esteemed laboratory that will produce these incredible formulations featured in the PlusOne line. The manufacturing plant I've partnered with is one of the best in their industry. I have been assured (to the best of their projections) of the expected timelines in the tooling, sample and mass production.  

However, The challenge for this, or any campaign will be the ability for our chosen vendors to adhere to the agreed production timetables.

PlusOne is my baby, and a true labor of love. I am very thankful for any and all support. However in the event I am unable to reach my funding goals, I will use the backer funds to secure a traditional bank loan as the required collateral portion. This will enable me to complete the deployment of PlusOne to market expeditiously. 

By no means will I give up after all I have given to this vision. PlusOne will be made manifest by any means necessary.

My focus in running this campaign is to efficiently deliver PlusOne in a transparent, expeditious manner. Much is at stake in this process and I have exactly what it takes to accomplish what I started so long ago to achieve.

Other Ways You Can Help

It would be an incredible honor to have my campaign shared with as many people as you can introduce it to. I believe, and I hope you do too - that PlusOne is worthy of your support. 

To show my gratitude, I will be awarding top backers and those who share the PlusOne campaign with PlusOne gift cards and free PlusOne grooming systems. Please visit www.plusonehair.com for all the info.

Thank you, and together I know PlusOne will be the standard of grooming for years to come!

These hurdles have been successfully cleared. 
I've secured a partnership with a highly esteemed laboratory that will produce these incredible formulations featured in the PlusOne line. The manufacturing plant I've partnered with is one of the best in their industry. I have been assured (to the best of their projections) of the expected timelines in the tooling, sample and mass production.  
However, The challenge for this, or any campaign will be the ability for our chosen vendors to adhere to the agreed production timetables.

PlusOne is my baby, and a true labor of love. I am very thankful for any and all support. However in the event I am unable to reach my funding goals, I will use the backer funds to secure a traditional bank loan as the required collateral portion. This will enable me to complete the deployment of PlusOne to market expeditiously. 
By no means will I give up after all I have given to this vision. PlusOne will be made manifest by any means necessary.
My focus in running this campaign is to efficiently deliver PlusOne in a transparent, expeditious manner. Much is at stake in this process and I have exactly what it takes to accomplish what I started so long ago to achieve.   Other Ways You Can Help It would be an incredible honor to have my campaign shared with as many people as you can introduce it to. I believe, and I hope you do too - that PlusOne is worthy of your support. 
To show my gratitude, I will be awarding top backers and those who share the PlusOne campaign with PlusOne gift cards and free PlusOne grooming systems. Please visit www.plusonehair.com for all the info.
Thank you, and together I know PlusOne will be the standard of grooming for years to come!

story:
What Is Migraine Miracle®?

Kelly Lott’s Migraine Miracle® is a natural, holistic and medication-free method for migraine sufferers to relieve their own migraine symptoms quickly and effectively. The Migraine Miracle® healing method incorporates cold stone therapy and specific proprietary essential oil blends to offer dramatic relief from migraine headaches without the use of prescription drugs.

Migraine Miracle® helps migraine sufferers:

  • Reduce vascular swelling that causes pounding migraine pain
  • Calm the brain's reaction to their specific migraine triggers
  • Identify migraine triggers
  • Relieve migraine headache pain without the use of medications


Migraine Miracle® was created by Kelly Lott, a Licensed Massage Therapist for 25 years, A Nationally Certified Massage Therapy Instructor for 18 years, and a Headache Specialist. Until now, the Migraine Miracle® treatment has only been available at massage therapy practices and spas, by hundreds of licensed and trained massage therapists in the U.S. Since Kelly’s passion is helping headache sufferers get relief from their pain, she wants to make this therapy available for migraine sufferers to use in the comfort of their own homes, at work or on the go. She is the leading spokesperson for natural and holistic migraine and headache treatments.

 ° Helplessness. Absolute helplessness and exhaustion that comes from the pain. 

 °Fear. The fear of being in a situation that will cause a migraine.

 °Sadness. Missing out on your family's life, going to soccer games, recitals, dates with your loved one. 

 °Desperation. Trying anything to get rid of these headaches, which could be dangerous. 

 °Loneliness. No one understands the pain. Having to stay in bed when others have fun. 

 °Optimism. There is life without migraines. I can prevent another from coming. There is hope. 

 °Happiness. Sheer happiness being migraine free!

 °Empowered. To change the way you think, the way you live and to know you can conquer the migraines. 



What Makes Migraine Miracle a Revolutionary Treatment?

More than 60 million people in the U.S. suffer from migraine pain – a neurological and vascular ailment that is much worse than a bad headache. The symptoms can be so debilitating that a person is rendered incapable of working or carrying out daily tasks at home.


In the past, the main treatment options for migraine sufferers are strong prescription medications that may eventually lose effectiveness and cause rebound headaches. And for migraine sufferers who choose to cope without medication due to ineffectiveness or how it makes them feel, then the only relief is hours (or even days) of lying down in a dark room.

Now there is an inexpensive, extremely effective, fast-acting natural therapy is available that any sufferer can use at home, at work or while traveling, to quickly relieve migraine symptoms. Your support will help us get the word out about Migraine Miracle® to the global community of migraine sufferers, friends, family and medical practitioners.




How It Works 

Migraine Miracle works by combining three processes:

 °  relieving the vascular swelling that causes migraine pressure and pain by using the cold stones in select areas on the head and neck.

  ° calming the brain using one or more of the included essential oil blends that correspond to the four main migraine triggers: Food Allergies, Environmental Agitation, Stress, and Hormone Imbalances.

  ° by performing pressure point holds on oneself to relieve sinus pressure and headache pain. 

 Many migraine sufferers aren’t sure what causes their headaches, or they can have a combination of triggers. How will you know which oil to use for a given migraine? Simply smell each of the four blends. Whichever one (or more) is pleasing to you is/are the blend(s) to use for this particular migraine episode. The brain will know what it needs to become balanced again-either it is depleted or over stimulated by something.


Cold Stone Therapy


Cold stone therapy is one of the key factors in Kelly Lott’s Migraine Miracle® holistic fusion. Her Cold Stones are specially shaped and hand-crafted from marble. The white color is important for strength, structure and perfectly suitable for maintaining the 36° temperature recommended for maximum relief of swollen blood vessels. Keeping your Cold Stones in the refrigerator is convenient and provides the optimum temperature for immediate use.


Kelly's Four Proprietary Essential Oil Blends

Kelly Lott’s Migraine Miracle® includes four custom proprietary blends of essential oils for the four most common headache triggers. 

  ° Food

  °Environment

  ° Stress

  °Hormone 

The blends were created by a Certified Medicinal Aromatherapist and Blender with over 30 years experience. Only therapeutic-grade essential oils are used in the essential oil blends. Pure plant energy is derived from herbs and plants that have been personally grown and harvested by our suppliers.


Pressure Point Massage 


Pressing up and in at specific points at your orbital ridge bone can help relieve sinus pressure and headache pain. Pressing in to your sinus points (beside your nostrils) also an excellent way to relieve pressure. Be sure to hold each point at least 20-30 seconds according to your pain threshold.


Migraine Miracle Helps You Learn Your Trigger Causes!


In my years of experience working with hundreds of migraine sufferers, I have found that the overall majority of people do not have just one single migraine trigger. Most sufferers have migraines for different reasons on different days or even more than one trigger at a time! To identify your migraine trigger, simply smell each of the four blends. Whichever one (or more) is pleasing to you is/are the blend(s) to use for this particular migraine episode. Whether you react to one or more of our blends, your body and brain instinctively knows which ones are needed to restore balance.


Testimonials

Here is what migraine sufferers have been saying about Migraine Miracle®!
"

25 years ago I was struck by lightning, and have suffered from chronic pressure headaches in the back of my head ever since. You can’t imagine how difficult it can be, suffering with a pain of Level 4 every day, and having to work to alleviate everyone else's pain as a massage therapist. 

I attended a Migraine Miracle® training class to continue my Massage Education, and as part of the class I received a treatment from Kelly Lott. Well, to my own amazement I have had no pain ever since. It has definitely improved my ability to help my clients and the quality of my life." - 

David A. - PRO Practitioner & HOME User

"I was nine years old when I had a horrific bike accident that changed my life forever. Not only did I suffer from a concussion, knocked out my four permanent front teeth, spent 3 and half hours in the operating room resulting in over 300 hundred stitches and acquired minor brain damage, but from that day forth I would live with a constant headache. Since trying Migraine Miracle®, I have used the cold stones and facial strokes on myself about once every other days and I have been headache free for over 2 months! Even if I recently used the stones, the moment I start to feel a headache coming on, I get them out and use them and stop the headache in its tracks!" - Crista T. - HOME User
Initially, I was very skeptical of this treatment. And even though I immediately felt better... I was still skeptical as to whether my migraine headache would actually go away. However, 30 minutes later, my migraine pain was completely gone! I was absolutely flabbergasted! I LOVE the Migraine Miracle® Cold Stone Therapy! 

- 

Cherie B. - HOME User


What We Need And What You Will Receive

I have personally funded this project so far through my own savings and with the help of family and friends. But now I need more friends! I have the marble stones, and essential oil blends ready as well as the design of the new packaging. I need your help to cover the costs of  producing the new packaging and starting an extensive year-long online marketing campaign to get the word out there!  If you can help me fund the next chapter, you will help millions of migraine sufferers learn about an inexpensive, effective, natural and holistic treatment for their symptoms – one that will help them get their life back!

*Please note that your Perks will ship immediately after the campaign has funded. You will receive the current packaging, but rest assured that everything in the kit is brand new and perfect. I want you to get migraine relief right away and get your life back!

My Story

My name is Kelly Lott and I have been a massage therapist for 25 years and a nationally certified massage therapy instructor for 18 years. Over the years, I have treated hundreds of clients with headaches and have become a Headache Specialist. Many of my clients reported using ice packs to ease migraine pain, but complained that they didn’t stay cold enough, long enough to cause effective migraine relief. This sparked the idea of using marble stones, which retain cold for a longer time allowing for migraine pain to dissipate. I also knew it would be helpful to combine this with aromatherapy, to help calm the brain’s reaction to the migraine trigger. Thus was born the holistic fusion that is Migraine Miracle®! 

Migraine Miracle® is divinely linked to my mother, who passed away shortly before I conceived of the idea for this treatment method. I felt my mom so strongly encouraging me to find a way to help people who suffer from migraines, and she was with me every step of the way as I moved forward in researching and developing the product. Her favorite saying to me was "C'mon Kelly, keep up!"


Published Articles

http://bit.ly/AMTAMTJ-Issue-3-Fall-2014

http://bit.ly/MNZ-Mag-4th-Q-2013

http://bit.ly/Massage-Today-Mag-April-2012

http://bit.ly/1OGIaZHMassage-Mag-Issue-191-April-2012

http://bit.ly/Massage-Education-Migraines-Article-2011


The Impact

 ° 60 million migraine sufferers in the U.S. alone. 

 ° 17 billion dollars are lost in productivity work hours every year.

 °13 billion dollars are spent in medication, doctor and ER visits every year.

Two thirds are women between the age of 12 and 60. Men commonly suffer with cluster headaches, and 17% are children who suffer, commonly from food allergies and sports injuries. With each migraine and migraine sufferer being different, it can be difficult to figure out your triggers and find a suitable treatment. The medications available for treatment often have terrible side effects, are addictive and may eventually lose effectiveness or cause rebound headaches. For many migraine sufferers, each episode can mean several days of pain and lost productivity at work and at home. 

 Migraine sufferers go to great lengths searching for a product that is easy to use, is safe and effective with no detrimental side effects. The latest trends are Botox injections, while others have tried surgically implanting electrodes in their brains. Both of these methods can be extremely dangerous and may provide minimal results. Also, neither of these methods can help to identify and address the "cause" of the migraine like Migraine Miracle can. Bottom line and most importantly is that Migraine Miracle works!

Migraine Miracle® offers these sufferers an inexpensive, natural, holistic, fast-acting and safe alternative method they can perform on themselves in their own homes. Your support will help with marketing to raise awareness about Migraine Miracle® in the community of migraine sufferers, their family and friends, and their medical practitioners. It will also help design and produce new packaging for the Migraine Miracle® Home Care Kit, thereby completing production for this new product and getting it ready to ship to those who can benefit from it.


Risks and Challenges

After the new packaging is complete, the next biggest challenge ahead of me is getting the word out to migraine sufferers, their families and friends as well as medical practitioners that a natural, effective drug-free therapy for migraine relief is available! This will take some time, and dedicated efforts in social media, advertising and public relations. I am an expert massage therapist and instructor, but I need help from experts in the world of online marketing. That’s why I am putting together a dream team, to help me learn and manage my online business, and to help this project and method become a success!


Other Ways You Can Help

Don't forget there are ways you can help besides backing our campaign financially. We do need to raise awareness in the broader community of migraine sufferers, friends and family and medical practitioners. Spreading the word can be done for free. If you love what you've seen here, please tell every friend you have. 


FAQ

1. Why do you use marble and why does it need to be cold?

In my research I found that marble which is a very porous stone keeps the cold longer than any other stone or even an ice pack. You can even make ice cream on marble, so I knew that marble was the right choice. You need the cold to help reduce the swelling of the blood vessels in the head and neck. It happens naturally and very quickly, giving you almost instant relief. 


2.  How do I know if my headache is a migraine or just a headache?

A "regular" headache can usually be helped with over the counter medication. A migraine will be something that renders you unable to function normally. The pain is so severe that you can't sleep, work, or drive for instance. You may have extreme sensitivity to light, smells and sound and feel that you need to go to a dark, cool and quite place until it subsides. 


3.  Will this method cure my migraines?

No, there is no known cure for migraines. What this method does is help you to prevent a migraine while helping you to determine your migraine triggers. Knowing what are the potential causes of your migraine is huge.  This knowledge empowers you to live your life instead of worrying when the next one will come. 


4.  Should I journal my headaches?

Yes, I highly recommend it. For one week, write down everything you do, what you eat and when, how much sleep, and especially what you were doing when you feel the symptoms of a migraine coming on. This is an excellent way to help determine your sensitivities, and then put a plan together to avoid the triggers. 


5.  Can I use this method for allergies and/or sinus pain?

Yes! Many people who suffer allergies and sinus headaches have let me know that Migraine Miracle helped them to feel better by overcoming the swelling of the sinuses along with relieving the pain and pressure. These cold marble stones work beautifully in reducing the swelling and itchy eyes. 


6.  Do I have to use all 12 stones?

No. My motto is put the stones where you hurt the most. If you need a big stone right in the middle of your forehead, then go for it. Let your body and pain be your guide. Use some, or use them all. 


7.  How often can I do the treatment to myself or a loved one?

As many times as you wish. This is a natural holistic method, there are no side-affects to doing the treatment many times a day or week. 


8.  What if I don't like any of the essential oil blends?

Your brain may not need balancing at the moment. Usually when you like an aroma, it comes from being over stimulated or depleted from something. Simply breathing in the essential oil blends creates 'aromatherapy', bringing harmony to your body and mind.  


9.  What is the carrier oil in your blends?

Safflower. A very gentle carrier that helps the blends be subtle yet strong enough to calm the brain. I know many migraine sufferers have triggers from smelling strong odors. Do not fear these blends, they are made especially for migraines.


10.  Is it alright to use this method on kids?

Yes. Children over 12 can enjoy the cold marble and aromatherapy. If the stones feel a little too cold, you can have your child or you hold the stones between the hands for about 20 seconds. That will take the edge off of the cold, and then apply where they want them. 

For children under 12, I recommend using a few drops of each essential oil blend on 4 different cotton swabs. Have them breathe in from the cotton swab tip instead of applying directly to the skin. When they choose a blend, you can give the cotton swab to them to hold and breathe from as they wish. 

After removing the stones from the refrigerator, I suggest warming the stones in between your hands first before you apply to the child's skin. Let them feel the stone on the back of their hand first, to confirm they want the stone on their head and/or neck. Every child I have worked with absolutely loved the cold stones. 


11.  Does caffeine affect migraines?

Yes! About 80% of migraine sufferers are addicted to caffeine. The problem with caffeine is that it helps in the short run as it is a vascular constrictor. However, when you come off of the caffeine, you can get a rebound headache. Caffeine withdrawal can be very uncomfortable, and hard to do, so many people continue with the coffee, tea or soda all day. This will only maintain your migraines, not help in the long run. I suggest weaning off the caffeine slowly and you will find the headaches don't come back as often. Over the counter headache medications all have caffeine in them to speed up the pain reliever. This can also cause rebound headaches when over used.

7.  How often can I do the treatment to myself or a loved one?
As many times as you wish. This is a natural holistic method, there are no side-affects to doing the treatment many times a day or week. 


8.  What if I don't like any of the essential oil blends?
Your brain may not need balancing at the moment. Usually when you like an aroma, it comes from being over stimulated or depleted from something. Simply breathing in the essential oil blends creates 'aromatherapy', bringing harmony to your body and mind.  


9.  What is the carrier oil in your blends?
Safflower. A very gentle carrier that helps the blends be subtle yet strong enough to calm the brain. I know many migraine sufferers have triggers from smelling strong odors. Do not fear these blends, they are made especially for migraines.


10.  Is it alright to use this method on kids?
Yes. Children over 12 can enjoy the cold marble and aromatherapy. If the stones feel a little too cold, you can have your child or you hold the stones between the hands for about 20 seconds. That will take the edge off of the cold, and then apply where they want them. 

For children under 12, I recommend using a few drops of each essential oil blend on 4 different cotton swabs. Have them breathe in from the cotton swab tip instead of applying directly to the skin. When they choose a blend, you can give the cotton swab to them to hold and breathe from as they wish. 

After removing the stones from the refrigerator, I suggest warming the stones in between your hands first before you apply to the child's skin. Let them feel the stone on the back of their hand first, to confirm they want the stone on their head and/or neck. Every child I have worked with absolutely loved the cold stones. 


11.  Does caffeine affect migraines?
Yes! About 80% of migraine sufferers are addicted to caffeine. The problem with caffeine is that it helps in the short run as it is a vascular constrictor. However, when you come off of the caffeine, you can get a rebound headache. Caffeine withdrawal can be very uncomfortable, and hard to do, so many people continue with the coffee, tea or soda all day. This will only maintain your migraines, not help in the long run. I suggest weaning off the caffeine slowly and you will find the headaches don't come back as often. Over the counter headache medications all have caffeine in them to speed up the pain reliever. This can also cause rebound headaches when over used.

story:
DID YOU KNOW?

  • 1 in 5 or 7 million Canadians of all ages suffer needlessly in pain

  • Undermanaged chronic pain can severely  and negatively impact the quality of life of individuals, their families and caregivers

  • Veterinary students receive 5 times more pain education than medical students

  • Pain research is still under-funded in Canada

  • Chronic pain costs more than cancer, heart disease and HIV combined

FUNDING FOR THIS CAMPAIGN ENABLES THE CPC TO CONTINUE ITS WORK TO:

  • Improve awareness and understanding of pain in Canada

  • Provide education about pain and pain management to Canadians

  • Participate in pain research priority setting, studies and highlight outcomes

  • Advocate with others for improved pain care within Canada’s healthcare systems

  • Provide a voice for people with pain in all we do!

WHY DO WE NEED YOUR HELP?

By contributing to this campaign you can be assured that you will be enabling the Canadian Pain Coalition to continue its ongoing efforts for Canadians – adults and children alike – who are living with pain.

The CPC is relying on this campaign to move its mission of helping Canadians living in pain and its goals through 2015 and 2016.  In order to do that funding is needed to maintain CPC’s  resources and continue its efforts through government and other submissions, retain administration, update both the CPC and Pain Resource Centre websites, provide guest lectures at Universities and professional conferences, engage the public and professionals at tradeshows and events, ensure involvement in pain research and continue its social media outreach.

HELP US NOW BY DONATING ANY AMOUNT YOU CAN!  See Perks available at different donation levels!

Go to http://www.canadianpaincoalition.ca/ and click on the button that looks like the button below!  Thank you!

Please note: CPC is not a registered Charity and cannot issue charitable receipts, however we are happy to issue a receipt for your donation

CANADA AM INTERVIEW WITH CPC - SEPTEMBER 2014 - VIDEO

http://canadaam.ctvnews.ca/chronic-pain-with-a-plan-it-is-possible-to-live-well-1.2008889

ABOUT THE CANADIAN PAIN COALITION

The Canadian Pain Coalition (CPC), incorporated as a not-for-profit in 2004, is a partnership of pain consumer organizations, individuals living with pain, health professionals treating pain and scientists studying more effective ways of managing pain.

The goals of the CPC are to: (i) promote sustained improvement in the understanding, treatment, management, and prevention of all types of pain in Canada; (ii) increase awareness of pain issues among the general public; (iii) provide educational information about pain conditions and management to people living with pain; (iv) participate in research that improves the lives of Canadians living in pain; and (v) to be a “National Voice of People with Pain” in discussions about improving pain management with government and policy makers.

CPC volunteers accomplish these goals through its education and awareness programs in conjunction with advocating for improved access to multi-disciplinary pain management within Canada’s healthcare systems.

The Canadian Pain Coalition is dedicated to improving the lives of Canadians living in pain through its awareness, education and advocacy programs.  Through its website (http://prc.canadianpaincoalition.ca/en/) and e-newsletter, which are

vetted by medical professionals – the CPC is constantly updating information for Canadians and ensuring they are aware of pain prevention, treatment and managements options, and resources to help manage their pain. The Canadian Pain Coalition relies heavily on outside funding support and is committed to ensuring its current resources remain viable options for Canadians living with pain.

 

NATIONAL PAIN AWARENESS WEEK - NOV 1-7, 2015

The Canadian Pain Coalition successfully had the Senate establish National Pain Awareness Week in 2004.  The first week of November each year has been dedicated to building awareness and providing education across Canada as CPC, its member organizations and others hold events, engage media and advocate for improved pain management. In 2015 this week runs from November 1 – 7, 2015.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP?

Please share our story and our campaign goals with others within your network and use the Indiegogo Share tools to get the word out to all Canadians!

You can also find this Campaign on:

https://www.facebook.com/CanadianPainCoalition

https://www.twitter.com/CaPainCoalition

Hello My name is Gerry Washington

I'm raising money for one of Big mama's Natural Herbal Formulas

I was very young when Big mama and I would pick herbs in her garden, she was always cooking up something in her kitchen with her herbs, she would make teas, , salves, creams, and herbal tintures, ect.... we never got sick.

Big mama would say to me " Baby"  This is good  for this,  or Baby" This is good for that,   This is a most remarkable Skin Serum.

This Natural Herbal Formula is unlike any other.... It is powerful yet gentle Liquid formula that has the ability to take away Musty Odors Underarms and musty butt odor too... It rejuvenates the skin everywhere as it absorbs toxins and replenish the skin with minerals and nutrients. It is a Natural Wrinkle Reducer.

This Herbal Formula for healthy skin, from the inside out have worked time and time again..... With No Chemicals or Active Ingredients ..... The Serum is A Natural Body Serum for the entire body and a Powerful Antioxidant and a Natural Deodorant /Moisturizer/ Sun screen /Wrinkle Reducer.... all in one bottle....

Your skin will immediately start reaping the results.

 Please Support my Campaign today and you too can benefit today from Big mama's Herbal Formula - Uni-SexSerum...

Thank You for Your Support

story:
Hello! I am here to tell you about a brand new product called The EFOR Device.  While we only have CAD files (photorealistic design and pictures available, we need your support for prototyping, manufacturing and production.  We developed the EFOR Device in order to help people remove foreign objects from their eyes, avoid costly doctor and emergency room visits and help relieve eye stress from staring at small objects or computer screens.  We think it will help people in need of a solution for eye pain, long-term damage and stress.

Do you ever think about giving your eyes a break, they are the one body part that is active all day long?

Do you want to find a portable and efficient solution to eye pain but don’t know how?

Are you interested in visiting a doctor but don’t have the time or money?

If you answered, “Yes” to any of these questions, you may want to keep reading…


Our popular culture reinforces the idea that eye care is very expensive. We're out to change that fallacious idea one “EFOR Device” at a time! Help us establish this initiative to serve people in need of a solution. For a pledge of $(149.00) gets an “EFOR Device” to an individual and can change their ideas about what they can accomplish for the rest of his or her life.  Finding out your eye pain or discomfort can be solved with ease will be life changing. Empower us to make this vision a reality with a donation to this project today!

Studies have shown that debris under the flap of the eyes can lead to glaucoma, also the human body is constantly under 14.5 pounds (psi) of atmospheric pressure daily, this could be a reason we feel tiredness around the eye areas at the end of the day, the EFOR device creates a negative pressure around the eyes therefore relieving the tiredness you feel in the eye areas.– This fact prompted us to dig deeper into a solution.  This is where we started to envision “EFOR Device” and all the possible benefits we could bring to people:

·  Lower medical bills

·  Relieve  pain

·  Less stress on your eyes

Features:

·  Portable

·  Convenient

·  Easy-to-use

When reviewing these benefits, features and much more, it inspired and assured us that this is a business that needs to be created. We feel if executed properly we can reach a large market of people in need of an easier way to clean out their eyes.  Our features will make us incredibly qualified to succeed in the eye care industry.  This paired with attention to detail and quality service will make us a key player if not leader in the eye care industry. Our mission is to take care of every funder, supporter and customer with the upmost respect and care.  We feel this will be the key to our growth.

Our company is passionate with creating an unmatched solution that’s going to keep your eyes feeling great and rested for your busy day’s needs. Our company will run the business based on our mission statement of reducing avoidable eye issues and strain and severe visual impairment by raising awareness on how to keep your eyes clean with our great, easy-to-use tool.

For us to bring the “EFOR Device” to life, we need your support!

Your generous funding will help us get things started in order to realize our concept. It will assist us with the cost of further development, manufacturing and production. More importantly you get the chance to be one of the first users of the “EFOR Device”.  We will also use our funding to test our concept to make it better.  We are committed to continuous improvement so we are always giving people the best possible solutions.

We will also be using the funding to:

·  Expand the possibilities for the usage for consumers as well as enterprise solutions of the “EFOR Device”

·  Further customize the first version of the “EFOR Device”

·  Create additional products and services that will compliment “EFOR Device”More

The “EFOR Device” needs pledging but above all it needs your attention and interest! If you love this product as much as we do then please take a moment to click on one of our social media buttons (Facebook, Twitter and YouTube at the bottom of the page). Help us spread the word and get things started!

How We'll Use the Funds

We need about {$25,000} ß Insert Goal amount in order to break “EFOR Device” onto the market. That will includes marketing, materials, labor and related expenses for start-up.

Final Thank You and Links

We feel so grateful to everyone who has taken the time to read out campaign and for those who contributed what they could to make a difference and helping us spread the word.  We have spent the last few months working hard to bring our vision to life in this campaign and it was worth every minute thanks to all our generous supporters.  Please know your efforts, even the smallest, don’t go unnoticed.  We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped us achieve.  You are part of our “EFOR Device” family.

If you cannot donate but you are interested in helping, please contact us so we can set you up with a referral program! You might even be able to earn perks, just by spreading the word!

story:
Who is Harmoni~Zen Skin

This story is about a 49 year old girl. I say girl because that is what she presents to the world. Her days are filled with rising to the morning sun in the summer, and dark cold days during winter months. She plays on her farm every moment her eyes are open; with the magic of animals and nature. Her world takes every thought and produces an action, creating harmony with her surroundings. Could it be this place she calls her farm is more than it appears? I'ts not just apple blossoms and bird song, it's about being a part of a greater plan. The closness she now depends upon, depends upon to bring out the path to her future. For in this closness developes the bond which nature beckons us all... to become the harmony of bird song and apple blossoms. So she creates......

Hello, my name is Nicole and I'm the creator of Zen Skin. Thank you for looking over my campaign. I  make Goat Milk Soap & raise pure breed Toggenburg Goats on RAN Farm. We are two simple people living on a little farm. My partner Rich works all week away from home while I stay tending to the animals and making Goat milk soap. Our weekends are filled with catching up and doing projects. 

Running a farm on one income can be a challenge, but we know the future is bright. I thought someone may like to help me continue making a business of my soap and skin care. Every penny goes back to the farm, so I make extra cash in various ways to buy my ingredients; selling my soap to friends, selling eggs, collection cans, and saving change from the laundry pants pockets. I love the Indiegogo idea.

Why Goat Milk Soap

I can't sell my raw goat milk, the laws are very strict here in the United States, especially Oregon. I don't believe in pasteurizing my milk. I can't sell raw goat milk off the farm and I'd rather not sell pasteurized milk just to make money. 

Making soap is a natural on a goat dairy farm, especially one which is self-sustaining. I also had a severe contact dermatitis rash on my hands, it was horrible & painful. It's almost impossible to milk 3 goats two times a day with swollen cracked hands. Once I got the Eczema type rash under control with steroids I was determined to  research this condition. Many people had be relieved by goat milk soap, go figure I had the solution right in my hands, literally. Oh, and the fact I had 21 gallons of milk each week.

About my soap and other products

  • All products are made in small batches,
  •  Fresh ingredients off the farm.
  •  Most soap is made with  our goat milk and no water.
  •  Organic ingredients are a must when I can get them.
  • Preservatives are never used, unless they are all natural.

Who would use my soaps and skin care products

The last 2 years I have made and sold soaps and skin care to many people. My customers have been people through out my community, riche's co-workers, our family too. I have discussed wanting to expand from hobby to making a little business. So many people enjoy Zen Skin products I think it would be an excellent addition  to anyone's skin care regime. The benefits of using fresh farm crafted soaps and skin products are vital to a healthy body. I don't make any medical claims, but the internet is full of true stories.

The Plan

I have expanded my customer base in several ways. 

  1. Dedicated webspace & blog to highlight Harmoni~ZenSkin
  2. Etsy Store to open in July
  3. Social media, opened facebook & twitter
  4. Contacted several Farmers Markets to sell at this summer
  5. Selling to the local River Lodges here in Coastal Mountains of Oregon

How would I use funds from Indiegogo

  • Soap supplies...bulk lye, oils, butters
  • Skin Care supplies...salts, oils, ect
  • Containers, packaging supplies and label supplies
  • Business license and registration
  • Booth set up for farmers market...table, unbrella, banner
  • Invest in large botles of Essential Oils, a must have in my business

Thank you again for making a contribuition to Harmoni~Zen Skin. I'm very excited to share my soap to people who need it, weather for relief or pleasure. Please contact me if you have any questions about my project. I hope you find this information useful and will share with many others. Love Rules


Other ways to HELP

It's all about spreading the word. I search indiegogo looking for campaigns to supoort and then share their information. Lets keep the ball rolling. Share, like tweet, fb...it all works to help us all get a little help.

Every few days I plan on sharing a campaign from Indiegogo, using my FB, twitter, Blog, Website. How fantastic it would be to help another person through my own social media. Love it.

Please contact me if you have any questions about my project. I hope you find this information useful and will share with many others. Love RulesOther ways to HELPIt's all about spreading the word. I search indiegogo looking for campaigns to supoort and then share their information. Lets keep the ball rolling. Share, like tweet, fb...it all works to help us all get a little help.Every few days I plan on sharing a campaign from Indiegogo, using my FB, twitter, Blog, Website. How fantastic it would be to help another person through my own social media. Love it.

story:
Help in Egypt, working in a poor remote village in upper Egypt for 3 years, establishing a small school and a healthcare programme with local doctors, it came to light that there were many people old and young suffering eye infections and cataracts. A chance meeting with an eye Doctor who suggested that he would be willing to operate a mobile eye surgery to outlying villages and carry out eye examinations and cataract removal on site seemed like a good idea to us. Eye problems affect not only the  person but the whole family, as, if untreated can result in total blindness. A cataract operation can take 15 minutes and restore a persons sight. Our aim, with Dr Bahar is to treat as many people as possible. A vehicle is essential to carry out this work as we can go to the people as they cannot afford transport or the cost of an operation in the clinic. Dr Bahar is willing to give his services for free wherever Help in Egypt want him to go, to make this possible we are in need of a vehicle, to help us, to help him, to help them.


Help us to buy a bus
Help them by helping us
Giving people back their sight
Surely they all have this right

Imagine that you cannot see
 we take for granted,you and me
Our mobile unit is on its way
So they can see in just one day

If you can spare a few pence for
Help in Egypt to do more
Help another human being
Let them see what we are seeing.

story:
1 in 1000. That's me. Not very many have this condition, even fewer know what it is and how it impacts your daily life. I am 1 of the 1000 people diagnosed with this rare brain disorder: Chiari Malformation or Arnold Chiari Malformation.It is a condition in which the brain has outgrown the skull, causing the cerebellum portion to grow downward into the spinal column. Unfortunately, the spinal column is already filled with the spinal cord. So the result ends up being overcrowding of the spinal column and crushing of the spinal cord. Since the brain and the spine are affected, symptoms and related conditions are numerous. At last count there were 86 possible symptoms.  I happen to be one of the lucky ones so far. I only have 23 of the 86. My vision Is distorted so I can no longer drive. My eyes are imbalanced, causing them to oscillate, are nd my balance problems have caused numerous falls, the worse resulting in a broken ankle. These have been the worse symptoms  However the pain is constant. As an adult patient I see bits of my life slowly disappearing. This disorder however is genetic. Children as young as 1 have been included as patients of this dreadful disorder.   I read stories of parents and grandparents pleading desperately for help. Its a painful, debilitating disorder and there is no cure. Usually it takes years to even diagnose since most physicians are not  familiar with the condition, it's symptoms or its treatment. The greatest frustration of those affected with this condition is in locating a knowledgeable physician. The symptoms are often attributed to other conditions until an MRI of the brain is finally done. 
 Repeated, unexplained falls, blurred off balanced vision and horrific headaches finally forced my physicians to perform the MRI. I had to terminate the services of 2 neurologist before finding one that was familiar with the condition beyond what he had read about in medical school. As I researched the condition on my own, I became more and more concerned about the young children experiencing the same things I was. I couldn't imagine being the parent of a young child facing a brain disorder, and brain surgery.. Or preparing to go through an MRI. Or asking desperately if anyone knew of an experienced neurosurgeon because my young child needed brain surgery. I had my first surgery last week. A cervical spine fusion. One of the many related conditions. As soon as I am healed enough, I will have the recommended treatment: decompression surgery of the brain and spinal cord. Note it is merely a treatment.  There is no cure. 
My hope, like every other Chiarian is that the pain and symptoms will lessen, progression will be halted and we can somehow regain our lives back. Money is being raised to increase awareness about this terrible condition, to increase education within the medical community and to research conditions and hopefully lead to a cure. I am seeking help however for those affected themselves by this terrible disorder. This is a very lonely condition. Once you convince your family's , friends and physicians that your pains are not "in your head" ,exaggerated. or imagined or that you really aren't lazy or depressed,  you need all the support you can get. I am hoping to support the patients and their families through this very rough time. The stress and burdens of everyday life are often forgotten at times like this. A parent that has to travel to get help for their child has many uncovered needs. An adult patient, such as myself, may live alone and require someone just to help with household chores I can no longer do. Or a husband may be needed as caregiver and not be able to work for a month Or more. Additional children need to be cared for  Travel to the Institute in New York requires air tickets and hotel fees. One patient had need of sleepwear, another of bedding and special pillows. The financial strain of these "little" things is something we all have, and something we can all relieve these 1000 patients of. I hope with your assistance, to begin a foundation for Chiairian patients and their families. Please help bring life's smiles back to me and my fellow chiarians

• Male, divorced, immigrant from Russia, US citizen, have an MD, RN, and higher degree in finance, 25 years of entrepreneurial experience and proven records in various successful businesses in Russia and USA
    • Our campaign is designed to help people quit and stop smoking tobacco. It is a well known fact that smoking tobacco leads to serious damages in health, quality of life and finances. We cannot pretend that it is not our business, because we all have someone we care about who is still a smoker. 
      One of every five deaths in the United States can be attributed to smoking: 

                                                                                                                                
    • This is the reasons why we are trying to bring an opportunity to substitute regular tobacco & cigarette smoking for affordable electronic cigarettes. The vaping experience is a fun and popular substitute to regular cigarettes, which does not carry the same health risks and is better for the environment,just check that proof of experienced heavy smoker!
    • Where funding goes to:

We would like to reach as large of an audience as possible without sticking our hands in people's pockets, as many greedy local stores and businesses do.
    • 2.Free samples give away for people who is want to give up regular smoking.
    • 3.Manage advertisement for popularization of quit smoking along with contest campaign and sports competitions or any other healthier events like exhibitions of artists,musician festivals,etc. and many other activities.
    • WE are looking for YOU! Every vote and dollar would count to become part of this huge opportunity to help people change their bad habit to a more attractive and healthy lifestyle. Because quitting smoking is an extremely difficult task for many to accomplish, we need to help smokers as much as possible. One way we could do this is by decreasing the financial burden of buying cigarettes and offering attractive prices on electronic cigarettes (we already sell our products for 20-30% less than regular market prices sample booth(website)with most affordable E cigarettes prices on the market! ,and  would be more discounted  later up to 40-50% less if we create our successful website ,because we pay high 20% commissions overall for middleman(e commerce platform and websites) and currently cannot afford to lower more yet! )
    • We are hoping to raise $69,990 in order to hire talented programmers and web designers to create this unique web store and to create a search engine optimization (SEO) campaign to reach as many customers as possible. We will offering the purchase of products directly from us, which offers customers savings of 30-50% on the same or better quality products they would have purchased elsewhere.
    • create website-that is new job positions for Americans,feed our American suppliers and contractors ,pay for ad (American net businesses)to reach maximum effectiveness, sample booth(website)with most affordable E cigarettes prices on the market! buy the products  at large amount from reliable manufacturer directly(to drastically reduce initial costs!)-if You just minimally calculate what we just described and could imagine? today's cost for that kind project overall is-20-30 Times higher! and more than what we asking for! because we know how manage and how to succeed in self sufficient mode and most cost effectiveness model of  operation!
    • Our goal would be reached, if even a few smokers quit, since we know it would improve both their lives and the lives of their loved ones. But we will try as hard as possible to maximize the amount of quitters and will share their stories on the website!
    • We will successfully finish this website and campaign even, if we do not reach our funding goal, however we will do it much faster and be more successful in improving the lives of Americans with YOUR direct contribution!!!

**************************************************

I have personally studied all about smoking related diseases before becoming a doctor of medicine and vice-chief of a hygiene ,epidemic disease and environmental  prevention facility.

The most important way to to stay healthy is through prevention and prophylaxis...not cures!

To explain further, living a healthy lifestyle to prevent illness is the most important thing. It is never too late to start improving your health, and we all know that the cost of FIXING and curing a disease is much more difficult and expensive than preventative care. Furthermore, preventative care is the only way to avoid illnesses that are not reversible and have no cure. Since smoking significantly damages health with incurable diseases like lung cancer for example, we know that preventative care such as smoking cessation is the only way to truly prevent this damage.


***************************************************************************

share with people what you want to comeback into your life: 

Want Love? share love with everyone-its come back to you with more passion and from everyone, even those you do not know

You  want more money?-give away money! its will come back to you more ,more and more! 

Everything you want?!!!Yes! Anything!!!Just one suggestion only:give away freely ,happily and easily!!!And would be comeback as boomerang with  greater ease than you even imagine!

**************************************************

E-cigarettes are a new solution that's not perfect yet, but logically and factually it's less damaging for the health (practically non-damaging if products do not contain nicotine and are made by strict quality standards). These products do not contain tar, carbon monoxide, arsenic, formaldehyde, and other toxic and carcinogenic contents of regular cigarettes. E-cigarette users have the option of interchanging either nicotine or non-nicotine containing oils/liquids inside the tanks/atomizers of the cigarette to their liking,and also can choose 100% natural content.
WHY WE WOULD BE SUCCESSFUL:

 


We have more that 2 years experience wholesale and online retail e cigs products & accessories  sample booth(website)with most affordable E cigarettes prices on the market!   and combine  almost 7 years in retail vapor stores as partnership;

  • By encouraging use of e-cigarettes over regular cigarettes, we may prevent people from even trying regular cigarettes and becoming addicted, since regular smoking is no longer considered cool! Remember, please, dear contributor, how regular tobacco smoking affects young adults, pregnant women, breastfeeding, even passive smokers, which every single one of us non-smokers unintentionally become, when we are exposed to tobacco smoke in public places. As long as there is even one smoker in the world, we are all exposed to the damage of their cigarette. 
  • The only way we can stop this right here and right now - if we try to end smoking once and for all. By participating on this website you are able to help do this!
  • Can We  stop this sometimes??? Yes,of cause,if never give up and We try to do that ,Here , Right Now by doing this contribution on this site! 
  • What people and professional are saying...


*"I started using e cigarettes with starter kit and I am sure I did the best decision in the last 5 years, haha .Already saved a lot of money and a few years of my life :)" Andrew Patterson ,quit regular smoking fellow  at SparkPeople.com

*"E cigarettes should be a last resort to quit smoking...", the American Heart Association says in a new  statement.

*"E cigarettes is safer and great substitute for the cigarettes ,because do not contain TAR,which is major cause of cancer"...Dr. David Baron,M.D

*Researchers also compared the toxicant levels in both e-liquids and aerosols versus tobacco smoke. They found that e-liquids and aerosols were much lower in toxicants and that their carcinogen content was “negligible.” This is supported by a finding by Roswell Park Cancer Institute researchers. They reviewed 12 e-cig brands and found that toxicant levels were 9 to 450 times lower than in cigarette smoke.

and many more....

REFERRAL PROGRAM

Refer as many friends as you can and when their contributions total the amounts shown below, you'll be rewarding(this program work for folks-who are at list contribute $10 or more or buy $3 perk contribution, which have exclusive right for Referral Bonuses)! And YES, any previous Quit smoking ASAP referrals count toward this program as long as you used your unique referral link!

How Does it Work?
1. Log into your Indiegogo account to signup for an Indiegogo account, if you have not yet already created an account. 
2. Navigate to the  http://igg.me/at/quitsmokeasap   campaign page and click the "link" icon on the left side of the campaign and then paste this link into an email to send to all your friends. Or click the Facebook, Twitter, or Google Plus icons to share your unique link on your social media accounts. 
3. View your total referral contribution amount by logging into your profile in the upper right and then click "Referrals".

*"E cigarettes is safer and great substitute for the cigarettes ,because do not contain TAR,which is major cause of cancer"...Dr. David Baron,M.D
*Researchers also compared the toxicant levels in both e-liquids and aerosols versus tobacco smoke. They found that e-liquids and aerosols were much lower in toxicants and that their carcinogen content was “negligible.” This is supported by a finding by Roswell Park Cancer Institute researchers. They reviewed 12 e-cig brands and found that toxicant levels were 9 to 450 times lower than in cigarette smoke.

story:
Short Summary

Hello my name is Noah Wilson and I am a 17 year old grade 12 student living in Ontario Canada. The reason that I started this campaign is to honour my grandfather Benjamin Gaudet who is stricken with bone and lung cancer. Cancer is a horrible disease that affects 2 in 5 Canadians and 1 in 4 will die from this disease. The Canadian Cancer Society relates that in 2014 there were 76,600 deaths in Canada. Cancer touches the lives of everyone and in late 2014 it affected my Papa.  

My Papa has been a hard working man that came to Ontario from Digby, Nova Scotia, he got married and raised a family in the Oshawa area. He worked in the GM plant on the line for over 40 years. Benjamin Gaudet is an avid wood worker and has always taught his 6 grandchildren (including me) all about how to use a skill saw and how not to lose a finger. Whenever there was anything that we needed Papa was the first to help. He is a quiet but funny man who has touched so many and deserves so much more!

The 5,000 goal that my Dad and I are trying to raise is for the sole purpose of contributing to the Princess Margaret Cancer Centre. To honour my Papa I have entered the Enbridge Conquer Cancer ride. This is a 200km journey that was designed to raise money and recognize all the people that are fighting or have fought cancer. To participate we are required to raise a minimum of 2,500 dollars each and I believe that this ride would be a wonderful way to demonstrate to my Papa  how much we will miss him. Although my grandfather has lost his fight I would like to make sure that no one else loses their Papa or anyone that means the world to them!

Please help stop this despicable robbery. Cancer truly is a crime against humanity and it unfairly robs us all! Help me get on that bicycle. I promise we will ride every kilometre with a tireless heart fuelled by your support!! 

What We Need

The money will only be used and donated to the Princess Margaret Cancer Centre to help people. If I do not reach my goal and I am not able to participate in the ride the money is still headed for funding Cancer research. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you would like to enter the ride and defeat cancer or if you would like more info about the ride I encourage everyone to visit this site: http://to15.conquercancer.ca/site/PageServer?pagename=to15_homepage 

If you are not able to donate I implore you to pass on my Papa's story and help me honour him in the way I would like.  

If you have a story that you would like to share with us feel free to email me at noahw10@icloud.com. I would love to help honour anyone that has been affected.

story: As most of you know, my dad has had a rough go of things this last year. From being in the hospital for a month with a ruptured colon, to breaking his back in a skiing accident yesterday. I started this link to try and help him out. Please donate or forward this link to anyone you think would be interested in helping. Anything helps and is much appreciate.

story:
When my youngest son was four, he was diagnosed with a rare kidney disease. So many emotions are involved when a child has a major illness, but one of the most overpowering is the sense of helplessness. The language the doctors speak is foreign, your life is now spent in a hospital, and the fear and tears have to be held back because you don't want to show your child just how terrified you are.
Overnight our kitchen turned into a pharmacy. There were so many medications, procedures, and precautions we had to know and any mistakes we made could have had dreadful consequences.

My son was not lucky. Most children who contract this disease eventually grow out of it. We fought it as hard as we could but finally his little kidneys couldn't fight anymore. He had to have surgery to have them removed. He would be on dialysis, placed on the organ transplant list, his medications would keep him alive, and we would have many harrowing episodes where he would have to be rushed to the emergency room. We went on like this for years. I quit my job and went to work as a janitor in my son's hospital. I hated that job but seeing his smiling face everyday made it worth it. It's hard to keep any job when you are always rushing to and spending so much time in the hospital. 


When my son turned 15 a wonderful thing happened. He got a kidney transplant. The change was miraculous. He could run and play. The disease had always stunted his growth but now he was getting taller. The pharmacy that was in our kitchen was gone. He only had to remember to take his anti rejection pill. When an organ is transplanted your body fights it because it is foreign material, the anti rejection medication stops your body from attacking the organ. So just the one pill and all of a sudden my son has his life back. No more hospital, no more pill regimen, and he was so happy.

The bottom fell out of our world when we forgot to make sure he took his pill. It was the hardest thing I ever went through. Back to the hospital, back to the pills, instead of being happy we felt miserable. Nothing was harder than looking at my son and seeing in his eyes that he thought he failed me. And I thought I failed him.

Ever since that time my son has been on dialysis. Three times a week. He never received another transplant. He was older now and the list was longer. Deservedly so, younger children go to the front of the line.

My son adjusted. He takes his medicine and never misses his treatments. He plays the hand dealt to him like a real man and I am extremely proud of him. He lives in Las Vegas and has a beautiful singing voice and he performs in casinos and is a recording artist.

But I could not move on. My mind would always go back to that awful day of the doctors explaining that the kidney could not be saved. It haunted me. I remember what they called it. Non compliance. I hated it because it made it sound like he chose not to take his meds. But it was just the medical term that was used to describe the broad problem. I also remember the doctors saying that this happens frequently to transplant recipients. Because they have been sick and feeling unwell but now with the transplant they feel great and it is a very easy thing to forget. It's just a pill, such a mundane little thing to do. So I just couldn't stop thinking about this thing. I started learning more about it. Not just transplant recipients, but diabetics, heart disease, hypertension, COPD, on and on. This thing was wiping people out to the tune of 125,000 deaths a year! And all those people like my son, who did not die but who suffered so much. And their families.
I didn't know it at the time but I was pretty much an expert on the problem because I lived it. I knew all the products that were available to help people remember and organize their medication but I kept saying to myself, "All these things remind you but nothing makes sure you take the medicine." And that was the core of the problem.

For example, I remembered watching my son on two specific occasions. My son had a really nice wristwatch with an alarm to remind him to take his medicine. The first time I noticed the problem with reminders was when my son's watch alarmed; he shut it off, but before he could take his medicine, the doorbell rang.  It was his buddies coming to visit.  If I hadn't reminded him he would have forgotten his medicine. The next time I saw the problem his watch alarmed while he was asleep. He was half awake when he turned off the alarm and went back to sleep. It was so easy to disregard the alarm. It did not protect him at all. Reminders only work when the circumstances are nearly perfect. But whose life is really like that?

I don't know why those incidents stuck in my memory but they did. This was just stuff humans do. Real life distractions, events, and priority choices. And that was the key to why reminders have a major flaw. They can be turned off before the medicine is taken. It is too easy to get distracted by events or convenience.
Over and over I turned this thing around in my head. It was years since that awful day but I was still angry about losing so much and now after studying so much, I knew this same scenario was playing out over and over. I guess if you think about something long and hard enough the light bulb finally comes on. "It's too easy to turn the reminder off. The alarm should go off AFTER you take your medicine!" I figured it out. And I knew enough about electronics to make a prototype. I put together a lab in my apartment and went to work. It was frustrating because it took so long to get parts.  I had to order each component and have them shipped.  Finally I had everything I needed. I put it together and the thing worked beyond my dreams. It was so easy to use and made sense to everyone who saw it. Back then I had no idea how far away I was from a real product and how many successes and disappointments were to come. Building the company, securing the intellectual property, designing the pendant, finding a manufacturer, on and on. I kept pushing, I kept trying, it's been more than six years but I kept going.

Now, I have a market ready product and have a major pharmacy chain ready to put it in their stores. But it costs a lot of money to be able to fulfill the inventory, shipping, and legal costs. I want to be able to provide these pendants to the public. It breaks my heart when people ask for one of my pendants and I cannot give them one. I know it's for their health or someone they love and want to protect. I also want to show my son that all that he went through was for a reason. We can make it so other families won't have to go through what we did.

Almost everyone knows someone who takes medication. Help pass this story on because this could really make a difference in so many people's lives.
